item.text: rdo rje khros pa phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud bzhugs so//
rgya gar skad du/ badzra kro d+ha kI la ya mU la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje khros pa phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rnams skye ba
med pa la/ mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas shing/ sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad ltar gnas pa la/ skye 'gag med cing bdag dang gzhan du ma mthong ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ thams cad
byang chub sems gcig la/ snang ba tha dad par snang ste/ gcig dang du ma brjod las 'das/ kye kye/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// ngo bo gcig las med pa la// gcig la
snang ba tha dad pas// gcig la du ma brjod las 'das// zhes gsungs so// dpe mnyam pa nyid dang// don mnyam pa nyid dang// thams cad lhun gyis grub pa nyid do// e ma ho/
'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gcig dang du ma brjod las 'das// 'di zhes gcig tu bstan par dka'// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// bcos slad med
par mya ngan 'das// zhes gsungs so// 'khor ba bcos bslad med rtogs na// yid bzhin nor bu dag 'dra ba'i// gang ltar byas kyang lhun gyis grub par yin par ston// dbye
ba med pa'i don rtogs so// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' zhing// ci yang med las cir yang snang// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su snang// gcig
dang tha dad du mar snang// 'khor ba nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// ma rig pa nyid yang dag lam// byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na// rtog pa g.yeng ba chos kyi sku// ma rig ye shes tha

dad med// so sor snang ba phye ba tsam// ma rig pa yang lam du gcig/ dang po gang nas ma byung bas// tha ma gar yang 'gro ba med// dang po skye ba'i rgyu med pas// tha mar 'chi ba'i lam yang med// dngos po
gcig la mi gnas pas// 'di zhes gcig tu bstan du med// skye shi 'pho ba'i gnas med pas/ gsad cing gcad la gzung du med// ma rig pa yi rtog pa yis// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur// rdo rjai lta

bur gnas pa las// sgyu ma chu zla brag cha 'dra// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu gsungs so// kye kye/ thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs las// stong gsum rgyal ba'i skus gang yang// byang chub sems las g.yos pa
med// dper na nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin// dkar dmar sngo ste ngos bzung med// de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin yang// 'di zhes gcig tu bstan du med// mi shes bar snang 'ja' tshon 'dra// de phyir ma
bcos de bzhin bzhag/ ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// yab yum sras bcas snang ba yang// byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gcig/ skye 'chi med pa'i byang chub
sems// 'du 'bral med do chos kyi sku// bzang ngan med do 'khor 'das chos// rgyu 'bras med do mnyam pa nyid// 'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid ni// dper na rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra// nam mkha' bzhin du ye
gnas la// nam mkha' 'di ni 'di 'dra zhes// tshig tu rab tu brjod du med// de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin yang// 'di zhes gcig tu bstan du med// bstan na gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i
chos// bstan du med pa bstan pa'i mchog/ blta ru med pa blta ba'i mchog/ bsgom du med pa bsgom pa'i mchog/ bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig ni// ma bsrungs bzhin du lhun gyis grub// ma nor ma
bcos dbyings nyid las// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings// thog mar gzhal yas byang chub sems// de ni rgyu 'bras ma bkag chos// dper na rgya mtsho chen po la// chu bran thams cad 'bab cing
'du// de bzhin byang chub sems nyid la// 'khor 'das gnyis ka 'byung zhing 'du// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu gsungs so// e ma bde gshegs snying po ni// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' zhing// me
long bzhin du gzung du med// brag cha bzhin du brjod dang bral// bcud kyi rdo rje snying po ni// bdag dang gzhan du dbye ru med// bstan du med pa'i chos nyid 'di// brjod du med kyis go bar
gyis// brjod med brjod pa rjod pa'i mchog/ mnyan bsam bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis// blo yi rtog pa kha phye nas// nges pa'i don 'di rtogs par gyis// nges pa'i don 'di ma rtogs na// bsgom pa bsgrub pa

yun ring yang// mi shes gzung 'dzin 'ching ba'i rgyu// de phyir rtogs pa sngon du 'gro// rtogs pa gdeng du ma gyur na// ji ltar bshad kyang 'ching ba'i rgyu// rtogs pa gdeng gi blta ba 'di// dngos po gshis kyi
gnas lugs brtag/ nges pa'i don 'di ma rtogs na// mnyam bzhag bsgoms kyang chags pa'i rgyu// spu gri'i nags tshal la sogs kyang// rang gi rtog pa brtas pa'i phyir// de phyir rtogs pa sngon du
btang// rab tu rtogs pa 'di zhes pas// rtogs pas brtags na kun kyang 'grub// rtogs pa'i don 'di rab tu gces// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis ched du brjod
do// de nas 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa/ rang bzhin gyi dur khrod chen po'i gnas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin gang bar gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das dur khrod kyi
bdag po zhes bya ba dang/ gtso bo la 'khril ba'i yum dang/ dregs pa can dbang du sdud pa'i 'jigs byed chen po bcu dang/ 'khril ba'i yum dang/ thogs pa med pa'i mgo brnyan dang/ yang sprul sum sprul
dpag tu med pa'i 'khor dang bcas nas/ rang bzhin gyis gnas so// de nas dur khrod kyi bdag po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye kye/ gtso bo gtso mo 'khor bcas
kyang// rang bzhin dur khrod chen po na// me long chu zla gzugs brnyan 'dra// nyon mongs dri mas gos pa med// rang bzhin don gyi dbyings na bzhugs// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ston pa ste// rang
bzhin dur khrod dam pa na// gsung gi chos rnams mi ston te// thugs kyis chos rnams 'jal bar ston// thugs kyi brda' yis 'jal bar ston// zhes yum dang gnyis su med par mnyam par bzhugs so// rdo

rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mnyam pa dang rtogs pa'i sgo nas gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang dgyes pa chen po des 'og min gyi gnas na bzhugs nas// yum dang yang 'khril ba'i tshul du

gnas pa la/ kye kye/ dag pa dri ma med pa'i mchog/ bla med byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs// 'khor ba'i rnam rtogs sbyang ba dang// drag pos 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir// yab yum gnyis med 'khril ba'i tshul// zhes rdo

rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// de nas yul dang mnyam nyid 'khril ba'i tshul gyis/ kye kye/ bde gshegs rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso// mnyam nyid chen po'i don bstan nas// gang la gang 'dul bstan pa'i phyir// rdo rje
rigs kyi gtso mchog la// gnas med don gyis 'khyud par bgyi// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dgyes pa chen pos gsang ba'i thugs mnyam pa'i ngang gis/ kye kye// don nyid snying po bde gshegs
gtso// bde gshegs thams cad thugs kyi sras// 'gro ba yongs kyi ded dpon gtso// gnyis su med pa'i yum dang bzhugs// zhes gleng bslangs te mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas

yab yum chen mo nyid kyis mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// kye kye/ bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// ma rig mun pa 'joms pa'i bdag/ kun kyang 'gro ba'i don bya'i phyir// dri med zla
gsal nyi zla'i 'od// dur khrod chen po'i dbyings na bzhugs// 'bar ba chen po'i klong na bzhugs// rigs ni rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// mun pa 'joms pa'i shes rab 'od// 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig ded dpon
gtso// 'gro ba'i dri ma sel ba'i skal// 'gro ba yongs kyi gnyen gcig gtso// gnyis med bde ba'i dbyings dkyil du// dgyes pa chen po dbab tu gsol// ho// zhes yum gyis mnyam pa'i ngang nas// de skad

ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dur khrod kyi klong na/ gdug pa can gyi khri la zhabs mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung gi bzhugs nas/ rgyal po dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad ces glengs so// kye ma'o// rgyal bas 'gro don bya ba'i phyir// rigs kyi yum dang gnyis med par// pad+ma chen po brdeg tu gsol// 'khor rnams ma lus bskyed
gsol// zhes dgongs pa gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas yum chen mo nyid kyi bsam pa g.yos par gyur te// e ma ho// ston pa'i bstan par bstan pa'i phyir// 'khor ba 'dus pa'i ded

dpon gtso// dgyes pa'i rdo rje dbang po yis// gnyis med dgyes par gyur nas ni// gsang ba chen po char chen phob ho// sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a nu rA' ga yA mi/ a nu rA ga yA haM/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/

de nas yab yum gnyis su med pa las/ khro bo dang/ khro mo dang sprul pa dang yang sprul bcas pa thams cad thon par gyur nas hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ ces rdo rje phur pa drag po'i sgra byung nas/

'jig rten gyi dregs pa spa bkong nas/ yang rang bzhin gnyis su med par mnyam pa nyid kyis bzhugs te/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzhugs so// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste
gnyis pa'o//// de ltar mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du gnas pa las/ bdag tu rmongs pa dang/ rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa'i lam dang bral nas/ gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par/

sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mor gyur nas/ rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// tsha ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pas/ 'di bas kyang

shin tu grang na ci ma rung snyam pas/ shin tugrang ba'i nang du skyes te/ tsha ba dang grang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams brgyud cing/ bskal pa stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo// de nas yang yan lag sna tshogs pa dang/

gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs pa dang/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/ lha'i rigs dang lha ma yin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus so// bde bar gshegs pa thams
cad kyis mkhyen pas gzigs nas/ thugs rje'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ de nas bde ba gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa'i byin gyis rlabs gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nus/ bde bar
gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras su bskyed nas/ sras ni chos nyid skye ba med pa las/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs skur bzhengs pa'i phyir na sras// mchog ni de las bzhengs kyang g.yos pa med// sras ni rU

tra 'dul phyir bde gshegs byin gyis sras// mchog ni de las sprul kyang g.yos pa med// sras ni skye med sras po rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// mchog ni gang la gang 'dul mi bzad phur pa drug/ ces bde ba gshegs
pas byin gyi rlabs kyis bstod nas/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi pa gcig tu sprul nas/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT ces khros pas lus po gcig la mgo bo brgyar sprul nas/ phyag na mtshon cha sna
tshogs pa bsnams pa/ 'khor ba thams cad bsdus nas/ shin tu 'gyings bag dang bcas par gyur te/ hi hi hi zhes shin tu nga rgyal dang bcas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sras mchog
nyid kyis/ dur khrod kyi klong na gdug pa can thams cad kyi gdan la bzhugs nas/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas shin tu rngam pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan par gyur

to// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal gsum pa mche ba bcu gnyis shangs gsum pa/ ba spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o// phyag drug dang po rdo rje rtse dgu/ bar pas rtse lnga/ g.yon gyi dang po me dpung/ bar pa

kha T+wAMrtse gsum/ tha ma gnyis kyis rdo rje phur bu 'dril ba/ dur khrod chas brgyad gsol ba// rdzu 'phrul kyi zhabs bzhir bzhugs pa/ rdo rje'i gshogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba// sku tshon gang bas lus

la gtams pa/ yum dang gnyis su med par gyur to// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil na thigs par shar// srog gi go ru shar ba dang// snying gi go ru

bsgom par bya/ zhes gsungs so// de nas khro bo'i tshogs thams cad sprul pa las/ oM badzra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra hU~M/ gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ ces steng du khro bo hU~M kA ra dang/ yum chen rdo rje sgra 'byin ma sprul pa'i phra men ma

phag gi mgo can dang/ smig bu'i mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ shar du khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang/ yum rdo rje snyems ma sprul pa'i phra men ma stag gi mgo can dang/ bya rgod kyi

mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU~M da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ shar lho'i mtshams su khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po dang/ yum rdo rje sder mo sprul pa'i phra men ma g.yag gi mgo can dang/ bya rog gi mgo can no// oM

badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ lho'i phyogs su khro bo ya mAn+ta ka dang/ yum rdo rje dur khrod ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma sha ba'i mgo can dang/ 'ug pa'i mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M ban+d+ha ban+d+ha

hU~M phaT/ lho nub tu khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon po dang/ yum rdo rje gtun khung ma sprul pa'i phra men ma gzig gi mgo can dang/ khwa ta'i mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hU~M hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ nub tu khro bo

chen po rta mgrin dang/ yum rdo rje gtum mo sprul pa'i phra men byi li'i mgo can dang/ pu shud kyi mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta hU~M tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ nub byang khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang/

yum rdo rje mda' snyoms ma sprul pa'i phra men ma spyang ki'i mgo can dang/ khra'i mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ byang du khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang/ yum rdo rje rlung

'byin ma sprul pa'i phra men ma seng ge'i mgo can dang/ pha wang gi mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M phaT/ b+hin+da b+hin+da hU~M phaT/ byang shar du khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba

dang/ yum rdo rje gsod byed ma sprul pa'i phra men dred kyi mgo can dang/ sre mo'i mgo can no// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M s+phoT s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ 'og tu khro bo chen po stobs po che dang/ yum rdo rje bskyod byed ma dang/

sprul pa'i phra men ma dom gyi mgo can dang// byi ba'i mgo can gyis gtams pa'o// de rnams thams cad kyang 'thon par gyur te/ rab tu khros par gyur to// oM badzra kI li kI li ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ ces
rab tu khros te/ stong gsum dus gcig tu g.yos te/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu 'khor bcas kyis gang bar gyur nas/ stong gsum dus gcig tu g.yos so// srin po chen po shin tu gdug pa dang

bcas pa bros te/ mi thub bar 'chor ba la bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon du nyid kyis shin tu khros rab tu khros pa las/ mi bzad pa'i sras mchog rnam pa drug 'thon par gyur te/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ ha sa ya ra

ha sa ya ra hU~M phaT/ shI g+h+raM A na ya hU~M phaT/ dz+wa lA pa ya dz+wa lA pa ya hU~M phaT/ A we sha ya A we sha ya hU~M phaT/ bin+d+ha ya bin+d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ ces sras mchog rnam pa drug gis klong chen drug gi las byas te/ stod
ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa// smad ni zur gsum dbal dang ldan// khro mo bcu yis yongs brgyan nas// gdug pa ma lus bsgral bar bya'o// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin

te// phung po rdo rjes gtams byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// hU~M hU~M hU~M kI li kI la ya zhes rab tu khros pas rang dbang chen po bskur te/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje 'grub

mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur bu'i lha// ye shes khro bor 'grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ni// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed

cig/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs bdag la stsol// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang// dbang dang

dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// zhes dbang bskur nas/ oM lam hU~M lam

s+t+waM b+ha nan/ mo ha g+hA ta ya/ b+ha ga wAn/ shI g+h+raM hriHSh+tAHbi tr-i yang 'dug kyang rgyu mtshan dpyad/ bi kr-i badzra hU~M ka ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nAM/ badzra kI li kI la ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ hU~M kA ra hU~M

phaT/ badzra hU~M kA ra hU~M a/ stong gsum dus gcig tu g.yos nas/ khro bo chen po rnams ni sku che chung tshad ri rab tsam mo// mang nyung ni stong gi 'jig rten yungs 'brus bkang ba tsam du gyur nas/ oM

badzra kI li kI la ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ ces rdo rje phur pa dril zhing sku bsigs nas/ dur khrod kyi klong na rab tu khros nas/ phyogs bcur gzigs pas/ mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma hA de wa

brgyal bar gyur/ rdo rje phur pa rab tu 'bar ba/ nyi zer la ser ba 'bab pa bzhin du btab pas/ kha T+wAM ga'i rtse la blangs pas de rab tu brgyal nas/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam/ ma byed
shin tu gdug pa dang bcas nas smras pa las/ de ltar 'jig byed kyi dpal rdo rje gzhon nus phur pa byin gyis rlabs te/ cho ga gsum gyis skur bskyed nas// snyan gsan spyan drangs dbang nod nas// dbang
bskur thim gyur thob bsam nas// bcod brgyad sngags kyis gzi byin bskyed// rnam gsum tshul bzhin mchod pa dbul// phur pa bkrag dang gzi mdangs bskyed// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// dus
gsum rgyal ba'i gdung gsob pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa yi// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tshe ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i
byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon sbyor tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang// lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// oM lam hU~M lam s+t+waM b+ha nan/

mo ha g+hA ta ya/ b+ha ga wAn/ shI g+h+raM bi kr-i badzra hU~M kA ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaH hU~M baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nAM/ badzra kI li kI la ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT badzra hU~M kA ra hU~M A/ thams cad phur bus btab nas shin

tu myos shing rid par gyur pa'i badzra yak+sha kro d+ha khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha zhes snying dang nang khrol kun phyung nas/ yan lag kun gtubs nas/ sha zos khrag 'thungs rus pa kun 'chos nas/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ ces

bden pa mthong nas 'bangs su mchi 'bangs su nan tan ma chung zhig/ shes pa bla med gnas su spar// phung po dur khrod gnas bya zhing// gzugs phung nga yi stan bya'o// chos nyid kyi bden pa'o// gsang sngags

kyi byin gyis rlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o// a b+hi tsar+ya'i dus la bab po// brnag pa de kho na la'o// zhes byin rlabs gyi gnang ba'o// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ drag po dregs pa can btul ba'i le'u
ste gsum pa'o//// de nas dregs pa 'dul byed gtso bo 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can rnams dngangs nas/ ye shes dang las la grub pa'i ma mos kyang srog gi snying po phul nas/ dpa' bo chen po 'khor
bcas la// bdag cag rnams kyang 'bangs su mchi// yang bud med nag mo khrag gi ral pa can gyis kyang/ bdag gi srog gi snying po 'di// dpa' bo chen pos bzhes su gsol// de nas yang bud

med dmar mo byi ru'i ral pa can gyis/ dpa' bo chen po'i spyan lam du// bdag gi srog snying dam pa 'di// dpa' bo khyod kyi bzhes su gsol// a dzi te pa ra dzi te dza ye bi dza ya ka taM ka ye/ mA ra se na pra marda na
hU~M phaT/ bdag cag rnams kyi srog snying 'di// dpa' bo chen pos 'azhes su gsol// sku gsung thugs las rdzogs pa'i sngags// dpa' bo khyod la dbul bar bgyi// zhes srog gi snying po phul nas khas blangs

dam bcas pa la// rdo rje gsang ba'i dga' las ni// sdig chen gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka'
las 'da' ma byed// ces gnad la bor bas/ yang srog gi snying po phul te/ dpa' bo thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa yis// srog gi snying po dbul bar bgyi// bka' yi pha phab

stsal du gsol// hU~M ma ma pa shaM ku ru ma taM dz+nyA na ka ra i dan/ d+ha d+hi ma ma karma shrI g+h+raM kA rA ya hU~MphaT// dpa' bo chen po'i spyan lam du// srog gi drag sngags dbul bar bgyi// thugs rje can gyis gzigs su

gsol// zhes phul lo// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// 'khor dang bcas pa ma lusakun// dam tshig 'di la brten pa yi// ma lus las rnams 'grub par gyis// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la
bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// shwa na mu kha'i dus la bab// bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la
bab// ces gnad la bor nas/ dam rdzas la brten cing bran gyi tshul du khas blangs so// ston pa chen po sangs rgyas gtso// drag po chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// mnyam pa
nyid kyi don ston zhing// zhing yangs sems can 'dul don du// rtog pa med pa'i khro bor 'byung// khro bo'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas// dpag tu med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// bdag cag dpal gyi 'khor du
'dud// dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod nas las bya bar dam bcas so// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dregs pa can 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas mnyam pa nyid la gnas

pa las/ bgegs kyi rgyal po bi nA ya ka kun tu ma rungs par gyur pa la/ 'dul bar dgongs nas// ma rung sems can khyod lta bu// ma rung mnar ba'i sdig can khyod// thar pa chen po thob bya'i phyir// nga yi
'khor du 'du bar gyis// zhes gsungs pas/ bka' nyan du ma 'dod do// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu'i thugs la dgongs te// gtogs dang grogs rnams bral ba'i phyir// klong drug lha dbral dgug

bstim bya// dbral ba'i klong dang spro ba'i klong// dgug pa'i klong dang bcing pa'i klong dang skyo ba'i klong// bsdu ba'i klong dang bstab pa'i klong// klong du gyur pa'i las bya'o// ha sa ya ra ha ra Na hU~M phaT/ oM badzra

kI li kI la ya/ A we sha ya A we sha ya hU~M phaT/ shI g+h+rin A na ya hU~M phaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hU~M phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ bid ya bid ya hU~M phaT/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing
sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob la rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug la smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas

kyang// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH// ang+ku sha dza/ ces bstims pas bgegs kyi rgyal po brgyal lo// de nas yang dpal rngom brjid kyi rgyal po des/ sku bsig cing shin tu rngam pa'i sgras/

hU~M hU~M hU~M/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M phaT/ tri dza dza dza hU~M baM hoH/ s+t+wam+b+ha ya nan/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ badzra ces pas bgegs kyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas hU~M pa ra bir+yA na hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/

bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod phrin las myur du

mdzod// ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ kro d+ha kro d+ha badzra/ dza ya tu dza ya tu badzra/ rak+sha du mA ra ya badzra/ gnas skabs sbyar
ba'i sngags rnams la// sgrol gnas cho ga de bzhin sbyar// tshig drug dkyus kyi sgos btab nas// tshig gsum bstab pa'i gnas bstan nas// tshig drug dam can gnad la dbab// bya ba'i las bzhis kun kyang
rdzogs// sngags gsum bzlas pas drod gsum skye// zhesagasungs so// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung// nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par

gyis// tsakra ye oM b+h+rUM hU~M b+h+rUM ta?M b+h+rUM ti? b+h+rUM ha b+h+rUM/ sarba A ra ya hU~M phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ mtshon dang dug la sogs pa dang/ sdug bsngal bskyed pa la sogs bya// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka'
las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dbal snying bsreg nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas rdung byas na// lha yang rung ste rlags

par 'gyur// kha thaM kha thaM hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra yak+sha kro d+ha khA hi kha hi ha ha/ yab yum bar du brdung bya zhing// dngos po sha khrag lha yi skur// bstabs pas dgyes pa'i stan gan gyur// nyi shu

rtsa gcig sngags rnams kyis// dkar nag mtshams su gdab par bya// hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bgegs btul ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas mnyam pa'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di// ting 'dzin rgyal por ston par 'gyur// ma nor ma bcos dbyings nyid las// de bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings// dngos med
gsal ba'i ye shes las// de las sems kyi 'bras bu bskyed// thog mar gzhal yas byang chub sems// de ni rgyu 'bras ma bkag chos// de nas phur bu'i byang chub sems// rgyu 'bras gnyis ka mya ngan
'das// de nas bdag gi byang chub sems// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur zhing// bcom ldan 'das dang skal pa gcig/ byang chub sems ni sngon du bstan// khams gsum ye shes skyed pa'i phyir// bsgrub

pa'i ye shes tshon gang pa// gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskyed nas kyang// sku dang ldan par rab bskyed cing// khams gsum khro bos gang bar mdzad// gnyis ldan sku gsum thugs su ldan// shin tu brjid pa'i ye

shes kyis// sku yi tshogs kyis rab brgyan cing// thugs la 'bar ba'i srog kyang zhugs// dbu la rdzogs pa'i rigs lngas bsrung// nyi zla ri rab phur pa'i rgyan// khro bo mang pos gzir mnan nas// yum ni rnam
par grol ba'i thugs// srid pa'i phur bu rtaugs pa yis// srid pa gsum yang thebs zhes bya/ khams gsum gdug pa bsgral pa'i phyir// tsham rngams gzugs ni glog ltar 'bar// me dpung gsum gyis khams
gsum bsregs// nyes byed gsum yang srid par sgrol// khams gsum dus gcig dbang bskur nas// rab tu srog gi gor shar ba// gnyis ldan sku gsung thugs su ldan// dus gcig le brgan 'bar bar

smin// rdzogs ldan dud ka gsal phyir ro// mthing ga nyi zla dkyil 'khor bsgom// lag tu blang te dril nas kyang// khams gsum sdug bsngal bsgral bar 'gyur// yum bzhi'i phyag rgyas byin brlabs shing// de
nas a las rnam par dag/ srid pa gsum du gsal 'tsher nas// 'khor ba gsum ni mya ngan 'das// 'di na byang chub sems kyi khrus// byang chub sems kyi khyad par las// khro bo phur bus rab brgyan
cing// khams gsum dbang bskur yang dag grub// de nas yul sems gnyis su med// bskyod pa med pa'i ri rab kyis// mkha' yi gtun khung bde gshegs gnas// gting dpag med pa'i dbyings nyid
du// lha yang rung ste nyon mongs bsgral// srid pa'i phur pas thebs shes bya// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// khro bo 'bar ba'i gtun tshogs kyis// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du yis// khams
gsum ma lus bsgral zhes bya// rnam par shes pa'i ye shes mchog/ srog dang thugs kyis byin brlabs nas// byang chub sems kyi phur bu 'dis// ma btab bzhin du lhun gyis grub// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yang
dag bsgral// rtog 'dzin med pa'i dbang phyug de// dpa' bo chen pos btul ba bzhin// shin tu bsgral te dgyes bstar na// za byed kun la stong par mdzod// ha ha dgyes pas dgyes par 'dzod// phaT phaT

kyis ni dkyil 'khor spro// hU~M hU~M dgyes pas dbang du sdud// khA hi khA his dgyes pas lhag med bzhes// rdo rje rab tu kI la ya// rab tu sor te dril nas kyang// khams gsum 'khor ba bsgral bar bya// sems
kyi yul rnams bsgral nas ni// ye shes sku yis khyab gdal nas// 'dzin chags thams cad rnam par grol// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu// byang chub sems las 'od 'phros pas// khams gsum de bzhin

rol pa'i sku// ma lus phur pas thebs zhes bya// gang zhig gnod pa'i mchog rnams la// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad nas// rdo rje phur pa mang shar cing// de yis tshogs brgyad dag par bya// bdag dang
gsum du ldan nas kyang// byang chub sems las rnam spros te// phung po rdul du bshigs nas kyang// sha khrag khams gsum gang bar dmigs// hU~M gis rab tu nam mkha' gang// phaT kyis kun tu gtor byas
te// rdo rje ye shes tshon gang gis// khams gsum rab tu gang gnas kyang// ho yis rab tu dga' ba yis// snying po 'di skad ces brjod do// rab rgyud mchog sems rab tu gsal ba'i phyir// mnyam nyid rig

pa'i rtsal las bdag nyid grol// de phyir hU~M gis drangs nas ni// phung po gzi ldan thob nas kyang// bsdus pa'i thig le chen por bsgom// khams gsum byang chub sems bskyed do// 'gro ba ma lus don bya'i

phyir// spros pas ljang gus nam mkha' khyab// dmar po khrag gi thugs kyang lags// ljang gu las kyis sa bon te// mthing ga he ru ka yi thugs// thams cad kun du brjid 'grub pas// de nges sems kyi phung po

tshol/ khams gsum dur khrod khrag yin te// thugs rje chags pas bsgral phyir du// srid pa gdar sha bcad nas ni// spyod pa rnam pa bcud dang ldan// hU~M zhes bya bskal pa zang ngo// srid pa dbang du bsdus nas
kyang/ khams gsum kun las 'das par bsgom// 'jig rten kun las 'das pas na// lhan ne bor yang bdag nyid sbyor// 'jig rten kun las grub pa'i rgyal// man ngag snying khu gsang ba'i rdzas// 'dzin
dang rtog pa rnams spangs te// byang chub sems ni skad cig ma// snang dang srid dang 'dzin rtog kyang// bsam pa las kyang mya ngan 'das// 'jig rten las kyang mya ngan 'das// byang chub sems kyi
gol sa bcad// grub mtha' 'di la 'jigs mtha' med// 'di ni mi 'gyur byang chub sems// mya ngan 'das pa rtogs pa'o// sgrib pa med pa'i mthar phyin pa// rtsol ba med par lhun gyis grub// mi nub pa la

rtag gnas shing// rdo rje yi ni mtha' la thug/ bgrang nus med par shin tu dpag/ 'di ni snyan gyi bu ga nas// snyan gyi bu gar gang ba yin// rgya mtsho'i gting gi rdo ba bzhin// byangachub sems ni rdzogs so
zhes// man ngag snying po gsal ba'i rdzas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bskul ba// mi zad gter du bzhag par mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// bstan pa'i snying po de las med// man ngag

bstan pa'i snying po 'di// don gyi bcud phyung sangs rgyas rgyu// 'di las gzhan zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mkhyen no// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyun las/ ting nge 'dzin gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu nyid kyis gdug pa can thams cad dus gcig tu btul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na// dur khrodachen po yi klong na// dur khrod kyi ni

gzhal yas khang// me lha drang srong sreg pa'i mchog/ lho nub srin po gnas pa'i sa// nub byang rlung lha 'phang dang dbye ba ste// byang shar 'byung po dbang ldan sgrol la mkhas// dkyil 'khor pho brang mi 'gyur brtan
pa'i mchog/ gdug pa can gyi mthu 'phrog cing// bsnyen sgrub gnyis kyi las bya'i phyir// bkra shis byin brlabs yod pa'am// rkang gcig pa'am rkang gnyis pa// gnod par nges pa'i sa de ru// phyogs skyong

bcud dang rgyal chen bzhi// bsrung ba'i rim pa tshul bzhin bya// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// gong du smos pa bzhin du bri// ma traM khog par gnas byas nas// skye med thabs dbyings phur pa ni// mnyam nyid skye

ba med pas thebs// thugs rje'i phur pa thugs rje yis// log par 'khyams pa rnams la gdab// gsang ba byang chub sems kyi phur pa 'di// rtog tshogs rdung phyir yum gyi mkha' la gdab// 'dus byas rdzas kyi

phur pa 'di// bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa rnams la gdab// 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa ni// man ngag nyid du bkol ba bdun// med du mi rung de bzhin bshams// bsnyen phur la yang rnam pa gnyis// nyung
dkar dang ni phur bu dngos// lcags sna lnga'am bdun kyang rung// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum// sked pa rgya mdud gzhal yas khang// bcum gzhog la ni sor bcu gnyis// bsnyen pa'i phur pa de bzhin
bya// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad ni// mthu 'phrog byin brlabs yod pa yin// de bzhin bya rgod gshog phur yang// 'gugs par bya ba'i nus pa yod// ser po gser ram yang na ni// skyer ba
bdag la byas pa ni// zil gyis mnan pa'i phur pa yin// skyes pa dar ma rigs can gyi// spom po ma yin thur ma phra mo tsam// zangs sam mdzo mo shing dag gis// dmar po dag la byas pa ni// dbang du 'dus

pa'i phur bur bstan// tsan+dan dag gam rgya shug ni// gzi byin 'phrog par yang dag bstan// lcags sam shing ni nag po ni// drag por gyur pa mtha' dag la// rdul du rlag par rab tu bstan// phyogs kyi khro bo

bcu po la// bcu tshan re 'am yang na bcu// de bzhin mang nyung srangs kyis dbye// mthing nag dar gyi cod pan gdags// lha 'am rdzas gsum spyod kyang rung// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha ru// nag po'i 'bru yis

bkang nas ni// rim par gcug cing byin brlab bya// mthing nag dar gyis kha bcad la// byin brlab dbang bskur gzhung bzhin bya// mi 'gyur pho brang rdzas su dgod// me lha drang srong sreg pa'i sar// drag po'i

hom thabs gzhung bzhin bya// tsher ma can gyi shing bcug la// ming dang rus su bcas pa dang// drag po'i rtsang gis bskor ba'am// bsreg pa'i rdzas rnams kun kyang bzhag/ lho nub srin po gnas pa'i sar// de
bzhin drag po'i gru gsum la// rim pa bzhin du rab tu bskor// mon nam rab chad thos pa la// gang yin ming rus bris nas ni// tha mar drag po'i sngags kyis bskor// gru gsum dbus kyi steng du

bzhag/ ldog pa med par mthar phyin pa'i// brgya dang brgyad kyi phur par bskor// tha ma de bzhin rtsang gis bskor// nub byang rlung lha 'phang dang dbye ba'i sar// drag po'i gru gsum gong bzhin bya// thod pa dum
bu drug gam bdun// mtshan ma ngan par gyur pa la// bri ba'i thabs ni gong ma bzhin// gang yin ming rus bcug nas ni// drag po'i gru gsum dbus su bzhag/ man ngag nying khu bskol pa yi// phur bu zur

gsum dbal dang ldan// drag po'i gtor ma steng du 'god// khrag sna lnga dang snying sna lnga// mtshe nag nyung nag rdo dang mda'// drag po zor gyi rdzas su bzhag/ tha ma de ni rtsang gis bskor// byang shar 'byung po
dbang ldan sgrol ba'i sar// gru gsum rim pa gong bzhin bya// bsgral ba'i rim pa gang yin pa'i// snying gar rus la dpral bar ming// yan lag bzhi la yig 'bru bzhi// che ge mo ni dbus su gzhug/ mA ra la

yis tha ma bskor// gru gsum dbus su gzhug par bya// tha ma rtsang gis de bzhin bskor// dbus kyi pho brang dgod pa ni// ling+ga bya ba'i rgyu rnams la// gzugs dang ling+ga gzhung bzhin bya// rno ba'i mtshon gyis
lus la gtug/ lcags thag nag pos mgul nas gdags// yan lag lnga la tshon skud lnga// de bzhin pho brang dbus su dgod// tha ma rtsang gis de bzhin bskor// bsnyen pa'i phur pas gzir la
bzhag/ de yi phyi rim gru gsum la// khro bcu'i phur pa rim bzhin dgod// sras mchog mi zad phur pa drug/ sgo bzhi steng 'og gnyis dag gam// yang ni rim pa drug tu dgod// dpal gyi gtor ma gzhung bzhin

bshams// srung ma rnam gsum thun rdzas bsag/ drag po'i las su gyur pa yis// zangs phye lcags phye rdo phye drug/ khyad par bal tshon drus kyis gdags// srung ma rnam gsum phyag mtshan dang// btun dang rdo

rje tho ba dang// thun rdzas sna tshogs dgod par bya// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ drag pos 'dul ba'i bya thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas ye shes lha rnams kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan
bstan pa ste// de yi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang// thod pa skam rlon rtsigs pa la// gnam lcags gzer gyis de bzhin gdab// zhing chen bzhi yi gdung ma la// gza' chen brgyad kyi ka ba btsugs// zhing chen

zhing chung gcal du bkram// nyi zla'i mthongs khung rnam par gsal// rgyal po bzhi yi skyes bu la// zhing chen sgo yis de bzhin bcad// lhu dum bcad por rgyan gyis brgyan// nang gi gru gsum 'bar ba dgu// sgo

dang rta babs rgyan du byas// dbus kyi gru gsum 'bar ba la// nyi ma zla ba pad+ma gsum// dregs pa'i rgyal po bsnol mar gsal// ma a pa sUr+ya tsan+d+ra maN+Dal/ ra tri ru tri ti ra baM hU~M hU~M/ de steng gtso bo yab yum

ni// sku mdog phyag mtshan gong du gsal// dIb+ta tsa kra ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ yum yang 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma// rgyan dang cha lugs yab dang mthun// bstod pa bdag gis rab tu bstod// dregs pa phyogs skyong

gdan steng na// khro bo bcu po bzhugs par bsam// dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ 'jigs byed chen po khro bo bcu po yang// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir

bgrad// mthing dang dkar sngo dmar ba dang// ljang dang dkar sngo dmar ba dang// dmar skya ljang ser dud ka dang// dbyings dang ye shes phyag rgya dang// rgyal byed dpa' rtags phyag mtshan dang// rigs la rang

rtags phyag mtshan dang// kun kyang dur khrod chas brgyad la// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// za byed chen mo bcu rnams kyang// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun// yum chen rnams kyi mtshan nyid
kyang// rgyan dang cha lugs yab dang mthun// g.yas pa dgyes phyir yab la 'khyud// g.yon na dung dmar gtso la stob// mche ba can dang gshog pa can// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun// g.yas pa rang
phur pa bsnams// g.yon pa 'dzin byed lcags kyu bsnams// yang sprul sum sprul bsam mi khyab// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa yi// sa gzhi chen po'i gdan steng 'dir// sgrol byed sras mchog rnam

par bsgom// hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang gsang sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dang
po gnyis med byang sems bstan// gnyis pa rig pa so sor bstan// gsum pa drag po'i 'dzab dgongs bstan// bzhi pa sku gsung thugs su bstan// yang dag nyid la yang dag pa// rtogs par bya ste rnam par
bsgom// yang dag rtogs na bde chen thob// dag par brtags na kun kyang rtogs// mang por bzlas na kun kyang 'grub// dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub myur// byang chub sems kyi phur pa 'di// bdag gi don
du rtogs par bgyi// stong gsum ma lus sems can kun// rdo rje phur pas ma rig 'joms// shes pa'i bla med thar pa'i thabs// mun pa 'joms pa'i shes rab 'od// bag chags spyod pa khrus kyi chu// 'khor
ba 'joms pa 'jigs pa'i gtso// yang dag sa yi rdo rje dang// khro bar bcas pa'i ngang gis 'dul// ma rtogs pa yi sems can la// zhi ba dbang dang drag po dang// rgyas pa la sogs mang dubastan// ma nor
tshul bzhin bsgrub pas ni// dbang po mngon gsum khugs par 'gyur// bdag dang lha dang gzas pa gsum// byang chub sems la skye shi med// stong pa'i rang bzhin gnyis su med// nyon mongs srog dbug rtsa

rnams bcad// byang chub sems la skye shi med/ shing yang min nam// shid rgyang tshe mthud lta bur 'gyur// don gyi phur pa rnam bzhi yang// skabs dang sbyar te rtogs par bgyi// phur ni thams cad byang chub sems// pa

ni thams cas kun la khyab// phur ni thams cad gtso bo'i mchog/ pa ni thams cad 'khor gyi tshul// phur ni thams cad skye ba med// pa ni rol pa 'gag pa med// phur ni byang chub sems su gcig/ pa ni thams

cad de ru sgrub// bsnyen pa bya ba rab tu gces// don gyi rtsa ba lha yi sku// zhi ba dbang dang drag po dang// rgyas pa la sogs rnam pa bzhi// don dang bstun zhing shes par bya// ljags la gnas pa'i yi ge
dang// thugs la gnas pa'i yi ge gnyis// kha dog rigs las shes par bya// 'phro bas 'dul ba byin rlabs ni// skabs dang gnas skabs shes par bya// bdag dang gzhan gyi don rnams kyang// rnam pa

gnyis su shes par bya// shin tu phra la rab sbyangs na// blo yi rtogs pas kha phyed nas// rig 'dzin sa la rnam par 'gro// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de
nas drag po'i las rnams bstan pa'i phyir// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phyir// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig pa dang// lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed pa// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar ba dang// gti mug
mun ltar 'thibs pa dang// phrag dog rlung ltar 'tshub pa dang// nga rgyal bse ltar mkhreg pa dang// 'dod chags sbyin ltar 'dzin pa dang// don med log par 'khyams pa dang// mi shes tshul 'chos byed pa

dang// ban+de mna' zan dam log dang// 'di bcu bsgral ba'i rim pa yin// nges par khugs par bya ba'i phyir// rten dang 'brel ba'i klong gis dbye// sprul pa khams gsum dag pa'i phyir// sku gsum sprul pa'i

klong gis dbye// gang du 'phros pa'i dbang med par// phyag rgya bzhi yi klong gis dgug/ nges par rten la dbab pa'i phyir// dbab par bya ba'i klong gis bstim// rten la gnas par bya ba'i phyir// bcings par
bya ba'i klong gis sdoms// nyon mongs sha mdangs dbye ba'i phyir// sgrol ba gnas kyi klong gis gdab// skye med chos kyi don mthong phyir// don dam chos kyi bden pa bdar// 'khor ba'i gnas su mi 'khor

phyir// thun mtshon drug gi klong gis gdab// lha rnams dgyes par bya ba'i phyir// brdung dang sdug bsngal bskyed pa dang// byang chub sems kyi klong gis bstab// 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khyams pa la// thugs rje

chen po thabs mkhas pas// skye ba med pa'i don mthong bas// klong zhes rgyal bas de ltar gsungs// sku stod khro bo chen po la// sku smad lcags phur zur gsum pas// stong gsum ma lus kun bkang nas// bde
bar gshegs pa'i thugs rje yi// gang gis 'dul ba'i don bstan nas// klong drug lha dbral dgug bstim bya// byin brlabs dbang bskur byas nas ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig kI la ya// klad la bskor zhing bzlas

par bya// oM laM hU~M laM stam+b+ha nan/ mo ha g+ha ya/ b+ha ga wAn/ shi kri bi kri badzra hU~M kA ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ sarba big+hAnan/ badzra k-I li kI la ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/

badzra hU~M kA ra hU~M phaT/ badzra hU~M kA ra hU~M a/ hU~M pa ra bid+ya na hU~M phaT/ sarba A na ya hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT/ ma tha ma tha hU~M phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ ts+tshin+d+ha

ts+tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ drag po rdzas dang drag po sngags// drag po lha dang drag po dkyus// mthar gnas drug gis nges par brdeb// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ zhing

bcu bsgral ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas sras mchog lnga bsgrub par bya ba bstan te/ don dam skye med chos dbyings las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul skur ston pa// dbyings dang ye shes byin brlabs las// chu

la chu bur rdol ba 'dra// hU~M e yaM ra keM raM b+h+rUM/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M phaT/ su ru su ru pra su ru hU~M phaT/ bi ta ya bi ta ya bid hU~M phaT/ namaHsan+ta bi sho ta ya bi bid hU~M

phaT/ mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ 'jigs byed sras mchog rnam pa lnga// gru gsum e yi dkyil 'khor na// dug gsum bsgral ba'i zhing chen la// rU tra bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// sku stod khro bo chen po la// sku
smad zur gsum dbal gyis bzhugs// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sras mchog lnga bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas dam tshig dam pa 'di dag mchog tu bstan to// snga rabs 'das
pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// dam tshig 'di la brten nas grub// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// dam tshig 'di la brten nas grub// slad nas 'byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// dam tshig 'di la brten nas

grub// de phyir dam tshig theg chen 'di// phyir rabs sngags 'chang rnams kyis srung// dam tshig 'di ni sa gzhi 'dra// sa la skye 'khrungs kun skyed ltar// dam tshig gzhi yi sa gzhis ni// sku dang ye shes skyed par
byed// rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum po dang// yan lag dam tshig lnga rnams las// ma 'das bsrungs na sangs rgyas yin// de las 'das na sems can yin// dam tshig gzhung bzhin bsrung ba la// dam can rnams

kyis bsgo ba nyan// gal te bsgo ba ma nyan na// dam can nyid kyang rlag par 'gyur// lha yang 'das na myos 'gyur na// rnal 'byor 'das na smos ci dgos// dam tshig 'di ni gtso yin zhes// dpa' bo chen pos

yang dag bshad// dam tshig nyams pa'i lnga ltas ni// bya ru mi ring sna tshogs byed// slob dpon bka' slu smod pa dang// lu gu rgyud la dbyen 'dogs dang// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun bcad nas// gzhan nas

dngos grub thob 'dod pa// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga ltas yin// rdzas dang lag cha mngon bstan nas// pha rol gzhan la sdig byed cing// man ngag gting nas ma thob par// ag tshar kha yis ngom pa dang// rig

pa'i rtsal dang ma ldan par/ kha nas lha srin gnyan 'bod pa// 'di rnams nyams pa'i snga rtags yin// mtshan dang ldan pa'i rig ma la// phrad nas sbyor ba ma byas dang// las ngan skyon can mtshan rdzogs

pa// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu ma bsgral na// 'di yang nyams pa'i snga ltas yin// dam tshig nyams pa'i snga ltas ni// rtsa ba gsum po nyams gyur na// rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// 'dir yang nyes pa sna bcu
'ong// phyi ma na rag dmyal khams skye// 'dir yang nad dang sdug bsngal che// mdze dang nad dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'ong// ma tshogs stong gis snying nas 'dren// sha zan stong gis sha rus
'bral// 'jig rten ma momakha' 'gro yang// dam tshig nyams pa'i bdud du 'bab// ma mo kun kyang gshed du 'ong// tshe dang srog la bar chod byed// dam tshig 'di la mi gnas na// brtsams pa
mi 'grub mya ngan non// dam tshig bsrungs pa'i yon tan ni// ci bsam las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// yi dam lha yi dngos grub thob// mkha' 'gro mang po 'khor zhing 'du// dngos grub rnam gsum
rim bzhin thob// tshe dang bsod nams dbang thang 'phel// lha srin kun kyang de bzhin bkur// dgra bgegs kun kyang gzhom zhing 'dul// bstan pa kun kyang dar zhing bsrung// dam tshig 'di dag gtsor len

na// grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// dam tshig bsrung ba'i rim pa ni// rdo rje slob dpon pha ltar khur// yum gyi dbang mo ma ltar khur// mched dang lcam dral spun ltar brtse// nyin dang mtshan du dus med

par// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcod// ma yengs gsal ba'i don brtson pa// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// mnyan bsam thos pa rgya bskyed nas// 'du 'dzi'i dbang du mi gtong bar// rtag tu sgrub la

brtson byed pa// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// pha rol dam nyams dgra bo la// dmod btsug kha tsho mi zer bar// gsang zhing bstun nas las byed pa// 'di yang bsrung ba'i rim pa yin// rdo rje phur pa rtsa
ba'i rgyud las/ dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas dbang rnam par bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ srog dang lus la mi 'dzem zhing// nor dang dad pas
mnyes byas nas// 'khor gsum yongs su dag byas te// bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul// dka' dang 'khor lo bum pa dang// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang// phan dang nus pa'i byin rlabs

dbang// rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya// slob dpon ji bzhin mnyam bzhag nas// bsnyen pa'i rdzas rnams bsags byas la// phur bu bum pa la sogs dang// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// spos dang snying po
lnga dag dang// kha rgyan mgul chings de bzhin bshams// bsnyen pa tshul bzhin byas nas ni// phur pa 'gul zhing 'bar kyang rung// sku gzugs bzhad cing 'gul ba dang// bum pa nam mkhar 'dug nas
ni// dkyil 'khor las la de bzhin bshams// rin chen zur brgyad dkyil 'khor du// dar dkar yol gyis bres pa ru// rdzas dang lag cha kun bkram nas// slob ma lnga'am gcig kyang rung// gdod g.yogs

dar gyis rab dkris la// dag pa'i khrus kyis bkru byas nas// rin chen sna tshogs snyim par bkang// rdo rje ye shes chen po yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de ring
bdag la dbang bskur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// ma lus gzhung bzhin sgrubs nas ni// sku gsung thugs kyi phur pa bzhin// ye shes rdo rje'i dkyil
'khor du// bdag gi dad pas 'jug par bgyi// 'joms byed rdo rje chen po yis// bdag la dbang mchog de ring stsol// nga ni ye shes rdo rje ste// nyon mongs rnam rtog 'joms pa'i phyir// 'joms byed rdo rje

chen po 'di// de ring khyod la sbyin par bya// 'joms byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// rnam rtog gzhom phyir ye shes gsal// sangs rgyas bdag la dbang ldan shog/ e ma ho
rigs kyi bu khyod kyis// gang la phog pa yid dam lha// me tog dam pa dor bar gyis// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu dang// yum chen 'khor lo rgyas 'debs gnyis// g.yon nas yum gyis yab la 'khyud// phyag
gis bum pa rab tu blangs// ye shes dbang gi chu bo 'di// nyon mongs ma gos dkar la 'tsher// skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// spyi bor bum pa'i dbang bskur bas// nyon mongs gsum dang dug gsum

sbyangs// dbang gi chu bo rgyun bzhin 'bab// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ dbang bskur yi dam lhar bskyed la// lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
dbang// phan pa'i dbang dang nus pa'i dbang// dur khrod dbang dang dam rdzas dbang// rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya// phur pa'i dbang dang 'debs pa'i dbang// drag po'i las su gyur pa yi// kun kyang ma

lus dbang du bskur// srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la
ya yi dngos grub stsol// gsang ba'i dbang rnams bskur ba'i phyir// dbang gi stegs bu rab brtsegs la// sha rtsi dkar la lcang lo'i skra// pad+ma'i mchu la so tshags dam// smin mtshams bar yang ma chad

par// tshes brgyad zla ba'i mig 'dra ba// slob dpon gnang ba'i thugs rje bskyed// yum gyis dus gsum bde gshegs bskyed// dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a nu rA ga yA mi/ a nu rA ga ya

ho// dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a a a/ de bzhin byang sems phab nas ni// ji ltar 'jug pa bzhin du bskur// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dbang gi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas tshogs sgrub pa
rnam par spros te/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// 'byor pa phun sum tshogs byas la// byin brlabs tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// bsam pa bdag gis rab bsam la// snod ni a las rnam par
dag/ bcud ni hU~M las bsam par bya// yaM gis 'bar ba'i me bskyod nas// raM gyi me yis a zhu nas// bcud kyi hU~M la thim par gyur// hU~M ni rnam par zhu gyur nas// phyogs bcur 'od zer 'phros
pa las// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus bdud rtsi nyid du gyur// bdud rtsi byin brlabs chen po yis// ye shes lha la mchod par dbul// bdag la bdag mchod mnyam nyid thim// 'od
zer gsum du rnam par gsal// dkar dmar nag po'i 'od dang gsum// dbul dang bshags pa bstab par bya// dgug dang bcing dang bsgral ba dang// rim pa bzhin du rdzogs par bya// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i
rgyud las// tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsdus nas/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dri yi rgyal po lnga yis byug/ mthing bag

gru gsum nag po la// drag po hU~M gis mtshan pa bri// sgo dang rta babs de bzhin no// lcags sam seng lding phur pa la// mthing nag dar gyi cod pan can// nyung dkar rgyal po dag dang ni// gu gul sbyar ba la
sog pa// dbang bskur rim par byas nas su// drag po gru gsum dbus su dgod// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma dang// rim pa bzhin du skur bskyed bya// mchod pa dbul zhing phrin las bcol// sgrub chen las

rnams byas nas ni// klong gi bya ba'i las byas nas// bstab cing bsregs te 'phang ba dang// mnan te las bzhis mtha' brtul bya// tshe bstim bkra shis gtor ma btang// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/
dpa' bo gcig pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas nyung dkar gu gul rak+ta gsum sgrub pa gsungs te/ mtshan ma ngan pa'i thod pa ru// gsum po so sor blug byas la// tsher ma'i shing gis kha

bcad la// dkar nag sbra ni phub byas la// lam po che yi rgya gram du// ma grub bar du de bzhin bya// gzhan yang gru gsum mthing nag bsgom// oMbadzra kI li kI la ya hril shag dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ du ba rlangs dang

me 'od dang// 'gul dang khol ba la sogs 'byung// de bzhin rtags la phebs pa dang// nyung dkar dbang po rnam lngar brab// dri chen dri chu rkyen las bskyed// bdud kyi nyi mar bkra mi shis// ngan pa'i dus su

'di dag sgrub// rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rdzas sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// e ma ho phyogs bcu dus bzhir ni// skye ba med pa'i chos nyid las// log par 'khyams pa bsgral slad du// drag

po rtsa ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs// skal ldan yang rab blo can dang// theg pa mchog la rtogs pa che// rtsol ba che zhing shes rab rno// bsam pa dag par gyur pa la// rgyud 'di yongs su gtad par bya// rdo rje khros pa
rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba ngam 'bres les bsam yas kyi mchims

phu dge gong du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//// #// rgya gar skad du/ shri badzra ku mA ra tan+t+ra na ma kA ru Na kro d+ha mU la sam+b+r-i ti/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros

pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snying

po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ khro bo dang khro mo mkha' 'gro ma bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas drag por gyur pa rU tra dang/ yum

drag byed ma dang/ 'khor ma bdun dbang phyug ma dang bcas pa/ sha dang khrag dang rus pa la longs spyod pa'i tshe/ dpal rdo rje khrag 'thung dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pas/ rU tra bsgral ba'i gnas skabs su

rU tra'i snying khrag theb long tsam gnyis yal ba las/ rU tra'i sras drag byed ma hA de wa zhes bya ba/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa/ yum drag mo ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang/ drag mo

srid pa 'khor byed ma zhes bya ba gnyis dang ldan te/ de gnyis las sras phyogs bcur dam sri bcu byung ste/ steng gi phyogs na yab nyi ma 'bar gsal/ yum zla ba sgra 'byin ma/ bu pho nyi ma phag gi mgo can dang/

bu mo zla ba smig pa'i mgo can gnas/ shar phyogs na dri za pho rgyal po'i sgra/ dri za mo rgyal ba'i sgra 'byin ma/ bu stag gi mgo can dang/ bu mo bya rgod mgo can gnas/ shar lho na me lha dbyug pa can/ me lha mo
lcags sder can/ bu g.yag gi mgo can dang/ bu mo bya rog gdong can gnas/ lho na 'chi bdag gshin rje dang/ gshin rje mo sha zan/ bu sha ba'i mgo can dang/ bu mo 'ug pa'i mgo can gnas/ lho nub na srin

po g.yo byed dang/ srin mo gtun shing 'dzin ma/ bu gzig gi mgo can dang/ bu mo khra'i mgo can gnas/ nub phyogs na klu rgyal chu zla dbang dang/ klu mo pir la zhon ma dang/ bu byil la'i mgo can dang/ bu mo
pu shud mgo can gnas/ nub byang na rlung lha gzhan 'joms dang/ rlung lha mo mdza' 'dzin ma dang/ bu spyang ki'i mgo can dang/ bu mo khra'i mgo can gnas/ byang na gnod sbyin las kyi bdud dang/ gnod

sbyin mo rlung lha zhon/ bu seng ge'i mgo can dang/ bu mo wa gdong can gnas/ byang shar na 'byung po khams gsum gyi bdag po dang/ 'byung po srog gcod ma dang/ bu dom gyi mgo can dang/ bu mo sre mong gi mgo
can gnas/ 'og phyogs na bdag gzhan stobs 'joms dang/ sa bdag mo rlung gi gzugs 'dzin ma/ sa bdag gi bu dred kyi mgo can dang/ sa bdag gi bu mo byi la'i mgo can gnas te/ de
rnams kyis 'jig rten khams kyi sems can thams cad kyi srog bcad/ sha zos khrag 'thungs/ dbugs rngubs shing/ dam pa'i chos la gnas pa dang/ dkar po'i phyogs la gnas pa thams cad kyi dam sri byed

cing/ bar du gcod par byed pa la gnas pa la/ de'i tshe 'og min gyi gnas na/ chos sku skye ba med pa'i ngang las/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rdo rje 'chang yab yum la/ sangs rgyas til gyi gong bu lta bus bskor

nas gnas pa la gdul bya drag byed dbang phyug ma hA de wa de gzigs nas/ lho yi 'dzam bu'i gling gi u rgyan gyi yul gyi dur khrod chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas su/ phyi rin chen lnga las grub cing/ nang thod pa skam
rlon las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang rgya khyon dpag tu med pa sprul pa'i nang du dpal rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum me dpung gi dkyil na 'jigs shing rngam par bzhugs te gnas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
bdud thams cad btul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang gnas nas/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba byung nas/ khams gsum gyi bdud thams cad dang/ dam sri
bcu'i yab yum rnams/ dbang du bsdus nas mdun du bkug nas khro bo de slar gsang gnas su thim mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang gnas dang/ spyan gnyis dang/ spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga nas sgo ma
bzhi byung ste/ lcags kyu mas dam sri bcu'i snying ga nas bzung/ zhags pa mas bcings/ lcags sgrog mas bsdams/ dril bu mas smyos par byas te/ dpal chen po yab yum gyi mkha' gsang bar nas sras kyi

mchog byung ste/ bgegs kyi tshogs de rnams kyi klad pa tshal pa brgya/ lus dum bu stong snying tshal pa bdun du gtub nas srog ye shes su bsgyur/ yab yum gyi mkha' gsang nas 'od kyi gong bu bcu las/ khro bo
yum yum phra thabs su bcas pa phyogs bcur sprul nas/ dam sri bcu gdan du byas te/ de'i tshe sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral zhing/ bdud bzhi rang zhir song ngo// sprul pa'i sku de nyid snang

ba'i dus na/ byang shar gyi khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo bye ba khrag khrig dang/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dpag tu med pa dang bcas pas/ sha dang/ rus pa dang/ khrag dron mo
rnams/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la phul nas/ phyag dang bskong ba lan du ma byas te/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa/ e ma ho rig pa'i ye shes 'khor 'das gzhi// rtogs na bla
med dbyings kyi ngang// ma rtogs 'khor ba nyid du 'khor// de bas thogs med kun 'gro ba'i// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' yang// 'khor ba'i 'dam las thar pa'i thabs// bdag dang
gzhan la sman slad du// don dam dbyings kyi thig le las// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid du// yang dag don gyi mthar phyin pa'i// gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba// gsang chen rgyud 'di bka' stsol
cig/ ces gsungs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs par nyon cig khams gsum rgyal// dbyings la skye 'gag mi gnas kyang// 'on kyang 'khor ba las thar phyir// dri mas dri ma dag

byed cing// dug gi dug ni zhi bar byed// zhe sdang drag po rgyas pa la// yang dag dbyer med don dang ldan// zhe sdang rdo rje rgyud 'di nyon// zhes bka' stsal to// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa'i rgyud kyi
bshad pa las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas gsol ba/ bdud rnams 'dul ba'i bcom ldan 'das// zhe sdang can gyi gang zag rnams// rdo rje'i rigs su smin
pa'i thabs// rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rigs kyi srog la yang// 'bum phrag gcig tu nges bzlas pas// lha yis lung ni bstan pa dang// sa brtag dkyil

'khor drag por sbyar// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum gru bzhi mthing nag ldan// ma traM bsgral zhing bdud rtsi lnga// dur khrod rdzas kyis byug par bya// oM pany+tsa a mr-i ta maN+Dal hU~M// oM rak+ta maN+Dal hU~M/

oM namaH sa man+ta maN+Dal hU~M/ oM keng ka pA la maN+Dal hU~M// ba yi rnam lnga de bzhin te// lha yi gnas su me tog ni// tshom bu sngon po lha grangs dgod// bdud rtsi lnga yi thig le dgod// phun sum tshogs pa lnga ldan

pas// dkyil 'khor lha la gsol ba gdab// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis// slob ma dag la byin gyis brlab// oM AHhU~M badzra satwa hU~M// hU~M stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// 'gro ba rigs drug sems can

rnams// dug lnga nyon mongs tshar gcod phyir// rigs lnga khrag 'thung nyid du brjod// a/ 'gro ba rigs lngar gsal ba 'di// rtog 'joms ye shes lnga rang bzhin// ye nas skye med chos sku la// snang ba 'khrul

pa snying re rje// badzra/ thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin te// cis kyang mi chod mi shigs shing// skye 'gag med pa rdo rje'i ngang// de bzhin nyid du rnam par dag sa/ dbyings las ngo bo ma grub kyang// snang ba tsam du

khrag 'thung sku// dug lnga rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// rigs lnga'i khro bor rnam par dag/ twa/ rigs lnga khro bo bsgrub pa la// snying rje sems can la bskyed nas// thar par 'dod pa'i bsam pa yis// dam
tshig lnga po gzung bar bgyi// 'di yis myur du sgrol bar nges// hU~M/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i bcom ldan 'das// rigs lnga 'dus pa'i khro rgyal gtso// rdo rje gzhon nu khros pa'i dpal// skal ldan
rnams kyis thob par shog/ slob dpon rigs drug rdo rje 'chang// A+oM/ gtsug gtor sangs rgyas khrag 'thung dpal// badzra/ lag g.yas rdo rje khrag 'thung dpal// sa/ lag g.yon rin chen khrag 'thung
dpal// twa/ rkang g.yas las kyi khrag 'thung dpal// a/ rkang g.yon pad+ma khrag 'thung dpal// hU~M/ thugs ka gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'di yin no// mthong bas rigs lnga khrag

'thung sku// bshags pas lus ngag dag par bya'o// oM AHhU~M badzra sa twa hU~M// oM/ ye shes lnga ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs dgongs su gsol// khrag 'thung khro bo khro mos byin gyis
brlobs// bdag gi lus kyi srog bcad ma byin blangs// mi tshangs spyod cing ting 'dzin sku ma gsal// sku yi dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// a/ bdag gi ngag ni rdzun dang phra ma dang// ngag 'khyal
tshig rtsub bzlas brjod grangs ma 'khyol// rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i don ni bdag gis ma rtogs te// gsung gi dam tshig nyams de mthos lo bshags// badzra/ bdag gis snod ldan sems can thams cad
la// brnab sems gnod sems log lta bskyed pa dang// chos nyid zab mo'i don ni ma rtogs te// lta bas sangs rgyas thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// sa/ sems can thams cad ye
nas sangs rgyas rgyu// ma rtogs bdag gis mngan dang skyon du bgrangs// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas ma brjod cing// yon tan dam tshig nyams te mthol lo bshags// twa/ sangs rgyas phrin las sna tshogs
dpag med kyis// snying rje chen pos sems can don ma byas// bdud rtsi lnga la longs spyod ma nus shing// phrin las dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// hU~M/ skye ba rnams bzhis bsdus pa'i sems
can rnams// chos sku rnam dag dbyings las gzugs sku snang// bde ba chen pos kun la khyab dmigs te// yang dag don dam ma rtogs mthol lo bshags// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin mchod cing// skyabs 'gro sems
bskyed gzhan don dmigs// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin sogs dang// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dgongs su gsol// oM/ chos sku mkha' 'dra gzugs sku mja' ltar snang// AH/ gsang sngags sgra brnyan lta bur sgra
grags cing// hU~M/ khro bo khro mo gdug pa 'dul// bla med dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// A+oM/ bdag gis byang chub mchog gis sems// a: ma lus par ni bskyed par bgyi// badzra/ ngan song
gsum las ma grol ba// lha mi gnyis su grol bar bgyi// sa/ ma bsgral ba yi lha mi rnams// byang chub sa la bsgral bar bgyi// twa/ dbugs ma phyung ba'i sems can rnams// sa brgyad pa la

dbugs dbyung zhing// hU~M/ sems la mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha'// rdo rje 'chang la rab tu 'god// lan gsum rgyud la gnas par 'gyur// bsrung ba so shing 'khyor ba'i chu// ku sha'i sngas stan steng du ni// dur khrod

zhig lpags rting nyal rmi lam brtag/ 'grub pa'i rtags rnams rab tu 'byung// bum pa mthing shun sngon po'i mdog/ gsang zhing dur khrod ras kyis dkris// ljon shig bzang pos kha brgyan cing// bdud rtsi lnga
yis bum par dgang// dbang dang bdud sel bgegs bsal ba'i// bum pa gsum du yang dag nges// rdo rje gzhon nu rigs kyi lha// ye shes khro bo thugs bskul sngags// lha yi sngags rnams rab tu

bzlas// khri dang stong gis dngos grub 'byung// rtags byung nyi ma rtse shar la// rgyu ma rigs lnga khrag 'thung dpal// mi 'gyur thig gis legs par btab// dur khrod tshon rtsi sna lnga yis// dkyil 'khor rdo

rje rigs su nges// rdzas rnams phun sum tshogs ldan pas// lha rnams bsgrub pa tshul bzhin bya// slob ma'i bdud dang bgegs bsal te// yon ni khas ni len du gzhug/ hU~M khrag 'thung rdo rje he ru ka/ bdag

gis bdud rtsi lngas mchod de// bdag gis rab tu bsgral slad du// mi phyed rdo rje bdag la stsol// slob mas lan gsum legs brjod pas// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis// slob ma bzang la 'di skad brjod// hU~M
skal ldan rig 'dzin rigs kyi bu// lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po'i phyir// da lta'i dus ni sems bskyed nas// bu khyod dga' ba ci la dga'// mtshan ldan slob mas 'di brjod do// hU~M/ bdag ni skal bzang

bde chen la// bde chen mchog la bdag dga' ste// bla med byang chub thob bya'i phyir// khrag 'thung dpal la bdag dga' 'o// skal ldan de la dam tshig dbog/ hU~M/ sangs rgyas kun gyis grub pa'i gzhi// bla
med rdo rje dam tshig ste// dam pa 'di ni gzur bar 'gyi// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang// dkon mchog mkha' 'gro yang dag gzung// phyag rgya sngags rnams rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la

byams// gsang ba chen po smra mi bya// 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams bzung// sgrub dang srung ba'i dam tshig mchog/ zhe sdang gti mug chags nga rgyal// dkar dmar ljang ser mthing ga'i mdog/ dag pa'i snod bcud mi
'dor ro// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste// bdag gis brtan par gzung bar bgyi// nam du yang ni mi spang ngo// lan gsum rgyud la gnas par 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig mna' bsgag ste// oM badzra sa
ma ya hU~M hU~M thA/ me tog sngon po sna tshogs gtad// hU~M/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// rdo rje rigs kyi me tog dor nas kyang// khrag 'thung rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// sku

gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams// skal ldan rig 'dzin bdag la stsal du gsol// bdag ni rdo rje'i rigs su gzung du gsol// oM bod+hi tsit+ta pU tsa ho// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis// lha ngo

bstan cing cod pan sbyin// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub rdo rje lam nas drangs nas kyang// khrag 'thung rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rab byams

rnams// skal ldan rig 'dzin khyod la sbyin par bya// drag po'i lha tshogs khyed kyis blta bar byos// puSh+pe A we sha ya a a/ gang gis slob mar dbang bskur phyir// bum pa rdo rje dril bu dang// thod pa rdo rje ming

du grags// phur pa khro bcu dpa' bo'i tshul// gsang sngags 'chi med 'dod yon che// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa A/ nus pa skyed par byed pa yis// rdo rje nang gi dbang lnga ste// thos bsgom smra byed phrin
las dbang// rdo rje slob dpon dpa' bo che// yab yum bde ba sbyor ba'i sgras// byang sems dkar dmar thig le'i dbang// sa/ nyan byed rna ba'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba rin chen ngo bo nyid// sa yi phyag
rgya'i tshogs mchog las// rin chen khrag 'thung gsal spro bstim// sa/ dbang de bskur zhing smin pa yis// gsang ba'i gsang mchog dam pa las// gsang ba gzhal yas bsnyen par bya// gsang ba'i don nyid

rtogs par bya// gsang ba gzhan du smra mi bya// badzra/ bsam byed snying gi gzhal yas su// gsang ba rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid// yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las// rdo rje khrag 'thung gsal spro bstim// badzra/ dus

gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i gdan// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// twa/ lag mthil gnyis kyi gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i rgya gram ngo

bo nyid// twa yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// las kyi khrag 'thung gsal 'phro bstim// twa// khyod ni rdo rje las yin pas// las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/ pho nya 'du 'phro mang po kun// khyod kyi dgongs pa

byed par 'gyur// a/ smra byed lce yi gzhal yas su// gsal ba a yi ngo bo nyid// a yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// pad+ma khrag 'thung gsal spro bstim// a/ chos kyi bdud rtsi bla na med// dad ldan skyes bu

ngoms par byed// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la// 'thung bar gsang bsgrag gzhan du min// oM/ bskyod chen lan lag gzhal yas su// gsal ba oM gyi ngo bo nyid// oM AHbadzras twa hU~M las// rigs lnga khrag
'thung lnga ru gsal// oM/ phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mnga' bdag 'gyur// oM/ slob ma'i

lus ni dag cing smin// rdo rje'i lus ni rnam par dag/ de ni bum pa'i dbang yin te// lha yi sku ni rnam dag dpa'// myur du thob ste the tshom med// rdo rje theg la mos pa yi// bu mo mtshan bzang ldan pa

btsal// thabs ni rdo rje gzhon nu ste// de nyid shes rab bde ba'i yum// rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mor 'khyil// bde ba thugs kyi thig le spro// oM a nu rA ga pU tsa ho/ zag med nyi zla'i snying po de// slob ma'i ngag la

yang dag sbyin// kA ya sid+d+hi oM/ wAk+ka sid+d+hi A/ tsit+ta sid+d+hi hU~M/ oM AHhU~M ma hA su kha ho// hU~M bde chen thig le yab yum bcud// rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mor 'khyil// bu yi lce la dbab par bya// snying gi dkyil du gzung

bar gyis// A+oM bo d+hi tsit+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ gsang ba byang sems rdo rje'i ngag/ rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par dag/ rdo rje gzhon nu khrag 'thung dpal// shes rab bcu drug lon pa yi// bu mo mtshan dang ldan pa

la// gar dang ldan pas yang dag spyod// bde chen sgyu ma'i brda mtshon te// gnyis shor gnyis mnyam dbus dag tu// dbyibs kyi bde chen byung ba ste// rang rig ye shes de la yod// hU~M bde ba thugs kyi sems
dpa' che// yab yum gnyis med mu tig gi/ khu 'phang byang sems phab pa yi// dus gsum bla ma sangs rgyas dang// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la bde chen gyis// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa phul// rdo rje bde

chen thig le dbyings// zag med dbyings su mi rtog skye// de bas blo mchog longs spyod cig/ hU~M yab chen chos kyi dbyings mthong ba'i// pad+ma dag la 'o byed dam// de las byang chub sems 'khyil ba'i// zag

med bde ba longs spyod dam// e ma ho// shes rab lha mo yum chen mo// chos kyi dbyings 'thob 'o byed dam// byang chub sems mthong thig le la// rtag tu gus shing bde bar sbyor// ho/ A+oM a badzra satwa hU~M// de

yi shes rab ye shes kyi// dbang gi rdo rje thugs nyid bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i byin rlabs kyis// sems nyid mkha' dang mtshungs par mthong// chos sku mngon gsum mthong ba'i tshe// mchog gi dbang du de nyid
nges// rdul tshon lus dang byang chub sems// de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ brten nas dbang rnams yang dag bskur// bum pa gsang ba shes rab dbang// bzhi pa mchog gi dbang chen yin// bla ma
mnyes par ma byas shing// dbang gis smin par ma byas na// thos bsam bsgom pa don med 'gyur// de bas dbang bskur mchog thob kyis// bla ma mnyes pas don 'grub 'byung// dam tshig nyams par gyur pa
na// bla ma mnyes par byas pas skongs// gong bzhin dam tshig bsrung ba dag/ dam tshig dang po yin par brjod// bdud rtsi lnga la longs spyod cing// de bzhin bum bu ga'i yang pa'i snying

po gzhib// dam tshig gnyis pa yin par nges// shes rab rang bzhin bud med la// rigs lnga'i mkha' 'gro nyid du brtag/ mdog dang spyod pa ri mo dang// dri dang pad+ma yongs brtags la// gus pas bsten cing
brtse bar bya// dam tshig gsum pa yin pas nges// ting 'dzin gsum ldan nges pa yis// sems can sangs rgyas dbyer med kyang// nam mkha'i mtha' dag mnyam par dmigs// nam yang 'bral bar mi byed

pa// dam tshig bzhi pa yin par bshad// badzra/ gsang gsum dam tshig las byung ba// yab yum gnyis med bde chen las// byang chub sems kyi chu rgyud 'dis// rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur ro// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta

A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// swA/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid che// thod pa lnga yi dbang bskur bas// rin chen rigs kyi dbang bskur mchog/ rin chen khrag 'thung brtan gyur cig/ sa man+ta rat+na badzra a

b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// a/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang// rdo rje gsung gis don mdzad pa// pad+ma khrag 'thung rdo rje dpal// rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro// badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ prat+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// twa/

mkha' 'gro kun gyi dril bu'i dbang// rtog med chos kyi sgra 'byin zhing// las kyi khrag 'thung phrin las bdag/ shes rab dril bu'i dbang bskur ro// tiSh+Tha a nuSh+ThA na badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// oM/ rdo rje ming gi chos nyid

de// cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs te// sangs rgyas khrag 'thung ngo bo nyid// rdo rje ming du dbang bskur ro// d+harma d+hA tu bi shod+ha/ badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM// thams cad 'dus pa'i ye shes la// drug pa rdo rje gzhon nu'i

sku// zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub// lha klu thams cad dbang sdud cing// mkha' 'gro'i gnas su myur du 'gro// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las dbang gis le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho bcom ldan khro bo'i gtso// sems kyi zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzas// lha yi de
nyid bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas dang dkyil 'khor phur pa dang// lha yi sku mdog phyag mtshan rnams// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub pa'i
gnas// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs dang// ri dang brag dang sa yi dbyibs// rigs kyi mtshan mar nges pa dang// nyams dga' ba yi sa phyogs su// gnag cing cher rtsub sa btsal la// rdo rje'i
dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa// gru bzhi mnyam zhing 'thas par bzhag/ 'byung chen rab 'jigs rU tra bsgral// dur khrod dkyil 'khor gzhi yin no// rdo rje thod pa mtshan ldan la// thig gdab dur

khrod tshon gyis bri// lcags sam seng ldeng rtsub pa'i shing// drag po'i phur pa sor brgyad pa// ye shes lnga yi bsnyen pa brtsam// dur khrod thig tshon rab ldan pas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rab bris te// phur pa'i

dbyibs la khro bor rdzogs// ting 'dzin rdzogs pa'i bsnyen pa brtsam// gru gsum shel gyi dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu bri// phur pa lha yi bsgrub pa brtsam// dur khrod thig tshon rab ldan pas// drag
po'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum ni// drag po'i phur pas las la sbyar// dkyil 'khor bzhi yis las bzhi 'grub// rdo rje phur pa'i bsam gtan gnas// khams gsum sems can bsgral gyur na// bsad pa 'di

yis mchog thob cing// rdo rje'i rigs su mngon 'tshang rgya// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rgyu nyid kyis// mdzes shing 'jigs par rab tu gnas// phyi ni rin chen lnga las grub// dbus su nor bu bai DUr+ya// shar ni
shel yin lho ni gser// nub ni pad+marA ga la// byang ni in+d+ra nI lar gnas// rin chen lnga yi rtsig pas mdzes// 'dod yon lha mo rin chen bdag/ me tog phreng ba mu tig har// tA ra Na zhing 'khor lo

gdugs// ba dan la sogs rab tu mdzes// tog ni rdo rje rtse dgu pa'o// nang ni dur khrod gzhal yas khang// klu chen brgyad kyi ka ba la// nyi ma zla ba lha yi bus// ka gdan ka gzhu mdzes par gnas// lha chen

brgyad kyi gdung la ni// zla ba'i skar khung yang dag gnas// gza' chen brgyad kyi phyam la ni// nyi ma'i mthongs khung bcu yis mdzes// nyi shu rtsa brgyad rgyu skar gyis// gral ma rnams su rab tu mdzes// thod pa
skam rlon ra ri yis// phyogs bzhir rtsigs pa rab tu byas// 'byung po bsnol ba'i ma thems byas// chu srin ya thems nyid du gnas// ro rlon la sogs skyes bu la// rigs bzhi klu yis sgo bzhi mdzes// dbus

kyi gru gsum mthing nag la// zla gam dmar po gsum dang ldan// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad nag por gnas// dur khrod brgyad du gnas pa ste// mtsho dang klu dang sprin dang ni// zhing skyong phyogs skyong mchod rten
dang// brag dang me yi rnam par gnas// ro ni rlon pas ra ri dang// keng rus bam rul rnam par 'thor// bya gcan 'jigs pa'i ma mo dang// srid pa'i mkha' 'gro mang po gnas// gzhal yas mdzes shing

'jigs pa der// lha ni brgyad dang nyi shu gnyis// dbus su drug pa rdo rje 'dzin// rU tra bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// pad+ma nyi zla bdud bzhi mnan// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu ni// sgeg pa dpa' ba gar dgu
pa// rab 'jigs me dpung dkyil na bzhugs// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug mdzes// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor thabs bgrad// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// skra mdzes bzhad

khro gshe ba'i zhal// spyan dmar smin ma sma ra ser// khro gnyer chu ni rlabs bzhin 'khrugs// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po yis// gser gyi rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams// bar pa rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// g.yon gyi dang po

me dpung bsnams// bar pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// mthing nag sku la dur khrod brgyan// rigs lnga thod pa lnga yis brgyan// klu chen brgyad dang thod pas brgyan// 'khor

lo rgyas 'debs bde ba'i yum// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bde ba'i sku// sbrul dang thod pa gzigs gis brgyan// dril bu thod khrag phyag na bsnams// e ka tsa ti sgrol ba'i yum// gri gug thod khrag khams gsum

sgrol// res 'ga' kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams// g.yer kha dril bu nyid la yang// rtog med chos kyi sgra 'byin ma// ma mo bcu drug pho nyar 'gyed// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba'i sras// stod ni gtso bo yab 'dra

la// smad ni chu srin phur bu'i dbal// rdo rje phur pas dgra bgegs sgrol// de nas phyogs skyong tshar bcad phyir// 'od kyi gong bu sgo nga bcu// yab yum phra thabs nyi shur bcas// steng 'og nyi zla'i gdan

steng du// rdo rje khro bo hU~M mdzad dang// yum chen rdo rje sgra 'byin ma// sprul pa g.yag dang smig bu'i mgo/ shar phyogs dri za'i gdan steng du// khro bo rdo rje rnam par rgyal// yum chen rdo rje snyems ma dang// sprul pa

stag dang bya rgod mgo/ shar lho me lha'i gdan steng du// khro bo rdo rje dbyug sngon can// yum chen rdo rje sder mo dang// sprul pa g.yag dang bya rog mgo/ lho phyogs gshin rje'i gdan steng du/ khro bo rdo rje gshin rje'i

gshed// yum chen dur khrod bdag mo dang// sprul pa sha ba 'ug pa'i mgo/ lho nub srin po'i gdan steng du// khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon// yum chen rdo rje gtun khung ma// sprul pa gzig dang khwa ta'i mgo/ nub

phyogs klu yi gdan steng du/ khro bo chen po rta mgrin rgyal// yum chen rdo rje gtum mo dang// sprul pa byi la pu shud mgo/ nub byang rlung lha'i gdan steng du// khro bo chen po gzhan mi thub// yum chen rdo rje mda'

snyems ma// sprul pa spyang ki khra yi mgo/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin gdan steng du// khro bo rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil// yum chen rdo rje rlung 'byin ma// sprul pa pha wang seng ge'i mgo/ byang shar 'byung po'i gdan

steng du// khro bo rdo rje khams gsum rgyal// yum chen rdo rje gsod ma dang// sprul pa dom dang sre mo mgo/ 'og phyogs sa bdag gdan steng du// khro bo rdo rje stobs po che// yum chen rdo rje bskyod ma dang// sprul pa
dred dang byi la'i mgo/ lha ni bzhi bcu gnyis rnams kyang// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdog nag gzugs// stag dang gzig gi sham thabs can// mche ba can dang gshog pa can// phra men mgo
brnyan nyi shu ni// sbrul dang thod pas rab tu brgyan// phur pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// skra brdzes spyan dmar mche ba gtsigs// dus mtha'i 'od zer 'phro bas 'khrugs// drod gsher las skyes sgo ma

bzhi// shar phyogs dri za'i gdan steng du// skye ka'i mgo can lcags kyu ma// lho phyogs grul bum gdan steng du// pu shud mgo can zhags pa ma// nub phyogs chu bdag gdan steng du// srin bya'i mgo can lcags

sgrog ma// byang phyogs gnod sbyin gdan steng du/ khra yi mgo can dril bu ma// 'di bzhi zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// dkar ser dmar dang ljang ba'i mgo/ gzig dang thod sbrul rgyan du byas// bskum zhing brkyang
ba'i zhabs kyis gnas// phyag g.yon phur pa 'debs par mdzad// med dpung dkyil na khro tshul bzhugs// lha ni brgyad dang bzhi bcu rnams// drag po'i tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms// 'di yis lus ngag sems

sbyangs te// bdud kyi 'tshe ba zhi ba dang// tshe 'di nyid la bud+d+har 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ dkyil 'khor lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rnam
rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho bcom ldan rig pa'i gtso// dug lnga rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir// rdo rje khrag 'thung khro tshogs kyi// mngon rtogs rim pa bshad du
gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dug 'joms ye shes lnga ldan 'di// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// dang po bdud bzhi log 'dren tshogs// tshar gcad bsrung ba rab tu bya// sems

bskyed gzhan la rab dmigs la// oM ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ nam mkha' rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas// rdzus skyes gtso 'khor khro bo ni// skad cig tsam la rab tu gsal// sgra yi rkyen gyis yongs

su rdzogs// hU~M nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal

pa brgya ru khos// lus kyang dum bu stong du gtubs// snying yang tshalapa bdun du gtubs// drag po sngags kyis tshar gcod do// oM badzra satwa hU~M// nyi shu rtsa gcig nyams pa bskang// phyi nang gsang ba rab tu

brjod// mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA lar// bdud rtsi lnga dang rak+ta'i tshogs// sha khrag rus pa gtor mar bsham// oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU~M hrI ThA/ oM AHhU~M ma hA rak+ta dz+wal sa muny+tsa hU~M/ oM AHhU~M ba liM ta te dz+wa ba liM ta

ba la ba te gu ya sa ma yahU~M/ sngags kyi sgra yis dag pa gsum// mchod rdzas rang bzhin dug lnga dang// dug gsum mchod pa bla na med// hU~M rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon cha sngon po 'bar

ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas shar ba 'dra// srog gi go ru shar ba dang// snying gi go ru bsgom par bya// hU~M e yaM ra suM keM raM b+h+rUM/ b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+hA+e dz+nyA na tsa kra maN+Da la b+h+rUM/ srog las nam mkha' gru gsum dang//

rlung khrag sha chen keng rus me// 'jigs pa'i dur khrod gzhal yas khang// sgra yi rkyen gyis rab tu rdzogs// dzaHhU~M baM hoH// ti ra baM/ a ma paM las rdzogs pa'i gdan// rU tra pho mo dam srin bcu// bdud bzhi

bgegs bzhi yab yum rnams// kha sbub gan rgyal byi chings mnan// pad+ma nyi zla yon tan sgras// rab bskyed 'od zer rab tu 'khrugs// hU~M hU~M gdug pa 'joms byed tshogs// oM AHbadzra satwa hU~M/ rdo rje sems

dpa' yab yum ni// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag rdzogs// rdo rje dril bu bde bar 'khyud// kun+da lta bur dkar ba'i mdog/ rigs lnga khrag 'thung yab yum bcu// 'dus pa'i rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// oM badzra kI li

kI la ya dIb+da tsakra ha na ha na ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ zhes pa khrag 'thung rgyal po dang// bde bar sgrol bar byed pa'i yum// khro zhing rngams pa'i tshul bskyed pas// gdug pa ma lus sgrol bar byed// hU~M/ snying rjes

bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// gsad cing gnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtams byas na// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// srag gi go ru shar ba dang// snying gi go ru bsgom par bya// sgra yi stobs kyis

gsal bar bsgom// yab yum mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab// a dang hU~M las rab tu sbyangs// yum gyi yab kyi lce gzhibs nas// yum gyi thugs kar ut+pal gtad// gdung ba'i nga ro 'di skad brjod// hU~M rdo rje

gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rjer grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas yab yum bde bas sgo nga bcu phyung ste

phyogs bcu rab tu spro// A+oM badzra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra hU~M/ gardza hU~M phaT/ gardza hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M/ ha na hU~M phaT/ ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU~M/ da ha hU~M phaT/ da ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn ta

ka hU~M/ pa tsa hU~M phaT/ pa tsa hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la b+h+yo hU~M/ ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hri/ hu lu hU~M phaT/ hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pA ra dzi ta hU~M/ tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/

oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M/ ts+tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ ts+tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M/ b+hin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ b+hin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la kro d+ha hU~M/ s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ yab kyis de brjod sgra
stobs kyis// khro bo yab yum mgo brnyan tshogs// lha ni bzhi bcu tham pa bskyed// nyi zla yi ge bzhi nyid las// oM badzra kI li kI la ya bi d+ha ya bing bing hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya na

maHsarba ta thA hring hring hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya su ru su ru pra su ru hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ drod dang gsher las grub pa yi// sngags brjod khro mo bzhi po bskyed// yab yum

'dod chags nga ro brjod// byin gnyis dam du rab 'khyud de// lag pa dam 'khyud ma mchu 'jibs// hU~M sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje'i chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzadapa// sku

yi dbyig tu sras bskyed cing// de brjod bde ba'i rba rlabs kyis// yi ge 'joms byed sgra yis bskyed// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M phaT/ sras mchog rdo rje phur pa ni// yum gyi b+ha gar sku gsum
