rdzogs// badzra sa ma ya dzaH/ de brjod yab kyi phyag gi blangs// phyag ni rigs lnga yab yum bcu// sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bde ba'i rlabs kyis dbang bzhi bskur/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya a b+hi She ka hU~M

phaT// rigs lnga dbu yi gtsug tor can// thams cad 'dus pa'i sras mchog ste// dug lnga rtsad nas gcod par byed// sangs rgyas 'dus pa thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// oM bud+d+ha kI

li kI la ya badzrA NAM dz+wa la dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta sarba na sa pa na ye hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya wA ka badzrA NAM sarba duSh+ThA na hri shod+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzrA kI li kI la ya badzra tsit+ta nAn/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ lus kyi ba

spu'i bu ga kun// khro chung nyid kyi rab tu gtams// oM badzra kI li kI la ya be ta lI maN+Dal rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ lus ni bkrag dang ldan pa dang// ba spu'i bu ga rdo rje gtams// oM badzra kI li kI li ya ma gu ta la ta la

pra ta la hU~M phaT/ oM bud+d+ha thams cad 'dus pa'i sku// khro bo du mas byin gyis brlab// khams gsum gdug pa bsgral ba'i phyir// gdul bya'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya tiSh+Tha/ sgra yi stobs kyi yub

yum gyi// sngon du bka' stong tshul du ni/ khrag 'thung 'dus pa'i phur pa ni// sras kyi mchog tu rab tu dmigs/ khrag 'thung 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dbang ni rab tu blang bar bya// dang po bde ba'i sku yis
mchod// hU~M thabs kyis spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// dbang dang byin brlabs bdag stsol cig/ dbang bzhi rdzogs par rab tu

blangs// oM AHhU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ 'gro drug nyon mongs bcings ba rnams// hU~M gis dug chen rab sbyang ste// a nr-i su tri pre dur 'gyur// raM yaM khaM las me rlung chus// 'gro ba rab sbyangs hU~M du gyur/ khams
gsum thams cad rdo rje sems// til gyi gong bus lta bus gang// hU~M rta mgrin rgyal po ye shes la// bstims pas byang chub sems rgyas gyur// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba'i sgras// ye shes khro

bo spyan drangs te// hU~M srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// rdo rje

phur pa'i dngos grub stsol// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sa ma ya dzaH/ a ti pu ho// pra tI ts+tsha ho/ sarba ta thA ga ta ban+da naM ka ro yA mi/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ yab yum bde ba'i sbyor ba las// mchod pa rnams dang 'dod yon

lnga// bde ba'i mchod pa rab tu brtsam// oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M phaT/ pU dza badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ gtor mas lha rnams tshim par bya// hU~M mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab// dam

tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M tuMphaT/ ma hA ba liM ta khA hi/ dug gsum mchod pa rab phul

bas// sangs rgyas sku gsung thob par 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa yis// khro bo'i tshogs rnams mnyes par 'gyur// oM badzra kI li kI la ya na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ar+g+haMpra tI ts+tsha ho/ shrI pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ khA hi khA

hi/ kha raM khA hi/ kha raM khA hi/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH// sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M hU~M phaT/ pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha raM khA hi/ bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa yis// dug chen lnga po rab dag nas// sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bor
gyur// oM AHhU~M/ shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs rnams 'grub// 'dod chags rab tu dag bya'i phyir// rak+ta'i mchod pa brtson par bya// hU~M dngos grub bar chod byed pa'i
bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rengs par khug la smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// nga

yi dbang du gyur nas kyang// bsgo ba'i bka' 'di nyan par byos// ma ha rak+ta khA hi/ hU~M bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngaun chad ji bzhin bcas pa yis// mngon spyod phrin

las myur du mdzod// ma hA rak+ta khA hi/ hU~M dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung// nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul
med par shog/ ma hA rak+ta la khA hi/ lag pa khrag 'thung yab yum bcus// dug gsum rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir// khams gsum yongs sgrol sbyor bar bya// hU~M rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka'
las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dbal snying bsreg nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdung byas nas// lha yang rung ste bsgral

bar gyis/ kha thaM kha thaM kha thaM/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ ha ha ha/ dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'khor bcas kyis// 'gro ba rigs drug sems can gyi// dug gsum rtsad nas bcad par 'gyur/
tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum// mchod dang bshags dang bstab pa bya// lhag mas mkha' 'gro mnyes par 'gyur// lhag ma rnam pa gnyis yin te// dpal gyi lhag ma dang/ rig 'dzin gyi phud/ rig

'dzin gyi lhag ma bsres la/ rang gi khar rak+ta dang chang blug la/ rta mgrin gy-i phyag rgya bcas la/ rang gi lce thog tu hrIHdzi la rta mgrin yab yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dmar po pad+ma thod khrag can du bsam

phyag rgya byas te gtor ma yang/ de kho na 'dra bar bsam kha phru phyag rgya nas gtor mar btab pas/ lce'i rta mgrin yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i thig le 'od du zhu phyag rgya la phog ste/ sbyor bas gtor mar 'od du zhu
nas/ bdud rtsi mu tig dkar po lta bur gyur/ dam can rnams kyis gsol nas bar chod bsal lo// dga' zhing spro dang bcas pa yis// gsang sngags drag po'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM badzra kI li kI la ya

hU~M phaT/ yi ge dgu pa sngags kyi mchog/ ma byung 'byung ba'i mi 'gyur ro// oM badzra kI li kI la ya dIp+ta tsakra ha na ha na ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ yab yum gnyis kyi snying po mchog/ sdig pa thams cad zad 'gyur

cing// sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed// gdug pa tshar gcod bdud las rgyal// bde sgrol mkha' mnyam dbyer med thob// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M phaT/ lha rnams bsdus pa'i nye snying

ste// sems kyi sdig pa'i sdug bsngal sel// lha rnams dbang 'gyur dngos grub thob// mab+h+yo dra ga dza/ mkha' 'gro kun gyi srog 'phrog sngags// yi ge mtshan ma mthong ba dang// 'od me 'tshag 'khrol mchong lding

'gyur// myur du lha yi zhal mthong 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ bsam gtan gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad gsol// gdug pa tshar gcod bcom ldan 'das// klu tshogs dbang du ji ltar bsdu// 'gro ba rigs drug ji ltar bsgral// thugs rje can gyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// klu dang gshin rje bdud la sogs// drag po thams cad dbang sdud na// gru gsum drag po'i gnas nyid du// dur khrod sa la dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mthing nag
dkyil 'khor bya// sor brgyad phur pa nyi shu brgyad// dkyil 'khor rdzas su yang dag bkod// gong bzhin mngon rtogs rim pa las// bzhi bcu zhe brgyad lha tshogs kun// kun gyi spyi bo'i gtsug

tor na// rta mgo ljang zhur rta skad mtsher// khams gsum klu tshogs dbang du sdud// rdo rje'i gshog pas bar snang khebs// phyag na phur pa bya khyung bsnams// zhabs kyi chu srin phur pa'i dbal// klu la sogs

pa'i snying gar gzer// kun kyang kha dog dmar por dmigs// gdug pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur// oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hri/ hu lu hu lu hri/ pad+ma pad+ma hri/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hri/ hU~M

gar ru Na tsa le tsa le hri/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M hU~M phaT phaT b+h+yo nA ga b+h+yo/ zhag gsum lon nas dbang du 'gyur// klu sogs thams cad dbang du 'gyur// gang zhig gsad par 'dod pa na// drag po'i las kyi bsam

gtan brtsam// lha rnams sku mdog nag po ste// sngags kyang sgra dang me ru byung// gang zhig gsad par 'dod pa la// phur pa'i ser chen rab tu dbab// oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa

nA ga hu lu hu lu sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M phaT/ sbyor ba zhag bdun byas gyur na// lha klu thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur// mi dang lha dang klu la sogs// yang dag sa la bsgral 'dod pas// ngang nyid rdo rje snying rje

yis// gsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rje gtams byas nas// rnam shes rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas// hU~M rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs ni// til gyi gong bu lta bu yis// rtsa bcud kun gyi rtse la 'bar// nga

nyid sku yi rnam pa las// sngags kyi 'od zer du ma byung// khro rgyal khyod kyis mnyam par byos// de tshe de yi rjes la ni// thugs kyi dpal be'u rtse mo dang// ljags kyi pad+ma'i klong dkyil nas// ngan sngags snying po

'di phyung ngo// oM badzra kI li kI la ya log 'dren thams cad mA ra ya/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hU~M phaT/ de yis log 'dren thams cad kun// smyo zhing smra bar 'gyur ba yin// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// smyo

byed ces bya'i sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan dbu yi gtsug gtor nas// oM badzra kI li kI la ya log 'dren thams cad mA ra ya/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ snod bcud log 'dren thams cad kun// rdul phran

bzhin du phye mar 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// rdul rlog ces bya ba'i sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan gsang ba'i sbubs nas ni// ngan sngags snying po 'di byung ngo// oM badzra kI li kI la ya log
'dren thams cad mA ra ya/ b+hin+d+ha ya b+hin+d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ snod bcud log 'dren thams cad kun// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du gsol// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// zhal du gsol ba'i snying po

gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod sbu nas// ngan sngags snying po 'di byung ngo// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ gnod pa'i nus pa ha sa ra ya hraM da ya hU~M phaT/ ngan sngags snying po 'di byung bas// lo
ka khams 'di rab tu g.yos// bdud dpung thams cad pham par gyur// rdo rje rig kyi lha tshogs kyis// lha dang dpral ba'i sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis lte ba nas// dbang sdud 'gugs pa'i

snying po byung// oM badzra kI li kI la ya log 'dren thams cad A we sha ya A we sha ya hU~M phaT/ stong gsum log 'dren thams cad kun// gzugs nas dbang sdud rdo bzhin 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs

kyis// 'bebs par byed pa'i sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag zhabs las// ngan sngags snying po 'di byung ngo// oM badzra kI li kI la ya log 'dren thams cad mA ra ya shrI g+h+raM a na ya hU~M phaT/ bdud
dang log 'dren thams cad kun// yan lag gru gu bzhin du gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// byad du gzhug pa'i sngags du gsungs// bcom ldan thugs ka'i dpal be'u nas// gsang ba'i snying po 'di

byung ngo// oM lam hU~M lam staM b+ha ya nan/ mo ha g+ha ya b+ha ga wAn hrIHSh+Th-IHbi kri badzra hU~M kA ra A/ hU~M ma ma pa shaM ku ru maSh+taM dz+nyA na ka ra i dan/ d+ha ti ma ma karma pa shi karma ya shI g+h+raM kA ra ya hU~M phaT/ 'di byung log

'dren thams cad kyi// rnam shes 'phos shing bde ba thob// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// dag cing tshe 'dzin sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyi lte ba dang// thugs ka dpung pa dpyi mig dang// gtsug

tor gsang ba'i lam dang ni// spyi bo gsang ba'i gnas rnams nas// gsang ba'i snying po 'di byung ngo// hU~M pa ra bid+yA na bi ga nAM/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/

ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ sarba A na ya hU~M phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hU~M phaT/ 'di byung khro mo bcu po yi// gnas bcu nyon mongs rang dag nas// log 'dren thar pa nyid du gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyi shangs dang ni// spyan

snyan lte ljags gsang sbubs dang// thugs kyi dpal be'u rtse mo nas// gsang ba'i snying po 'di rnams byung// ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/

mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka tang ka ye/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a dzi te a pa ra dzi te/ mA ra se na pra marda na ya hU~M phaT/ 'di byung rig pa'i khro bo bcus// log par 'dren pa thams cad kyis// gnas bcu'i nyon mongs rnam dag

nas// thig le dbyings su mi 'gyur thim// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bo dang// snying ga lte ba'i gnas gsum nas// oM badzra kI li kI la ya b-id ya bid ya hU~M phaT/ namaHsa man+ta hring hring hU~M phaT/ su ru su ru pra su ru
phaT/ mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ de byung sgo ma bzhi po yis// mtsho bzhi nyon mongs gnas dag nas// dag pa'i mtsho ni nyag gcig ste// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par dag/ ngan sngags 'dus pa'i
dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor la// rgyar ni khru gang zabs su phyed// kha khyer gsum la sor bzhi ste// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi yin te// drag po'i me yi dkyil 'khor dang// mA ra ya
gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang// 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor dang// bstab pa zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ro// gnag pa dmar ba'i mdog 'dra ba// mthun pa'i rdzas ni tsakra gtso// sra ba klad rgyas 'khor lo

ni// lha dang dpral ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i 'khor lo ni// gzugs la dbab pa'i 'khor lo yin// nya lta bu yi tsakra ni// byang du gzhug pa'i tsakra yin// pad+ma 'dab 'dra'i tsakra ni// smyo bar

byed pa'i tsakra yin// pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i tsakra ni// rdul du rlog pa'i tsakra yin// rdo rje dbyibs 'dra'i tsakra ni// zhal du bstab pa nyid du 'gyur// srog la 'khor lo bskor ba ni// rtsibs drug lte bar ling+ga

bkod// gtad mnan byas pas las 'grub cing// khyad par klu la gtad pas 'grub// rdzas ni rnam pa drug yin te// gu gu tshil chen dri chen gsum// rkang drag gu gul ra yi gzhob// lha dang phral ba'i rdzas yin

no// dbab la nyung dkar rgyal po dang// smad dkris rak+ta tsha ba yin// tshon sna lnga yi byad du gzhug/ smyo ba dug gi chu yis so// rdo rje tho bas rdul du brlag/ bstab pa me yi dkyil 'khor ro// lha dang bral bas
dgug pa dang// rnam shes bstim zhing byad du gzhug/ smyor gzhug rdul du brlag pa dang// zhal du bstab pas dgyes par 'gyur// dngos grub bar chod byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa
rnams// gtogs shig grogs dang phral bar gyis// phob cig rnam par gzir bar byos// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// rengs par khug la smyor chug cig/ nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang// bsgo ba'i

bka' 'di nyan par byos// zhal du bstab po mgul du bstim// sku yi gzi brjid rgyas par mdzod// badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha kha tham kha tham kha tham/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ hA hA hA/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ phur pa nyi shu rtsa
brgyad la// yab yum gnyis kyi bden gnyis kyis// phyag rgya chen po'i sku ru gsal// dza tis dgug dang bsad pa'i mchog/ sras kyi mchog gis las rnams 'grub// khro bo yab yum bcu po yi// gnas bcu

drug gsum rtsad nas gcod// sgo ba bzhi yis mtsho bzhi skems// srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes 'khor lo rab grub nas// nyon mongs dug lnga rtsad nas gcod/ khrag 'thung rigs lnga 'dres pa la// rdo rje
gzhon nu'i dngos grub thob// las bzhi grub pa'i smon lam gdab// gang zhig mtshon cha mang po yis// phyag mtshan phreng ba'i yig 'bru dang// sgra dang me dang 'od dang 'ja'// drag byed thams

cad phran du bkol/ khrag mtsho sha rus spung pa yi// drag byed mngon du mthong ba dang// 'od dang du ba me rnams 'byung// tshe dang mi 'phel longs spyod dang// rig 'dzin sa dang dbyings rnams thob/ khams
gsum yongs grol ting 'dzin gyis// nam mkha' chos sku nyag gcig thob// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las sngags drug gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rnam rgyal khro bo
yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// 'gro ba'i mgon mdzad bcom ldan 'das// ro yi dngos grub ji ltar lags// dur khrod spyod pa ji ltar lags// mgon mdzad khyod kyis bshad du
gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ro sgrub spyod pa byed pa rnams// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// ro yi mtshan nyid legs par brtag/ mi rigs lnga la kun tu bshad// sha chen lnga la 'di

ltar brtag/ grub rdzas dngos grub lha ru brtag/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ gshed dang phral phyir bdud rtsi 'khyil// mchog phur sor brgyad nyid la bsgrub// gnas pa'i khung du sbyor bar 'gyur// pha

rol phyin bcu dag pa yi/ khro bo bcu yis sdig pa sbyang// yi ge drug gis 'gro drug sbyang// bar chad bsal phyir bro brdungs ste// hU~M stong gsum stong gi lo ka na// dbus phyogs stong gi lo ka na// dregs pa bsnol

ba'i gdan steng na// rdo rje khrag 'thung bro ra bcas// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag sku// rdo rje dbyings phyug yum la 'khyud// rdo rje thod khrag dkrug cing gsol// dur khrod chas kyis lha srin 'dul// rdo
rje'i gshog pa bar snang brkyangs// spyan gsum dmar zlum stong gsum bsreg/ mche ba gtsigs pas bdud bzhi 'joms// ljags dmar glog ltar 'khyug pa yis// stong gsum ma lus gsal bar byed// hU~M

gi sgra ni 'brug bzhin sgrogs// brkyang bskum zhabs kyis bro brdung bas// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// klu ni yos su rngod pa'i bro// bgegs rnams mer ni sreg pa'i bro// ma bdud thar bar rlog pa'i

bro// dur khrod 'di la bro brdung bas// dam nyams gshed ni rlag par 'gyur// A+oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ phyogs bzhi rigs kyi bro brdung bas// bar chad bgegs ni sbyang bar 'gyur// khro chu rdo rje 'gros kyis

blang// drag po bya yi 'gros kyis blang// mkha' 'gro ce spyang 'gros gyis blang// bdud kyi sgo la 'ju thag bcad// sa yi rten phur 'og tu bkod// rdo rje rgya gram thag pas gdags// dkyil 'khor steng du rU tra

bzhin// dur khrod gzhal yas khang du bzung// sgrub pa byed pa'i rdzas su bzung// thugs dam skong ba'i bdud rtsi bzung// A+oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ dur khrod gnas su byin gyis brlab// bsgrub pa

lha dang bdud rtsi lngar// byin gyis brlabs pa'i yon tan sgra// hU~M dza ti dbyings kyi yum chen las// mkha' 'gro mang po'i sprul pa 'gyed// kau rI b+han dmar zhing dbyug sngo// tsau rI ser mo mda' gzhu 'gengs// pra

mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar nag sngo// be tA nag mo zhing chu za// puk+ka dmar ser rgyu zhags 'dren// g+hasma ljang gu dung khrag 'thung// sma sha ljang nag zhing snying za// tsaN+Da ser skya zhing lus 'bral// ma mo chen mo khyed

brgyad kyis// dur khrod gnas su byin gyis brlobs// he ru ka yi grong khyer mdzod// bdud rtsi lnga ru byin gyis brlobs// b+h+yo seng gdong ser mo ro bsnol za// stag gdong dmar mo bsnol mar blta// wa gdong

nag mo ro la ldag khyi gdong mthing nag zur blta len// bya rgod gdong dmar rgyu ma 'dren// kaM ka sngo skya zhing la za// bya rog mdog nag b+han gri 'dzin// 'ug gdong khra mo rgya gram 'dzin// phra men rdo rje khyed

brgyad kyis// ru lu zlos shing byin gyis brlab// A+oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ thugs dam bskang ba bsgrub pa'i rdzas// bdud rtsi lnga sogs ba liM bskang// brten pa'i gnas kyis thugs dam bskang// ro yi ha

stas spyan drangs la// hU~M/ bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// d+hU tI rtsa yi byang sems kyis// bla ma dam pa'i thugs dam bskang// dam tshig gnyen po bskangs 'gyur nas// zag med bde ba rgyas gyur

cig/ hU~M ro lus 'dom gang gru bzhi 'di// dur khrod gzhal yas khang du gsal// gru bzhi pa la kha dog lnga// dri ma nag po baiDUr sngo// rtsib rnams ljang gu ma rgad mdog/ tshil bu ser po gser ltar snang// rus

pa dkar po shel dngul mdog/ lnga yi rtsigs par rab tu mdzes// sgal tshigs dung gi rang bzhin la// rkang brgyad ka ba brgyad yin no// ther ma lcam la rtsib ma dral// rtsa yi dra bas rab 'brel cing// mgo yi

gsang sgo shel ltar dkar// mig g.yas lho sgo gser ltar ser// mig g.yon byang sgo dmar dang ljang// nub kyi tsha sgo pad ltar dmar// 'og gi spu nag smin ma dang// skra rnams sgo yi rgyan yin no// rkang lag
sen mo'i phreng ba rnams// mu tig dra ba phyed pas mdzes// tshig mdud rin chen pha gu la// phag la 'don yon lha mos mdzes// dur khrod gzhal yas mdzes pa yis// dkyil 'khor lha yi thugs dam
bskang// phung po lnga ni gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung lnga yi thugs dam bskang// 'byung ba lnga yi gnas gyur pa// yum chen lnga yi thugs dam bskang// kun gzhi'i rnam shes gnas gyur pa// rdo rje gzhon
nu'i thugs dam bskang// sgo lnga'i rnam shes gnas gyur pa// e ka tsa ti'i thugs dam bskang// ma mo bcu drug thugs dam bskang// yid kyi rnam shes gnas gyur pa// 'khor lo rgyas
'debs thugs dam bskang// yan lag cha shas dum bu bcu// gnas gyur khro bo bcu yi thugs dam bskang// khro mo bcu yi thugs dam bskang// sgal tshig nyi shu gnas gyur pa// mgo brnyan nyi shu'i thugs dam

bskang// lus kyi mtsho bzhi gnas gyur pas// sgo ma bzhi yi thugs dam bskang// ro la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lngas// dkyil 'khor lnga yi thugs dam bskang// dug lnga rtsad nas gcod gyur cig/ ye shes lnga dang

ldan gyur nas// zag med bde ba rol pa dang// sangs rgyas lhun gyis 'grub par shog/ thig gdab bdud rtsi bum pa dbye// A+oM AH hU~M a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hU~M hri ThA/ bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang// ye shes lnga dang mkha'
'gro'i tshogs// ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gi thog ma med pa nas// da lta yan chad sdig bgyis dang// dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags// dngos grub rnam gsum bdag la stsol// sku

gsung thugs kyi dag pa dang// rdo rje gsum ni bdag la stsol// dug lnga 'joms pa'i khrag 'thung dpal// ye shes lnga ni bdag la stsol// ting 'dzin tshe yi dngos grub dang// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub

stsol// grub pa brgyad kyi dngos grub dang// phrin las bzhi yi dngos grub stsaul// 'byor ldan longs spyod dngos grub stsol// a la la ho// sa ma ho// sa ma ya staM// rdo rje gsum ldan nyid du 'gyur// hU~M bla ma rdo rje

slob dpon dang// he ru ka sogs khrag 'thung tshogs// ma mo mkha' 'gro brten pa'i phyir// tsit+ta gsang ba'i rten du bcangs// mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la// bdud rtsi lnga yi snod du bcangs// lus la gnas pa'i

bdud rtsi lnga// lha rnams 'dus pa'i rdzas su bcangs// phung po'i rkang la phur pa ste// khro bo bcu yi rten du bcangs// brla yi rkang la 'bud pa'i dud// lcang lo mtshan dang ldan pa la// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i rten du

bcangs// lag pa g.yas pa hasta yang// mkha' 'gro g.yob pa'i rten du bcangs// sog pa dam sri bri ba'i rdzas// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi byas pa yang// phra men nyi shu'i rten du bcangs// rgyu ma'i zhags pa 'dren

pa yang// ma mo bcu drug brten pa'i rdzas// dbang po lnga yi me tog kyang// yab yum gsum ni brten pa'i rdzas// mtsho bzhi dum bu 'chang ba yang// sgo ba bzhi yi rten du zung// a la la ho// dur khrod ro la

longs spyod cing// dur khrod chas kyis rab tu brgyan// dur khrod gnas su rgyu bya zhing// bdud rtsi lnga la longs spyod nas// dur khrod mkha' 'gro kun dang 'grogs// 'dod yon lnga la longs spyod cing/ khams
gsum pa yi sems can kun// bsad pas grol bar 'gyur ba yin// rtogs med dbyings la gnas gyur na// bsad pas sdig gis ma gos shing// rig 'dzin sa la myur du 'gro// zag med bde

stong dbyer med la// mkha' 'gro kun dang longs spyod 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ ro sgrub pa spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas rnam rgyal khro bo
yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// phrin las mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das// phur pas phrin las 'grub pa yang// 'gro ba'i don du bshad du gsal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phur

pa rnam pa bzhi yin te// chos nyid don gyi phur pa dang// rig pa ye shes phur pa dang// 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa dang// brten pa lus kyi phur pa'o// 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa ni// dngul lam 'o ma can gyi

shing// zangs sam tsan+dan dmar po'i shing// lcags sam rkang dang tsher ma'i shing// gser ram 'o se ser po'i shing// sor brgyad sor drug bcu gnyis dang// bcu drug phur pa'i tshad yin no// zlum dang gru bzhi
zla gam dang// zur gsum dbyibs su nges pa yin// gcig dang lha grangs mnyam pa'o// maN+Dal dbyibs dang kha dog nyid// gzungs thag kha dog bzhi dang ldan// gtor ma'i rigs su nges pa yin// bzlas

pas dngos grub myur du thob// shAn+ting ku ru swA hA/ puSh+ting ku ru oM/ wa shang ku ru ho/ mA ra ya phaT/ ling+ga nyid la mngon par bsgrub/ bdun 'bum grangs kyi 'grub par 'gyur// 'gul dang 'phro dang 'tsheg pa

'byung// grub nas so so'i las la sbyar// dgra dang bgegs dang nad zhi dang// tshe dang longs spyod rgyas par 'gyur// 'di nas phyi mar bsgral ba dang// bla med lnga ru bsgral bar bya// 'di bsgral bsod nams

dpag tu med// rdo rje 'dzin pa ku mA ra'i// dngos grub thams cad myur du 'grub// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ phur pas phrin las bzhi 'grub pa ste le'u bdun
pa'o//// de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// thugs rje byams mgon bcom ldan 'das// tshe yi rig 'dzin ji ltar sgrub// bsgrub pa'i dngos grub ji ltar
blangs// mgon mdzad khyod kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de yang sgrub pa'i dngos grub ni// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// tshe ni rnam pa gsum yin te// mi 'gyur mi

'phrog rdo rje'i tshe// nyams shing 'pho ba thig le'i tshe// 'khrul zhing rtog pa snang ba'i tshe// nyams shing 'pho ba tshe'i rang bzhin// nyams pa'i rgyu ni 'di ltar te// dam nyams bzhin 'gyur spyod lam nyams// dam
can 'khrugs shing sems 'khrugs dang// zhe sdang rgyas dang bgegs dang 'phrad// bred dngangs rbod gtong khar zad dang// dam can gtor chags tshe nyams 'gyur// bla ma la gus rgyud la

sbyangs// ting 'dzin brtan zhing rigs sngags 'dzin// dam can nye bar 'gyur ba yi// 'di yi tshe ni khugs 'gyur te// nyams pa gso bar 'dod pa yis// bkra shis sa la maN+Dal bya// pad+ma 'khor lo rgya gram

ldan// lha yi rten ni mar me dgu// khro bcu'i phur pas bgegs bsal zhing// bdud rtsi lnga dang sman lnga dang// phung po brten pa'i zas mchog la// thod pa lcags dang rin chen snod// bum pa yid 'ong mdzes pa

ru// bsgrub pas tshe ni rab tu 'phel// b+hud+d+ha kun gyi byin gyis rlobs// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ A yur+dz+nyA na A kar+Sha ya dza/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ A+oM AHhU~M/ tshe ni rigs lnga khrag 'thung ste// dug 'joms

ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin// thig le mi shigs ngo bo nyid// gdod nas ma skyes ngo bo la// rang bzhin dag pas rin chen 'dra// hU~M dbus nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal chen rdo rje khrag 'thung dang// khro mo rdo rje
dbyings phyug ma// mthing nag mi 'gyur nam mkha'i mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro mo'i tshul// rdo rjes gdug pa 'dul mdzad cing// baiDUr+ya yi bum pa g.yon// nad ni 'chi med bdud rtsi bkang// ka shi
dar gyis mgul chings la// dpag bsam ljon pas kha brgyan nas// yab yum bde ba'i sbyor ba las// byang sems mu tig khu 'phangs 'bebs// rdo rje khrag 'thung dpag med kyis// stong gsum stong gi 'jig

rten bkang// zhal nas tshe yi sngags zlos shing// lha klu gnod sbyin gshin rje dang// mkha' 'gro'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di

la rtags phyung zhig/ rig 'dzin sgrub pa po yi tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bstsol// A+oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ A yur+dz+nyAn tsit+ta b+h+rUM/ hU~M shar nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal chen bder gshegs
khrag 'thung ste// khro mo sangs rgyas dbyings phyug ma// sku mdog shel ltar dkar gsal zhing// zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro mo'i sku// 'khor los bdud bzhi 'joms par mdzad// g.yon na shel gyi bum pa
bsnams// nang na 'chi med bdud rtsis bkang// ka shi dar gyis mgul chings la// dpag bsam ljon pas kha brgyan nas// yab yum bde ba'i sbyor ba las// byang sems mu tig khu 'phang 'bebs// b+hud+d+ha khrag

'thung dpag med kyis// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten bkang// zhal nas tshe yi sngags zlos shing// lha klu gnod sbyin gshin rje dang// mkha' 'gro'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs

shig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags shig phyung// rig 'dzin sgrub pa po yi tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// A+oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ A yur+dz+nyAn b+h+ruM/ hU~M

lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal ldan rin chen khrag 'thung dang// jo mo rin chen dbyings phyug ma// sku mdog ser 'od rgyas mdzad cing// zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro mo'i sku// rin chen dgos 'dod re ba
skong// g.yon na gser gyi bum pa bsnams// nang na 'chi med bdud rtsis bkang// ka shi dar gyis mgul chings la// dpag bsam ljon pas kha brgyan nas// yab yum bde ba'i sbyor ba las// byang sems mu

tig khu 'phang 'bebs// rin chen khrag 'thung dpag med kyis// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten bkang// zhal nas tshe yi sngags zlos shing// lha klu gnod sbyin gshin rje dang// mkha' 'gro lag nas tshe khug

cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags shig phyung// rig 'dzin sgrub pa po yi tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// A+oM ru lu ru lu hU~M

b+h+yo hU~M/ A yu r+dz+nyA na tsit+ta b+h+rUM/ hU~M nub nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal ldan pad+ma khrag 'thung dang// khro mo pad+ma dbyings phyug ma// sku mdog dmar gsal dbang du byed// zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro mo'i
tshul// pad+ma nyon mongs chags pa sel// pad+ma rA ga'i bum pa g.yon// nang ni 'chi med bdud rtsis bkang// ka shi dar gyis mgul bcings la// dpag bsam ljon pas kha brgyan nas// yab yum bde ba'i sbyor
ba las// byang sems mu tig khu 'phang 'bebs// pad+ma khrag 'thung dpag med kyis// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten bkang// zhal nas tshe yi sngags zlos shing// lha klu gnod sbyin gshin rje dang// mkha'

'gro'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags shig phyung// rig 'dzin sgrub pa po yi tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub

stsol// A+oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ A yur+dz+nyAn tsit+ta b+h+rUM/ hU~M byang nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal ldan las kyi khrag 'thung dang// khro mo las kyi dbyings phyug ma// ljang gu phrin las sna tshogs 'grub// rgya gram phrag
dog sdug bsngal sel// in+da nI la'i bum pa bsnams// nang na 'chi med bdud rtsis bkang// ka shi dar gyis mgul chings la// dpag bsam ljon pas kha brgyan nas// yab yum bde ba'i sbyor ba las// byang
sems mu tig khu 'phang 'bebs// las kyi khrag 'thung dpag med kyis// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten bkang// zhal nas tshe yi sngags zlos shing// lha klu gnos sbyin gshin rje dang// mkha' 'gro'i lag nas
tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags shig phyung// rig 'dzin sgrub pa po yi tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub

stsol// A+oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ A yur+dz+nyA na tsit+ta b+h+rUM/ hU~M dbus nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu ni// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// gar dgu'i rol pas gnas mdzad
cing// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs yum la 'khyud// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba'i rdzas// dus gsum b+hud+d+ha rab mchod nas// byang chub sems kyi thig le las// mu tig khu 'phang dbab tu gsol// tshe bum 'di la

byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags phyung zhig/ rig 'dzin sgrub pa po yi tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH// A yur+dz+nyAn A kar+Sha dzaH/ A+oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo

hU~M/ oM AHhU~M/ sgrol yum e ka tsa ti ma// chos kyi dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro yum// khrag 'thung lha tshogs mnyes byed ma// b+hud+d+ha kun dang mnyam sbyor la// bde 'od nyi ma'i gzi brjid kyis// mkha' 'gro thams cad
dbang bsdus nas// byang chub sems kyi thig le ni// mu tig khu 'phang dbab tu gsol// tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlabs// tshe bum 'di la rtags shig phyung// rig 'dzin sgrub pa po yi tshe spel cig/ sku

gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// A+oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza/ rdo rje ma mo kau rI ma// g.yas g.yon zhing dbyug thod khrag mthing// rdo rje ma mo tsau rI ma// ser mo phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs// rdo rje

ma mo pra mo hA// chu srin rgyal mtshan thod khrag dmar// rdo rje ma mo be ta lI/ g.yas na rdo rje zhing dbyug mthing// rdo rje ma mo puka ka sI// dmar ser zhing bcu'i rgyu ma 'dren// rdo rje ma mo g+hasma rI// ljang gu rdo rje thod

khrag thogs// rdo rje ma mo sma sha nI// phyag gnyis ro 'dzin snying za zhing// rdo rje ma mo tsaN+Da lI// ser skya ro 'dzin mgo lus 'bral// ma mo chen mo khyed brgyad ni// sprul pa'i ma mos stong khams 'gengs// thugs

ka ma mo'i dpa' be'u nas// byang chub sems kyi tshe 'dzin ma/ khug cig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags shig phyung// rig 'dzin sgrub pa po yi tshe spel cig/ sku

gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung du gsol// A+oM badzra gau rI ha/ A+oM badzra tsau rI ha/ oM badzra phra mo ha/ badzra be ta lI ha/ badzra phuk+ka sI ha/ badzra g+hasma rI ha/ badzra sma sha nI ha/ badzra tsaN+Da lI ha/

oM ru lu ru lu oM b+h+yo hU~M/ a yur+dz+nyAn ang+ku sha dza/ b+h+yo rdo rje phra men seng gdong ma// phyag gnyis kha yis ro 'dzin ser// rdo rje phra chen stag gdong ma// phyag gnyis bsnol zhing mnan nas ro la blta// rdo rje phra men wa

gdong ma// dmar nag ro snying phyung nas ldag/ rdo rje phra men khyi gdong ma// ro yi khog 'byed nang blta mthing// rdo rje phra men bya rgod gdong// dmar po rgyu za gri thod bsnams// rdo rje phra men kang+ka

gdong// smug nag gzhi 'dzin phrag la bkal// rdo rje phra men bya rog gdong// nag mo ro 'dzin gri thod bsnams// rdo rje phra men 'ug pa'i gdong// ljang gu lcags kyu thod khrag bsnams// rdo rje phra men khyed
brgyad ni// sprul pa dpag med stong khams 'gengs// thugs ka dpal be'u'i dkyil 'khor nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phang 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs

shig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags shig phyung// A+oM badzra sid+ha mu khI he// A+oM badzra byA g+ha mu khI he/ A+oM badzra shA'i ga la mu khI he// A+oM badzra shwa na mu khI he/ A+oM badzra gr-id+d+ha mu khI he/ A+oM badzra kAM ka mu

khI he/ A+oM badzra u lU mu khI he/ A+oM badzra kA ka mu khI he/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ A yur+dz+nyA na ang+ku sha dzaH/ hU~M b+ha ga dbyings kyi pho brang nas// sras mchog rdo rje phur pa ste// bud+d+ha kun gyi thugs kyi sras// khro bo'i tshul
ston gdug pa 'dul// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten 'dir// sprul pa grangs med khro tshogs kyis// dgra bgegs gdug pa dbyings su sgrol// mkha' mnyam bde chen dbyings su chug/ byang sems thig le mi

shigs dbus// mu tig khu 'phang dbab tu gsol// tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags shig phyung// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M hU~M phaT/ hU~M steng nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje
khro bo hU~M mdzad ni// yab yum phra thabs dpag med kyang// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul ba'i khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa

bsnams// thugs ka'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phang 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shing tshe drongs shig/ lha yi gnas

nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// A+oM badzra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra hU~M gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza/ hU~M shar nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo rnam par rgyal// yab yum phra thabs dpag med
kyang// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'joms shing khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs ka'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe

'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le'i khu 'phang 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ shar phyogs dri za'i lag nas tshe drongs shig/ tshe bum 'di

la byin gyis rlobs// A+oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hU~M/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza// hU~M shar lho mtshams nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo dbyug sngon can// yab yum phra thabs dpag med
kyang// mthing nag zhal cig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul ba'i khro tshul can// g.yas pa lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon pas bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs ka'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe

'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phang 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ me lha'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis

rlobs// A+oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hU~M da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza hU~M/ hU~M lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo gshin rje'i gshed// yab yum phra thabs dpag med kyang// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag
gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul ba'-i khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs ka'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang

sems thig le khu 'phang 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ gshin rje lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// A+oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M pa tsa

pa tsa hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyAn dza/ hU~M lho nub mtshams nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo mi g.yo mgon// yab yum phra thabs dpag med kyang// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul zhing

khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs ka'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phang 'bebs// khug cig khug

cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ srin po'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// A+oM badzra Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyAn dza hU~M/ hU~M nub nas

rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo rta mgrin dpal// yab yum phra thabs dpag med kyang// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul ba'i khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa

bsnams// thugs ka'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phang 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ klu yi lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// A+oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza/ hU~M nub byang mtshams nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro
bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa// yab yum phra thabs bdag med kyang// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul ba'i khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon

na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs ka'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phang 'bebs/ khug cig khug cig tshe khug gcig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs

shig/ rlung lha'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// A+oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta hU~M// tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza/ hU~M byang nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// yab
yum phra thabs dpag med kyang// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul ba'i khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs ka'i nyi zla

kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phang 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ gnod sbyin lag nas tshe khug

cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// A+oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M paT/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza/ hU~M byang shar mtshams nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khams gsum rnam rgyal dang// yab yum
phra thabs dpag med kyang// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dus pa'i khro tshul ston// g.yas pa lcags kyus phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs ka'i nyi zla kha

sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phang 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ 'byung po'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum

'di la byin gyis rlobs// A+oM badzra kro d+ha trai lokya bi dza ya hU~M phaT// bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza/ hU~M 'og gi phyogs nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo stobs po che// yab yum phra thabs 'khor bcas
kyang// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// bgegs chen 'dul ba'i khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs ka'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe

'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phang 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ sa bdag lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis

rlobs// A+oM badzra kro d+ha ma ha ba la hU~M/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyAn dza/ hU~M shar gyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// dkar mo zhi mdzad skya ka'i mgo// lcags kyu tshe yi bum pa bsnams// log 'dren 'gugs mdzad

sgo srung ma// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ dri za'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ bi da bing bing hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyAn dza/ hU~M lho yi phyogs

nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// ser mo pu shud mgo can ma// zhags pa tshe yi bum pa bsnams// tshe dang longs spyod rgyas par 'dzod// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ grul

bum lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya na ma sa man+ta hring hring hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza/ hU~M nub nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dmar mo srin bya'i mgo can ma// lcags

sgrog tshe yi dngos grub stsol// log 'dren dbang mdzad sgo srung ma// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ klu yi lag nas tshe khug cig/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ su ru su ru pra su

ru hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza/ hU~M byang gi phyogs nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// ljang gu khra yi mgo can ma// dril bu tshe yi bum pa bsnams// log 'dren sgrol mdzad sgo srung ma// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs

shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ gnod sbyin lag nas tshe khug cig/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza/ tshe yi dngos po 'chi med 'di// khrag 'thung lnga yi thugs kar sba// mi 'gyur tshe
yi thig le la// rdo rjes rgyas btab mi gshegs dbus// 'khor los rgyas btab bdud bzhi bcom// rin chen rgyas btab bsam zhing 'grub// pad+mas rgyas btab nyon mongs bsgrol// rgya gram rgyas btab don

rnams 'grub// ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab pas// dbyings kyi thig le mi shigs so// A yu A be ya A/ nam mkha' lta bur skyon med kyang// char sprin lta bur tshe dbang blang// hU~M dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu

ni// bde chen rgyas pa b+ha ga'i dbyings// khrag 'thung 'dus pa'i khro rgyal bcu// 'gyur ba med pa tshe yi thugs// thabs kyis spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// bud+d+ha phrin las rdzogs

mdzad pa// dbang dang byin rlabs bdag stsol cig/ hU~M khrag 'thung lnga yi dbang bskur bas// nyon mongs dug lnga rab dag nas// ye shes lnga rdzogs thig le rgyas// 'chi med tshe yi rigs 'dzin thob// oM badzra kI

li kI la ya dza hU~M baM hoH/ badzra shrI he ru ka badzra kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ b+hud+d+ha shrI he ru ka b+hud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ rat+na shrI he ru ka/ rat+na kro d+hI sha rI s+t+waM// pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ pad+ma kro d+hI shA rI s+t+waM/ karma shrI he ru ka/ karma

kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM AHhU~M/ tshe yi dngos grub blang ba yis// nad dang bral zhing sdug bsngal zhi// bgegs med nyi zla'i tshe dang mnyam// khrag 'thung sku dang dbyer med 'gyur// 'od dang 'ja' dang du
ba me// khol ba tshe yi rtags yin no// nye bsnyen bsnyen sgrub sgrub chen no// dmigs pa'i rten la nges par 'grub// sku gsung thugs la bsgrub gyur kyang// khyad par thugs la nye bar 'grub// grub

pa'i rtags ni byung ba dang// lcang lo thod pa kha sbyar du// bdud rtsi rtsa ba lnga btsal nas// rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i ril bu gzhug/ 'od zer lnga dang yang dag ldan// de bzhin bza' ba bca' ba dang// btung

dang ldag dang gzhi la sogs// rgyan dang rin chen gos rnams la// dag cing spel ba'i sngags 'di brjod// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhUM baM hoH// a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hU~M hU~M hri thA/ A be sha ya ho/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga

rnams kyang// myur du 'grub cing mngon shes 'char// rig pa 'dzin pa myur du thob// a la la ho/ e ma ho/ bcom ldan 'das ni khro rgyal gtso// rdo rje srin po nam ni langs lags na// gza' skar rgyal po nyi ma

rtse shar gyis// bzlas brjod bsnyen pa'i grangs ni thems lag na// 'grub pa'i rtags mtshan myur du bstan nas kyang// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol re ran// dbang dang byin rlab thams cad bdag stsol

cig/ hU~M brjod med spros bral chos kyi sku// sku gsum rdzogs pa khro rgyal sku// mi gnas ye shes nam mkha'i thugs// thun mong ma yin khyad par 'phags// ye shes mi 'gyur dpal be'u nas// bde chen thig le

byang chub sems// bdud 'dul rdo rje gzhon nu yi// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rnams// ma thogs myur du stsal du gsol// mi 'chi tshe yi dngos grub stsol// mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub stsol// rdzu 'phrul
mthu yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// rigs rgyud 'phel ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// grub mchog brgyad kyi
dngos grub bstsal du gsol// nad bgegs 'joms pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// hU~M bde mchog nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// yid 'ong skyon bral bde spyod ma// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs khro mo'i

gtso// yum gyi mkha' klong thig le las// thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// hU~M nam mkha' lta bur dag pa'i sku// mkha' 'dus bde klong rgyas pa'i sku// dbyings kyi thig le dza ti ma// zag med bde ba'i

dngos grub stsol// hU~M yab yum gnyis med bde chen las// mi shigs thig le las byung ba'i// lha rnams 'dul pa'i bur sras mchog/ phrin las sna tshogs dngos grub stsol// hU~M nyi zla bsnol ba'i gdan steng

na// lha rnams 'dul ba'i khro rgyal gtso// rdo rje hU~M mdzad sgra 'byin ma// sprul pa phag dang smig bu'i mgo/ phyag brnyan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// lha yi gdon chen 'dul ba dang// tshe la dbang ba'i dngos grub

stsol// hU~M dri za bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// dri za 'dul ba'i khro bo gtso// rdo rje rnam rgyal mda' snyem ma// sprul pa stag dang bya rgod mgo/ phyag brnyan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// dri za'i gdon chen

'dul ba dang// las la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M me lha bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// me lha 'dul ba'i khro bo gtso// rdo rje dbyug sngon sder mo dang// sprul pa g.yag dang bya rog mgo/ phyag brnyan yang sprul
mang po'i tshogs// me lha'i gdon ni 'dul ba dang// yo byad dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// gshin rje 'dul ba'i khro bo'i gtso// gshin rje'i gshed po dur khrod

bdag/ sprul pa sha ba 'ug pa'i mgo/ phyag brnyan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// gshin rje'i gdon rnams 'dul ba dang// mos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M srin po bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// srin po

'dul ba'i khro rgyal gtso// rdo rje mi g.yo gtun khung ma// sprul pa gzig dang khwa yi mgo/ phyag brnyan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// srin po gdon tshogs 'dul ba dang// smon lam dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M

klu dbang bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// klu dbang 'dul ba'i khro bo gtso// rta mgrin rdo rje gtum mo dang// sprul pa byi la pu shud mgo/ phyag brnyan sprul pa mang po'i tshogs// klu yi gdon rnams 'dul ba dang// rdzu

'phrul dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M rlung lha bsnol ba'i khri steng du// rlung lha'i gdon 'dul khro bo'i gtso// gzhan gyis mi thub mda' snyem ma// sprul pa spyang ki khra yi mgo/ phyag brnyan yang sprul mang po'i

tshogs// rlung lha'i gdon rnams 'dul ba dang// skye la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i khro bo'i gtso// rdo rje bdud rtsi rlung 'byin ma// sprul pa seng

ge pha wang mgo/ phyag brnyan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// gnod sbyin gdon rnams 'dul ba dang// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M 'byung po bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// 'byung po 'dul ba khro bo'i
gtso// khams gsum rnam rgyal gsod ma dang// sprul pa bsre mo dom gyi mgo/ phyag brnyan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// 'byung po gdon rnams 'dul ba dang// sems la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// hU~M sa

bdag bsnol ba'i gdan steng na// sa bdag 'dul ba'i khro rgyal gtso// stobs chen rdo rje bskyed ma dang// sprul pa dred dang byi la'i mgo/ phyag brnyan yang sprul mang po'i tshogs// sa bdag gdon rnams 'dul ba
dang// sems la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu ma// skya ka pu shud srin bya khra yi mgo/ 'gugs 'degs sdom 'bebs mkha' 'gro ma bzhi yis// phrin las rnam bzhi'i
dngos grub stsol// lha yi sku rnams g.yo 'gul yig 'bru sgra// thugs ni lding 'phyo gos 'od me// bdud rtsi bza' btung gos rnams kyang// du ba 'ja' dang me dang 'tshag/ mdangs rnams gsal

na dngos grub thob// phrin las bzhi dang grub pa brgyad// mkha' spyod gnas su myur du 'gro// rdo rje me lce gsum ldan zhing// mi nas ye shes skur 'gyur zhing// thig le nyag gcig myur du thob// dpal rdo rje
gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ tshe dang dngos grub blang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// gdug pa 'dul
ba'i bcom ldan 'das// bar chod thams cad gnon pa'i thabs// de ni gang lags bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bsgral ba'i zhing ni dgra dang ni// bar du gcod pa'i bgegs

chen la// dkyil 'khor lho nub srin po'i sar// gru gsum rim gsum nag por bya// rnam lnga'i ling+ga 'khor lor ldan// 'khor lo rtsibs drug mu khyud ldan// ling+ga 'khor lo'i lto bar sbyar// rgyu ma chen pos rab tu

bsdam// ras skud kha dog lnga yis bcing// rnam lnga dur khrod bgegs kyi shul// gnod pa'i ling+ga de ru sbyar// bsam gtan rtse gcig yid kyis 'grub// sngags kyi grangs ni khri tsho gcig/ 'grub 'gyur 'di

la the tshom med// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe dang// shang tshe bye ma gsum dang ldan// rdo dreg zi ra til nag dang// dug khrag tshogs pas rno ngar bskyed// oM badzra kI li kI la ya dAp+ti tsa kra ha na ha na ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo

hU~M dzaHhU~M baM hoH// sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ oM laM hU~M laM/ mo ha g+ha ya che ge mo s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ mon dang rabs chad thod pa dang// la cha'i sbal pa glang ru dang// snel gri ra yi thod pa dang// spre'u byi la phag thod

dang// sbrul sbal rus sbal khog pa dang// mchod rten sats+tsha rdo rje dang// ri rab rgya gram rdo rje dang// mkha' lding sku gdung 'og tu mnan// mi nyid gshin rje mgon po dang// bdud srin ma mo pho mo'i rigs// klu
gnyan sa bdag klu mo rnams// mnan pas bsod nams chen po thob// bag chags nyon mongs rab dag nas// skye 'gag med cing rol pa'i ngang// bsam du med cing brjod las 'das// rtogs nas bla med
yul du 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ mnan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// b+ha ga wAn la 'di skad gsol// thugs rje ldan
pa'i bcom ldan 'das// zor gyi bzlog dang gsod byed pa'i// thabs ni gang lags bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zor ni lha yi sku yin te// nub byang rlung lha 'du mtshams
su// bsam gtan rtse gcig yid kyis bsgrub// drag po phur thun khro bo'i las// drag po'i las ni mda' yi zor// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi khrag gi zor// dbang phyug phra men sgo nga'i zor// rwa

dang thod pa zor du 'phang// rno bar byed pa thun gyi rdzas// drag por byed pa sngags kyi dpal// oMbadzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nA baM hU~M phaT/ ma ma pa shi ku ru ma taM nya ka ra i dan/ d+ha ti ma ma karma shi
g+h+raM kA ra ya mA ra ya thun// rab 'bring tha ma brdeg pa'i gnas// dmag dang gtor ma mda' 'phen dang// khrag mtsho khol na grub pa'i rtags// gang la 'phen pas bzlog par 'gyur// glo dang gzer thabs

mchin nad kyis// 'chi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// lha klu kun kyang gsod par 'gyur// bsad pas byang chub sgrub par byed// skye mchi med pa'i byang chub sems// 'khor 'das ro gcig chos kyi dbyings// nam

mkha' lta bur khyab pa'i sku// myur du 'grub ste the tshom med// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ zor gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// bdud rnams sreg mdzad bcom ldan 'das// sbyin sreg las ni ci ltar sgrub// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang zhig sbyin
sreg ma byas na// las rnam 'grub par mi 'gyur cing// dam tshig nyams pa mi skongs shing// sdig pa dag par mi 'byung bas// de bas nan tan cher bskyed nas// sbyin sreg las la sbyor bar bya// gza' skar

phun sum tshogs pa la// dus tshod ldan pas gnas nyid du// bram ze khyim dang gtsug lag khang// smad tshong khyim dang dur khrod du// zhi dang rgyas pa dbang drag gi/ thab khung zlum zhig dkar la 'tsher// zla gam

dmar la gdengs pa dang// gru bzhi ser la snum pa dang// gnag cing rtsub pa drag po'i thab// rim pa gsum ldan zhal gyi dbyibs// shar lho me lha'i mtshams nyid du// ma traM dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas// 'o

ma can dang dri zhim dang// dkar nag tsher ma can gyi shing// til dkar yungs kar tsan+dan dmar// til dang zi ra nag po dang// sha khrag rus pa gu gul nag/ dug khrag snying sna tshogs tshad rnams// dUr ba ku

sha yam shing dang// 'bras dang 'bras so sran ma nas// bra 'o mar khu ske tshe mar// bong bu rnga mo'i spangs dang ni// bya rog 'ug pa'i sha dang bcas// rnga mo ma he glang gi sha/ chang dang mi sha nya yi sha/ yung ba gur
gum me tog ser// 'o ma zho mar mngar gsum bcas// me tog dmar po lcags lta bu// sbal pa lcong mo sprul gyi sha/ bsreg pas las rnams thams cad 'grub// me yi bdag po drang srong kyang// bsam gtan rtse
gcig ma yengs gsal// hU~M/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs me lha'i rgyal po che// bsreg blug zhal zas bzhes su gsol// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs nas kyang// las rnams

'grub par mdzad du gsol// dngos grub tshul bzhin stsal du gsol// ang+ku sha dza/ mchod pas me lha mnyes par bya// hU~M/ tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras// drang srong chen po'i cha byad can// tshangs pa'i skud

pas rab dge ba// rin chen rus pa'i rgyan gyis mdzes// zhal gsum phyag drug khro tshul ston// sku mdog 'dod dgur sgyur mdzad cing// phyag drug mdzes pa'i mtshon cha ni// g+hun d+he me thab bgrang phreng dang// spyi

blug skyabs sbyin phur bu bsnams// rgyud drug rtsad nas gcod la bstod// zhabs bzhis bdud rtsa gcod la bstod// zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul// chu skyes nyi ma'i steng na bzhugs// dag byed ra yi

gdan la bzhugs// bdud rnams 'dul la bdag bstod do// yon tan chu thigs tsam bstod pas// drang srong chen po mnyes par byas// bsregs pa'i rdzas kyis las 'grub po// oM ag+na ye swA hA/ shAn+tiM ku ru swA

hA/ puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ pa shaM ku ru ho// mA ra ya phaT/ uts+tsha Ta ya/ u min+ta/ an+ma nga 'dra/ ang+ku sha dzaHzhes pas drang srong mnyes par 'gyur// rtsa ba gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dang// phur pa lha yi dkyil 'khor dang// phyogs

bcu'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rnams// me lha'i snying gar rdzogs par bskyed// ting 'dzin brtan pas 'grub par 'gyur// oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ las rnams sngags kyis 'grub
par 'gyur// zhi rgyas dbang drag bskrad pa dang// dbye ba rengs pa rmongs byed cing// 'gugs pa la sogs dpag tu med// sbyin sreg gis ni thams cad 'grub// dam tshig nyams pa bskong 'gyur

cing// mtshams med lnga yi sdig byas pa// 'di yi dag par 'gyur ba yin// phrin las mthar phyin sbyin sreg ste// khro bo'i rgyal po gzhon nu yis// khro bo rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang// dpag tu med cing brjod du

med// yab yum sras su snang ba yang// chos kyi sku las ye ma 'das// sems kyi rang bzhin cir snang yang// dper na nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin// thog ma tha ma skye 'gag med// rgyal ba'i dbang po nyid thob
'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////
de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho bcom ldan dngos grub stsol// bde gshegs sras kyi dngos grub rnams// sgrub pa'i thabs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// thun mongs dngos grub thams cad kun// nga yis bshad kyi legs par nyon// phur pa lha yi dkyil 'khor yang// thugs kyi rten las yang dag 'grub// de yi rgyu yang rnam

pa gnyis// lcags dang shing gi bye brag go/ lcags ni rnam lnga 'dus pa yin// spu gri srog rtsa bcad pa'i lcags// gnam lcags ngur mo thog gi lcags// khab len dbang bsdud rgyal po la// lha dang phral ba sgo yi
lcags// mnyen la lcugs pa rno ba'i lcags// dge slong bshan pa dge bsnyen dang// rnal 'byor rig sngags 'chang dang ni// lha bzos blang ba mchog yin no// zhe gnag khrims gtsang sdom ldan

pa// dbang thob dad pa ldan pas brdung// gdug pa'i shing ni rnam mang yang// rdo rje'i rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'i// chu 'gram brag ri sa las skyes// ljang nag dkar ser dmar po ni// las bzhi 'grub pa'i
phur pa ste// tsher ma can la bug pa khrag/ sha skam rus pas dug gsum 'joms// mtshan ldan drag po'i phyogs las blangs// bzo mkhas yon tan ldan pas bya'o// shing lcags gnyis kyi tshad dang

dbyibs// sor brgyad tshad du rdzogs pa la// dbu yi rgya mdud sor gcig ste// zur gsum brgyad dang gru bzhi lnga// hU~M mdzad khrag 'thung lnga rdzogs te// sor gnyis lte ba yan chad la// bcum bzhog brgyad du

yang bdag shes// khro brgyad mgo brnyan bcu drug rdzogs// sor cig lte ba gsus pa ste// sgo bzhi sgo ma bzhi dang ldan// 'og gi stobs chen de nyid do// sor gcig btsos so mtshan ma ste// chu srin kha ru yang

dag rdzogs// drag po khro bo dkyil 'khor yin// sor gsum dpal dang ldan pa ste// yum chen lnga yi dkyil 'khor yin// bcu gnyis ldan na dbus de gtso// sor mgo'i rgya mdud re yin zhing sku stod la// sor gsum

ldan pa cung bzhog rdzogs rkang pa'i rgya mdud yin par byas// gzhan drug dbal du shes par bya// sor drug brgyad 'dra chung ba gnyis// sor ni bcu drug ldan pa la// sor gnyis dbu yin sku stod bzhi// lte ba gnyis la
mtshan ma gnyis// drug ni dbal du rdzogs pa yin// chag tshad ldan pas rtags myur ro// rab gnas rtse gcig yid kyis rdzogs// rang gi lus nyid phur pa ste// mgo bo rgya mdud gong ma yin// sku stod bcum

zhog brgyad yin no// lte ba rgya mdud 'og ma yin// rtsos so mtshan ma chu srin kha// rkang pa gnyis ni dpal du shes// lus kyi nang du lha rdzogs pas// phur pa gcig tu bsgrub pa yis// las rnams 'grub par the

tshom med// tshon sna lnga'am ba su tas// gzungs thag ldan la bzlas pa ni// bye ba gcig gis lding bar 'gyur// 'khrol ba me dang 'od rnams 'byung// de yis las rnams thams cad 'grub// mtshan ldan rdo rje

ka pA lar// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// rigs lnga khrag 'thung yab yum rdzogs// bsam gtan rdzogs nas bzlas pa ni// oM AHhU~M/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU~M hrI tha swA hA/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas

du ba dri// 'od rnams byung na grub pa ste// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ ma b+h+yo trag dza/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M hU~M phaT/ badzra a mr-i ta hU~M hri tha/ 'bum phrag gcig gi bzlas pas 'grub// 'od dang 'ja' khol me

byung rtags// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ lha rnams kun gyi snying po'i mchog/ mkha' 'gro kun gyi srog snying yin// bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i sngags yin te// yang dag don gyi lha'o// 'grub na las brgyad bsgrub par
bya// bdud rtsi ril bu ljags su dril// khar bcug lag na phur pa thogs// gzhan gyis mi mthong gnas su phyin// yang dag pa yi don la spyod// sman de gang gi mig la bskus// gzhan gyis mi mthong lha srin

mthong// sgyu ma lta bu'i sid+d+hi rdzogs// sa 'og gter kyang mthong bar 'gyur// nam mkha' mdzod la mnga' yang brnyes// longs spyod kun la ma chags shing// kun snang sid+d+hi ldan pas spyad// phur pa lha yi dngos po
la// ril bu de nyid rab bsdus na// phur pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa thob// nam mkha' la spyod rig 'dzin dang// mkha' 'gro'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// ril bu de nyid rkang la bskus// phur pa lag na thogs
gyur na// nam mkha' nyid la 'phur bar 'gyur// ril bu de nyid rtag tu zos// nad rnam 'joms shing bgegs rnams med// bde chen nyid la longs spyod cing// bdag gzhan bde bas khyab par 'gyur// phur

pa thogs shing ril bu la// A yur+dz+nyA na 'bum bzlas na// zos pas tshe yi rig 'dzin 'gyur// de bzhin nyid la byas nas spyod// ril bus dbang po rab sbyar cing// khrag 'thung lnga dang ldan pa yis// mngon shes

lnga po rgyud la skye// phur pa lha mis 'grub par 'gyur// he ru ka yi zhal mthong 'gyur// sku gsum myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sku gsum zhing dang sku gsum lam// 'bras bu mthar phyin yongs su rdzogs// ser ba
gcod cing 'bebs pa dang// char pa bcad 'bebs las rnams kun/ phur pa 'di yis 'grub par 'gyur// srog chags 'bru la gnod pa yang// phur pa 'di yis gnod pa 'joms// nad dang gdon gyis

gnod pa yang// phur pa 'di yis srung bar byed// tshe thung ba yang tshe ring 'gyur// me stag seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang// sbrul gdug glang chen smyon pa dang// dred mo me dang chur bcas rnams// phur pa 'di yis
'bigs pa sel// mdze yi nad 'joms klu dug sel// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ phur pa dang bdud rtsi lnga las thams
cad grub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho bcom ldan bdud 'dul dag/ rang bzhin rnam dag bde klong
nas// rdo rje khrag 'thung skur snang ba// de yi yon tan ji ltar lags// yang dag lha dang dpal grub pa// bcom ldan bdud 'joms bshad du gsol// sku yi cha byad rab 'jigs pas// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas// khro rgyal khrag 'thung lnga byung ste// gsung dbyangs lnga yis 'di skad brjod// hU~M bde klong nam mkha'i dkyil nyid nas// dur khrod gzhal yas 'jigs rngam
dbus// gru gsum mthing nag klong dkyil nas// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu ni// sgeg pa dpa' ba gar dgu'i tshul// rab 'jigs med dpung dkyil na bzhugs// mnyam nyid ngang las ma g.yos kyang/ khro rgyal

'dus pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dkar dang dmar dang gnag pa'i zhal// mchog gi sku gsum ldan la bstod// phyag drug pha rol phyin pa drug/ phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse dgu

yis// 'gro ba sa rim dgu la dgod// bar ma rdo rje rtse lnga yis// dug lnga rtsad gcod ye shes lnga// phyag g.yon med dpung 'bar ba yis// nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skem par byed// bar ma kha T+wAM rtse gsum
gyis// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod par byed// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur bu 'dril// dgra bgegs gtan nas sgrol bar byed// spyan dgu sdang mig dmar la zlum// 'gro drug dug gsum sreg par byed// smin

ma sma ra glog ltar 'khyug/ thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba sgrol// khro gnyer chu yi rlabs bzhin 'khrug/ srid gsum ma lus sgrol bar mdzad// dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes// 'gro drug bde chen dbyings su

sgrol// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bdud rnams gnon// rU tra sgrol la bdag bstod do// dur khrod chas brgyad sku la brgyan// lha srin sde brgyad dbang du sdud// thod pa lnga yis dbu la brgyan// rigs lnga khrag

'thung lnga la bstod// phyag drug sbrul gyis brgyan pa la// a dang ha la'i sgra sgrogs shing// klu chen brgyad po rab btul nas// rigs bzhi'i klu rnams 'joms la bstod// zhal nas ljags 'dril gad rgyangs

sgrogs// 'jigs pa'i hU~M sgra phyogs bcur sgrogs// sku las rdo rje khro chung 'phro// bgegs chen sreg mdzad khyed la bstod// phrin las drag byed 'dul la bstod// bde chen mkha' klong rgyas la bstod// rtog med

bsam mi khyab la bstod// hU~M gsang ba zag med bde ba'i yum// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs khro mo'i gtso// mnyam nyid mi 'gyur mthing nag sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku la 'khril// phyag g.yas dril bu dku la
'khyud// stong pa nyid kyi sgra sgrogs shing// g.yon pas dung dmar gtso la stob// zag med bde ba rgyas la bstod// gzig dang thod sbrul rgyan du byas// mi rtogs ye shes 'phel bar mdzad// mi
'gyur brtan pa thugs gyi rigs// bde chen lus la bdag bstod do// hU~M g.yon nas rol pa sgrol ba'i yum// za byed rngam thabs khro gtum 'bar// mthing nag 'bar chen gdug pa sreg/ rak+ta tshil chen thal
bas brgyan// gzig dang thod sbrul rgyan du byas// lha klu thams cad dbang du sdud// g.yas pas rdo rje gri gug bsnams// res 'ga' kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams// srid pa gsum po dbang du sdud// dgra bgegs

srog rtsa gcod par byed// g.yon pas thod pa tsit+ta bsnams// b+hud+d+ha kun gyi thugs dam bskang// thugs ka'i ru lu 'bru brgyad las// ma mo phra med bcu drug 'gyed// gsang chen mi bzad ral gcig ma// e ma

tsa ti mkha' 'gro'i gtso// khro mo'i gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// snang srid dbang sdud khyod la bstod// hU~M srid gsum sdug bsngal mthar mdzad ma// sku gsung thugs mchog bdud 'dul sku// yab yum gnyis med
sbyor ba'i sras// dbu gsum phyag drug gtum chen sku// phyag na mtshon cha bsnams pa yis// rgyud drug 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i gdug pa 'dul// sku smad phur pa zur gsum po// dgra
bgegs gdug pa'i snying la 'debs// dug gsum ma lus rtsad nas gcod// gdug pa chu srin kha nas phyung// rgya mdud nang nas 'brug stong ldir// chu srin kha nas glog stong 'khyug/ gdug pa sdig sbrul sbal
lcong 'phyo// klu bdud dbang du sdud la bstod// khams gsum ma lus sgrol la bstod// hU~M phyogs bcu dam sri gnon mdzad sku// yab yum gnyis med las la grub// hU~M mdzad la sogs khro rgyal bcu// drag po
'bar ba'i sku mdog nag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis stag lpags dkris// phyogs skyong bcu po 'dul bar byed// phur pa lcags kyu bsnams pa yis// 'gugs shing 'debs pas srid gsum sgrol// hU~M gi nga ro
sgrogs par byed// mnyam nyid khro rgyal bcu la bstod// mi 'gyur brtan pa sbyor ba'i yum// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// gtso mo yab bzhin 'gugs 'debs mdzad// sgra 'byin yum bcu me ltar

'bar// hU~M sgra 'brug ltar rngam pa'i sgras// dgra bgegs gnas su sgrol la bstod// hU~M yab yum gnyis med thugs las sprul// za byed gsod byed phra men tshogs// mgo brnyan nyi shu phyag brnyan te// gdug pa
'dul byed sku mdog nag/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis mi bzod sku// phrin las 'gugs shing 'debs par mdzad// snang srid sgrol mdzad mthu stobs can// hU~M dang phaT gi stong gsum sgrogs// kha rlangs me 'bar
gdug pa sreg/ phyogs bcur sprul pa 'gyed la bstod// hU~M drod dang gsher las sku 'khrungs pa// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgo ba bzhi// skya ka pu shud srin bya khra// mgo brnyan zhal gcig phyag
gnyis ma// phrin las 'gugs 'ching sdom pa dang// myos shing mnyes pa'i las mdzad ma// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// phur pa 'debs pa'i las mdzad cing// dkar ser dmar ljang khro
mo'i sku// zhal las dzaHhU~M baM hoH'i sngags// 'brug sgra chen po phyogs bzhir sgrogs// dgra bgegs gnas su sgrol la bstod// hU~M thugs ka dpal be'u dkyil 'khor nas// sgo gcig rin chen gzhal
yas khang// bde stong dbyer med ngang nyid las// chos kyi sku las longs sku shar// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// skyon gyis ma gos gti mug sel// yab yum gnyis med zag med sku// sku mdog
dkar gsal rnam dag dbyings// rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams// shes rab byang chub sems dang ldan// rtog med mi 'gyur skyil krung bzhugs// mkha' dbyings bde chen sku la bstod// khrag 'thung lnga
ni dbyings la thim// yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu la// chu thigs tsam gcig bstod gyur pas// bdud rtsi log 'dren nad med cing// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// thig le nyag gcig des thob po//
e ma ho// yang dag don la ma yengs kyang// kun kyang khrag 'thung rang bzhin te// nges pa'i don 'di khyod kyis nyon// hU~M stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// dbus phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na//

brtan g.yo rtsi shing nags tshal kun// kun kyang rdo rje phur pa'i lha// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mthing nag me yi 'od 'phro zhing// rgod dang gshe dang khro ba'i tshul// phyag drug 'jigs
pa'i mtshon cha yis// 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings su sbyor// zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// zhal nas kI la'i sngags zlos zhing// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// gnas 'dir spyan
'dren gshegs nas kyang// dkyil 'khor 'di la brtan par bzhugs// phur pa 'di la dbang zhig skur// phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang// rig 'dzin bdag la

dngos grub stsol// A+oM badzra kI li ki la ya ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ hU~M stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// shar phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// brtan g.yo rtsi shing nags tshal kun// kun kyang b+hud+d+ha phur pa'i lha// zhal
gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dkar gsal me yi 'od 'phro zhing// khro dang bzhad dang gshed dang tshul// phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis// 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings su sbyor// zhabs bzhis
bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// zhal nas kI la'i sngags zlos shing// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs nas kyang// dkyil 'khor 'di la brtan

par bzhugs// phur pa 'di la dbang zhig skur// phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang// rig 'dzin bdag la dngos grub stsol// A+oM b+hud+d+ha kI li kI la ya ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ hU~M stong gsum
stong gi 'jig rten na// lho phyogs stong gis 'jig rten na// brtan g.yo rtsi shing nags tshal kun// kun kyang rin chen phur pa'i lha// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ser 'od me yi 'od

'phro zhing// sdang dang khro dang gshe ba'i tshul// phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis// 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings su sbyor// zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su
gsol// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs nas kyang// dkyil 'khor 'di la brtan par bzhugs// phur pa 'di la dbang zhig skur// phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung ba

dang// rig 'dzin bdag la dngos grub stsol// A+oM rat+na kI li kI la ya ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ hU~M stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// nub phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// brtan g.yo rtsi shing nags tshal kun// kun

kyang pad+ma phur pa'i lha// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dmar gsal me yi 'od 'phro zhing// gshe dang khro dang bzhad pa'i tshul// phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis// 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings
su sbyor// zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi zil gyi gnon// zhal nas kI la'i sgra zlos shing// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs nas kyang// dkyil 'khor 'di la brtan

par bzhugs// phur pa 'di la dbang zhig skur// phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang// rig 'dzin bdag la dngos grub stsol// A+oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ hU~M

stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// byang phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// brtan g.yo rtsi shing nags tshal kun// kun kyang las kyi phur pa'i lha// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ljang gu me yi 'od

'phro zhing// rngam dang bzhad dang khro bo'i tshul// phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis// 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings su sbyor// zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// zhal nas kI la'i sgra zlos shing// gnas
'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs nas kyang// dkyil 'khor 'di la brtan par bzhugs// phur pa 'di la dbang zhig skur// phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs// rtags

dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang// rig 'dzin bdag la dngos grub stsol// A+oM karma kI li kI la ya ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ b+ha ga bde ba'i klong yangs nas// mi 'gyur mthing ga'i thugs nyid de// thig le

dbyer med thugs kyi sku// rigs lnga khrag 'thung chos dbyings ngang// dbyings las ma g.yos rnam dag ste// e ma ho sras kyi mchog las ma g.yos kyang// b+ha ga'i dbyings las byung ba ste// rang bzhin rnam dag
khro bo'i sku// yang dag pa yi don 'di nyon// hU~M yab yum bde klong thig le nas// mi shigs byang chub sems kyi hU~M// 'joms byed dpal be'u phur pa'i dbyibs// thig le yig 'bru rnam pa kun// phur pa'i

logs la lha bkod nas// 'gyur med dbyings kyi ngang nyid las// khrag 'thung 'dus pa phur pa'i lha// sras kyi mchog gyur phur pa'i tshul// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed sku// ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra

zhing// khro dang bzhad dang gshe ba'i tshul// phyag drug rgyud drug rtsad nas gcod// phyag mtshan mtshon chas 'gro drug sgrol// sku smad chu srin phur pa'i dbal// rgya mdud nang nas sngags kyi sgra// 'brug stong lta bur

ldir zhing grags// chu srin kha nas me lce 'od// glog ltar 'khyug cing stong gsum gsal// gdug pa chu srin kha nas ni// sdig sbrul sbal lcong cho 'phrul 'gyed// stong khams gang zhing klu rnams 'dul// thugs
ka'i dpal be'i dkyil 'khor nas// bzhi bcu rtsa bdun lha tshogs gnas// dgu la rigs lnga'i khrag 'thung rdzogs// ye shes lnga ldan dug lnga 'joms// sras kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// bde chen yab
yum dbyings su bzhugs// khro bo'i sprul pas nam mkha' gang// khro mo'i sprul pas sa gzhi gang// phra men sprul pas bar snang gang// sgo ba'i sprul pas phyogs bcur 'gyed// khro bo phra men sgo ba'i
tshogs// thams cad 'dus pa sras kyi mchog/ ma btab tsam na lhun gyis grub// btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur// dgra bgegs thig le'i dkyil du kI la ya// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod cig kI la
ya// rgyud drug gnas su sgrol cig kI la ya// sems kyi bag chags sbyongs shig kI la ya// sems nyid dbyings su bstims shig kI la ya// dbyings las bde chen rgyas gyur kI la ya// sprul skus 'gro don

mdzod cig kI la ya// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M hU~M phaT/ e ma ho/ sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te// nam mkha' nyid las cho 'phrul 'byung// cho 'phrul nam mkha'i dbyings la thim// rnam rgyal

yang dag don 'di nyon// thams cad 'dus pa'i sras mchog nyid// sbyor sgrol sbyor spor thim pa'i tshe// nam mkha'i klong nyid las byung ngo// gdod nas ma skye rang bzhin rnam par dag/ srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa'i
phyir// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu nyid// dbyer med ngang las yang dag ste// dag dang ma dag dbyer med dbyings// bsam dang mi bsam brjod du med// cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir snang yang// b+ha

ga dbyings kyi ngang nyid du// thams cad bde ba klong nas shar// bsam gyi mi khyab kun las 'das// rjod med dbyings kyi thig le che// 'gro ba yongs la thams cad khyab// skye dang mi skye kun snang yang// yang

dag don la rig mi nus// phur pa'i rdzas nyid la brten nas// phrin las sna tshogs sgrub pa yang// yang dag don la yod ma yin// thams cad 'gro ba drang phyir te// dri mas dri ma dag byed cing// 'khrul pa bskyed

pa'i rim pas 'jigs// bskyed pa'i rim pa lha bsgom yang// yang dag don du yod min te// snang ba sprul sku sngags brjod med// bde chen rgyas par longs spyod nyid// dbyings su thim pa chos kyi sku// brjod
med gnyis su med pa ste// brjod du med pa sangs rgyas nyid// sngags kyi sgra yang brjod las 'das// thig le chen po mi shigs dbus// bdag dang bdag med dbyer med nyid// gnyis med ye shes rdo rje

ste// chos sku byang sems gzhon nu nga// srid pa'i 'khor lo phur pa ste// mi rtog dbyings kyi rgyas 'debs ma// e ka nam mkha'i rang bzhin te// dza ni dug chen bde dbyings thim// ti ni dug chen rtog med
dbyings// yab yum byang sems chos sku sras// dug thim phur pa brjod bral thim// bde chen dug gsum dbyings su thim// khro rgyal byang sems zhe sdang 'joms// hU~M mdzad dug 'joms thig le lnga// dbyings

su thim pas thig le ste// hU~M gi ye shes dang ldan zhing// kA yis dug lnga 'joms par byed// ras ni rnam rtog dbyings su thim// yum chen mi phyed rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas skyed par byed pa'i yum// sems can b+hud+d+ha

'gyur byed che// mi phyed ye shes rdo rje ste// sgra 'byin brag cha ltar snang la// ma ni sprul pa bskyed pa'i yum// sprul pa rol pa 'gag med nyid// phag las ma rig mun pa sel// smig bus 'dam rdzab skam par

byed// 'od gsal bdud 'jigs rnam par rgyal// snang ba mun sel rdo rje snyem// snang ba sna tshogs stag gi mgo/ bya rgod nam mkha' lta bu ste// dbyug pas lta log 'joms byed cing// sngon pos mtshan ma'i rnam
rtog 'joms// gnyis med rdo rje sder mo rno// las rnams mi rtog dbyings su thim// g.yag mgo dbyings las 'gyur ba med// bya rog chos dbyings rnam par dag/ gshin rje gzung 'dzin dag pa dang// dmyal
ba'i khams ni dpag med kyang// don dam dbyings la yod ma yin// rjes ni chos kyi dbyings su thim// dur khrod rol pa dpag med kyang// bdag mo mkha' dbyings rnam par dag/ sha ba skye
'gag med pa nyid// 'ug pa shes rab dbyings nyid de// lo ka chos brgyad nyid kyi sems// rtag tu yengs shing gnas pa yang// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// mi g.yo thig le nyag cig
go/ sems can don byed thams cad kyang// dam pa'i dbyings ni mgon yin no// rdo rje gnyis med zung 'jug pa// gtun khung snang ba 'joms byed ma// don dam nyid las ma g.yos kyang// thig le nyag

gcig gzigs gi mgo/ kha twa nam mkha' lta bur khyab// rta mgrin rta skad sgra snyan lta bu ste// rdo rje stong pa'i ngang nyid kyis/ khro bar snang bas gtum mo'o// byi las gzung 'dzin rnam rtog 'joms// pu shud bzang
ngan rnam rtog med// don dam nyid las yod ma yin// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams// rtog med mkha' dbyings gzhan mi thub// mi shigs rdo rje 'bigs byed mda'// mtshan ma 'joms par byed snyem

ma// spyang ka'i mgo ni ye sangs rgyas// rnam rtog phra mo sems byed kyang// yang dag nyid blta khra yi mgo/ bdud ni bzhi por snang byed pa// rtsi yis mi shigs klong du thim// 'khyil pa bde ba chen po'i
ngang// gcig dang du ma dang bral zhing// rtog med dbyings ni rlung 'byin ma// nyi ma lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis// mun pa'i tshogs 'joms seng ge'i mgo/ yod med gnyis las 'das pa yis// mtha' gnyis
bral ba pha wang mgo/ lus ngag yid gsum snang ba yang// don dam nyid la yod min te// 'khor ba las 'das khams gsum rgyal// mi shigs rdo rjes log 'gro 'joms// gzung 'dzin rtogs pa shes pa

gsod// pha rol phyin pa yin pa ste// spyod pa brlang po dom gyi mgo/ gang du mi gnas sre mo'i mgo/ don dam bden pas sems can gyi// nyon mongs stob byed stobs po che// rdo rje don dam bden pa ste// dag
pa mkha' dbyings klong du bskyod// bud+d+ha skyed pa'i yum yin ma// ye shes thogs med dred kyi mgo/ log pa'i lam zhugs sum byed cing// de bzhin nyid gnas byi la'i mgo/ snang ba stong pas 'gugs byed

ma// lcags kyus ye shes sa la dgod// stong pa bco brgyad zhags pa yis// mi rtog rtog pa 'ching byed ma// yod dam med pa'i phyogs spangs shing// snying rjes mi phyed lcags sgrog ma// stong pa nyid kyi sgra sgrogs
pas// mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms// shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyid// gzung 'dzin dang bral dril bu ma// sa ni thams cad kun gyi rten// de bzhin lta ba kun gyi gzhi// de ni gang du'ang ma grub

pa// bsam dang brjod pa'i yul las 'das// me yis sreg par byed pa ste// lha yi mtshan ma de bzhin nyid// chu yis sdud par byed pa ste// chu ltar snang ba'i sna tshogs kyang// de bzhin nyid las byung nas
ni// slar yang de bzhin nyid la thim// rlung gis g.yo bar byed pa nyid// rlung g.yos chu dang sprin las kyang// sems can kun gyi don la g.yo// nam mkha' go 'byed kun la khyab// cho 'phrul dam
pa'i dbyings la thim// log lta 'joms byed don la spyod// yang dag don la spyod pa gyis// nyi mas mun sel rnam rtog thim// nyi mas mun sel 'joms byed cing// mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa rnams// ye

shes dbyings kyi ngang du thim// zla ba chu shel grub pa nyid// zla ba dug gsum gdung ba sel// nyi shu nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams// dbyings las ma 'das thig le nyid// de bzhin re skong skur snang yang// rin chen
dgos 'dod re ba skong// gdul bya'i don du skur snang yang// yang dag dbyings las ma g.yos so// dpag bsam shing gis don rnams 'grub// yang dag don la gang dmigs pa// don dam myur du rtogs par
'gyur// pad+ma mi spang 'dam mi chags// pad+ma skyon gyis ma gos te// 'khor ba mi spang 'dam mi chags// yod med gnyis su mi gnas shing// dbyer med bag nas yang dag lta// nam mkha' sa chu mi gnas

pa'i// tshad med bzhi la gnas nas kyang// phyag rgya bzhi rdzogs thig le gcig/ yang dag don dang ldan gyur na// thig le nyag gcig brjod dang bral// e ma ho// sems can tham cad bud+d+ha yang// glo bur dri
mas sems can bsgribs// nam mkha' chu gser lta bur dag/ yang dag lta mthong rnam par grol// gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'ja' lta bu// gzugs brnyan lta bur snang gyur kyang// yang dag don la reg ma
yin// nam mkha' nyid las sprin byung ltar// 'khrul rtog don rtogs gnyis med lta// ji ltar sprin rnams sna tshogs kyang// nam mkha' nyid las byung ltar thim// las gnyis amra'i 'bras bu bzhin// 'khrul
zhing rtogs pa'i gang zag blun// yang dag lta ba nyid mthong na// dbyer med pa yi ngang la gnas// de yang smra bsam brjod med brda// yod med mtshan mar 'dzin dang bral// mtha' gnyis gang du mi gnas
pa// yang dag lta ba gzung bar byos// de rtogs pa yi gang zag rnams// 'chi ba zhes ni rnam rtog ste// mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par 'gyur// dkyil gsum bdag nyid brjod las 'das// gang du mi gnas

lta spyod sgom pa'o// tha snyad mtshan mar 'dzin pa gang brjod rnams// gang du ma grub 'dir ni brjod pa min// 'gyur med dag pa'i sems rang bzhin// sems ni gang du gnas pa'ang med// de rtogs pa yi gang
zag rnams// thugs kyi rigs la gnas par 'gyur// rdo rje'i rigs su mngon sangs rgya// nga yis bstan pas mngon sangs rgyas// sems can dug lnga rgyas pa'i dus// drag po'i las kyi tshar gcod

pa'i// sngags la sbyangs pas rgyal po'i rigs// pad+ma las skyes skye ba dran// spyod pa sna tshogs byas gyur nas// mkha' 'gro ma yi lung bstan thob// tshe gcig nyid la bud+d+ha 'gyur// zhe sdang rdo rje'i

rigs yin no// rdo rje khrag 'thung ngang nyid kyis// chos la rtag tu sgrub 'gyur zhing// nga yi bstan pa 'di yis 'dzin// 'di la brten pa'i gang zag rnams// thams cad grol 'gyur the tshom med// rdo rje khrag

'thung nga nyid kyis// yi ge hU~M tsam bzlas pa yang// bar chod bdud kyis mi tshugs shing// mtshan ma grub par the tshom med// rdo rje can gyi zhing du skye// lha klu kun la dbang byed 'gyur// 'di sgrub pa yi gang zag

rnams// snga nas sbyangs par the tshom med// tshe gcig 'di la brtson ldan pas// 'khor bar mi ldog mngon sangs rgyas// gang gis dbang dang man ngag thob// skad gcig tsam gyis mos gyur na// 'chi ba zhes ni

rnam rtog ste// mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la mos pa tsam// dbang dang dam tshig 'dzin 'gyur na// skye bdun nyid la sangs rgyas 'gyur// skye ba gzhan gyis bar ma chod// 'di la the

tshom le lo spang// brtson 'grus dad ldan can gyis sgrub// rgyud 'di rtag tu gsang bar bya// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis srung bar 'gyur// b+ha ga wAn gyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bud+d+ha dang kro d+hA dang kro d+hI
