'dul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag don gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dbang po gsal la rtog pa med// yang dag don la mthar phyin pa'i// rig 'dzin pa

dang byang chub sems// dngos grub myur zhing longs spyod 'phel// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub pa la// bar chad med cing bsam pa 'grub// gang du stsol ba'i don rnams 'grub// rten pa'i rdzas la rab brten te// rdzas
la rnam pa lnga nyid las// rdo rje rigs kyi rdzas su bshad// sngon mo skra bzang sked pa phra// spyi bo rim bzhin stod smad snyoms// smin mtshams bar yang ma chad pa// lag pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin

la// rkang pa ran la mdzes pa dang// mig phra mdzes la 'khur sha snyoms// so thags dam la smra ba snyan// snyan bde dag gis nges pa med// smra ba nyan cing spyod pa sdug/ rigs btsun nyes pa'i skyon med

pa// khong nas dal shing shong yangs che// 'gro ba'i stabs kyang yid du 'ong// gsal la bde zhing ran par 'dzin// yid la bsam pas mngon du gsal// lha yang mnyes la dngos grub ster// de phyir dngos grub

rdzas su bshad// rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar ba dang// shing gi rta la bskyon pa dang// mtshon gyis rtse la brlabs pa dang// gsum gyi nad kyis shi ba dang// rbab dang glo bur drag po dang// 'tshal dang rdibs

dang 'gags pa dang// log par bo dang bug pa dang// rta dang glang chen bka' thab dang// pho mo'i 'brel pas shi ba dang// ri dang rlung dang sa gtsang dang// gang byung rim pa'i rdzas de dag/ bsgrub pa'i rdzas
mchog yin par bshad// rims dang smyo ba'i nad rnams dang// 'bog pa drag pos nyes pa dang// mdze dang shu ba g.yem pa dang// 'bras dang phol mig rtag tu gnas// dmod pa'i kha zugs nyes pa'i skyon// chu

dang me yi skyon med dang// skyon du 'gyur ba'i rdzas de dag/ mi bcangs rab tu spang bar bya// sngo nag bam rul ham pa can// rigs med spyod pa kun kyang byed// kha ngan zlos shing lag ngan byed// 'jur bas

bcings la shong yangs med// phra ma dbyen rdzun 'gyur ba mkhan// gnyis kyi don la 'gyur ba che// grub pa med pa kun la 'jug/ skra ngan sha sngo mig phor che// mjing pa thung la sha rtsubs pa// mkhur sha che la

gnyer ma mang// so dprad kos ko yu ba thung// nu ma lhong la rab tu che// sked pa spom la cha ma phyed// ma lhu thung la bu lhu ring// tshigs pa che la dreg pa chags// rked pa phra la rus pa spom// mthe bong ring zhing
sen mo gyong// mgo bo che la gsus pa 'bur// rna bas mi thos log la dga'// mig kyang mi bde rab rib can// lce yang mi bde dig po smra// gnya' ba dpung mtho mgo bo dma'// rting pa spom la sor mo

phra// byin pa spom la brla sha chung// smad phra steng sbom shan ma phyed// mchu 'thug rna 'byar sna zhim dang// mtshogs ma rdib dang gre ba 'dzer// mi bcang rab tu spang ba'i rdzas// gang du gnas pa'i sa de ru// tshe
gsum dran byed ting 'dzin gyis// dngos grub chen po rtsol bas btsal// dpa' rtul ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// skongs shing dngos grub yod bsam nas// bton nas gang yin mnan pa'i phyir// seng lding phur bu
sor brgyad ni// stobs chen sngags kyis byin brlab la// khro bo bcu yi sngags kyis btab// sar gdab stangs stabs drag po bya// stobs kyi ting 'dzin chen po yis// khur te dngos grub thob
bsam nas// re dang dogs pa'i sems mi bca'// dur khrod gnas su sleb pa dang// shar gyi phyogs su bzhag nas ni// ting 'dzin gzhal yas lha bskyed la// dag pa'i khrus kyis bkrus byas nas// stangs
stabs rim par sngags kyis bya// lha la bstab cing gsol bar bsam// thig ni lnga ba lnga btab ste// snying nas yan lag bzhi rnams dang// mgo dang lnga ru rnam par btang// rdzas rnams legs par spros pa

ste// snying la dum bu lnga ru bya// spyi bo gsang ba'i mig dang sna// dpral ba dpung pa lte ba snying// dpyi dang rkang pa rim bzhin du// yan lag bzhi dang snying dang mgo// glo ba mchin pa mtsher pa dang// mkhal ma
rim pa bzhin du dgod// dam rdzas kun la byas pa'am// sha sna kun la rdzas bgos la// mkha' 'gro kun la yang dag dgram// thod pa rangs pa lnga dag dang// tshom bu lha yi grangs dang mnyam// ma 'dres so

so'i snod du gzhag/ spyan drangs skos la byon pa dang// skos gdab rim pa 'di lta ste// dran byed snying gi dam rdzas ni// sras mchog lnga yi skos yin pas// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol// spyi bo'i sha dang

gsang ba dang// sna mig dpral ba dpung pa dang// lte ba snying dpyi rkang pa dag/ khro bo yab yum sras bcas rdzas// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol// glo ba mcher pa mchin pa dang// mkhal ma la sogs don

snying ni// gdug byed sras mchog drug gi rdzas// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol// mi dbang 'bras bu sha dag dang// srog rtsa khrag gi sbubs dag dang// bde ba chen po'i klad pa 'di// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro

gdug pa'i rdzas// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su gsol// so so'i rdzas rnams so sor bskos// thod pa dbang dang drag po la// gdan dang snying por bcas pa kun// bri zhing rab gnas bya ba dang// phyin chad bsgrub

pa'i rdzas bya'i phyir// shun dang rgyu zhags bcas pa dag/ bsgrub pa'i rdzas yin rab tu sba// de phyir sgrub pa'i rdzas la brten// de ni rdzas kyi dam pa'o// ngan pa'i rdzas la spyad pa dang// brten pa'i rdzas su med pa

ni// dngos grub med pa phur pa'i rdzas// dur khrod mi ro mang po dang// dmar dang gnag pa'i ri dwags dang// brag dang dmar nag spang brag dbyibs// shing rtse dmar nag skyes pa'am// gru gsum zla gam sgo
yod pa// phug kyang de 'drar gnas pa la// bar snang gru gsum zla gam dbyibs// sa yang de bzhin shes par bya// mdun du chu 'bab skyobs pa'i ri// dngos grub 'byung dang rin chen dbang// 'byung po ma mo
srin po dang// rngam pa chen po'i rjes med par// gnyan rdo med cing tsha drag med// zur rdo ra ri'i brag med pa// zur ma zug cing yid du 'ong// nyams su bde zhing nyam mi nga// de 'dra yid 'ong
gnas dag tu// sa rin bcal zhing las dag bya// stegs bu 'dam gang brtsig nas su// dur khrod sna tshogs rus pa la// khrag sna lnga yis legs par byug/ dam rdzas lnga yis chag chag gdab// bden pa sngags
kyi nus pa dbyung// dur khrod chen po'i rgyus pa la// mtshan ldan yum gyis byin brlab la// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// byang chub sems las ye shes kyis// byin rlab chen po 'byung bar

'gyur// rnam pa gnyis su rab shes bya// lnga tshan lnga yi tshon rnams kun// thod pa brtan pa'i rdzas su blug/ byin brlab bya zhing mchod pa 'bul// gru gsum zla gam mu khyud dang// rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad rim

pa la// gru gsum gdan dang bcas pa gtad// gru chad bar khyams sgo bzhir bcas// rta babs them skas tshang bar bri// nyi zla pad+ma sum brtsegs dang// rkyang pa zhing ldan rim pa gtad// las kyi lha yi ting
'dzin gyis// bar chad bsal ba'i las rnams bya// rdzas kyi thod par rangs pa lnga// lhar bskyed spyan drangs bstims pa dang// sngags dang bstod pa'i las rnams bya// hUM dbus nas rang byung grub pa'i
lha// bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas su// dug gsum bsgral ba'i gdan stengs su// rU tra bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing

brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// kI la la yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM shar nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// bcom
ldan bud+d+ha kI la ya// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i gnas chen 'dir// brgya byin bsnol pa'i gdan stengs su// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan

par bzhugs nas kyang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// bcom ldan

rat+na kI la ya// dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i gzhal yas su// gshin rje bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// kI

la ya yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM nub nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// bcom ldan karma kI la ya// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor

'dir// dug gsum bsgral ba'i gnas chen 'dir// klu bdud bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i
dngos grub stsol// A+oM badzra kI li kI la la sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM byang nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// bcom ldan karma kI la ya// dur khrod chen po'i
dkyil 'khor du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i gnas chen du// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// kI la ya yi dngos

grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM srid pa phur bu sgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// phyogs bcur dur khrod
gzhal yas nas// khro rgyal 'khor tshogs bzhugs pa ni// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas nas// dug gsum bsgral ba'i gnas chen 'dir// phyogs skyong bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// dgyes shing brtan par

bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na

ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT// oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM

badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha tri lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha

lhan// hUM thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir stsol cig/ las kyi sras mchog drug rnams ni// dur
khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// dug gsum bsgral ba'i gnas chen du// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i gdan steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// kI la ya

yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// ha sa ra na ha ra hUM phaT/ A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ shI g+h+raM 'ga' zhig tu Da byung A na ya hU~M phaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/
bi da ya bi da ya hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM thugs mchog gsol ba'i byin brlab las// zhe sdang gnas su 'joms pa dang// me long ye shes 'thob bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su
gsol// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs nas kyang// nyon mongs mun pa bsal du gsol// dz+nyA na dI paM sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM dam rdzas kun gyi bcud ldan pa'i// thams cad sdud pa rdzas kyi
mchog/ mkha' 'gro ma chen rnam gsum yang// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang/ dug gsum bsgral ba'i gnas chen du// dam rdzas spungs pa'i gdan steng du// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs su

gsol// dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// chos la dbang ba'i dngos grub stsol// a dzi te a pa ra dzi te dza ya ka tang ka ye sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ mtshan ldan dngos grub rdo
rje ka pA la// gser dngul lugs su btang ba 'dra// lan gsum gnas gsum spar ba dang// shar phyogs nub dang lho yang rab// byang dang lho nub shar lho 'bring// byang nub byang shar steng 'og tha// dngos
grub ster dang dbang yang thob// drag po'i las nyid thob par 'gyur// tshe ring nad med longs spyod 'phel// dad pa med cing bsam pa 'grub// rig 'dzin sa la rnam par 'gro// yon tan ldan pa'i kA pa
la// nyes pa spang bar ma gyur na// bar chad 'byung zhing rtog pa skyes// lha nyid bdud du babs pa dang// don med phyal bar 'gro ba yin// re ba stongs shing mya ngan gnon// dngos grub re ba'i yi ge
las// dngos grub gnas pa'i rten bshad de// dgos pa'i las rnams de bzhin bya// dur khrod chen po'i g.yang gzhi la// lha yi mtshan mas mtshan cing dgod// zhags pa chen po rim drug ni// gtso sngags

gdab cing bskor bar bya// phur pa dar gyi cod pan can// rab gnas bya zhing dgod par bya// bar chad bsal ba'i las bya zhing// nus pa can du bya ba'i phyir// sngon du 'gro ba'i dbang bskur bya// lha yi mtshan

mas mtshan par bya// nus pa ldan zhing rab brtan nas// brda yis mtshon te rnam par dbye// phyag ni tshul dang rab tu ldan// skabs dang mi mthun gnyan po bsal// 'on kyang dngos grub re ba skongs// bsgrub

pa'i rdzas la rab brtan te// lha re'i grangs kyi snang ba dgram// sha khrag sna tshogs rab bstar la// bar ma chad par snying po 'don// thod pa blang dang snying po 'don// nyul le zlog dang phur kha bstan// lha la

bstod cing srung ma bskul// dus drug mchod pa dbul bya zhing// 'jigs dang re ba'i sems mi 'byung// phur pa 'phar dang mtshan mar ston// sgra snyan dri dang bcas pa 'byung// nyams dga' skye ba'i sems mi

'byung// dus dus lha rnams gnad la dbab// rtags rnams byung na las rnams bya// dngos grub rdzas rnams rab tu ster// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur
bu'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub pa mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos nyid las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro

don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlab 'dir stsol cig/ dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag bsnyan

chen po'i dus la bab// shwa na mu kha'i dus la bab// bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab// sa bdag rgyal mo'i dus la bab// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod phrin

las myur du mdzod// hUM skye med chos dbyings dag pa las// yang dag don gyi lha yi sku// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlab yin// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM thugs rje'i byin brlab

cir yang ston// shar gyi sras mchog gdug pa 'dul// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM lho yi sras mchog gdug pa 'dul// swA badzra kI li kI la ya// byin rlab chen po char ltar

phob// hUM nub kyi sras mchog gdug pa 'dul// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM byang gi sras mchog gdug pa 'dul// ha badzra kI li kI la ya/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hU~M

steng gi khro bo tshangs pa 'dul// oM badzra kro d+ha/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hU~M shar gyi khro bo brgya byin 'dul// oM badzra kro d+ha/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hU~M shar lho'i khro bo drang srong 'dul// oM badzra kro

d+ha/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hU~M lho yi khro bo gshin rje 'dul// oM badzra krod+ha/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hU~M lho nub khro bo srin po 'dul// oM badzra kro d+ha/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hU~M nub kyi

khro bo klu bdud 'dul// oM badzra kro d+ha/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hU~M nub byang khro bo rlung lha 'dul// oM badzra kro d+ha/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM byang gi khro bo gnod spyin 'dul// oM badzra kro d+ha/

byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM byang shar khro bo dbang ldan 'dul// oM badzra kro d+ha/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM 'og gi khro bo sa bdag 'dul// oM badzra kro d+ha/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM steng

gi sras mchog gdug pa 'dul// oM badzra krod+ha kI la ya// byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM shar gyi sras mchog gdug pa 'dul// oM badzra kI li kI la ya// byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM lho yi sras

mchog gdug pa 'dul// oM badzra kI li kI la ya// byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM nub kyi sras mchog gdug pa 'dul// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM byang gi sras mchog
gdul pa 'dul// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM 'og gi sras mchog gdug pa 'dul// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM khro bo chen po

las kyi mchog/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ byin rlab chen po char ltar phob// hUM lha rnams gnad la dbab pa dang// bskyed dang spyan drang bstim pa dang// sgo ba bskyed pa'i las rnams bya// mchod pa sngags dang

bstod pa dang// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang// rim pa bzhin du yang dag bstan// phrin las phur pa'i dngos grub dang// gang yin nyid la gdab pa dang// brten pa'i rdzas de kha phye la// hU~M bcom ldan

dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu dang// yum chen 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma// dngos grub stsol ba'i dus la bab// skya rengs dang po dngos grub dus la bab// kI la ya yi bro brdung bas// dngos grub stsol ba'i dus la
bab// dbang bskur dam pa sgrub pa'i mchog/ rim pa bzhin du de shes bya// zhal zas dbang dar thod pa dang// kun kyang rim pa gnyis su bstan// rdo rje tshe yi dbang bskur bas// rtogs pa ye shes me ru

'bar// hUM ye shes sku yi sprul pa ste// rdzu 'phrul ston cing bka' nyan pa'i// dpa' rtul stag gi mgo can la// mi mo stag gi mgo can zhon// bang ni rlung gis bskyod du med// skad ni stong khams khyab par
sgrogs// lag pa g.yas na phur bu bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying la ya// lag pa g.yon na lcags kyu bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying nas drongs// khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang// srid gsum zil gyis

gnon pa dang// sgrub la bar chad byed pa rnams// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// hUM ye shes thugs kyi sprul pa gcig/ stobs kyi rgyal po seng ge la// mi mo seng ge'i mgo can zhon// bang ni rlung gis bskyod

du med// skad ni khams gsum khyab par sgrogs// lag pa g.yas na phur pa bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying la ya// lag pa g.yon na lcags kyu bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying nas drongs// khams gsum dbang

du bsdu ba dang// srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa dang// sgrub la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// hUM ye shes thugs kyi sprul pa gcig/ dran byed mkha' lding pho rog la// mi mo pho

rog mgo can zhon// bang ni rlung gis bskyod du med// skad ni stong khams khyab par sgrogs// lag pa g.yas na phur pa bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying la ya// lag pa g.yon na lcags kyu bsnams// gang la bya
ba'i snying nas drongs// khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang// srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa dang// sgrub la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal pa bzhin du rdul du rlogs// hUM ye shes thugs kyi sprul pa
gcig/ rdzi gnon g.yag gi mgo can la// mi mo g.yag gi mgo can zhon// bang ni rlung gis bskyod du med// skad ni stong khams khyab par sgrogs// lag pa g.yas na phur bu bsnams// gang la bya
ba'i snying la ya// lag pa g.yon na lcags kyu bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying nas drongs/ khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang// srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa dang// sgrub la bar chad byed pa'i

bgegs// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// hUM ye shes thabs kyi sprul pa gcig/ gsod byed chen mo dred mo la// mi mo dred mo'i mgo can zhon// bang ni rlung gis bskyod du med// skad ni stong khams khyab par
sgrogs// lag pa g.yas na phur bu bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying la ya// lag pa g.yon na lcags kyu bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying nas drongs/ khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang// srid gsum zil gyis
gnon pa dang// sgrub la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// hUM ye shes thugs kyi sprul pa gcig/ grim byed chen mo gzig mo la// mi mo gzig gi mgo can zhon// bang ni rlung gis

bskyod du med// skad ni stong khams khyab par sgrogs// lag pa g.yas na phur bu bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying la ya// lag pa g.yon na lcags kyu bsnams// gang la bya ba'i snying nas drongs// khams gsum
dbang du bsdu ba dang// srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa dang// sgrub la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// nyams drug rtags drug mi gsal ba'i// ting 'dzin drod nyul chen mo

rnams// thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// nyi ma'i zer la gnod byed pa// 'byung po the'u rang gnod byed lnga// dri dang ngad du bcas pa ldang// rtse la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// zlog byed stag mo'i ting 'dzin

gyis// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// nyi ma gung la gnod byed pa// sa bdag chen mo lag chen yang// lci zhing nyam chung drod dang bral// gung la bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// zlog byed stobs ldan ting 'dzin

gyis// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// dgong gi dus na gnod byed pa'i// btsan gyi pho nya rkang srin yin// phyad phyod ting 'dzin mi gsal ba// dgongs la bar chad byed ba'i bgegs// dran byed chen mo'i ting

'dzin gyis// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// srod gyi dus na gnod byed pa// bdud gyi rgyal mo ma rungs pa// grib so nag cing rmug par byed// zlog byed g.yag gi ting 'dzin gyis// thal ba bzhin du rdul du
rlogs// nam phyed bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// ma bdud rgyal mo kun tu rgyu// spyugs pa len cing me ru 'bar// nam byed bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// hUM tho rangs bar chad
byed pa'i bgegs// tshangs pa chen po'i sprul pa ste// me 'od kun gyi bdag po yis// zlog byed dred kyi ting 'dzin dang// sgrub pa rdzas kyi dam pa yis// tho rangs bar chad byed pa'i
bgegs// thal ba bzhin du rdul du rlogs// hUM gdug byed gnod pa'i bar chad rnams// dus ma yin par 'byung bar byed// ting 'dzin mi gsal dran pa nyams// zlog byed gzig gi ting 'dzin gyis// thal ba

bzhin du rdul du rlogs// nyams pa'i 'od dang bdud kyi 'od// the'u rang 'od dang rtags kyi 'od// rtags kyi dri dang the'u rang dri// bdud kyi nyams dang dngos grub nyams// spar shang dri dang rdzas kyi dri// bar chad
'od dang ma mo'i rtags// btsan gyi sgra dang rig 'dzin gsung// thams cad dus dang nyams dga' dang// rdo rje kha TAM rnge'u chung dang// nyung dkar phur bu zhing lpags dang// gu gul dud pa btang bas
'byung// rab rib med par rab shes na// de nyid ye shes lha yi rtags// gsal la rtog med nyam mi nga// rab rib mi brtan 'gyur ba can// rtags min dngos grub bar chad byed// de nyid bzlog par rab

shes bya// yang na ting 'dzin chen po drug/ gtso bo'i ting 'dzin chen po dang// mtshams dang sras mchog drug rnams kyi// sngags dang tshig dang phur pa yis// dus rnams kun tu bzlog par bya/ yang na sras mchog
drug rnams kyis// rim pa bzhin du yang dag bzlog/ yang na khro bo chen po bcus// thams cad kun tu bzlog par bya// oM sku gsum yon tan rdzogs pa'i sngags// phar 'phros lha rnams thugs dam
bskul// tshur 'dus ci bsam tshul bzhin sgrub// ye shes lha la mchod pa 'bul// dam can rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskul// bdud dang srin po rdul du rlogs/ byin rlab chen po char ltar 'bebs// sngags kyi
'bru ni lha yin te// sngags kyi bzlas pa yid 'ong gnas// lha rnams gsal la rtog pa med// nyon mongs dri ma kun kyang 'joms// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting nas skems// dbang dang dngos grub tshul bzhin

stsol// 'bru dgu sngags kyi byin brlab las// lha la bstod cing thugs dam bskul// rtogs pa'i don gyi chos sku thob// nyon mongs rgyud sbyong longs sku thob// cir yang 'dul ba sprul sku thob// thams cad lha yi

ngo bor gsal// hUM gdug pa 'dul ba'i lha ni cir yang ston// rngam pa chen pos thams cad 'dul ba'i lha/ khams gsum dbang sdud bdud kyi rgyal po 'joms// rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM

yab la dgyes shing rgyal ba'i thugs dam skongs// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i yum// nyon mongs chags pa rab tu sbyong mdzad pa// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM tshangs pa
'dul ba'i lha ni sku mdog mthing// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yub sras 'khor bcas// rngam pa chen po nyi zla 'dul mdzad pa// tshangs pa 'dul du yab yum sras dang bcas// rngam pa chen po
gdug pa 'dul ba'i lha// sa bdag 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM rdzu 'phrul 'phrog byed lha ni sku mdog mthing// 'dul ba'i dbang du rang rtags gu gul bsnams// mthu 'phrog phrin las mtha' ru
dbyung ba'i phyir// mthu rnams 'phrog pa'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM 'gugs byed chen po'i lha ni sku mdog dkar// 'dul ba'i dbang du rang rtags lcags kyu bsnams// 'gugs pa'i phrin las

mtha' ru dbyung ba'i phyir// mthu rnams 'phrog pa'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM 'chi byed chen po'i lha ni sku mdog sngo// 'dul ba'i dbang du rang rtags zhags pa bsnams// 'ching ba'i phrin las

mtha' ru dbyung ba'i phyir// 'ching byed lha chen khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM smyo byed chen po'i lha ni sku mdog dmar// 'dul ba'i dbang du rang rtags drug rnams bsnams// smyo ba'i phrin las mtha' ru dbyung

ba'i phyir// smyo byed lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM sgrol byed chen mo'i lha ni sku mdog nag po ste// 'dul ba'i dbang du rang rtags tho ba bsnams// sgrol ba'i phrin las mtha' ru dbyung ba'i phyir// sgrol

ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM stobs pa'i lha ni sku mdog ljang sngon te// 'bul ba'i dbang du rang rtags gzas pa bsnams// stobs pa'i phrin las mtha' ru dbyung ba'i phyir// stobs pa'i lha chen
khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM ye shes las la grub pa'i dbang phyug ma// sha khrag dmar la dad cing dam la rub// gang du mngags pa'i las rnams sgrub par byed// las rnams kun gyi bdag mo'i dus la

bab// 'jig rten khams kun ma lus khyab pa'i bya ma rta// bdud dang srin po rab tu 'dar byed ma// gang ltar 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM brgya byin 'dul ba'i lha ni sku mdog dkar// 'dul ba'i

dbang du yab yum sras dang bcas// rngam pa chen po dri za 'dul ba'i lha// brgya byin 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM drang srong 'dul ba'i lha ni sku mdog sngo// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yum sras dang

bcas// drang srong 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM gshin rje 'dul ba'i lha ni sku mdog sngo// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yum sras dang bcas// rngam pa chen po gshin rje 'dul ba'i lha// gshin rje 'dul

ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM srin po 'dul ba'i lha ni sku mdog ljang// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yum sras dang bcas// rngam pa chen po srin po 'dul ba'i lha// srin po 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal
bstod// hUM klu bdud 'dul ba'i lha ni sku mdog dmar// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yum sras dang bcas// rngam pa chen po ya bdud 'dul ba'i lha// klu bdud 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal

bstod// hUM rlung lha 'dul ba'i lha ni sku mdog dmar skya can// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yum sras dang bcas// rngam pa chen po 'byung po 'dul ba'i lha// rlung lha 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM gnod

sbyin 'dul ba'i lha ni sku mdog ljang nag la// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yum sras dang bcas// rngam pa chen po nor srung 'dul ba'i lha// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM dbang ldan 'dul

ba'i lha ni sku mdog ljang ser la// 'dul ba'i dbang du yab yum sras dang bcas// rngam pa chen po bgegs rnams 'ching ba'i lha// dbang ldan 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM sa bdag 'dul ba'i lha

ni sku mdog dud kha la// 'dul ba'i dbang la rbad pa de bzhin las byed ma// bstan pa rgyas par mdzad pa'i rgyal mo thugs dam dus la bab// bran dang pho nya las rnams 'grub byed ma'i// bstan pa srung ba'i
las la brtson pa'o// 'jig rten dbang du sdud pa'i mthu mo che// sa bdag 'khor tshogs thugs dam dus la bab// hUM yang dag don las sku ni cir yang snang// bdud dang srin po'i nga rgyal ma yin te// 'dul

ba'i dbang du rab rngam mche ba gtsigs// hUM dang phaT kyi sgras ni kun kyang bkang// nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul ba'i thugs rje yis// byams mgon rngam pa'i lha la dngos grub nod// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin

cig phob// byin rlab ster ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'byor pa can dang rab tshogs nas// ci la thogs med ser sna spangs// spangs pa can du gyur pa na// rtsol bas rab tu 'byor bas ni// lha dang lha yi

rang bzhin las// rim pa bzhin du yang dag sbyar// dug gsum rtsad bcad rdzas gsum gyis// 'bar ba me la mchod bya ste// dur khrod shing la me sbar te// bkug cing bstim ste bstab pa'i rdzas// dum bu nyid

du rab gtubs la// rtse lnga 'bar ba'i mthil du blug/ hUM 'byung po'i sha ni zan bas zhim// gti mug mchod pa bla na med// bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// sku yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'byung po'i khrag

ni chang bas zhim// 'dod chags mchod pa bla na med// bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// gsung gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'byung po'i lha rkang mar bas zhim// zhe sdang mchod pa bla na med// bla med mchod pa

'di 'bul gyi// thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// dug gsum mchod pa bla na med// bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// hUM me yi rgyal po khro bo'i sku// 'ur 'ur chem
chem 'bar ba'i 'od/ khams gsum 'khor ba gzhom pa dang// nyon mongs log lta bsreg pa'i phyir// ye shes me chen 'bar ba yis// 'khor ba'i bag chags bsreg pa dang// dngos grub 'tshe
ba'i gdug pa can// khro rgyal 'bar ba'i me la bsreg/ rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ rdzas sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzas thams cad bsgrub par gnas pa'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdzas rnams bsgrubs nas rab tu bcangs// gang la thob pa de bzhin te// de ni 'grub par gdon mi za// mtshan dang ldan pa'i dur khrod du// maN+Dal thig dang dkyil

'khor bri// gru gsum zla gam 'khor lo bri// gru chad bar khyams sgo dang ldan// las rnams ma lus kun bya ste// bar chad bsal la rdzas rnams dgod// lha lnga rdzas dang mar me dang// steng 'og rdzas rnams de

bzhin dgram// rim par bya ba gang yin pa'i// ting 'dzin rab tu gsal bar bya// lha lnga spyan drangs mchod pa dang// bstod dang 'dzabs snyen las rnams bya// rigs lnga khrag 'thung bsgrub pa ste// bar chad

bsal zhing mtshan ma brtag/ sgrub pa chen po'i las kyi mchog/ dus rnams kun tu bar mi gcad// lha la mchod cing mkha' 'gro bskul// mi 'gyur mtshan ma byung ba dang// dngos grub chen po'i lha lnga la// rim

par blang zhing dbang bskur bya// rim par don dang ldan par bya// thams cad kun la rnam par g.yengs// don dang ldan pa'i dur khrod du// maN+Dal bya zhing dkyil 'khor bri// bsrung ba'i rim pa ma lus bya// thod
pa mtshan ldan rangs po la// gtso bo yab yum sngags bris la// snying dang bcas pa dbus su dgod// phyi ma'i rdzas rnams rim pas te// mar me ye shes gcig tu 'dus// dngos grub mtshan ldan ka pA
lar// yab yum sngags rnams bris nas ni// gang yin gnas su dgod par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang yang dgod// nus pa'i dbang yang sngon du bskur// ting 'dzin rim pa grangs mang yang// thams cad

'dus pa'i yab yum bsgom// spyan drangs rim pa de bzhin du// las nyid grub pa'i snying por 'dus// bya ba thams cad yongs su sbyar// chos dbyings nam mkha'i ngo bo las// cir yang snang ba lha yi sku// gsal
ba nyid la bsam du med// thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol// hUM me long ye shes byin brlab las// rang rig ye shes me bo che// ma rig mun pa bsal du
med// thams cad rang byung ye shes me// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol// hUM stong gsum thams cad gzhal yas khang// skye ba med par ye nas grub// 'dzin pa med par rang bzhin grol// dkyil
'khor rgyan du dgram par bya// hUM 'khor ba ma spangs lhun gyis grub// spangs na byang chub sems nyid spangs// thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// rdzas kyang de bzhin rtogs pa'i ngang// dkyil
'khor rgyan du dgram par bya// hUM thams cad thig le ye brdal las// re dang dogs pa'i sems spangs la// rten yang ye brdal ka pA lar// dur khrod rdzas su bzhag nas kyang// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs
su gsol// hUM chos dbyings gsal la rtog pa med// nyes pas ma bsgribs gsal ba'i 'od// ting 'dzin chen po'i byin brlab las// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings// hUM chos dbyings nam mkha'i rang
bzhin la// rol pas 'byung lngar lhun gyis grub// grub kyang rol pa 'dzin pa bral// rten du 'gyur bas rnam par gsal// hUM dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang// rang byung ye shes bzhugs gnas su// ma
bsgribs gsal ba'i 'od po che// rig pa rang shar gzhal yas su// thig le cir yang snang ba shar// hUM rang byung ye shes gsal ba'i 'od// rol pa bsam med brjod las 'das// lha nyid gsal la gzhi rtsa

bral// bde ba chen po'i klong na bzhugs// hUM chos sku nyag gcig gnyis su med// cir yang snang bas bsam mi khyab// gang du gnas pa'i de bzhin nyid// rang byung chen po'i dbyings na g.yos// hUM gsal la
rtog med ye shes te// ye shes chen po phyag rgya che// rnam par grol cing dmigs dang bral// chos dbyings dag pa'i phyag rgya 'byung// thig le byang chub sems nyid las// thams cad dngos grub chen po
yin// chos dbyings nor bu rin po che// zad pa med par thams cad 'byung// sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar mdzad// zad pa med pa'i dngos grub gter// re ba skong
bas thams cad tshim// dga' bar 'gyur bas rtogs pa skye// rang byung lha la dngos grub slong// hUM bsam pas 'grub pa'i rin po che// zad pa med pa'i gter du gnas// thams cad re skong bsam pa
'grub// sku gsum sa thob dngos grub gter// da lta nyid du stsal du gsol// thugs dam chen po rgyud bskul na// gang la thogs med dngos grub stsol// hUM rang byung ye shes lha la dngos grub slong// 'dir

gshegs spyan 'dren dbang dang dngos grub stsol// nam mkha' bzhin du re dogs mi mnga' yang// thugs rje'i shugs kyis byin rlabs sprin dang 'dra// bdud rtsi char chen 'bebs pas re ba skong// chos nyid re
dogs bral ba'i rang bzhin las// dngos grub stsal dang stsol bar mi dmigs kyang// byin rlab dbang gis dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes lha la re dogs ma mchis kyang// dogs pa'i sems dang mi cha re
ba skong// bsam pa 'grub pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// hUM lha dang gnyis su med par gang gsal ba// re ba'i dngos grub dang po de bas na// lha la lha yis byin brlab nus pa can// bstan pa

rgyas pa'i phyir na slod lags kyis// thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// hUM dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi byin brlab las// zhal bu mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA lar// 'chi med tshe yi g.yung drung ci bsam
'grub// 'dun pa rigs kyi dngos grub mdzad med gter// bdud 'dul lha nye bgegs zhi rab tu bzang// nye ba nyid du bsam pa da re ran// yang dag ldan pa'i dngos grub dam pa 'di// ci bsam 'grub cing
re ba skong ba dang// rig 'dzin sa la nges par phyin pa dang/ thogs pa med par ci bsam 'grub pa dang// dngos grub dam pa de nyid stsal du gsol// hUM chos dbyings nam mkha' bsam med brjod las
'das// thams cad 'byung zhing re ba thams cad skong// skong ba nyid na rgyal ba'i dbyings su thim// chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// hUM byin rlabs chen po nam mkha'i sprin dang
'dra// bdud dang srin po 'dul phyir rgyal ba'i rigs su byung// dbang bskur byin brlab nus pa bsam mi khyab// sras kyi dam pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// hUM thabs dang shes rab bde ba chen po'i
dbyings// yab la chags shing gnyis su med pa'i yum// don dam ngang la rigs kyi yum du bstan// zad pa med pa gter gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// hUM gdug pa 'dul phyir yab kyi thugs las
sprul// dregs pa'i 'khor rnams ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis sprul pa cir yang ston// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// yab la dgyes shing gnyis su med pa'i
yum// dregs pa yum du gyur pa 'dul mdzad pa// re skong bdud 'dul dngos grub stsal du gsol// hUM yab yum gnyis med sras kyi dam pa byung// gdug pa sprul pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul mdzad pa// yab yum
rgyun du 'dzin cing las rnams grub// thogs med sgrol ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// las kyi bya ba thams cad kun// de bzhin ma nor rim pa bzhin// gnas skabs nyid du yang dag sbyar// kun kyang don la
rgyas par bstan// rnam gnyis don la rnam par gtad// yang dag 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bstan pa'i las nyid kun kyang 'grub// dpal gyi dngos grub chen po ni// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas

su// maN+Dal mda' gang byas nas su// thig dang bri ba de bzhin bya// phyi nang gsang gsum las kyi mchog/ thod pa dmar nag dbang drag la// snying po gdan dang bcas pa bri// snying dang bcas pa'i rdzas dag
la// bskyed dang spyan drang bstim mchod bstod// dbus su dgod cing gsal bar bsam// mar me gsol byang rgyan rnams dgod// mchod pa'i rgyan yang de bzhin te// ting 'dzin chen po'i byin
brlab kyis// rim par bsgom zhing gzhal yas khang// gru gsum zla gam mu khyud la// thod pa skom rlon btang bar bsgom// shar sgor bum bzhugs sgo ba'i tshul// gtso bo'i zhal ni yum la gzigs// spyan
'dren bstim dang mchod pa dang// bsnyen pa bstod dang mchod pa dbul// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba dang// thod pa blang zhing mar me gso// bar ma chad par de bzhin bya// lha la bstod cing thugs dam
bskul// dngos grub chen po'i las rnams ni// gnad la dbab cing mchod pa dbul// lha la bslang zhing lan gsum bstims// rdzas la blang ba de bzhin te// rim pa bzhin du rab shes bya// tha ma las kyi

mtha' rnams rgyas// yi ge 'khor lo'i sa non nas// 'gro ba'i don rnams de bzhin bya// rnam gnyis sku yi 'dul thabs bstan// hUM chos sku bde ba chen po'i ngang nyid las// kun tu bzang po'i rol ba cir yang

snang// bdud dang srin po ma lus 'dul ba'i lha// rngam pa chen pos srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha// bdud rgyal dregs pa 'dul zhing dbang du sdud// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra 'byin stong gsum sgrol// ya mtshan rmad du

che ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// dbu gsum rnam thar gsum gyi dbu// dbus ni mthing gar bstan pa ni// chos kyi sku la 'gyur ba med pa dang// zhe sdang rtsad
nas gcod pa dang// chos sku 'gyur ba med pa'i zhal la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas ni dkar bar bstan pa ni// chos kyi sku la nyes pa med pa dang// nyon mongs gnas su dag pa'i phyir// nyes pa med pa'i
zhal la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yon ni dmar bar bstan pa ni// thugs rje thabs kyis chags pa dang// 'dod chags rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// thugs rje chags pa'i zhal la phyag 'tshal bstod// spyan mig
dgu ru bstan pa ni// 'khor ba'i sa dgu 'joms pa dang// theg pa dgu dang ldan pa'i phyir// 'khor ba 'joms pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// mche ba bcu gnyis bstan pa ni// skye mched bcu gnyis rtsad
nas gcod pa dang// sha za gdug pa'i mche ba dmar ba'i phyir// skye mched rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshems la phyag 'tshal bstod// shangs ni gsum du bstan pa ni// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa dang// dug gsum
rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir// sku gsum lhun grub shangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhal ni gsum du bstan pa ni// dug gsum zhal du gsol ba dang// stong gsum sgra yis gang ba'i phyir// dug gsum gsol ba'i
zhal la phyag 'tshal bstod// ri spu gyen du 'khyil bar bstan pa ni/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas nas drang ba dang// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la dgod pa'i phyir/ khams gsum 'dren
pa'i ri spu nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil bar bstan pa ni// gdug pa can rnams dbang du bsdu ba dang// srid pa'i rtse mo zil gyis gnon pa dang// gdug pa 'joms pa'i dbu la

phyag 'tshal bstod// phyag drug ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams pa ni// sa dgu lhun gyis grub pa dang// theg pa dgu dang ldan pa'i phyir// sa dgu gnon pa'i phyag la phyag

'tshal bstod// bar pa rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams pa ni// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa dang// rigs lnga 'gro ba'i don bya'i phyir// ye shes lnga ldan phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yon gyi dang po me dpung bsnams pa ni// ye shes me
ru 'bar ba dang// 'khor ba nyon mongs bsreg pa'i phyir// ye shes 'bar ba'i phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yon gyi bar ma kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams par bstan pa ni// dug gsum rtsad nas bcad pa
dang// rigs gsum mgon po rnams dang gnyis su med pa'i phyir// dug gsum rtsad gcod phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas g.yon tha ma rdo rje ri rab phur bu 'dril bar bstan pa ni// thabs dang shes rab
gnyis su med pa ste/ khams gsums gdug pa ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod// dur khrod chas brgyad sku la gsol ba ni// rnam shes tshogs brgyad rtsad nas gcod

pa'i rtags// glang chen ko rlon sku la gsol bar bstan pa ni// gti mug rtsad nas bcad nas kyang// thugs rje thabs dang ldan pa'i phyir// gti mug 'joms pa'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhing chen g.yang
gzhi sku la gsol bar bstan pa ni// 'dod chags rtsad nas gcod pa dang// thugs rje chags par ldan pa'i phyir// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// stag gi sham thabs sku la brgyan pa

ni// zhe sdang rtsad nas gcod pa dang// thugs rje thabs dang ldan pa'i phyir// zhe sdang rtsad gcod rgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// thod pa rlon pas sku la brgyan pa ni// chos kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa dang// skye ba

med pa'i don ni grub pa'i phyir// chos sku gnyis med rgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// thod pa skam pos sku la brgyan par bstan pa ni// longs spyod sku dang gnyis su med pa dang// thams cad kun tu longs sku

bsam mi khyab// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// thod pa tshal bus sku la brgyan par bstan pa ni// sprul pa'i sku dang gnyis su med pa dang// sprul sku 'gro ba'i don du cir yang snang// sprul
sku gnyis med rgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhag gi zo ris sku la brgyan pa ni// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang gnyis su med pa dang// mar me mdzad dang bstan pa gcig pa'i phyir// 'das

pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod// thal chen tshom bus sku la brgyan pa ni// da ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang gnyis su med pa dang// bcom ldan 'das dang skal pa gcig pa'i phyir// da ltar sangs

rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod// rak+ta'i thig les sku la brgyan par bstan pa ni// ma byon sangs rgyas rnams dang gnyis su med pa dang// rgyal ba byams pa'i bstan pa gcig pa'i phyir// ma byon sangs rgyas

rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i gshog pa sku la brgyan pa ni// ma mo mkha' 'gro zil gyis gnon pa dang// thams cad kun tu dbang du sdud pa'i phyir// rdo rje gshog pa'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// sbrul
chen rigs bzhis sku la brgyan par bstan pa ni// gdug pa klu rnams rtsad nas gcod pa dang// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i rgyan ni rigs bzhir bstan pa'i phyir// gdug pa chen po'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal
bstod// zhabs bzhi mngon par bstan pa ni// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi rang bzhin te// g.yas gnyis bskum par bstan pa ni// pho gnyis 'gram pa brdzis pa dang// thabs ni shes rab rang bzhin te// pho gnyis

brdzis pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yon gnyis brkyang bar bstan pa ni// mo gnyis nu phrag brdzes pa ni// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te// mo gnyis brdzis pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo
rje ba spu khro bos gtams par bstan pa ni// 'jigs pa med par dbang du sdud pa dang// thams cad kun tu sprul pas khyab pa dang// 'jigs med khro bo 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// sgeg pa dpa' ba

'jigs su rung ba dang// rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang// rngam brjid chen po rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhe sdang tshul yis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad

pa// rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// yab kyi thugs dam gnyen po bskong ba'i yum// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs dgyes pa skong ba'i yum// rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso mo chen mo ste// dgyes pa skong ba'i yum
la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// g.yas pa dgyes pas yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// rdo rje rigs kyi yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku mdog mthing bar
bstan pa ni// 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin te// thams cad chos sku gcig pa dang// don rnams thams cad thugs su chud pa'i phyir// 'gyur ba med pa'i dbu la phyag 'tshal bstod// spyan mig gnyis su bstan
pa ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa dang// 'khor 'das gnyis su gzigs pa'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab spyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhal ni gcig tu bstan pa ni// yab la dgyes

par bzhad pa dang// dug lnga zhal du gsol ba'i phyir// yab la dgyes pa'i zhal la phyag 'tshal bstod// mche ba bzhi ru bstan pa ni// skye ba rnam bzhi rtsad nas gcod pa dang// gdug pa'i tshems 'dra rngam pa'i

sha za'i phyir// skye shi rtsad gcod tshems la phyag 'tshal bstod// shangs ni gcig tu bstan pa dang// dri yi mchod pas mnyes pa'i phyir// chos nyid gcig pa'i shangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas pa yab la

'khyud pa ni// shes rab thabs la chags pa dang// dgyes pa chen po bskang ba'i phyir// shes rab thabs la chags pa'i phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yon na b+han+da rak+ta bsnams pa ni// yum gyi chags pa sel ba

dang// 'dod chags rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir// chags pa sel ba'i phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod// dur khrod chas brgyad sku la gsol ba ni// sdug bsngal brgyad po rtsad nas bcad nas kyang// rnam pa thams cad
chos nyid dbyings su sgrol// sdug bsngal 'joms pa'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhabs gnyis mngon par bstan pa ni// rkang gnyis kun la brtse bar dgongs pa dang// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam

dgyes skong phyir// rkang gnyis brtse dgongs zhabs la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM khro bo chen po hUM kA

ra// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na mda' gzhu bsnams// tshabs pa 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// steng gi za byed rdo rje sgra 'byin ma// zhal gcig
phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud pa'i phyag/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis tshangs mo'i gdan la bzhugs// tshabs rigs 'bul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// phag gi mgo can yab kyi sprul pa ste// tshangs pa po yi 'khor
na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang du phyag na phur pa bsnams// gdug rtsub klu bdud khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// smig bu'i mgo can yum gyi sprul pa ste// tshangs pa mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul

ba'i dbang gis phyag na mda' gzhu bsnams// so rno grims bzhed khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis tri shUl

'khor lo bsnams// brgya byin 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// shar gyi za byed rdo rje rnam snyems ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud pa'i phyag/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis brgya byin mo yi
gdan la bzhugs// brgya byin 'dul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// stag gi mgo can yab kyi sprul pa ste// brgya byin pho yi 'khor gyi gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na phur pa
bsnams// gdug pa 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// bya rgod mgo can yum gyi sprul pa ste// brgya byin mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// zhi ba chen po

khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM shar lho'i khro bo dbyug sngon po// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis dbyug to me dpung bsnams// drang srong 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal
bstod// shar lho za byed chen mo rdo rje sder mo la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud pa'i phyag/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis drang srong mo yi gdan la bzhugs// drang srong 'dul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal

bstod// g.yag gi mgo can yab kyi sprul pa ste// drang srong pho yi 'khor gyi gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na phur pa bsnams// rdzi rnon brjed med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bya rog mgo can

yum gyi sprul pa ste// drang srong mo yi 'khor gyis gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// tshe gsum dran byed khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM lho yi khro bo gshin rje'i gshed// dbu

gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis mi mgo dgra s+t+wa bsnams// gshin rje 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// lho yi za byed dur khrod ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud
pa'i phyag/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje mo yi gdan la bzhugs// gshin rje 'dul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// sha ba'i mgo can yab kyi sprul pa ste// gshin rje pho yi 'khor gyi gdug pa
'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na phur pa bsnams// smyos par byed pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'ug pa'i mgo can yum gyi sprul pa ste// gshin rje mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang
gis phyag na phur pa bsnams// rtogs pa skyed byed khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM lho nub khro bo mi g.yo mgon// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis ral gri zhags pa
bsnams// srin po 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// lho nub za byed rdo rje gtun khung ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud pa'i phyag/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis srin mo'i gdan la
bzhugs// srin mo 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzig gi mgo can yab kyi pho nya ste// srin po'i 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// gdul ba'i dbang gis phyag na phur pa bsnams// dran rtog bang mgyogs
khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// khwa ta'i mgo can sum gyi pho nya ste// srin mo'i 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// 'dzin cing bsam pas slob pa khyod la
phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM nub kyi khro bo rta mgrin dpal// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis zhags pa spu gri bsnams// klu bdud 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal
bstod// nub kyi za byed rdo rje gtum mo ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud pa'i phyag/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis klu bdud mo yi gdan la bzhugs// klu bdud 'dul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// byi
la'i mgo can yab kyi sprul pa ste// klu bdud pho yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyag na phur pa bsnams// gdug pa so rnon ci la thogs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// pu shud mgo can

yum gyi sprul pa ste// klu bdud mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// 'jigs byed glog gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM nub byang khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub

pa// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis rdul g.yab ba dan bsnams// rlung lha 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nub byang za byed rdo rje mda' snyems ma// zhal

gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud pa'i phyag/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis rlung lha mo yi gdan la bzhugs// rlung lha 'dul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// spyang ki'i mgo can yab kyi pho nya ste// rlung lha pho yi 'khor na
gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na phur pa bsnams// gsod par byed pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ khra yi mgo na yum gyi pho nya ste// rlung lha mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang

gis phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// gsod par byed pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM byang gi khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na rgya gram
bsnams// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// byang gi za byed yum chen rlung 'byin ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gnod sbyin mo yi gdan la
bzhugs// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// seng ge'i mgo can yab kyi sprul pa ste// gnod sbyin pho yi 'khor gyi gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na phur pa bsnams// stobs
chen 'gro mgyogs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// pha wang mgo can yum gyi sprul pa ste// gnod sbyin mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// 'phrul chen thabs mkhas
khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM byang shar khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na rdo rje mda' gzhu bsnams// dbang ldan

'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// byang shar za byed rdo rje gsod byed ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud pa'i phyag/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis dbang ldan mo yi gdan la bzhugs// dbang ldan
'dul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// dred kyi mgo can yab kyi sprul pa ste// dbang ldan 'dul ba'i 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na phur pa bsnams// 'jigs med shugs chen zhe
sdang khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// sre mo'i mgo can yum gyi sprul pa ste// dbang ldan mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// bde mgyogs sha grims 'gugs byed

khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM 'og gi khro bo stobs po che// dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje'i gshog pa can// 'dul ba'i dbang gis tho ba gtun shing bsnams// sa bdag 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal
bstod// 'og gi za byed rdo rje bskyod ma ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud// 'dul ba'i dbang gis sa bdag mo yi gdan la bzhugs// sa bdag 'dul ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// dom gyi mgo
can yab kyi sprul pa ste// sa bdag pho yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dus pa'i dbang gis phyag na phur pa bsnams// dmigs dang khraus pa brjed med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// byi ba'i mgo can yum gyi

sprul pa ste// sa bdag mo yi 'khor na gdug pa 'dul// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyag na lcags kyu bsnams// 'bigs byed sgrol bar byed pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud
las/ rdzas la brten te sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dur khrod kyi bdag po bdud rtsi chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnas ni dur khrod gzhal yas su// bar
snang dmar dang gnag pa dang// ri yang dmar nag rdo rje'i dbyibs// me tog shing dang lo 'dab rgyas// sman rnams 'khrungs dang sa bzang dang// gong du bstan pa'i nges pa med// rtsa ba lo mar bcas pa

skam// yum yang yid du 'ong ba btsal// rigs btsun ngang bzang shongs yangs che// lcang lo'i skra la sked pa phra// smra ba snyan la rna ba gsang// smin mtshams bar ma chad pa dang// so thags dam la shangs kyang
mdzes// stod smad snyoms la nu ma 'bur// nyes pa'i skyon rnams med par bya// nyid las mi gzhan mchod pa stobs// nyams pa thogs med spyod nus dang// bar chad sel zhing nyes pa med// mdzes pa'i don la
yang dag goms// shes bzhin yid 'ong stobs ldan dang// mthun pa'i gtso 'khor mdzes par 'gyur// dam tshig gtsang ma dam pa bsrungs// smra nyung don chen dngos grub snod// 'dzin pas ma
bcings lta ba rtogs// bsam gtan don dang mi 'bral ba'i// snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa yis// 'dam zhing nyes pa bsal bar bya// ston pa chen po'i byin rlabs las// thugs rje nam mkha'i cho 'phrul

gyis// thams cad bdud rtsi sa la bab// 'byung ba chen po'i byin rlabs las// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin te// phyi nang rtsa ba brgyad po dang// gsang ba nyid du de bzhin sbyar// byang chub sems dang mAM sa

dang// dri chen rak+ta dri chu rnams// sder chags sha dang rmig zlum sha/ kha brag sha dang 'dab chags sha/ rkang leb sha yang de bzhin bshams// lan tshwa brag zhun lag pa dang// cong zhi rab tu rnam pa lnga// de bzhin

rim las yang dag sbyar// maN+Dal gru bzhi 'dom gang la// dam rdzas lnga yis chag chag gdab// oM hUM bo d+hi tsit+ta maN+Dal hUM// oM ku ku maN+Da la hUM/ oM ma hA mAM sa maN+Da la hUM/ oM rak+ta maN+Da la hUM/ oM g+han d+ha maN+Da la hUM/

lug dang spyang ki'i sog pa la// gtso bo nyid du yang dag bshad// spyan dang bstim la mchod bstod bya// sog pa'i rgyab tu sgo srung bri// hUM rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes
khro bo grub par mdzod// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// gtogs shing grogs dang bral bar gyis// sgo yi g.yas su gdags par bya/ khyi dang phag gi sog pa
la// dam sri bris la las rnams bya// sgo yi g.yon du gdags par bya// 'phags pa mchod dang 'byung po la// dbul zhing dregs pa kun kyang mchod// rdo rje phur pa'i dam sri mnan// gsum pa tshogs bsag

sgrib sbyang bya// de nas thig ni gdab par bya// sa thig gnam thig de bzhin sbyar// tshon yang de bzhin shes par bya// bri ba'i rim pa 'di lta ste// gru gsum zla gam mu khyud dang// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rtsibs
brgyad dang// gru chad bzhi dang lha rnams dang// sgo dang rta babs bcas pa dang// bum pa 'khor lo gdugs dang bcas// gru gsum dmar dang gnag dang bcas// gnag dang yang ni thod pa dkar// rigs
dang dmar ba gnag pa dkar// ser dang ljang dang gru chad dmar// ser las rigs dang mthun par bri// rtsigs pa gzhi mar thod pa dkar// gzhi ser lhu dum dmar ba dang// ljang la rgyu zhags dkar ba

dang// rin chen lnga yang rnam par gtang// rin chen phreng ba dkar po gtang// lcags ri nag po me ri dmar// 'khor lo dang ni lha gnas su// gru gsum steng du yig 'bru bkod// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha
la// sul med sul 'greng mang ba dang// zla gam rgya gram mtshan dang lnga// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang// rin chen pad+ma las kyi rigs// de bzhin mtshan ldan thod pa la// rnam pa gsum gyi

dris bdug la// byang chub sems dang dri chen dang// sha chen pad+ma rak+ta dang// dri chu lnga ste rim pa bzhin// sder chags sha dang rmig zlum kha brag dang// 'dab chags rkang leb rnam pa lnga// tshwa dang brag bcud lag

pa dang/ rab tu cong zi rim pa star bu lnga// phyi nang gsang gsum dam rdzas lnga// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// phyi nang gsang gsum rtsa ba brgyad// ma nor rim par dgod par bya// mig dang rdo rje'i chu ba

dang// sna dang gre ba yang dag ldan// lce dang pad+ma chen po dang// rna ba dang ni tsit+ta rnams// de bzhin nang gi rtsa bar bshad// lug mig thal kar rdo rje dang// sri zhing 'dab ma dbang po lag/ kha 'bar ma dang rgun

'bru dang// zho sha ka sho kA d+ha rnams// phyi yi rim par dgod par bya// yang na 'di ltar bshad par bya// cong zi dang ni lan tshwa dang// ra mo shag dang ram nye ba// brag zhun brag rgya ha'o gnyis// bu ram dang ni

dom mkhris gnyis// gsang ba'i rim par de bzhin dgod// yang na gsang ba chen po ni// yab yum bzhi bzhi rnam pa brgyad// yang dag nyid du de shes bya// gzhi yi rnam lnga ma 'khrul na// ji ltar bye yang nges

par med/ kha dog ro dang dbyibs rnams dang// rigs dang sbyar te de bzhin dbye// lnga la lnga yis dbab bya zhing// lnga yis de bzhin gdags par bya// khro bo drag po'i tsham rngams bya// mtshams gyis nyes pa

bsal ba dang// las kyi lha yi ting 'dzin gyis// dbus kyi thod pa stong par 'gyur// 'jigs pa'i stong pa chen po yin// hUM dang rdo rje'i 'phro 'du las// sngags kyi gtso bo nyid du gnas// gnas pa chen po bde

ba che// spyan dang bstim dang sngags kyi las// bstod cing thod pa de bzhin blang// hUM dbus kyi b+han+d+ha sul med bya// byang chub sems la sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcad pa rnams// badzra kI la ya ru byin

brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// dbus su brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM

hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM shar gyi b+han+d+ha sul 'greng du// dri chen mchog la sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// bud+d+ha kI la ya ru byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud

rtsi'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// shar du brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol// hUM bud+d+ha kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/

sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM lho yi b+han+d+ha sul mang du// mAM sa mchog la sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// rat+na kI la ya ru byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba

rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// lho ru brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol// swA badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM paT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hU~M nub gyi

b+han d+ha zla gam du// rak+ta mchog la sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// pad+ma kI la ya ru byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// nub

tu brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol// A+oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM byang gi b+han d+ha rgya gram du// dri chu mchog la

sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// karma kI la ya ru byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// byang du brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang

byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol/ hA karma kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Du li hU~M tha/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ bdud rtsi lnga dang rtsa ba brgyad// yan lag stong dang rab

bsnyams pa'i// 'o ma dang ni chu rnams dang// me tog rin chen mngar rnams dang// 'jig rten 'di ru grags pa rnams// 'khor gyi khro bor byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya

mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// phyogs mtshams brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM gardza gardza hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/
hUM thugs rje chen po'i ngang nyid las// thugs mchog rab tu gsal ba'i phyir// ma rig mun pa 'joms pa'i 'od// 'khor ba'i bag chags bsal ba'i phyir// dbus su brtan par bzhugs su gsol// dz+nyA nA dI

pa sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir rtsol cig/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sa ma

ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM dngos grub bar gcod byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung// nga la bar chad byed
rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par gyis// las rnams thams cad bsrung ba yi// las sngags thams cad kun bsdus nas// bar du gcod pa'i 'byung po la// gsang ba yang dag mtshams su bshad// phrin
las ma lus mthar byung ba// nus pa yod par bya ba'i phyir// sngon du dbang bskur yang dag bshad// bdud rtsi lnga yi thod pa la// byin brlab 'byung zhing bstim pa dang// bsgo dang brda phyag dam sri
mnan// 'khor 'das gzhug cing sgo bcad nas// stangs stabs rtags kyi rim pa yis// lha dang don gyis gnyis su med// thod pa'i lha rnams gsal ba la// spyan drangs nam mkhar rab tu bzhugs// sngags

kyi bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab// tha mar rang nyid thim par gyur// bdud rtsi mu tig dri ma med// thams cad de yi rang bzhin no// las kyi bya ba kun byas nas// bdag gzhan gnyis su rnam par gyur// 'phro 'du nyi
ma'i zer lta bu// nam mkha' gnas pa'i sbyor ba las// byang sems mu tig rnam par thim// de yang mu tig dri med 'dra// yang nas yang du 'gyur bas na// de nyid bdud rtsi chen po yin// dbus nas gzung te

shar dag tu// rim pa lnga ni rang byung lnga// phyogs mtshams ra sA ya na la// de bzhin phyogs mtshams nyid du sbyar// lnga nas bzung zhing yab yum spel// rgyan bstar me long g.yab mo bya// rdo rje rigs kyi yab

yum yang// snying po 'di brjod bdud rtsir 'gyur// hUM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha// de bzhin gshegs pa yab yum yang// rgyan bstar g.yab cing lha la bstod// dam can

bskul zhing dri yis mchod// snying po 'di brjod bdud rtsir 'gyur// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ rin chen rigs kyi yab yum yang// rgyan bstar g.yab cing lha la

bstod// rin chen rigs kyi srung ma bskul// snying po 'di bzlas bdud rtsir 'gyur// swA badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i kuN+Da li hUM tha/ pad+ma rigs kyi yab yum yang// rgyan bstar g.yab cing lha

la bstod// pad+ma rigs kyi srung ma bskul// snying po 'di brjod bdud rtsir 'gyur// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M tha/ las kyi rigs kyi yab yum yang// rgyan bstar g.yab cing

lha la bstod// las kyi rigs kyi srung ma bskul// snying po 'di brjod bdud rtsir 'gyur// hA badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M tha/ phyogs mtshams thod pa'i sman rnams la// rim pa

bzhin du yang dag bzlas// lha la bstod cing srung ma bskul// mchod pa 'bul zhing bar gcod bsal// lnga'am bdun du de nyid sbyar// dkar ba sngo dang dmar ba dang// ljang dang mthing ba rnam par byung// sha

rtsi dkar la sngo bsangs mdog/ dmar la cha phra ljang la ldem// mthing ga skra bzang rdo rje'i dbyibs// mngar dang kha ba'i dri dag dang// skyur ba tsha ba yang dag 'byung// ngad pa'i dri rnams de bzhin no// yang ba
gsal ba sbyor la dga'// brtul zhugs che zhing shes rab gsal// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag dang// rin chen pad+ma las kyi rigs// rdo rje'i rigs dang yang dag don// de nyid dus na lnga

ru snang// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang// rgya gram rdo rje yang dag 'byung// de bzhin rin chen pad+ma dang// las dang rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis// khro bo lnga yi dngos grub blang// che ba'i lus dang nag po'i
'od// log pa'i sgra dang gnyis pa'i las// grangs med sprul pa 'gyed pa dang// yi dam lha la mkha' 'gro'i gzugs// dngos grub ster dang snyan pa'i glu// 'bar ba'i me rnams log pa'i lam/ nam mkha'i 'od

dang gsal ba'i me// nyi ma'i mdangs dang 'ja' tshon gzugs// byis pa'i sems dang log pa'i rtags// phur pa nyung dkar tho ba dang// dgra s+t+wa ral gri phyag na bsnams// gu gul rnga dang kha T+wAM dang// zhing
lpags phyag rgyas yang dag dgab// re dogs med pa'i sems nyid kyis// nyam nga med pa'i sems dang bcas// dpa' brtul spyod pa dus dang sbyar// bden pa'i don dang ma ldan na// bag med spyad pas skyon du
'gyur// yang dag nges pa'i gdeng chud na// bsam pa 'grub cing chud mi gson// sa gzhi don la yang dag sbyor// bsod nams me yi mchod pa 'bul// nyes pa med pa'i rtags la dbab// dngos grub las su
shes pa yin// nyi ma shar ba'i dus dag tu// go mtshon stangs stabs bar gcod bsal// zhing chen pad+ma'i gdan steng nas// a las zla ba'i gtan pa la// ma las nyi ma'i tho ba yis// brdungs bas thab dang

shes rab kyis// nyes pa brdung ba'i byin rlabs kyis// sman nyid byang sems dri ma med// thams cad bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang// rnam par rgyal ba nyid kyang rung// sngags nyid gang bsgoms de bzhin sbyar// oM

badza kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ nyon mongs ma lus brdung bar bsam// hUM khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdung byas na// lha yang rung ste brdung bar
bya// yab dang yum du bcas pa dang// rgyan dang cha lugs rab tu bstan// byin rlabs brdas bskul byas nas ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med par// dri med mu tig 'od bzhin 'tsher// dar tshag yab yum

gnyis kyis gzung// rta mgrin dbyug pa sngon po gnyis// gang yin nyid du sngags dang sbyar// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ gardza ha na da ha pa tsa b+han+d+ha gr-i h+Na tiSh+Tha

tshin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha s+pho Ta hUM tha// skam dang rlon pa'i nyes pa med// dar ram za 'og snod du blug/ phur pa bcug la rgya yang gdab// sras mchog rgya yang de bzhin gdab// gdags shing kha sbyar nang du
gzhug/ tshod la bab pa shes par bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// gru chad de bzhin bstan par bya// 'phags mchod cing las rnams bya// sbyin sreg gtang zhing bar chad
bsal// yab yum bar du bcug byas nas// gu gul du bas de bzhin bdug/ dbus nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// bcom ldan badzra kI la ya// snang srid bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas// rtsa ba brgyad dang yan
lag stong// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i sman// pho brang chen po'i dbus su skyil// rigs rnams bsdus nas dbus su gzhug/ dbu mang phyag mang gdug pa 'dul// dbus su brtan par bzhugs su

gsol// sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ las kyi bya ba kun kyang bya// til chen me mar rgyun mi gcad// ye shes lnga yi me btang la// rigs gcig bsgrub pa bar mi gcad// mchod pa dus su dbul bya zhing// sbyor ba chen po

de dus bya// rgyu mchog mtshan dang ldan pa bsgral// mchod pa dus su me mchod bya// dam tshig zol zog med par bya// lha la bstod cing srung ma bskul// me dang du ba brlangs pa dang// dri dang lha mo mngon du

ston// mang du 'phel ba rdzas kyi mchog/ bsgral dang chas pa'i dngos grub dang// lung bstan rdo rje rigs kyi bsgrub// de la ya mtshan yongs mi bya// re bas bar chod dogs pa 'byung// nyams su lon na nyam nga
med// nyam nga med na dngos grub myur// dngos grub chen po re dogs bcas// bdud dang cha brtags rab tu gces// bdud kyi spyod pa cir yang ston// yid dam lha dang mkha' 'gro dang// rig 'dzin nam

mkha' lung ston 'byung// nges pa med pa'i don rtogs na// dngos grub chen po 'byung ba yin// hUM rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur bu'i lha// ye shes khro bo

grub par mdzod// thabs kyis spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir stsol cig/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ aM ku sha

dza/ gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha hUM tha hUM hUM/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ rak+ta khA

hi/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ aM ku sha dza/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ khro chen nyi shu rtsa gcig dang// sngags dang dbyangs las 'byung ba ste// rim pas blangs pa kun la sbyar// lha dang rdzas kyi rim pa gnyis// lha la gsum ste

ma lus thim// rdzas la brten pa'i bro dang sngags// brgyad dang rgyun gdon par bya// tshe bstim bkra shis las rnams bya// kun tu bzang po'i rol pa las// thams cad bcud ldan rdo rje nyid// 'gro ba'i rig
'dzin 'thob par 'gyur// sa rnams rim par bgrod pa'o// hUM rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor du// mar me lnga brgyad dag la mdangs phyung nas// rdo rje phur pa dag la dam bcas nas// rdo rje gzhon
nu'i thugs kyi byin rlabs las// ye shes me yi 'od chen rab tu 'bar// rtag tu snang ba'i go 'byed mar me bltams// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang// ngan song 'khor ba'i gnas nas thar bar shog/ hUM phyogs

kyi sras mchog bzhi yi thugs kyi byin rlabs las// ye shes me yi 'od chen rab tu 'bar// rtag tu snang ba'i go 'byed mar me bltams// skye ba rnam bzhi'i gnas las thar bar shog/ hUM khro bo bcu yi thugs rje'i
byin rlabs las// ye shes me yi 'od chen rab tu gsal// rtag tu snang ba'i go 'byed mar me bltams// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang// mi dge bcu yi gnas nas thar bar shog/ hUM khro mo bcu yi thugs kyi
byin rlabs las// ye shes me yi 'od chen rab tu gsal// rtag tu snang ba'i go 'byed mar me bltams// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang// 'khor ba'i g.yang sa rnams nas thar bar shog/ hUM phra thabs nyi
shu'i thugs kyi byin rlabs las// ye shes me 'od rab tu gsal ba dang// rtag tu snang ba'i go 'byed mar me bltams// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang// ngan song 'khor ba'i gnas nas 'dren par shog/ hUM sras
mchog drug gi thugs kyi byin rlabs las// ye shes me yi 'od chen rab tu gsal ba dang// rtag tu snang ba'i go 'byed mar me bltams// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang// 'gro ba rigs drug gnas nas thar bar
shog/ hU~M dam can rnam gsum thugs kyi byin rlabs las// ye shes me yi 'od chen rab tu gsal ba dang// rtag tu snang ba'i go 'byed mar me bltams// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang// ngan song rgyud gsum
gnas nas thar bar shog/ hU~M rig 'dzin rgyal po thugs kyi byin rlabs las// ye shes me yi 'od chen rab tu 'bar// rtag tu snang ba'i go 'byed mar me bltams// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang// rig 'dzin
rnam bzhi'i gnas nas 'dren par shog/ hUM 'khor ba'i mun pa bsal ba dang// don dam chos dbyings mthong ba dang// chu bo bzhi las brgal ba dang// bla med gnas su 'dren pa'i phyir// mar me gsal ba'i

'od dbyung ngo// hUM rin chen gser gyi sa gzhi la// sa yi lha mo brtan ma ni// btso ma gser gyi kha dog 'dra// bdud rtsi'i bum pa phyag na bsnams// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi mthar byung nas// 'dod yon lha mor
byin brlabs pa'i// dam rdzas mang po'i gtor ma 'di// sa yi lha mo'i mkha' dbyings su// skyon med rdzas kyi gter sbas pas// gser gyi sa gzhi'i yon tan dang// sa yi lha mo'i byin rlabs
dang// sgrub mchog bdag gi byin rlabs kyis// zad med gter la longs spyod cing// 'dod yon mang po'i dbang thob nas// rin chen lnga la dbang bsgyur shog/ hUM rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi mchog
gi sku// rngam pa chen po'i rigs gcig bsgrub pa'i lha// dbu ni bcu gsum gang la gang 'dul bstan// g.yas dang g.yon du med par thams cad mthing// chos sku 'gyur ba med pa khyed la phyag 'tshal

bstod// spyan ni sum cu so dgu byung ba ni// thams cad kun tu khyab pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal bstod// mche ba lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bsnol ba ni/ khams gsum gdug pa thams cad sgrol bar byed// skye shi'i rtsa ba
gcod pa'i tshems la phyag 'tshal bstod// shangs ni rnam pa bcu gsum byung ba ni// dri rnams mchod pas mnyes byed cing// bde bar gshegs pa'i shangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ral pa gyen du 'khyil bar
bstan pa ni// 'khor ba gnas su 'dren byed cing// byams pa'i mgon mdzad khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas g.yon dang po hUM mdzad yab yum bsnams pa ni// tshangs pa dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen

'bebs// nyi ma zla ba 'dul ba khyod la bstod// de yi 'og mas rnam rgyal yab yum bsnams// dri za dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// brgya byin 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de yi
'og mas dbyug sngon yab yum bsnams// drang srong dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// me lha 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// de yi 'og mas gshin rje yab yum bsnams// ma mo dbang sdud
bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// gshin rje 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de yi 'og mas mi g.yo mgon po yab yum bsnams// bden gral dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// srin po
'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de yi 'og mas rta mgrin yab yum bsnams// bdud rnams dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// klu rnams 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal

bstod// de yi 'og mas gzhan gyis mi thub yab yum bsnams// nor srung dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// rlung lha 'dus pa'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de yi 'og mas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa
yab yum bsnams// 'chi bdag dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de yi 'og mas khams gsum rnam rgyal yab yum bsnams// bgegs
rigs dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// dbang ldan 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de yi 'og mas stobs chen yab yum bsnams// klu rnams dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen
'bebs// sa bdag 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas g.yon tha mas sras mchog drug bsnams shing// 'gro drug dbang sdud bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs// 'jig rten

'dul ba'i lha chen drug la phyag 'tshal bstod// thod pa tshar gsum sku gsum lhun grub rtags// zhag gi zo ris don dam bcud kyi rtags// rak+ta'i thig le thugs rje chags pa'i rtags// thal chen tshom bu thams
cad mkhyen pa'i rtags// glang chen ko shun thugs rje stobs kyi rtags// zhing chen g.yang gzhi 'dod chags rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// stag gi sham bu dpal rtul zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// sbrul chen
rigs bzhi klu yi rigs rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// rdo rje'i gshog pa 'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams dregs pa gnon pa'i rtags// 'jig rten dpa' stong thams

cad 'dul ba'i lha// rdo rje phur pa bdud rtsi 'bebs mdzad lha// bdud rtsi chen po'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// thams cad 'dul ba'i lha chen khyod la bstod// bdud rtsi'i char chen 'bebs la phyag 'tshal

bstod// bdud rtsi chen po 'di dag kyang// skyon yon rab tu che bas na// bsrung ba'i rim pa tshul bzhin bya// mtshan ma sha mdangs phyed par gyis// chos nyid blta ba chen po yis// ngan pa thams cad bzang por
'gyur// de phyir rtogs pa rab tu gces// ma rtogs 'khrul pa rtogs pa bsgom// rang rgyud bral ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// bar chad gtan nas 'joms par byed// stong pa chen po'i ting 'dzin la// bsod nams

stong pa'i rang bzhin yin// de nyid yang dag don shes na// 'bras bu bdud rtsi 'khyil par byed// 'dzin pas bcings pa'i sems nyid ni// nyam nga 'khu 'phrig rab tu che// rtags kyi bye brag ma phyed par// dngos
grub yal bar gtong ba dang// bdud kyi las las grub par byed// rtsi med bdud kyi las su 'gyur// de bzhin cha rtags rab tu gces// sngon gyi bdud kyi rgyal po yang// gab sbas sha mdangs ma phyed

par// khams gsum sdug bsngal chen por gyur// thar pa'i dus med thugs rjes bsgral// sbyor dang sgrol ba ma rtogs te// rang dgar bzung ba'i sbyor sgrol gyis// rnam pa gnyis su smin par 'gyur// rdo rje phur
pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzas thams cad khro bos bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dur khrod chen po bstan pa

bzhin// maN+Dal bri ba de bzhin te// mang nyung grangs su bshad pa tsam// mtshan ldan lnga ru bshams pa'i rdzas// bstan pa de bzhin mang nyung med// bskyed dang spyan drang bstim pa dang// mchod dang bstod pa rab
ldan bya// hUM dbus kyi b+han d+ha sul med du// byang chub sems la sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// badzra kI la ya ru byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi sman sbyar

nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// dbus su brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ sa ma ya

tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM shar gyi b+han+d+ha sul 'greng du// dri chen mchog la sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams/ khro bo rnam par rgyal dang byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya

mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// shar du brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol// oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza la hUM ha na ha na hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM lho yi b+han d+ha

sul mar du// mAM sa mchog la sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// khro bo gshin rje'i gshed du byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// lho

ru brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol// oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ sa ma ya tiSh+tha lhan/ hUM nub kyi bun d+ha zla gam du// rak+ta mchog la

sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa rnams// khro bo rta mgrin dpal du byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// nub tu brtan par bzhugs nas

kyang// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol// oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hUM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM byang gi b+han d+ha rgya gram du// dri chu mchog la sman sbyar nas// rtsa ba

yan lag bcas pa rnams// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil par byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang// byang du brtan par bzhugs nas kyang// rang byung bdud

rtsi'i dngos grub stsol/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM tha/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ hUM rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ bdud rtsi lnga dang rtsa ba brgyad// yan lag stong dang
rab bsnyams pa'i// me tog rin chen lnga rnams dang// 'jig rten 'di ru grags pa rnams// mtshams bzhi steng 'og byin brlabs nas// rang byung bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar nas// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam

bskang// mtshams bzhi steng 'og brtan par bzhugs// rang byung bdud rtsi'i dngos grub stsol// hUM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM gardza gardza hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ las rnams ma lus thams
cad kun// rim pa gang du bshad pas na// khro bo las kyi bdud rtsi rnams// mi bsre rang rang bsten par bya// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ khro bo bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das sman rigs gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ mtshan ldan dur khrod gnas dag tu// srung ba'i las rnams kun byas nas// maN+Dal mda' gang gru bzhi

la// las kyi bya ba byas nas kyang// thig dang tshon yang de bzhin bya// bri ba'i las nyid yang dag bshad// gru gsum zla gam sgo dag bcas// zlum po brtsig pa de bzhin bya// shar du sgo yang de bzhin te// rim

pas bskor ba'i me ri bya// gdan dang snying po de bzhin brtag/ sgo la yum gyi snying po bkod// phyi nang gsang ba'i lnga gsum dang// rtsa ba brgyad kyang de bzhin du// thams cad bdud rtsi bsgrub bya'i phyir// mtshan

ldan thod pa dri yis bdug/ sman rnams nang du blug byas la// srung ba'i las nyid yang dag bshad// las kyi ting 'dzin chen po yis// stong pa hUM dang rdo rje dang// brgyad po nyid du yang dag 'gyur// bzhengs
dang spyan drangs bstims pa dang// 'phro 'du bstod pa yang dag pa// bstan nas dbus su gzhug byas te// mar me thod pa rgyan rnams dgram// phur pa rgyal por dbang bskur bya// de bzhin dkyil 'khor

dbus su gzhug/ mchod pa'i rdzas dang bskrad pa'i rdzas// gso ba'i rdzas kyang rim pa bzhin// ting 'dzin chen po'i rim pa bzhin// rgyal por bsgom zhing 'phro 'du bya// 'phro 'du bdud rtsi chen por 'gyur// de
bzhin las su rung bar bya// som nyi med pa'i rtags byung na// brdungs te las rnams de nyid yin// phab rnams btab la legs par spel// snod du stsal cing bsrung bar bya// du bas bdug cing rgyal pos
bsrung// dkyil 'khor gang du bstan pa'o// bzhugs su gsol ba kun kyang bya// til chen me mar gsal ba btang// rgyan dang cha lugs rab tu bstan// snying po grangs med brjod las 'das// lha la mchod

cing srung ma bskul// mchod pa 'bul zhing sbyor bar bya// du ba rlangs pa me 'od dang// snyan pa'i sgra dang zhim pa'i dri// bar ma chad par byung gyur na// dngos grub las la shis pa yin// ngan na dus drug nyul le

bzlog/ rta ba'i tshad dang ldan par bya// 'on tang dngos grub yin par nges// dngos grub rdzas rnams bstar byas la// bsrung zhing bskrad de las rnams bya// ye shes lha yi dngos grub dang// mtshan ma rdzas kyi
dngos grub dang// dbang bskur rim pa de bzhin bya// las kyi bya ba kun kyang rdzogs// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ sman rigs gcig pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas
bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi so sor sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rgyu gcig pa dang rkyen gnyis pa// byang chub sems dang sder chags sha/ lan tshwa nyid du rkyen du 'gyur// 'byung

ba stong pa'i rang bzhin las// bdud rtsi'i lha nyid rnam par gsal// ye shes rdo rje chen po yis// thams cad 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te// 'bru gsum sngags dang lha rnams dang// bdud rtsi'i sngags kyis rnam par
spar// ma grub bar du sngags rnams bzlas// thod pa 'gul dang du ba dang// me dang 'od rnams rnam par 'byung// me long ye shes dngos grub thob// 'bras bu rdo rje'i rigs su 'gyur// sul 'greng thod pa

mtshan ldan la// rgyu gcig pa dang rkyen gnyis pa// rgyu ni byang chub dri chen la// rmig zlum sha dang brag zhun dang// rim pa bya ba de bzhin du// de bzhin nyid kyi lha nyid gsal// chos nyid ye shes chen po
yis// thams cad 'dus pa dri ma med// sngags gsum de bzhin yang dag sbyar// sgrub pa chen po las kyi mchog/ zhim pa'i ngad dang sna tshogs dri// stong pa chen po'i dngos grub thob// 'bras bu de bzhin

gshegs par 'gyur// sul mang thod pa mtshan ldan la// rgyu gcig pa dang rkyen gnyis pa// mAM sa chen po yang dag 'byung/ kha brag sha dang dbang po lag/ bsgom pa'i lha yang de bzhin te// gsal la rtog pa med
