snyil ba'i dbang mo che// tsit+ta don snying za ba'i rkan sgra can// dbang sdud mkha' 'gro'i dbang mchog thob par shog/ hUM khams gsum nad kyi bdag mo dbang sgyur ma// 'jig rten khams kun khyab pa'i bya ma

rta// mi phyugs kun la mnga' mdzad dbang mo che// gdug pa ma mo'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM dus gsum kun tu rgyal ba'i sku brnyes pa// bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du phrin las mdzad// ser nag chen mo

khams gsum kun gyi bdag/ mkha' 'gro dbang sdud dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM las su sha khrag ro la rngam pa'i yum/ khrag 'thung dmar nag srid gsum dbang du sdud// stong khams dge sdig bya ra byed pa'i
yum// dad pa stobs ldan mkha' 'gro'i dbang thob shog/ hUM phrin las sna tshogs mthar phyin grub pa mo// rgya mtsho'i gting gi klu rnams 'khrug byed ma// ljang nag chen mo'i phrin las mthar phyin
ma// mkha' 'gro mthu yi dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM bdud kyi rigs rnams dbang du sdud mdzad ma// mthing nag bdud kyi chas su rab tu zhugs/ khams gsum bdud dpung 'joms pa'i dbang mo
che// gdug pa bdud 'dul dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM 'jig rten gnod byed rab tu 'dul mdzad ma// ser bas rgyas pa'i rang bzhin mtshon mdzad ma// ki kang las kyis bskal par 'dul mdzad
ma// mkha' 'gro mthu byin dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM khams gsum gang 'dul dbang gi bdag mo ste// rak+sha srin po za byed dbang du sdud// dpal gyi bka' nyan khrag gi dri snom ma//

dbang phyug chen mo'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM gdug pa klu rnams rab tu 'dul mdzad ma// nad ngan phrin las dbang gi bdag mo ste// klu la mnga' mdzad nad kyi bdag mo yang// las rnams mthar phyin dbang rnams thob

par shog/ hUM 'jig rten dregs pa 'dul ba'i las mdzad ma// grangs dang ldan pa ma nor rim par ldan// rnam bzhi rtogs pa'i khyad par ston mdzad pa// yang dag don dang ldan pa'i dbang thob shog/ hUM thugs

mchog rang byung ye shes 'od dang ldan// 'khor ba'i mun pa ma lus sel mdzad pa// rgyal ba'i thugs la nyon mongs nyes pa med// snang ba mar me'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM gdug pa chen po thabs kyis
'dul mdzad pa// mthing nag drag pos thams cad 'joms pa'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug zur gsum dbal dang ldan// sgrub pa drag po'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM nyung dkar rgyal pos thams cad sgrol

ba'i dbang// khro bo'i rgyal po 'bum phrag bsam las 'das// stong gsum khro bos dus gcig khengs mdzad pa// nyung dkar rgyal po sgrol ba'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM gu gul sbyar ba'i rdzas kyi dam pa

ste// ye shes lnga brnyes nyes byed rten dang 'bral// rab tu bsgrubs pas 'od dang du bar ldan// drag po rdzas kyi dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas lhun gyis grub// rang bzhin ye

shes lha rnams bzhugs pa'i rten// mthing nag gru gsum pho brang dbus gsal ba'i// pho brang chen po'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM 'khor ba nyon mongs ma lus sreg pa ste// me yi rgyal po drang srong rab tu
'bar// thams cad sreg par byed pa me yi dbang// nyon mongs rang rgyud sreg pa'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pa'i rtags// drag po hom la rab tu mchod par
byed// sreg byed drang srong mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'bul// mchod 'bul dgang blug dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM zhe sdang chen po rab tu gnon mdzad pa// rdo rje rgya gram phrin las mthar phyin

pa// gang la bya ba'i las nyid gdon mi za// gnon byed rgya gram dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM gzas pa bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa la// rten dang phral ba'i phra mar rab tu bsngags// rang gi rdzas la dbye

ba'i dbang dang ldan// zhing bcu dbye ba'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM phye nas rab tu bsgral ba'i don mdzad pa// nga rgyal rang khar 'dzin pa sgrol mdzad pa// zhe sdang rang rgyud ngan song gnas su ltung// stong pa

chen por sgrol ba'i dbang thob shog/ hUM gti mug sha yi mchod pa ri rab tsam// 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho kyi li li// zhe sdang rus pa'i mchod pa khra la la// dug gsum zhal du gsol ba'i dbang thob shog/ hUM

khams gsum dbang du sdud mdzad sgrol byed sku// nyon mongs thang gcig yud la sgrol mdzad pa// rdo rje phur pa zhing bcu sgrol ba'i lha/ khams gsum dbyings su sgrol ba'i dbang thob shog/ rdo rje phur pa rab tu kI

la ya// zhing bcu sgrol mdzad badzra kI la ya// rU tra gnas su sgrol mdzad badzra kI la ya// nyon mongs dbyings su sgrol ba'i dbang thob shog/ hUM 'khor ba rang rgyud ngan song dbyings su 'khyams// 'dzin pa sgrol

phyir mtshon gyi rgyal po dang// mkha' 'gro gdug byed phyag chas dbyings su sgrol// 'joms byed mtshon gyi dbang mchog thob par shog/ hUM drag po mtshon gyi rgyal po gtor ma la// ngar 'dzin rab tu brtas pas
gcod par byed// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zangs dang lcags// gcod byed ral gri'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM nyon mongs dug lnga drug gis 'thibs par byed// rul cing myags pas 'khor ba
gting nas skems// gnyen po'i dbang du thabs las de ltar snang// nyon mongs zhen pa sgrol ba'i dbang thob shog/ hUM khyad par chen po 'bar bas zhen pa gcod// sna lngas mtshon las nad lngas 'khor ba

nyen// de nyid rgyal bas byin rlabs rab tu gsungs// zhen pa gcod pa'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM gtun khung gru gsum yum gyi mkha' dbyings su// rig pa ye shes yab kyi rdo rje 'di// thabs dang shes

rab gnyis su med pa'i rtags// rdo rje tho ba'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM khams gsum gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// 'brel pa'i lha mchog badzra kI la ya// gang yin stong byed mthu 'phrog badzra kI la
ya// gdug byed stobs dang bral ba'i dbang thob shog/ hUM khams gsum nyon mongs gnas su drang ba'i phyir// rab tu 'gugs byed badzra kI la ya// nyon mongs zhing bcu gnas su 'dren mdzad pa// nyon mongs
gdug pa'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM nyon mongs rang gar mi gtang bcing ba'i phyir// rab tu 'ching byed badzra kI la ya// zhing bcu 'ching byed badzra kI la ya// nyon mongs 'ching ba'i dbang

rnams thob par shog/ hUM gdug pa can rnams rab tu 'dul ba'i phyir// smyo byed chen po badzra kI la ya// nyon mongs 'joms phyir badzra kI la ya// smyo byed chen po'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM gdug pa thabs

kyis sgrol ba 'jigs pa'i sku// nyon mongs sgrol byed badzra kI la ya// zhen pa'i dngos po rab tu gcod byed pa'i// sgrol ba chen po'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ hUM gdos pa'i dngos po brlag par bya ba'i

phyir// stob byed chen mo badzra kI la ya// gdangs pa'i zhal du nyon mongs stob byed pa// stob byed chen po'i dbang rnams thob par shog/ dngos grub dam pa lha yi lha// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas dam pa

'dir// dur khrod rdzas la brten te bsgrubs lags na// snang srid byams pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes lha ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// dngos grub stsal dang stsol bar mi dmigs kyang// gdug pa
chen po thabs kyis 'dul ba'i phyir// drag pos 'dren pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// hUM chos nyid kun tu bzang mo'i byin rlabs las// dregs pa 'dul ba'i thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'byung// bdud kyi rgyal
pos rU tra 'dul ba ltar// bdud rgyal dregs pa 'dul ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// hUM bdud dpung choms nas chos nyid don mthong bas// bdud rgyal rU tras chos nyid don rtogs nas// thugs rje'i byin

rlabs bdud la snang ba ltar// nyon mongs dbyings su bsgral ba'i dngos grub stsol// hUM 'khor gyis gdug pa ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// steng phyogs khro rgyal yab yum 'khor dang bcas// tshangs pa 'khor bcas
rab tu btul ba ltar// 'jig rten dregs pa btul ba'i dngos grub stsol// hUM rol pa chen po steng gi sras mchog yang// zhing bcu stobs dang rab tu 'bral mdzad pa// bdud rgyal rU tra grogs dang bral ba
bzhin// zhing bcu stobs dang 'bral ba'i dngos grub stsol// sprul pas stong khams rab tu bkang nas kyang// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gang la ci 'dul ston// rgyal bas stong gsum sprul pas bkang ba
ltar// sprul pa khams gsum 'gengs pa'i dngos grub stsol// hUM dpal gyi bka' nyan las la brtson pa mo// 'jig rten dregs pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// 'jig rten dbang du sdud pa'i las byas ltar// dam

las mi 'da' bka' nyan dngos grub stsol// hUM 'jig rten khams la dbang sgyur mthu mo che// las ngan zhing bcu ma lus sgrol mdzad pa// bcol cing rbad na las su pho nya mdzad pa ltar// gang du mngags pa'i
las rnams 'grub pa'i dngos grub stsol// hUM dregs pa sde bzhi rab tu 'dul mdzad pa// nad kyi bdag po bka' nyan gsung sdod ma// bran dang pho nya las rnams 'grub byed ltar// gang la bya ba'i

las rnams myur 'grub dngos grub stsol// hUM rol pa chen po'i byin rlabs cir yang snang// 'dul thabs drag po bdud kyi chas 'dra yang// snying rje byang chub sems las nyams pa med// drag po byams pa'i dngos
grub stsal du gsol// hUM thugs rje byams pas 'gro la snying brtse'i phyir// la lar zhi dang la lar khro bar snang// 'dul thabs drag pos 'gro ba 'dul lags na// nyon mongs gnas su 'dren pa'i dngos grub

stsol// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba'i dngos grub stsol// don dam chos nyid rtogs pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas sa la 'gro ba'i dngos grub stsol// 'khor ba ngan song sbyong ba'i dngos grub stsol/ rdo rje phur
pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ dbang dam pa bskur ba dang bkra shis dngos grub kyi le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das drag po me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ kun bzang
rol pa cir yang snang// la lar bcom ldan bstan pa'i bdag/ la lar 'jigs byed he ru ka/ la lar sbyong byed khrus kyi chu// la lar gnon byed ri rab gzugs// la lar gsod byed shan pa 'dra// la lar
dge sbyong dam pa'i mgon// la lar sha za srin po'i gzugs// la lar 'jigs pa bdud kyi chas// la lar sreg byed me yi 'od// me yi rgyal po khro bos kyang// stong gsum nyon mongs sreg par byed// 'khor

ba'i zhen pa gting nas skem// zhing bcu log lta sreg par byed// de phyir rab tu bsreg par bya// me lha chen po sreg pa'i sar// gru gsum sum rim grangs su bya// nag dang ser la dmar ba'i 'od// rang rang

yig 'bru bkod kyang rung// drag po'i shing la legs par bya// rab tu rdzas kyi dam pa ni// dam pa gsum gyi rdzas dag dang// chan dang me tog sngon po dang// nag po'i 'bru dang nyung nag dang// drag po'i shing

dang ming byang dang// rab tu de la bskor la bzhag/ dug dang drag po'i rdzas rnams ni// ma lus de la bskor te gzhag/ drag po'i lha dang mnyam pa'i rtsang// dmar po byas te de la bskor// rim pas 'byung ba de

bzhin du// hom thab nang du lha rnams bskyed// spyan drang rim pa yang dag bya// bzlas brjod me dang 'dra ba yis// nyon mongs rtsa mchog 'dra ba bsreg/ bstod pa bya zhing rab tu mchod// ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad

par la// drod rnams 'byung bar gdon mi za// gang yin me nyid rab tu sbyar// me yi lha nyid de bzhin sbyar// hUM me lha drang srong nyon mongs sreg/ 'bar ba me lha spyan 'dren na// 'bar ba me yi dbyings na
bzhugs// drang srong chen po me yi lha// mchod 'bul mnyes pa 'di bzhes la// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshig par mdzod// hUM gru gsum me yi dkyil 'khor nas// drang srong chen po me yi

lha// chibs su ra skyes kham bu chibs// sku la me yi slag pa gsol// g+hun d+he bgrang phreng phyag na bsnams// rdo rje phur pa'i zhabs dang ldan// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku mnyes pa// gdug byed drag po me yi

lha// gdug pa'i tshogs kun sreg par byed// gang yin zhing bcu tshig par mdzod// rnam gsum mchod pa lha la 'bul// mnyes pas lha yi dngos grub ster// lha yang drag po me yi chas// rab tu 'bar ba'i nang na

bzhugs// hUM phyogs skyong rgyal po me yi lha// steng phyogs 'bar ba me yi lha// phyag g.yas mda' gzhu rang 'gengs bsnams// g.yon pa me yi phung po 'bar// dkar ba'i zhal ni gting nas mthing// bus shig bus shig me
bus shig/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas me long la// ri rab rtse nas me bus shig/ nyams pa gang yin sreg par mdzod// 'byung po gang yin tshig par mdzod// hUM phyogs skyong rgyal po me yi lha// shar phyogs
'bar ba me yi lha// phyag g.yas 'khor lo dkar po bsnams// g.yon pa me yi phung po bsnams// sku mdog dkar po shin tu gsal// bus shig bus shig me bus shig/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas me long la// ri

rab rtse nas me bus shig/ nyams pa gang yin sreg par mdzod// hUM phyogs skyong rgyal po me yi lha// shar lho 'bar ba me yi lha// phyag g.yas dgra s+t+wa rab tu 'debs// g.yon pa me yi phung po bsnams// dmar
sngon sku mdog rab tu gsal// bus shig bus shig me bus shig/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas me long la// ri rab rtse nas me bus shig/ nyams pa gang yin sreg par mdzod// 'byung po gang yin tshig par

mdzod// hUM phyogs skyong rgyal po me yi lha// lho phyogs 'bar ba me yi lha// phyag g.yas dgra s+t+wa rab tu 'debs// g.yon pa me yi phung po bsnams// sku mdog sngon po shin tu gsal// bus shig bus shig me bus

shig/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas me long la// ri rab rtse nas me bus shig/ nyams pa gang yin sreg par mdzod// 'byung po gang yin tshig par mdzod// hUM lho nub phyogs skyong me yi lha// lho nub 'bar ba me yi
lha// phyag g.yas ral gri rab tu 'debs// g.yon pas me yi phung po bsnams// ljang sngon rab tu gsal ba'i sku// bus shig bus shig me bus shig/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas me long la// ri rab rtse nas me bus

shig/ nyams pa gang yin sreg par byed// 'byung po gang yin tshig par mdzod// hUM nub kyi phyogs skyong me yi lha// nub phyogs 'bar ba me yi lha// g.yas pa spu gris rab tu gcod// g.yon pa me yi phung po
bsnams// sku mdog dmar po rab tu gsal// bus shig bus shig me bus shig/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas me bus shig/ ri rab rtse nas me bus shig/ nyams pa gang yin sreg par byed// 'byung po
gang yin tshig par mdzod// hUM nub byang phyogs skyong me yi lha// nub byang 'bar ba me yi lha// phyag g.yas rdul g.yab ba dan bsnams// g.yon pa me yi phung po bsnams// dmar skya sku mdog shin tu

gsal// bus shig bus shig me bus shig/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas me long la// ri rab rtse la me bus shig/ nyams pa gang yin sreg par byed// 'byung po gang yin tshig par mdzod// hUM phyogs skyong rgyal po me yi

lha// byang phyogs 'bar ba me yi lha// phyag g.yas rgya gram rab tu 'dzin// g.yon pas me yi phung po bsnams// ljang nag shin tu gsal ba'i sku// bus shig bus shig me bus shig/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas me long

la// ri rab rtse nas me bus shig/ nyams pa gang yin sreg par byed// 'byung po gang yin tshig par mdzod// hUM phyogs skyong rgyal po me yi lha// byang shar 'bar ba me yi lha// g.yas pas kha T+wAM rtse gsum
bsnams// g.yon pas me yi phung po bsnams// ljang ser shin tu gsal ba'i sku// bus shig bus shig me bus shig/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas me long la// ri rab rtse nas me bus shig/ nyams pa gang yin sreg

par mdzod// 'byung po gang yin tshig par mdzod// hUM phyogs skyong rgyal po me yi lha// 'og phyogs 'bar ba me yi lha// phyag g.yas tho ba gtun shing bsnams// g.yon pa me yi phung po bsnams// dud kha shin tu

gsal ba'i sku// bus shig bus shig me bus shig/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas me long la/ ri rab rtse nas me bus shig/ nyams pa gang yin sreg par byed// 'byung po gang yin tshig par mdzod// steng nas dngul gyi
sbud pa can// shar nas shel gyi sbud pa can// shar lhor mchong gi sbud pa can// lho nas rin chen sbud pa can// lho nub g.yu yi sbud pa can// nub nas byi ru'i sbud pa can// nub byang zangs kyi sbud pa

can// byang nas mthing gi sbud pa can// byang shar gser gyi sbud pa can// 'og nas sna tshogs sbud pa can// tshangs pa 'khor tshogs me bus shig/ brgya byin 'khor tshogs me bus shig/ drang srong 'khor tshogs me
bus shig/ gshin rje'i 'khor tshogs me bus shig/ srin po'i 'khor tshogs me bus shig/ klu bdud 'khor tshogs me bus shig/ rlung lha'i 'khor tshogs me bus shig/ gnod sbyin 'khor tshogs me bus
shig/ dbang ldan 'khor tshogs me bus shig/ sa bdag 'khor tshogs me bus shig/ hUM/ mthing nag 'bar ba'i 'khor tshogs nas// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu yang/ khro rngam rab tu gdug pa'i bro// thugs rje
chen po bro la gshegs// dgra ni thal ba rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rngam pa chen po bro la gshegs// hUM mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// tshangs pa
'dul ba gdug pa'i lha// hUM mdzad yab yum bro la gshegs// khro bo mthing ga sprin ltar gtibs/ khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba'i bro// dgra ni thal bar rlag pa'i

bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// ngan song 'khor ba 'joms pa'i bro// bla med byang chub thob pa'i bro// phung po rdul du bshigs pa'i bro// rnam shes dbyings su 'dren pa'i bro// ta kr-ita chen po bro la
gshegs// hUM gdug pa phag dang smig bu'i mgo/ tshangs pa pho mo 'khor bcas 'dul// la la lding zhing la la 'dral// gshog pa can gyis mtha' nas sdud// mche ba can gyis gsod par byed// tsham rngams
drag pos bdud dpung 'joms// dpal rtul drag pos tshangs rigs 'dul// 'jigs pa'i khro bdag sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba'i bro// hUM khro
bos gdug pa grogs dang bral// thugs las sprul cing las rnams byed// sras mchog mthing ga sprin ltar gtibs/ khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba'i bro// hUM mkha' 'gro

ma chen gdug pa'i bro// ma mo'i rta bro si li li// sngon dmar byad thag rgyangs se rgyang// sha khrag dmar po mkha' 'gro'i zas// sha la rol cig mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/ khrag la 'thung zhig mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// rus
la 'cho zhig mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// mkha' 'gro rngam byed ro la rngam// g.yas su bltas nas g.yon du 'khyud// rngam pa'i tshems gtsigs mdun du blta// nyams pa gang yin spyan gyis gzigs// so brdar mche

gtsigs ha sgra can// stong gsum ro za khrag 'thung yang// ma 'grangs ma ngoms so brdar khrig/ mkha' 'gro ma chen sprin ltar gtibs// pho nya phyag brnyan skar ltar 'khrugs// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba'i

bro// hUM snying gi dkyil du bro brdung bas// ye shes lnga po mnyes par byed// dran pa gnas su dag pa'i bro// mig gi steng du bro brdung bas// gzugs kyi lha mo mnyes pa'i bro// rna ba'i steng du bro brdung pas// sgra yi

lha mo mnyes pa'i bro// sna yi steng du bro brdung pas// dri yi lha mo mnyes pa'i bro// lce yi steng du bro brdung pas// ro yi lha mo mnyes pa'i bro// lus kyi steng du bro brdung bas// reg bya'i lha mo mnyes pa'i bro// snying gi

dkyil du bro brdung bas// chos kyi lha mo mnyes pa'i bro// mdzes byed lha mo sprin ltar gtibs// phyi nang lha mo skar ltar 'khrugs// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba'i bro// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/
drag po me'i las dang bro'i rim pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ mthing nag gru gsum rim pa la// drug par byung ba

ngan pa'i thod pa ru// rtsibs drug rang sngags zor du bcas// snying dang khrag sna mang du blugs// rim pa grangs kyi bshams nas su// drag po sngags kyi rim pa yis// gang yin dngos po sgrol bar nus// bsnyen

sgrub bzhi po mtha' ru phyin// me nyes gzu dang dpang du gzug/ bsnyen pa'i lha yan da rung bsnyen// bden pa'i byin rlabs de bzhin bya// hUM mthing nag gru gsum dkyil 'khor nas// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu
yang// g.yas na khrag zor mda' zor 'phen// g.yon pa nyung zor rbab ltar 'dril// khrag zor dmar po mtsho ltar rlobs// mda' zor drag po skar ltar 'khrugs// drag po nyung zor rbab ltar 'dril// mtshe zor
rnon po mdung ltar 'debs// drag po'i phur zor snying la 'debs// do nub zor gyi las mdzod cig/ hUM yum gcig 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma// g.yas pa khrag zor mda' ltar 'phen// g.yon nas nyung zor rbab

ltar drag/ b+h+yo// steng phyogs tshangs pa 'dul ba'i lha/ khro bo chen po hUM kA ra// tshangs pa 'dul ba'i mthu bo che// g.yas pa khrag zor mda' ltar 'phen// g.yon pa nyung zor rbab ltar drag/ b+h+yo// yum chen rdo rje sgra
'byin ma// steng phyogs mo rigs 'dul ba'i mthu mo che// g.yas pa khrag zor mtsho ltar rlobs// g.yon pa nyung zor rbab ltar 'bril// steng phyogs gdug pa phag gi mgo/ g.yas pa drag po phur zor
bsnams// g.yon pa khrag zor mtsho ltar rlobs// steng phyogs 'gugs byed smig bu'i mgo/ g.yas pa 'dzin byed lcags kyu bsnams// g.yon pa khrag zor mtsho ltar rlobs// hUM steng phyogs 'bral byed sras

mchog ni// stod ni zhal gsum phyag drug la// sku smad lcags phur dbal dang ldan// g.yas pa 'bral byed gri gug bsnams// g.yon pa khrag zor mtsho ltar rlobs// khrag mda' khrag phur chi li li// khrag mda'

bu yug char ltar phob// dgra bo'i khong du dug mda' g.yos// b+h+yo/ shwa na las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu ma// las su sha za khrag 'thung ma// g.yas su phur zor mda' ltar 'phen// g.yon

du khrag zor mtsho ltar rlobs// nyid kyi dam tshig khrag mda' 'di// da ni 'phen pa'i dus la bab// khrag mda' khrag phur chi li li// khrag mda' bu yug char ltar phob// dgra bo'i khong du dug mda' rgyob// las

kyi mkha' 'gro rnam gsum yang// khrag zor dmar po'i sna drongs la/ khrag zor me ltar mched nas kyang// dam nyams dgra bo 'tshig par byed// khrag zor chu ltar brub nas kyang// dam nyams dgra bo khyer bar
byed/ khrag zor gnyen po'i sna drongs shig/ zor 'phang slar la ma log cig/ gnyen byas dgra ru ma sdang zhig/ zas sbyar dug tu ma g.yo zhig/ dam nyams gang yin yul mkhar sgyel// mi nad me

ltar mched nas kyang// gang yin nyams pa 'phung bar byed// dmag sna drong shig drag po zor gyi lha// b+h+yo b+h+yo/ drag po zor gyi thun phob cig/ rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ drag po zor gyi le'u ste so
drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu dbye ba dang bsgral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dbye ba'i sa phyogs gang yin par// rim pa gsum gyi gru gsum la// dpangs su khru gang pa

gcig brtsig/ gu gul chu yis legs par byug/ rnam gnyis las su bstan pa'i phyir// lho ru sgo re yang dag bsham// dme ba'i rdzas lnga de bzhin bya// tshon skud gnyis kyis rtsa ba bsdam// zhing gi rgyus pa'i thag

pas gdags// yi ge gnyis kyi bar dag tu// dbye ba'i lha nyid gzhug par bya// dbye ba'i snying po rgyab tu bri// rnam gsum rdzas kyis mchod pa'i phyir// de nyid gsum yang rab tu gdams// ting 'dzin rim pas
bsgom bya ste// dpal du bskyed dang las mkhan bsgom// spyan drang bstim dang mchod pa dang// dbye ba'i sngags nyid mang du bzlas// bstod cing bskul te mchod pa 'bul// dbye ba'i rtags nyid byung ba

dang// thun rnams brab cing rab tu rbad// sgro gnyis las kyi rlung la phyar// las kyi lung gis khyer bar 'gyur// hUM nye 'byed las kyi phra ma mkhan// rlung lha'i bu la srin po'i tsha// pha ni rlung lha kha skyes raM pa

yin// ma ni srin mo kha 'bar ma// gnyis med bu gcig byung ba ni// nye 'byed chen mo phra ma mkhan// sku mdog dud kha chen mo la// 'jigs pa'i khro gnyer mang pos brgyan// g.yas kyi dang po bya rog gong ru
bsnams// nyams pa spyan gyis gzigs par byed// g.yon gyi dang po 'ug pa'i gong du bsnams// mi 'chor rtog pa rab tu gsal// g.yas 'og lcags kyu s+t+wa re bsnams// nyams pa mgo lus 'bral ba'i

rtags// g.yon gyi 'og ma rlung gi rkyal pa bsnams// nyams pa rlung la skur ba'i rtags// khyod kyi phrag pa g.yas pa na// lcags kyi bya khra g.yu mig can// snang srid mi mthong gcig kyang med// dam nyams phrag

pa g.yas kyi pho lha phrol/ khyod kyi phrag pa g.yon pa na// zangs kyi bya khra gser mig can// srid pa gsum yang dus gcig gzigs// phrag pa g.yon gyi mo lha phrol/ khyod kyi spyi bo'i gtsug rum na// shel gyi bya khyung

g.yu mig can// dge sdig gnyis kyi las kyang gzigs// 'go bar byed pa'i lha dang phrol/ khyod kyi rgyab kyi sog pa la// stag dang spyang ki rngam zhing rgyug/ nyams pa zas su za bar byed// nyams pa'i rgyab kyi dgra

lha phrol/ khyod kyi mdun gyi lhe sna la// seng ge dkar mo 'gying zhing 'phyo// snang srid dbang du sdud par byed// dam nyams mdun gyi srog lha phrol/ khyod ni stong gsum phra ma mkhan// rlung lha'i bu la

srin bu'i tsha// mchu ni lcags kyi gzong bas rno// dam nyams mi dang lha yi bar du dbyen chug cig/ khyod kyis mi byed gang yang med// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed kyang// 'byed par khyod kyis nus par byed// tshe
gsum dran byed pho rog ma// khyod kyis mi dran ci yang med// bstan pa gnyen la gnod pa yi// dam nyams bsgral ba'i zhing bcu 'di// 'go bar byed pa'i lha dang phrol// stongs par byed pa'i gnyen dang

phrol// hu lu mun mthong 'ug pa mo// khyod kyis mi mthong gang yang med// bstan pa gnyen la gnod byed pa'i// dam nyams bsgral ba'i zhing bcu 'di// khyod kyis bsgral ba'i phrin las mdzod// ces so so'i sgro

gnyis las kyi rlung la phyar ro// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ zhing bcu lha dang dbye ba'i le'u ste so bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas su// steng du sol me rab tu btang// thal chen sol bas nang byugs la// zhabs ma dmar po'i gdan bting la// ling+ga bya

ba'i rgyud nyid la// ling+ga rab tu bzos byas la// ske nas sngo dmar rab tu gdags// drag po rtsang la bstod par bya// nag po skra yis skye gnas btags// phur pa nyid la bstod par bya// rtsa gnyis kyi ni khrag

gis byugs// thod pa mtshan dang ldan pa ru// dmar po gnyis kyi snying khrag la// de bzhin bsre ba'i rdzas rnams dang// de bzhin zur la rab tu gzhag/ bse phor mtshan ldan nang dag tu// chang dang rin chen sna
lnga dang// 'bru la sogs te zur du gzhag/ tsa ra khrag gis byugs pa yi// phur pa'i rtse mo gnam du bstan// rab tu zur la dgod par bya// de la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni// snying sna khrag sna mang du
bsags// lha nyid gsal la gnas rnams bsrung// de nyid las su rung ba dang// dregs pa can gyi sngags la 'jug/ gong du bstan pa de bzhin du// nur ba med pa rab tu bzlas// ci bgyi bka' nyan bran

ltar khol// the tshom som nyi ma yin par// dregs pa'i srog snying mang du bzlas// hUM bstan pa gnyen po bsrung bar zhal bzhes pa'i// rdo rje phur pa'i srung ma dam tshig can// khas blangs dam bcas srog gi snying
po phul// bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du don mdzad pa'i// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// dregs pa'i mnga' mdzad gnod sbyin me ru tse/ khrag mdog dmar po bse yi ral pa can// spyan mig
nyi ma'i 'od zer skar ltar 'khrugs// smin ma glog 'gyu bar snang go skabs 'byed// shangs nas bu yug rdo rje thog chen 'bebs// zhal bgrad tshems ni spu gri 'bum gyis gtams// rngam pa'i
ljags 'dril bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// ag tshom dmar ser dug gsum rtsad nas bsreg/ snyan nas 'brug stong sgra skad ldi ri ri// sen mo lcags kyu'i rtse ltar 'dzin zhing 'gugs// ba spu'i nang nas gnam
lcags zhun chu 'brub// spyan mig dmar pos snang srid gsal bar mdzad// lcags kyus snang srid dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// smin ma 'dzings pas me stag rab tu 'phro// yak+sha gnod sbyin 'jigs pas rab tu
rngam// chu ltar 'brub cing me ltar sreg par byed// zhabs kyis gang du bsams par yud kyis phyin// na bza' dmar po sprin gyi g.yang gzhi gsol// nyams pa'i snying 'byin chad par bcug nas gsol// rdo rje

phur pa'i las rnams khyed kyis sgrubs// bcol pa'i las rnams ma lus 'grub par mdzod// hUM gnod sbyin me ru tse yi thugs dam dgyes skul ma// yum gcig rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// khros pa'i sku mdog

khrag gi thigs pa 'dra// mi bzad rdo rje lcags kyi phur pas gtams// rdo rje'i ral pa si li li/ khrag gi mchi ma phru lu lu// snying rje mi mnga' dam nyams sgrol bar byed// phyag na rdo rje phur pa 'dril zhing
'debs// dus la bab bo gar kyi dbang phyug ma// gru bzhi srin mo sbrul 'dra ma// yab yum rtags dang gdug pa can// bya ba ma yin rab tu gzem// rta dang byis pa mug pa'am// tsag tsog mang po byung ba

dang// khug pas rab tu gdab bya ste// phur pa blangs shing rab tu 'dril// drod dang tshangs pa'i mgo la gdab// sa ti yam shud rkang pa la// shu la khu le lag pa la// da sha grI ba gsang ba la// rtsa gnyis yab
yum sngags kyis gdab// yab snying yum lte rnam pa gnyis// rab tu gdab pa de bzhin bya// gyad kyi sku mdog bzhir bsgom la// phur pa gdab cing las rnams bya// gtor ma lag tu thogs byas la// srod la
zla ba'i 'od la bskul// tho rangs skar chen shar nas bskul// dgong mo grib so chags la bskul// nang par nyi ma'i rtse la bskul// rang bzhin rtags ni byung ba dang// gang yin phyogs su gtor ma
'phangs// de yi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin dregs pa can sgrub pa'i le'u ste so brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan bstan pa'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bstan pa thams cad 'phel ba dang// chos nyid zhi bas 'dul ba dang// ma rig rig par 'gyur pa dang// ston pa rang las byung ba dang// 'bras bu gzhan la med rtogs
na// rgyud gnyis yongs su rtogs las byung// zhi ba chen por rtogs pa dang// ma rig mun pa bsal ba dang// rig pa'i ye shes gsal ba dang// rtogs pas 'bras bur gyur pa dang// dri med
'od ldan gsal ba dag/ rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// kun bzang don nyid ston pa dang// de nyid gzhi ru gyur pa dang// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang// de yis thams cad chos ston dang// rgyud
'di yongs su rtogs las byung// chos nyid phur pa kun gyi gzhi// bstan pa dar dang 'dul ba'i don// gang du bstan par 'byung bar byed// rang bzhin 'dul ba'i don bstan pa// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs

las byung// ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid 'di// chos nyid rig pa kun gyi gzhi// rdo rje yang dag skye ba med// spros med don rnams rtogs byed pa// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// thugs rje nam mkha'i
byin rlabs las// 'dul ba'i don la cir yang ston// gdug pa 'dul ba'i khro bo 'byung// thams cad ma lus 'dul ba yang// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// kun tu bzang po'i ngang nyid las// gdug
pa 'dul ba'i khro bo yang// hUM hUM phaT phaT sgra sgrogs pa// yongs su 'dul ba bstan pa yang// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// bde bar gshegs pa'i byin rlabs las// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba'i

lha// rngam pa'i sgra yis kun bkang nas// nyon mongs sreg par byed pa'i me// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yang// 'gro ba 'dul ba don gyi phyir// byang chub sems kyi
bde ba yang// bde gshegs dgongs pa'i byin rlabs te// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// 'dod chags sbyong zhing byang chub thob// chags pa rang rgyud sdug bsngal sel// zhen pa rang rgyud grol bar
byed// 'dzin pa med cing zhen pa gcod// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// mkha' la bya ltar 'phur pa dang// chu la mi 'bying mes mi tshig/ thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang// mngon shes rab tu mi slu
dang// bden pa don dang ldan pa 'di// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// log pa'i chos can 'dul ba dang// dngos grub bar chad byed pa dang// bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa dang// ngan song sdug
bsngal mkha' 'gror bcas// thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'byung bar ni// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i don slad du// zhi dang khro dang 'dul ba'i don// 'dul ba'i dbang du de las
byung// drang don nges don rnam pa gnyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i don du 'byung// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// rang rgyud dngos por 'joms pa dang// stong pa'i don la dgod pa dang// bden pa'i
dbyings las 'dul ba dang// mi 'khor don la 'god pa dang// zhing bcu'i don rnams mthong ba dang// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// nyi ma'i 'od bzhin gsal ba dang// gsal la 'gyur
med brtan pa dang// nyes pa med par rtogs pa dang// bgrod du med par mthar phyin pa// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// skabs dang rim par gyur pa la// sa dang lam la de bzhin te// rim par nus
pa'i byin rlabs dang// 'bras bu'i rim pa de bzhin te// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// bsam gtan ting 'dzin rim pa ni// ting 'dzin rtsal gyi rim pa yis// sa la rnam pa gnyis yod de// 'khor
'das gnyis su de bzhin 'byung// mya ngan 'das pa'i sa lam yang// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// bstan pa'i snying po dam pa yang// gang yin rtogs las de bzhin 'byung// ma nges 'dzin pa de bzhin
bral// 'dzin pa med pa gzhi rtsa bral// rgyud 'di yongs su rtogs las byung// bshad pa dri med 'od ldan 'di// bstan pa yongs kyi 'byung gnas yin// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po yin// thams cad 'byung
ba'i gnas chen yin// mun pa sel ba'i sgron me yin// rtogs par byed pa'i shes rab yin// sgom par byed pa'i bsam gtan yin// shes par byed pa'i spyod pa yin// thob par byed pa'i 'bras bu yin// nges
par 'grub pa'i dngos grub yin// zhi bar byed pa'i chos nyid yin// 'jom par byed pa'i khro bo yin// sgrol bar byed pa'i phur pa yin// gtub par byed pa'i mtshon cha yin// gsal bar byed pa'i mar me

yin// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud 'byung ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das drag po nyid sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dur khrod

chen po'i gnas dag tu// drag po gru gsum rim pa bzhin// dur khrod rus pa'i phye ma la// khrag gis sbrus te rab tu byug/ rim pa bzhin du byas kyang rung// rdzas rnams gong du bstan pa bzhin// tshang par
bsags shing las rnams bya// bar chad bsrung zhing byin brlab bya// phur pa sngags kyi byin brlab bya// brjod kyis rim pas gzhug par bya// rnam lnga las kyi ling+ga 'bul// gtso bo sngags kyis gzir la

gzhag/ sngags kyi las bya ting 'dzin bsgom// rnam gsum bskyed dang mchod pa 'bul// las bzhi brdung ba'i sbyor sgrol bya// bstab pa'i sngags kyis de bzhin 'bul// snying po dril zhing las rnams bya// tshogs

mchod gong du bstan pa bzhin// de yis rtags rnams byung ba dang// rab tu dril zhing drag por bstan// gong du bstan pa de min dgos// drag po'i las su bstan pa yin// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba dang// pho
nya dkyus su bcas pa dang// rang rang drag po bsgral ba'i sngags// mtha' yis brten cing gdab par bya// dngos por 'dzin pa sgrol ba yi// drag po khro bo'i byin rlabs yin// dngos po stong par
sgrol ba dang// de yi don las mi 'da' dang// 'khor bar mi 'khor 'or gcig bya// mtshon dang dug dang brdung ba dang// bstab dang gnas pa'i rim pa yang// 'dus pa chen po rang rang yin// gnas gsum

las nyid gang byed kyang// rang rang sngags kyis de bzhin bya// tshe dang bkra shis dngos grub kyang// thams cad 'dus pa'i sngags tshig yin// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ drag po bsgrub pa'i le'u
ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das sras mchog sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba bri// dur khrod rus pa'i

phye ma gdab// sngags kyis bsrung zhing phur pa dgod// byin brlabs dgod pa sngags nyid yin// de nyid bskyed dang spyan drang dang// mchod dang las bzhi'i brdung ba dang// gdab cing bskul zhing snying po

bzlas// bstod bzhin gong bzhin tshogs mchod byas// rtags rnams rab tu byung ba dang// bsgrub pa drag po sngags la 'jug/ bsnyen bsgrub sha mdangs phyed par bya// brdung ba'i las ni dus dus bya// de yis

rtags nyid byung ba dang// pho nya dkyus dang yang dag sbyar// sgrol ba'i sngags kyis bsgral bar bya// phyi ma'i las nyid gong du bstan// drag po sgrol ba'i las nyid yin// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/
sras mchog nyid du sgrub pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das las mkhan dgu bcu sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// dur khrod me ri spungs pa'i sar// gru gsum
mthing nag 'bar ba bri// sngon du bya ba'i rim pa'i sa// gsum dang bzhi bzhi gcig kyang rung// rim pas de bzhin gang yin sbyar// so so'i rdzas rnams so sor bsag/ thun yang de bzhin rim par bya// ting
'dzin rim pa'i byin rlabs las// phur pa dar gyi cod pan can// mnga' gsol rim pa bzhin du bya// mdun du las mkhan de nyid bskyed// spyan drang bstim dang mchod pa bya// snying po drag po sngags su

sbrel// lha gsal gang yin las sngags byed// bsnyen bsgrub mi dbye gcig tu dril// drag por sbrel cing rak+ta sbreng// dus dus rbad cing rab tu khro// rtags rnams dbyung ba'i phur pa'i las// thun yang de bzhin
'phang bar bya// thun la me ru 'bar ba dang// 'od dang skad dang du ba dang// rtags de mngon du 'ong bar bshad// bsnyen sngags gdab sngags thun sngags dang// mi dbye de nyid gcig pa yin// dril ba'i
sngags kyis las rnams 'grub// ting 'dzin rim pa so so yin// rdzas kyang mi mthun so so yin// bye brag tu ni shes par bya// gtso bo gcig la las mkhan ni// rkyang pa bcu dgu'i rim pa ste// de
rnams gang byed las mkhan yin// bcu dgu pho mo gnyis su 'dus// gang byed ye shes lha la gdags// dril bas sngags su gong bzhin 'gro// na ya bye brag rigs dang sbyar// las kyi pho mo rnam gnyis
so// gang yin rtags dang sbyar bar bya// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ las mkhan bcu dgu'i sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byin rlabs nam mkha'i ngo bo las// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs 'du// 'dul ba'i don du cir yang ston// thabs mkhas rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// 'dul ba rnam gnyis

gang 'dul ba// yang dag don la khyad par med// bstan pa'i snying po dam pa 'di// 'dul ba'i don du cir yang ston// snying po dam pa lha yi sku/ khams gsum sems can de bzhin 'byung// rtogs dang ma rtogs
khyad par med// rnam pa gnyis kyi 'bras bu 'byung// gcig las gnyis su de bzhin snang// snying po'i don la bzang ngan med// med pa ma yin cir yang snang// rgyal ba thams cad 'byung bar byed/ khams
gsum sems can 'byung bar byed// 'bras bu bzang ngan gnyis su smin// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs rnam par 'byung// rgyal ba grangs mang bsam 'das kyang// don dam snying po nyid las byung// rgyud rnams thams
cad 'byung ba yang// don dam snying po dbyings las byung// ston pa thams cad 'byung ba yang// don dam snying po dbyings las byung// 'khor rnams thams cad byung ba yang// don dam snying po dbyings las

byung// sdud pa thams cad 'byung ba yang// don dam snying po dbyings las byung// theg pa thams cad 'byung ba yang// don dam snying po dbyings las byung// bstan pa thams cad 'byung ba yang// don dam snying po
dbyings las byung// rigs rnams thams cad 'byung ba yang// don dam snying po dbyings las byung// lta ba bsgom pa rtogs pa yang// don dam snying po dbyings las byung// 'bras bu mtha' ru phyin pa
yang// don dam snying po dbyings las byung// 'gro ba'i don la spyod pa yang// don dam snying po dbyings las byung// don rnams thams cad 'grub pa yang// don dam snying po dbyings las byung// gtan la

dbab par bya ba dang// gtan la 'bebs par byed pa yang// don dam snying po dbyings las byung// don dam snying po ci yang med// ci yang med la cir yang snang// snang ba'i dngos po dmigs dang bral// snang

ba dngos med stong pa'i dbyings// snang ba rang bzhin med pa'i ngang// snang ba rang bzhin ci yang med// stong pa cir yang snang ba'i stong// stong pa thams cad kun kyang 'byung// stong pa ye shes lnga yi

ngang// stong pa rigs lnga bder gshegs byung// stong pa stong pas chad pa med// stong pa stong pas thams cad 'byung// stong pa stong pas dbyings su thim// stong pa'i stong pa ye shes mchog/ snang stong gnyis med
bde ba'i mchog/ gnyis su med pa gnyis med dbyings// gnyis su med par bden pa'i dbyings// gnyis su med par bstan pa'i gzhi// gnyis su med pa snying po'i dngos// gnyis su med pa 'bras bu'i
mchog/ gnyis su med pa don dam lam// gnyis su med pa bde ba'i mchog/ gnyis su med pa mnyam pa'i dbyings// mnyam nyid rig pa'i klong brdal bas// snang stong gnyis su med pa yang// thams cad rang
rig byang chub sems// bde ba chen po dbyings la gsal// rig dang ma rig khyad par las// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa byung// 'khor ba bsam med brjod las 'das// rtog pa brtas la so sor smin// rang

rang bcings pa grol ba med// bcing bya 'ching byed gnyis su med// rtog pa brtas la de ltar snang// rtog pa brtas la me ltar tsha// rtog pa'i dbang du de nyid ltar// sdug bsngal ngan song 'bras bu las// grangs
dang brjod las 'das pa ru// sdug bsngal sna tshogs thar pa med// log par brtas pas de bzhin byung// 'gro ba'i dus med ngan song 'khyams// thugs rje'i byin rlabs rab tu dkon// 'bras bu rlag par gyur
pa yin// rtog pa'i rim pa khyad par gyis// grangs dang brjod las 'das pa byung// theg pa'i rim pa bsam 'das kyang// nges par bstan pa gcig las med// sangs rgyas grangs mang brjod 'das
kyang// nges par bstan pa gcig las med// 'bras bu grangs mang brjod 'das kyang// nges pa'i 'bras bu gcig las med// de bzhin thams cad 'byung ba yang// nges par ma rtogs rim par bgrod// gtan
la phebs pa gcig las med// rtogs pa'i khyad par gnyis la 'byung// de yang snang ba rnam gnyis yin// lta ba thams cad de la 'dus// sgom pa thams cad de la 'dus// spyod pa thams cad de la
'dus// 'bras bu thams cad de la 'dus// dkyil 'khor thams cad de la 'dus// zhi dang khro yang de la 'dus// lam dang rim pa de la 'dus// rgyud rnams thams cad de la 'dus// ston pa thams cad de la
'dus// 'khor rnams thams cad de la 'dus// bstan pa'i snying po rin po che// rgyud rnams thams cad 'byung ba yang// de la zad cing stongs pa med// de phyir zad med rig pa'i gter// rin chen dbang gi
rgyal por bshad// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba yang// snying po don dam dbyings las byung// dper na chos nyid nam mkha' 'dra// cir yang med de kun gyi gzhi// thams cad thams cad 'byung

bar byed// de yis rgyud kyi rang bzhin 'byung// 'dul ba'i don du rgyud 'byung ba// rnam pa gnyis su nges par 'byung// byung yang don dam dbyings las byung// 'dus kyang don dam dbyings la 'du// de phyir kun
gyi gzhi yin pas// gzhi la rgyud rnams so sor 'byung// gzhi de nyid las ma g.yos par// thams cad de bzhin 'byung ba yang// 'dus kyang gzhi de nyid du 'dus// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba yi// khro bos
stong gsum kun bkang nas// khro bo byang chub sems las byung// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// thams cad 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni// rtogs ma rtogs kyi khyad par yin// bstan pa'i snying po de la

bya// rdo rje'i snying po kun gyi gzhi// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyud gtad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs te/ dus gsum skye shi mi mnga' ba'i// rig pa gsal ba 'dun pa'i don// rgyud rnams thams cad sdud par byed// rdo rje rigs la mnga' brnyes pa'i// dam pa'i rigs can khyod kyis

zung// las dang skal bar ldan pa dang// tshe rabs sngon du sbyangs pa dang// byang chub sems dang ldan pa dang// snying rje che zhing shes rab gsal// 'gro ba'i don la mos pa la// rgyud 'di yongs su 'byung bar
'gyur// rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe bzhi pa'oo// //rdo rje phur pa chen po bshad pa'i rgyud dri med 'od ldan zhes bya ba rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ karma ku ru rat+na tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ phrin las phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po'i snying po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur nas yum gyi b+ha ga la rtag tu bzhugs so// de nas mngon par byang

chub pa'i byin rlab kyis/ longs spyod par mdzad pa'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen po zhi ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i gzugs bzang po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ rnam par thar pa gsum gyi mdog mnga' ba so so'i

lag cha la sogs pa'i phyag cha dang/ dpe byad 'dzin pa de/ 'og min gyi gnas gzhi dang/ snying po me tog kar ti kas brgyan pa/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin rin po che sna lnga las grub pa tshad med pa'i gzhal yas
khang de dbyings dang kha dog dang ldan pa/ gru bzhi dang/ sgo bzhir ldan pa/ gru chad dang bcas pa/ rta babs dang thems skas dang bcas pa/ ka ba brgyad dang gdung bcu drug gis rnam par spras pa/
rin po che'i rgyan gyis bklubs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pa na nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs pa ni/ 'di ltar bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rin chen mchog dang/ tshe dpag med dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ btsun mo rnams dang bcas pa dang/ gzhan yang 'khor gyi lha mo du mas bskor ba 'di

lta ste/ sgeg mo dang/ phreng ba ma dang/ dbyangs len ma dang/ gar sgyur ma dang/ bdug spos ma dang/ me tog ma dang/ mar me ma dang/ dri chab ma dang/ lcags kyu ma dang/ zhags pa ma dang/ lcog sgrog ma dang/
dril bu ma rnams dang/ gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dges pa chen po dga' ba'i mchog de longs spyo rdzogs pa'i skur bzhugs nas/ 'od kyi bye brag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
po snang bar byas so// de nas stong gi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gzigs nas thad kar bltas sam gsal bar byas nas/ mnyam pa chen po las mi snang bar gyur to// e ma ho// thugs rjes ma bzung sems can
gcig kyang med// de yi stobs kyis byams pa ngo ma shes// kun la brtse bas dga' ba mchog tu gyur// thams cad skyob pas btang snyoms chen por bzhengs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i mchog de/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal gsum par kun gyis gzigs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang/ d+hU pe la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa
nang gi mchod pa dang/ me tog kar ti ka la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod de pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// spyan ras dri med kun gyis gzigs// rab dgyes
rgyal po khyod nyid la// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba rnams// dang po gang gi sgo nas zhugs// khyed kyis dga' ba skyed par gsol// zhes brjod pas/ nyid kyis nyid la gzigs nas/ chos thams cad dbugs

'byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ tshad med snying rje bskyed pa dang// byang chub sems la dga' ba ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i mchog yin te// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// gang gis stong nyid mi shes

pas// stong pa nyid kyang 'di ltar bya// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// stong pa nyid kyi don gyis kyang// yi ge'i ming tshogs sgra la grags// oM ma hA shun+yA tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ ye nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin
las// dngos med stong pa'i chos rnams ni// bdag dang chos dang rnam rig dang// gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i stong pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// ye shes rnams kyi rtse mo ste// shes pas mthong
ba'i yul med do// gang gis mthong ba ye shes skye// zhes gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des rnal 'byor gyi tshul 'di lta bu

gsungs so// ye nas chos nyid rang bzhin la// snying rjes thams cad khyab par bsgom// chos rnams kun gyi snying po 'di// don gyi rtsa ba yin par gsungs// rnam kun mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang// kun la khyab
pa'i snying rje ni// thun mong theg pa'i rang bzhin no// drang ba'i don gyis sangs rgyas kyi// byams dang dga' dang btang snyoms sogs// rnal 'byor pa yis bsam par bya// gzhan gyi don la dmigs pa
dang// chos rnams la ni dmigs pa dang// mi dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni// tshad med bzhi po bsgom pa'o// stong nyid nam mkha' dper bsgom las// rgyu yi sa bon hUM du gsal// de las gnas bsrung ba ni

rab tu brtsam// rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor yang dag don las skyes// de ru yi ge b+h+rUM bsam mo// yaM raM baM laM traM b+h+rUM hUM/ de nas yang dag dpa' bo de// sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor
ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// bdag nyid dbus kyi gtso bos ni// rang gis rang la byin gyis brlabs// byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu yang// zhal gsum phyag ni drug par gyur// ma hA yo ga'i

tshul gyis su// rnal 'byor ma ni dga' bya ste// 'dod chags chen po ting nge 'dzin// snyoms zhugs 'khor ni sku la bsdus// de nas dkyil 'khor gdon pa'i sngags// nyid kyis nyid la gdon pa ni 'di'o// oM A
hUM/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// btsun mo yum gyi b+ha ga la// rim pa bzhin du bkod de gnas// sku gsum thugs kyi dam tshig rnams// ldan par byas nas gdon par bya// de nas thugs rje'i

bdag po yis// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi gtso bor gyur// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i lte ba dang// rtsibs dang rtsibs mchan gru chad dang// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rim par bsam// de yang rnam par snang mdzad dang// rdo
rje sems dpa' rin chen dpal// 'od dpag med dang don grub pa// yum rnams lha mo sgo ma rnams// dkar po mthing ga dmar dang ser// ljang gu'i mdog tu snang ba dang// rang rang lag cha 'khor lo

dang// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma ral gri rnams// phyag mtshan g.yas kyi dang por 'dzin// g.yon pas rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma rnam 'khyud pa// chos kyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ so
so'i mdog dang lag cha yis brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs 'dus pa rdo rje phrin las phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u
ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dga' ba'i snying po de/ dpa' bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lta bu
gsungs so// ye nas dngos med dngos po'i tshogs// dngos por byung bas dngos po'i gnas// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la// dngos por btags kyang dngos med pa'o// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la// rgyu yi
ngo bor gsal ba las// gnas bsrung ba ni rnam par bsam// gnyis pa yis ni rnam brgyan las// bcu bzhi pa yi sprin steng du// bco lnga'i gdan dang thig ler bcas// de las 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu
pa// rim pa cung zad 'khor ba las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ma nor bsam// de steng pad+ma lha chen dang// thabs kyi dbus su bsam bya ba/ khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes// zhal gsum phyag ni drug

pa'o// g.yas pa dkar la g.yon pa dmar// rtsa ba'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// phyag gnyis hUM gi rgya bcings te// dang po rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// lhag ma zhi ba'i tshul du bya// sems dpa' gsum gyi sbyor ba

yis// bgegs rnams kun gyi snying ga nas// 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po ni// thugs ka dag nas byung ba ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes ni// spyan sngar sras kyi tshul du bzhugs// hUM bzhi las kyi phyag rgya

ni// g.yas pa rdo rje tho ba ste// g.yon pa bcing ba'i zhags pa'o// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ bgegs rnams kun ni rab bkug

ste// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi gdan du bya// a ko Ta ya mung+gar hUM/ tho ba lcags kyu 'khrigs pa yis// rdo rje phur pa'i khro bo ni// sku stod bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste// dbyar gyi sprin phung lta bu la// bskal pa'i me bzhin
rab tu 'bar// in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra la// rdo rje phur bu phyag na bsnams// smad ni gsal shing lta bu la// 'od zer rnam par 'phro bar bsam// rdo rje phur bu nges btab nas// 'gegs lus shin tu mi

g.yo'o// oM na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAk+ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+tAM hUM phaT/ kI li kI la ya sarba pA baM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba big+h+nAn kA ya wAka badzrA NAM kI la ya hUM

phaT/ sems dpa' phra mo'i rang bzhin gyi// snying ga'i chu skyes nyi gzugs gsal// hUM yig rnam par phyung nas ni// khro bo bcu yi gzugs su gyur// bskyed dang bzlas pa las kyi sngags// thun mong gcig tu

bsgrags pa'o// oM badzra kro ta hUM kA ra hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/

oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ b+han+d+ha d+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badza kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pA ra dzi ta hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/

ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro ta ma hA ba la hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ gsal bar brtas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mi g.yo lta bur 'khor ba yi//

me stag mang po 'phro ba can// phyogs bcu rnams su 'khor bar 'gyur// de ni de ma thag tu gang// rdo rje phur bur byin brlabs nas// phyogs bcu rnams su rnam par bsam// de nas rgyu yi sa bon las// las dang mthun pa'i 'od zer 'phros//

'od las sprul pa'i khro bo ni// yan lag byin gyis brlabs byas te// ta na ga Na zab mo'i sbyor sgrol gyis// rang rang rigs la sogs pa yi// rang rang lag cha ldan 'phros te// de ni spros ma thag tu yang// bar gcod bgegs rnams gzhom pa dang//

gnas bsrung ba ni yang dag go// rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa yi// gur dang sa gzhi ra bar bsam// rten gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par// steng du me yi dkyil 'khor dang// chu yis rnam par g.yogs par bsgom// las kyi phyag rgya de yis ni//

he sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang// nga rgyal phrag dog mchod pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs las// yon tan phrin las rnams kyis brgyan// bgegs rnams rnam par tshig par gyur// me dpung rgyal po'i byin rlabs kyis//

myos shing 'gyel bub 'bros par 'gyur// ba mo'i mdog dang mtshungs pa la// rdo rje la sogs gur lngar gsal// gur dang sa gzhi bla re dang// rgyal mtshan ba dan rtsig par bcas// dka' dang bka' yi mtshams rnams ni//

thun mong dbang chen mtshams rnams dang// thun mong ma yin bka' yi mtshams// rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// yi ge hUM las bskyed par bya// de las a rnams spro zhing bsdu// rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba dan 'phyar//
de bzhin rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis// gcig la gcig brten rgyu 'bras tshul// de yi steng du yi ge oM// rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan// de yi steng du yi ge raM// dbyibs dang kha dog rdo rjes mtshan//
de yi steng na yi ge aM// dbyibs dang rdo rje gnyis dang ldan// de yi steng na yi ge baM// ba mo'i mdog la bum pas brgyan// de yi steng na yi ge hUM// rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan//
de yi steng na yi ge suM/ kha dog dbyibs can gru bzhir gnas// de yi steng du yi ge yaM// rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan// de yi steng du

yi ge laM// de las byung ba'i yon tan ni// rin chen gru bzhi phreng bas brgyan// gzhal gyis mi lang gzhal yas ni// yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs 'dus pa/

karma ku ru'i rgyud las gzhi'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dga' ba chen po de/ bya sgrom chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/

bya byed sdig pa'i 'khor lo 'di bshad do// ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la ngas bshad par bya'o// yang dag par bsgrub par bya ste/ yang dag par sbyin pa'i sdig pa dang/ yang dag par shes rab kyi sdig pa dang/
yang dag par bsam gtan gyi sdig pa dang/ yang dag par bzod pa'i sdig pa dang/ yang dag par brtson 'grus kyi sdig pa dang/ yang dag par snying rje'i sdig pa dang/ yang dag par stobs kyi sdig pa dang/
yang dag par spyod pa'i sdig pa dang/ yang dag par lta ba'i sdig pa dang/ yang dag par ting nge 'dzin gyi sdig pa dang/ yang dag par drod kyi sdig pa dang/ yang dag par bzang po'i sdig pa dang/
yang dag par sman pa'i sdig pa dang/ yang dag par tshul khrims kyi sdig pa dang/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i sdig pa dang/ yang dag par sgrol ba'i sdig pa dang/ yang dag par thabs kyi sdig pa dang/

yang dag par shes rab kyi sdig pa dang/ yang dag par mthong ba'i sdig pa dang/ yang dag pa'i sdig pa ma yin pa'i sdig pa thams cad ni/ shes bzhin ma yin pa'i sdig pa ste yang dag par spang bar bya'o//
zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba de thob par bya ba'i don to/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs 'dus pa/
karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ de bzhin ma yin pa'i sdig pa'i 'khor lor bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/

thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dga' ba'i mchog des/ dpal gdeng chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so/ yang dag par 'di gsungs so// dpal chen po sbyin pa'i gdeng dang dpal

chen po brtson 'grus kyi gdeng dang/ dpal chen po bsam gtan gyi gdeng dang/ dpal chen po shes rab kyi gdeng dang/ dpal chen po bzod pa'i gdeng dang/ dpal chen po tshul khris kyi gdeng dang/ dpal chen po snying rje'i gdeng dang/
dpal chen po stobs kyi gdeng dang/ dpal chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi gdeng dang/ dpal chen po spyod pa'i gdeng dang/
dpal chen po lta ba'i gdeng dang/ dpal chen po drod kyi gdeng dang/ dpal chen po mthong ba'i gdeng dang/ dpal chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i gdeng so// zhes gsungs nas mnyam par bzhag go/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdeng rnal 'byor la gdams pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs karma ku ru las/ rnal 'byor chen po'i gdeng gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o////
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin bshegs pa dga' ba'i mchog de gzhi dang rang bzhin rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// de ltar na 'di lta ste/
byang chub snying po can rnams kyis// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// sa zin a 'thas ma yin te// rten 'brel tsam du rang bzhin ni// dngos su rtag pa ma yin pa// rtag na chos sku bde ba che//

yang dag par ni rnam thar gsum// rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i sgo rnams kyi// stong pa'i sgo rnams shes par bya'o// de ltar shes pa'i sgo rnams kyis// rten cing 'brel bar shes par bya// de nyid shes pa ma yin te//
tha dad ma yin don gcig min// 'gag pa med pas skye med pa// rtag pa ma yin chad pa min// 'ong ba med pas 'gro ba med// de bas rgyu yi rang bzhin ni// ngo bo nyid kyis ma grub pas//
rgyu 'bras gnyis las mya ngan 'das// yod pa ma yin med pa min// bdag las skye ba med pas nus// gzhan las skye ba ga la yod// de ltar dngos po dngos med pas// bsgom par bya ba yod ma yin//
de nyid rnam par thar pa'o// de nyid kyi ni rang bzhin ni// rgyu las 'bras bus rgyas ma btab// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pas// stong pa nyid kyi rnam thar ro// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pas//
'bras bu rang nyid mi skye bas// smon par bya ba'i nges 'brel te// smin par bya ba'i rnam thar ro// de nyid zil gyis gnon pa ni/ oM ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/

yang dag don du bsgom pa ni/ don dam pa yi sems bskyed la// 'gro ba'i don gyis sangs rgyas bskyed// de nas kun rdzob bden pa de// kun rdzob bar yang sems bskyed de// byams dang snying rje la sogs bya//

stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// 'gro ba rnams kyis don mi mthong// de la tshad med bzhi po bstan// de ni theg pa'i rang bzhin te// theg pa'i nang nas chen por grags// 'brel par byed pa gang bsgrub pa//

shes rab snying rje ldan pa'o// dug gsum lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// gang rnams sdug bsngal nyen pa la// 'dod pa'i don gyi snying rje 'byung// sgrub par 'dod pa byams pa ste// kun gyi don byed byams pa yin// dga' ba rab tu dga' ba ste// don dam 'dun pa'i 'dod pa'o// chags dang zhe sdang

rnam bral ba// don dam par ni sems nyid do// de bas don dam btang snyoms so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs 'dus pa karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ nges par 'brel pa'i rnam par thar pa dang/

de nyid spros pa'i mtha' dang/ tshad med pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten dang rten can gyi sngags 'di thugs las phyung ngo/ e yaM ra suM raM kaM/ bruM bi shwa bi shud+d+he/

oM laM/ hUM mUM/ swA maM/ AM pyaM/ ha tAM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM dzi na dzika laM twe sha ra sti/ hUM badzra d+h+r-ig mUM d+hA twI shwa rI/ swA rat+na d+h+r-ika maM ho ha ra ti/ AM A ro lika pyaM rA ga rA ti/
ha pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ig tAM badzra ra ti/ badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ badzra pA sha hUM/ badzra s+pho Ta baM/ badzra g+haN+De ho:/ phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi//

phyogs cha med pa'i gzhal yas nas// thugs rje'i 'od zer rab spros nas// 'od zer char pa phab pa bzhin// mdun nas thad kar dmigs pa las// tha dad ma yin gnyis med bstim// e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sha ho/

sa ma ya stam/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badzra puSh+pe pu swA hA/ e a ra li ho dza dza dzaH/ oM badzra sa ma ya oM/ AM badzra sa ma ya aM/ hUM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ swA badzra sa ma ya swA/ hA badzra sa ma ya hA/
oM badzra puSh+pe pu aHhUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ kha raM swA hA/ de nas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol ba 'di gsungs so// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// mi bzad rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang//

sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur nas// dngos grub rab mchog blang bar bya// oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+wam/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya phaT/ de nas dngos grub rab blangs nas// bdag dang gzugs brnyan dbyer med phyir//

tha dad ma yin gnyis su med// de ltar ye shes phebs pa dang// nyid la nyid spyod nyid la rol// bdag gis bdag la mchod pas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa yin// de phyir dngos grub gsol bar bya'o//

oM badzra A be sha a aM a/ de ltar gnyis su med pa dang// nyid kyis nyid la spyod pa dang// nyid la nyid kyis rol pa dang// nyid la nyid kyis bstod pa dang// nyid la nyid kyis dbang bskur nas// de yis theg pa chen po mthong//

gzhan du bstan par bya ba min// 'gro ba rnams kyi sems bskyed la// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// mthar thug mngon pa'i dbang rnams bskur// rnam par dben don mi shes na// spyod pa'i las rnams brtag par bya//

de ltar spyod pa mthar phyin nas// gsang ba'i don la 'jug par bya// shes rab ma yi mtshan brtag pa// rgyal rigs rje rigs bram ze'i rigs// gdol ba mo yang mi dor te// bcu gnyis bco lnga nyi shu gnyis// yang na rtsa lnga dag la
bya// byang chub sems phebs bla ma ste// rtsa dang rlung gi las shes na// dga' ba bzhi yang brten par bya// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung// drod la phebs dang byang chub sems// gnas bzhi dag tu zin

par bya// de nas phra mo'i thig le dang// nA da'i rtags dag byung ba na// byang chub sems kyi blta bar bya// de ltar rtags dag byung ba na// smig sgyu srin bu me khyer dang// du ba lta bu mthong bar bya// de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ snying po sngags dang spyod pa dang gsang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po dgyes pa chen po

de bzhin rnam par zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ zhi ba las khro bo'i ngang tshul du bzhengs nas/ sku 'bar ba las drag po'i chas kyis kun tu brgyan nas/ ha ha dang hUM hUM dang/ b+h+yo

dang ru lu la sogs pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis bkang nas/ 'gro ba'i don byas slar 'dus pa las/ 'dus ma thag tu 'khor gyi gtso bo khro bo dang

khro mo la sogs pa rigs kyi lha mo du ma dang/ stag dang/ khyi dang/ spyang ki dang/ wa dang/ ce spyang dang/ de la sogs te ye shes las grub pa'i dur bya sna tshogs pa dang/ gzhan yang ye shes kyi ma mo chen mo khro mo
mi pham ma dang/ ral pa gcig ma dang/ 'phel byed ma la sogs pa'i khro mo rnams dang/ lhan cig tu 'khod de bzhugs pa las/ ston pa dpal kI la yas 'khor rnams la ya mtshan skyed pa dang/ 'dul ba'i

don du 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho// e ma ho ngo mtshar chos/ skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes bu 'dul ba'i chos yin te// zhi khror ston pa ngo mtshar che// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rgyud// stong

pa chen po'i byang chub sems// gzugs rnams nyid kyi rgyud du grags/ zhes bka' stsal pas/ 'khor rnams ya mtshan skyes nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// gang zhig me yis tshig pa la//
me yis gso ba ya mtshan che// gang zhig chu yis 'gag pa la// chu rnams dag gis dbyung bar bya// de yi byin rlabs ya mtshan che// de ltar stong pa chen po la// stong pa'i bya byed ya mtshan

che// zhi bas mi 'dul gdug pa la// khro bos 'dul ba ya mtshan che// zhes gsol pa dang/ gleng bslang pa dang/ gleng slong ba las/ ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i chos du mas ma 'ongs pa thams cad yid ches pa

dang/ 'dul bar byed dang de dag gang dang gang lam du 'khyer ba dang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ye nas sangs rgyas pa la/ kun rdzob tu gang ltar 'dul ba'i chos la ji ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ltar/
ya mtshan rmad du byung nas/ ston pa dang 'khor rnams tha mi dad pa'i gzhung gis 'dul ba'i don du bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa'i rgyud/ karma ku ru
las drag po gleng gzhi'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po de bzhin rnam par zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams

sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// zhi ba shin tu zhi ba las// khro bo'i ngang tshul bzung ba dang// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi mtshams sbyar dang// gang gis mi 'dul gang gis 'dul// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la// zhi bas
phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// zhes gsungs nas/ drag po'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par gzhag go/ de nas dgyes pa chen po de/ dpal kI

la ya'i rgyal po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs bzhi pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhig tu gyur nas/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa 'di ched du brjod do/ khrag 'thung thugs su gnas pa ni// ye

shes rtse mo mchog yin te// hUM gsum las ni bzlas pa'i phyir// rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan// zhes ched du brjod do// de nas dpal kI la ya'i rgyal po des/ phrin las phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi 'di gsungs
so// de ni gzugs dang byin rlabs dang// bzlas brjod dang ni phrin las dang// dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid do// phun sum tshogs pa bdun po yis// btab na ci 'dod sbyin no zhes// dam tshig bdag pos
rab gsungs te// rang gi bka' las rang mi 'da'// 'das na lha yang rlag pa'i phyir// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das karma he ru kas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ni rgyal po'i
tshig yin te/ rje'u yi tshig gcig bka' stsol dang/ sdom dang yan lag bcas pa ni// gser mig g.yu yis spras pa 'dra// zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig karma he

ru ka/ snga ma smras pa rgyal po na// lhug pa rje'u yi tshig yin te/ zhes gsungs nas/ brtag pa'i rgyal po phyi ma 'di gsungs so// 'di lta ste/ de phun sum tshogs pa bdun yod de/ de la bdag nyid phun sum tshogs
pa dang/ dus phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gnas phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang// byin rlabs phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bzlas brjod phun sum tshogs pa dang/ phrin las phun sum

tshogs pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang karma he ru kas dpal kI la ya'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rje'u dang rgyal po'i bka' stsal pa/ dmangs kyi tshig gcig bka' stsol dang/
zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dpal kI la ya yi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig karma he ru ka/ rje'u yi tshig ni de 'dra na// dmangs kyi tshig rnams bdag gis bshad/ zhes gsol nas/

bshad pa'i rgyal po 'di bshad do// bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa ni/ byang chub la gzhol zhing mang du thos pa dang/ las la mkhas pa dang/ lha nye bar gyur ba dang/ mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob pa dang/ drag cing
ldog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ phrag dog dang 'bras bu gzhan la re ba mi 'jog pa dang/ dam tshig ma nyams pa 'di rnams ni/ bdag nyid phun sum tshogs pa 'di gsungs so/ sku gsung thugs mi
zad pa karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ sdom dang yan lag tu bcas pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dus phun sum tshogs pa 'di bshad do// tshes

bcu bdun man chad mar gyi ngo dang/ nyin mtshan gyi gung dang/ bsnyen pa tshang ba dang/ rtags byung ba dang la sogs te/ 'di ni dus phun sum tshogs pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang phun sum tshogs pa 'di
bshad do// gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni/ gnas chen po dang/ shing rkang gcig pa dang/ gnod par nges pa ste/ 'di ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i zhes bshad do// de nas yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa

bshad do// de la gzugs phun sum tshogs pa ni/ thugs kyi phyag rgya'i dbyibs la bya ste/ phur pa ni skabs 'dir lcags sam/ lcags sna lnga'am/ seng ldeng la sogs tsher ma can gyi shing la sor brgyad dam/
sor bcu gnyis par byas la/ mgo mjug ma nor bar byas la/ rtsa ba'i ngos la mgo bya/ mgo sor gcig la rgya mdud/ sked sor gcig la rgya mdud/ stod zur brgyad/ smad zur gsum pa/ ri rab ltar brjid
par 'dug pa ni/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa zhes bshad do// de nas yang byin rlabs phun sum tshogs pa 'di bshad do// byin rlabs phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ thog ma nyid du sku gsum du byin gyis

brlab par bya ste/ dang po kho nar stong pa nyid du bsgom ste/ chos skur byin gyis brlab pa dang/ de'i 'og tu rgya mdud gzhal yas khang du dmigs te/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar hUM sgril ma lnga gzhag ste/ dbus
su he ru ka/ shar du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba/ lhor gshin rje'i gshed/ nub tu rta mgrin/ byang du stobs po che/ 'di rnams so so'i snying po dran pa tsam gyis bskul te/ gzugs dang gnyis su med par

'khod pa dang/ 'khor rgyas par dmigs te phyi nang gi mchod pa ci 'byor pa phul te/ dam tshig rjes su bskul nas/ gnyis su med pa'i rgyan rdzogs pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de
la sras phur pa khro bor bskyed pa ni/ lte ba yan chad mthing nag la/ dbu skra kham pa zur gsum gyi thabs su 'greng ba/ brang gis 'gro ba chen po dang/ thod rlon gyis bcings shing bzhad pa/ spyan

gsum sdang mig tu bgrad pa/ spyan g.yon pa phur bu la gzigs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa rab tu rngam pa/ dur khrod kyi me dpung gi nang na/ lte ba man chad lcags kyi phur pa zur gsum pa/ e'i nang du sum cha

tsam nub pa/ phyag bzhi pa ste/ g.yas kyi gong na sta re kha yar bstan te stag pas rdeg par byed pa/ 'og ma na rdo rje ri rab kyis gnon pa'i thabs su 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang po na rdo rje kha T+wAM 'khrol zhing bdud kyi
khams gsum 'jigs pa/ 'og ma na phur pa zur gsum pa 'debs pa'i thabs su gzas shing ngan song gsum 'jig pa/ stobs dang mthu dang dpung la sogs pa khro bo thams cad 'dul pa las lhag par che ba
gcig 'og tu phyung ba ste/ rtag pa chen por bzhugs par bsam pa 'di ni/ sprul pa'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ dus
dang gnas dang rdzas la brten nas mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dpal kI la ya'i rgyal pos/ byin gyis brlab pa 'di gsungs so/ de la rigs lngar byin gyi brlab par

bya ste/ 'bru lngas gnas lngar byin gyis brlab pa'o// de nas yang sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu A+oM/ sked par hrIH/ rtse mor phaT bsam mo// de nas yang dpal kI la ya'i rgyal
pos 'di skad bshad do// de'i 'og tu thugs ye shes rtse gcig par byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ zur gsum du phaT gsum/ ngos gsum du hUM gsum gzhag pa'o// de nas yang sku gsung thugs kyi brtags pa

dang/ rigs kyi khro bo'i byin gyis brlab pa 'di bshad do// de nas yang sku brtag pa dang/ rigs so so'i khro bo rnams kyis byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur bar bya ste/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid/

phyogs bcur 'phros nas slar 'dus pa ste/ hUM hUM dang phaT phaT kyi sgra 'byin cing de nyid sku la bstims te/ dbang dang byin rlabs thams cad kyis tshim par bya'o// de nas yang 'di bshad par bya ste/ de nas 'gro

ba'i don la gshegs na/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis stong grogs mdzad par gnang ngo// sngon zhal gyis bzhes pa lags pas de'i stong grogs mdzad cing/ de'i sku la 'jug pa dang/ bdag nyid dang
bdag nyid chen po nyid du dbang bskur zhing/ byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ lag mthil g.yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du hUM/ g.yon pa'i lag mthil du a las zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du a bsam la gung mo la oM/ mthe bong la hUM/ mdzub mo la trAM/ srin lag la hrIH/ mthe'u chung la hA/ 'di rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste/ su ra ta s+t+waM

zhes brjod la thal mo mnyam par sbyar/ badzra any+dza li hUM zhes brjod nas sor mo cung zad bsnol badzra b+han+d+ha hUM/ zhes brjod nas/ sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la bsdam mo// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod la/ phur pa blangs

te 'chang ba'i bar du bcug nas/ lag pa'i rting pa phye nas/ mthe bong srin lag dang mthe'u chung gi bar du phur pa bcug la/ mthe bong gis cung zad bsgul zhing dril lo// oM badzra A be sha a a zhes brjod pas
phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa yab yum sras dang bcas pa thams cad/ zhe sdang rjes su dran pa'i sku yungs 'bru tsam bar mtshams med par phur pa la bsdu zhing bstim mo// de nas yang kI la

ya'i rgyal po des/ bshad pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid bshad do// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po chen po nyid du rdzogs par byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur bar bya ste/ sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la/ gung mo gnyis gzhib

pa'i bar du phur pa bzung nas/ oM badzra sa twa rA dza hUM zhes bzlas/ de nas sor mo rnams sug sug por byas la/ lag pa'i rting pas phur pa bzung la/ oM tri b+hur b+hu ba phaT/ ces brjod/ de nas sor mo rnams

rgyab tu bsnol te/ mthe bong gzhib pa'i bar du phur pa bcug la/ ha na ha na dIp+ta tsakra hUM phaT/ ces brjod nas dril te/ bdag nyid chen po thams cad gnyis su med par sbyor ba mdzad pa'i gzi byin thams cad

phur pa'i sku la zhugs pas stong khams thams cad gang bar me stag 'phro zhing dmigs pa thams cad nges par 'grub pa'i byin rlab dang/ dbang chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' e'i gdan la
bzhugs su gsol nas/ yungs kar gyi rgyal pos brdeg cing/ gu gul sbyar mas bdug la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa ci 'byor pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o// de nas yid la brnag pa'i phrin las bcol te/ 'di ni

byin rlab phun sum tshogs pa'o// zhes yang dag par bshad do/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa/ karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phur pa nyid la dbang bskur
ba dang byin gyis brlabs kyis 'gro ba'i don la thogs chags med par byed pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das kI la ya'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs 'phral la rgyas pa ma yin te/ ye nyid nas ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// dmangs rigs bzlas brjod ji ltar lags// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa// bzlas brjod phun sum tshogs pa ni// bdag nyid las kyi lhar bsgoms la// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ hUM mthing nag gcig bzhag nas/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ che ge mo zhig mA ra
ya phaT/ cesabarjod pas/ phur pa'i khro bo ci 'dra ba gcig byung bar gyur te/ phyogs bcu thams cad du sems can gyi don byas nas phur pa la bstim mo// 'di 'dra ba 'bum mam/ bdun 'bum bye ba'am/ sa ya

yan chad bzlas pa bya ste/ bsnyen pa gtang ba 'dod na/ phur pa nyid snying ga'i hUM la bsdus te/ 'di ni bzlas brjod phun sum tshogs pa'o// zhes bshad do// de nas yang karma he ru kas kI la ya la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mgon po chen po khyod// phrin las gang lags bshad du gsol// bdag gzhan las gnyis bshad du gsol// sngon gyi las dang gzhung gi las// dgug dang bcing dang dgrol ba
rnams// ji ltar lags pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phrin las phun sum tshogs pa ni// thog ma nyid du brtag pa'i sa rnyed nas/ bgegs bskrad pa dang mtshams bcad pa la

sogs pa bya ste/ skad cig ma'i ting 'dzin gyis khro bo'i sdang mig dang/ mtshon cha'i char dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin la sogs pas bgegs bskrad la/ phur pa bcu khro bo bcur byin gyis brlabs te/ phyogs bcur

btab nas ci tsam 'dod pa bsrung bar mtshams bcad do// dang po rigs lnga'i lha mnyes par byas te/ de nas las kyi lha mnyes par byas la/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gong nas 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen pa rnams tshang

nas/ gnas chen por dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa/ rtse mo lho phyogs su bstan te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba dang/ ske rtse dang/ lan tshwa dang/ zhing chen gyi rak+ta dang/ srum ma'i lo ma dang/ khre dang/ ju tshe'i phub ma dang/

grog mkhar gyi sa dang/ bong bu'i bdud rtsi las sprus te/ zhing chen thal ba ma rnyed na/ til nag po la gzhi blangs te/ gzugs byas kyang rung/ ri mo bris te mdog smug nag tu byas te/ la sogs pa la zhing gi

rak+tas hUM che mo mA ra ya phaT/ ces bris nas snying gar blan te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gan rkyal du bzhag nas/ mgo lho phyogs su bstan te/ gdon de nyid dgug pa ni/ mngag gzhug gam khro bo sum b+ha ni'i

sbyong ba yang rung/ gsang ba'i thugs ka'am rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dza dzaH/ 'di 'dra ba dmar po gcig bzhag la dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badzra aM ku sha dzaH che ge mo zhig hUM dza zhes brjod nas/ mngag

gzhug lha mo lcags kyu can grangs med pa brgyud mar byung nas/ bgegs kyi snying ga nas bzung ste der 'ong ba dang/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badzra che ge mo pra be sha hUM/ zhes ci ran brjod nas/ gzugs sam ri mo la phab
ste dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod nas lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas bcings pa dang/ bsdams pa dang/ de'i sems 'khrug par byas nas/ e'i nang du rtsi mo'i 'og tu song
bar bsam la/ de nas phur pa blangs te/ las kyi lha'i snying po dang bcas pas drag tu cung zad cig bskul la/ thal mo sbyar thabs kyis gsor te/ rdo rje sder mo'i sngags bzlas la/ ting 'dzin gsal bar ma

gyur gyi bar du dril nas/ ting nge 'dzin khugs pa dang/ gnod byed kyi steng du rtse mo nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par gzas la/ khro bo'i sked pa nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung te/ rdo rje tho ba'am s+t+wa re yi stag pas
brdeg cing/ rdo rje sder mo'i sngags lan gsum mam lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas shing btab ste/ seng lding gi phur pa sor brgyad pa gcig snying gar gdab/ gcig dpral bar gdab/ bzhi dpung

mgo gnyis dang/ brla'i nang rol gnyis su gdab/ lte ba'i khung du yang gdab bo// rdo rje sder mo'i sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA' ga tsit+ta badzrA NAn/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya che ge mo phaT/ sarba duSh+tAM kI li kI la sarba

pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ro a dz+nyA pA ya ti kA ya wA' ka tsit+ta badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ ces drag tu brjod do// phur pa de dag bab zin nas/ de'i steng du las kyi lha'i phyag rgya dang/ sngags kyis

mnan te/ lag pa gnyis sor mo bsnol te/ mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis ngos sbyar te brkyang la gzhan ma ni rgyab drang por bsrang/ de'i sngags la/ oM karma badzra kro d+ha hUM phaT swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas

te g.yas phyogs nas bskor la/ kI la ya'i mgo la lan gsum tu gtug go/ de nas yang phur pa slar mi dbyung zhing/ sus kyang ma phyin par slar mi dbyung zhing/ lhag par yang mi phyin par lhag par yang zung

cing thal phyin par bsam mo// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par byas te/ sor mo rnams rgyab tu bsnol te bcangs la gung mo gnyis gzhib la/ rtse mo bsgrengs la rnon par byas te phur pa'i slad du mnan/

phur pa'i lha dang bgegs che ge mo khyod dam tshig las ma 'da' zhig bar bsgo zhing/ sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas so// oM badzra sa twa sa ma ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod do// 'di ni sems ma dam tshig rdo rje'i sngags

dang phyag rgya ste/ bsgo ba thams cad nyan par bsam/ de nas sor mo rnams nang du bsnol te/ mthe bong mthe'u chung gnyis ngos sbyar la bsgreng/ khu tshur mi bcang bar sor mo rnams phyir bskyed de/ phur pa'i steng

du mnan cing sngags 'di brjod do// oM badzra kro d+ha ha na ha na da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// stobs po che'i sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ gong du bka'
nyan pa bdag gi dbang du gyur nas/ ci bsgo ba thams cad bdag gi bran bzhin las byed par 'gyur ro// de nas yungs kar rgyal pos brdeg/ gu gul sbyar ma bdug la bzhag/ de nas lag pa
gnyis rgyab sbyar/ mthe'u chung gcig la gcig mkhyud/ mdzub mo gnyis kha bgram g.yas g.yon du bzung ste/ yid tsam dgu bar byas/ lhag ma rnams nang du bcangs la/ mdzub mo gnyis mche bar bsams te/

rkang pa g.yon pas dgra bgegs kyi snying gar mnan la/ sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas so// oM badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha kha kha ha ha hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces brjod do// de nas rdo rje be con gyi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ lag

pa sor mo lu gu rgyud du bsnol la/ mthe bong g.yas pa g.yon gyi steng du bzhag la/ mdzub mo gnyis ngos sbyar te sbreng nas/ sdang mig bgrad cing brdeg pa sngags 'di lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya

rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wa na sa ma ya dza ti lam po da ra uts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ ces brjod do/ de nas yungs kar gyi rgyal pos brdeg cing gu gul gyis bdug la bzhag

go/ las 'di shin tu brtan cing grub par mdzod cig par bsam mo// cung zad byin chung ba 'dra na/ rdo rje brjid gnon gyi bsam gtan gyis mnan par bya ste/ khro bo rnams kyi spyi bor bsdus pa'i steng du hUM mthing

nag la rdo rje ljang gu rgya gram me lce'i phreng bas bskor ba rgya gam gyi steng du yi ge su ser po gser btso ma'i kha dog 'dra ba cig bsam la/ oM badzra su me ru hUM hUM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas/ gser gyi ri rab

dpag tshad bye ba gru bzhi pa zhig tu gyur pa'i steng du/ bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa/ sku mdog ljang gu dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas kyi dang po na 'khor lo 'bar ba phyar te bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi dang po
rdo rje rgya gram thugs kar brten pa/ 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pas pho brang btab pas/ khro bo rnams kyang shin tu gzir zhing mi g.yo ba dang/ las ma grub na bskal pa'i bar yang mnan par bsam
mo// phrin las kyang de bzhin du bcol te bzhag go/ yo byad thams cad kyang nag por bsham/ gtor ma nag po cha gcig bsham/ dam tshig can 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ 'jig rten pa thams cad la bsngo zhing
las la bcol/ drag po'i gtor ma cha gcig/ gdon de nyid bkug la zar gzhug go/ phrin las 'di'i dus su phra men ma dang/ gnod sbyin mo dang/ srin mo rnams kyang spyan drangs shing gtor ma dbul/ las

bcol te/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod par bya'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ b+hi d+hi ya kro d+ha dza b+h+yo ru lu ru lu hUM/ zhes lan gsum brjod pas spyan drangs so// oM pra ti dza hUM/ zhes brjod pas gtor

ma 'bul lo// oM sa ma ya a mr-ita ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha hUM swA hA/ zhes bzlas te/ a mr-i ta phul nas ci 'dod pa'i las bcol lo// 'di ni phrin las phun sum tshogs pa zhes bshad pa'i rgyal pos yang dag

par bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa'i rgyud/ karma ku ru las rten dang brten can du gyur pa'i phrin las 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu sgrol ba'i las kyi rgyal po'i le'u
ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kI la ya'i rgyal po la/ karma he ru kas gsol pa/ e ma ho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// ma mthong rmongs la bstan pa'i phyir// gzugs
brnyan dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang// las kyi sham bu hom khung rnams// dpa' bos yang dag bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dpa' bo nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rigs kyi he ru ka/ rje'u dmangs

dang rgyal po'i tshul// yang ni bdag gis bshad par bya// zhi ba'i gnas dang drag po'i gnas// snga ma nyid las brtag par bya// de lta bu yi gnas rnyed nas// sngon gyi las rnams rab brtags nas// maN+Dal

'dom gang mda' gang ngam// che chung tshad ni ma nges te// dpangs su khru gang brtsig par bya// cha mnyam chag chag go ma ye// bdud rtsi dag gis rab bya ste// bcu gnyis rtsa bco lnga yang lnga rtsa gnyis te// bu mos
legs par bkal ba yi// thig skud ma nyams gsang ba yis// dkyil 'khor cha ni bsnyam par bya// zur bzhi tshangs thig btab nas ni// snam bu brgyad du bgo bar bya// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// lte
