ba mu khyud dag gis bskor// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// srung ma rnams kyi khyams dag bya// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// sgo ma bzhi yi rang bzhin te// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// de bzhin lcags ri btang bar

bya// lte ba dag ni nag po te// de la gru gsum gru gsum bya// 'khor lo bzhi ni ser po ste// de yi gong ras nag por bya// bar khyams dmar la sgo khyams ser// gru chad ljang gu lcags ri nag/ de bzhin tshon
gyis bkye ba la// dbus su karma yab yum ste// shar nas brtsams te khro bo bzhi// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// srung ma rnams ni spel mar dgod// sgo la sgo ma bzhi rnams

te// lcags ri la ni dbang phyug ma// don gyis sangs rgyas yin mod kyang// bran gyi tshul du mu ran bzhugs// dbus kyi gtso bo'i mdun nyid du// sras mchog bdun po de bzhin gzhag/ de ltar don gyi lha bkod
nas// mchod pa rnams kyang de bzhin gzhag/ de nas mchod pa'i las bya ba// rgyal po rgyal po de bzhin te// rgyal thebs karma ging gis bya// de nas las rnams mtha' ru bskyal// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi bca' gzhi dang lha bkod pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang karma he ru kas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to// kye kye sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// drag po las kyi sham bu ste// me yi cho ga bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor dbus nas shar

lho'i mtshams// me yi dkyil 'khor gru gang bya// de la kha khyer gsum dang ldan// zabs dang rgyar yang mnyam pa la// hom khung sor ni bzhi par bya// dang po la yang thod pa gsum// bar ma dag la mtshon cha
lnga// tha ma rtsang dmar dag gis bskor// yang na dkyil 'khor chen po dang// 'brel pa nyid du bya ba yi// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rdzogs pa dang// gang la dmigs pa'i ling+ga la// dgug gzhug las rnams

tshang bar bya// gcad dang gtub dang gdab pa rnams// rdo rje sder la sogs pas bya// de nas me lha spyan yang drang// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung ba che// me lha drang srong bram

ze mchog/ sum cu rtsa lnga'i lnga tshigs ni// lnga pa me lha zhes kyang bya// rab tu spun la sku mdog ser// mgrin pa ring la gsung yang snyan// thugs rje'i dbang gis spyan drangs te// 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs nas
ni// sreg blug zhal zas bzhes su gsol// khyod la phrin las bcol ba ni// hom khung ma nyams dam pa 'dir// drongs shig drongs shig me drongs shig/ spor cig spor cig me spor cig/ zur phud can gyis me

gsos la/ kha 'bar ma yis me bus shig/ bram ze bu mo lnga brgya yang// khyod kyi g.yog dang bran du khol// thugs dam rgyud bskul bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// dzaHhUM baM hoH// na mo badzra pa Ni b+h+ya/ nag mo ag+ne

ye/ kI li kI la ya/ dan ta la si/ ma hA A gats+tsha hUM/ b+han+d+ha swA hA/ de nas bzhugs su gsol/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e h+ye hi ma hA shud+d+he de ba r-i Shi/ ha da sa da na ti ma hA hi da ha ut+ma hA raM sa ma/ san ti si ti b+ha ga/ oM ag+ne

ye ha bya ka bya/ ma hA na ya swA hA/ de nas yang rigs pa'i rgyal pos 'di gsungs so// yang dag bden pa'i snying po 'di/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ oM badzra ag+ne raM/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas sbar ba'i rig pa

'di gsungs so// tsi ri shag raM/ hi pa ra shag raM// yaM raM yaM raM yaM raM/ zhes lan bdun brjod de/ de nas yang rig pa 'di gsungs so// ma kyin raM by-i raM/ he la te shu raM/ the khyer se na raM/ ma raM ma raM zhes

bya'o// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// he la byi laM/ la byi laM/ rat+na rmi byi laM/ zhes gsungs so// de nas bsreg rdzas dbul bar bya// ling+ga ming rus dang bcas par// til nag dug sna sha sna rnams// drag po'i
sngags ni mthar brjod do// lha rnams dga' mgu rang ba'i phyir// mchod pa phul nas rgyal thabs bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ me'i

las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i rgyal po 'di gsungs so// hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ de nas yang 'di

gsungs so// oM karma shrI he ru ka/ kI li kI la ya ma hA tsaN+Da/ sarba duSh+tAM/ da ka ha na/ da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ sarba a mo g+ha sid+d+hi kro d+hI shwa rI hU~M phaT/ oM badzra trai lo kya bi dza ya badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ kro d+hI shwa rI hU~M/ oM badzra kro

d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M phaT/ oM kro d+hI shwa rI hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hU~M phaT/ kro d+hI shwa rI hU~M/ oM ma hA ba la badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ kro d+hI shwa rI hU~M/ zhes yang dag par thugs las phyung ngo/ de nas yang 'di gsungs

so// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa yi// yab yum sku ni gsal bar bskyed// oM dang AHdang hU~M rnams kyi// 'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya yis// gnas bzhi dag tu rgya yis gdab// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang// sgrub

pa dang ni sgrub pa che// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan yang drangs// dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn bin+d+ha ya ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha hU~M/ ru lu ru lu/ a ra li hriM hriM/ de nas mnyes dang

mgu ba'i phyir/ yang 'di gsungs so// oM badzra puSh+peA hU~M/ na maHshrI he ru ka hU~M/ d+hU pe d+hU A hU~M/ A lo ke hrI A hU~M/ g+han+d+he a hU~M/ nai wid+ya A hU~M/ na maHshrI he ru ka hU~M/ zhes phyi'i mchod pa gsungs so// de nas gsang

ba'i mchod pa 'khor lor 'bul ba 'di gsungs so// oM ma hA shrI he ru ka sa ma ya a mr-i ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho// karma shrI he ru ka karma kro d+hI shwa rI kha raM kha hI/ zhes gsungs so// de nas bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis

bstod do// hU~M khams gsum thugs rjes 'dren pa'i yak+sha he ru ka/ srid gsum sdangs par byad pa'i yak+sha he ru ka/ sa gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i yak+sha he ru ka/ 'gro ba mthar phyin sku gsung thugs mnga'
ba// sku yi chos kyis gdug byad zil gyis gnon// gsung gi nga ros bdud dgra rlag par byed// thugs kyi 'od zer bkye bas las dang nyon mongs 'joms// yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku gsung thugs la phyag

'tshal bstod// de nas yang sras mchog la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do// rigs lnga rgyal ba khrag 'thung mang po'i tshogs// sku gsung thugs kyi sras mchog kI la ya// chos sku mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing

nag la// zhe sdang bdud 'dul kham nag gyen du 'khyil// 'khor ba mi spang thod rlon phreng bas bcings// gdug pa'i klu 'dul sbrul gyis rab tu brgyan// spyan gsum bgrad pas 'khor ba zhe la gnon// mche ba
gtsigs pa'i skye shi rtsa ba gcod// rdzu 'phrul phyag bzhi g.yas kyi gong ma na// ye shes s+t+wa res khams gsum rdul du rlog/ g.yas 'og rgya gram 'khor ba zil gyis gnon// g.yon gyi dang pos kha
T+wAM bdud khams 'dul// g.yon 'og phur pas ngan song gnas gsum 'jig/ bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// lte ba man chad sku smad ni// ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// chos nyid rig pa'i

ye shes rtse gcig po// shes rab yum gyi mkha' yi pho brang nas// stobs dang mthu dpung khro bo 'bum pas lhag/ chos sku longs spyod rtag par sku sprul pa// ye shes kI la ya la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas yang
'di gsungs so// las kyi rigs mchog bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i gtso// bdud kyi rigs rnams rdul du rlog mdzad cing// bla med byang chub gnas su 'dren mdzad pa// karma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces
gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ rig pa'i rgyal po dang bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis

'khor rnams la/ bdag dang khyed du bcas pas rgyud 'di nyid kyis 'gro ba'i don byos shig/ ces gsungs nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas 'khor rnams kyis rgyud 'chad pa'i skyes bu la bstod pa/ hUM khro la

khros pa'i rgyal po yis// khro bo nye bar zhi mdzad pa/ khro zhi che la phyag 'tshal te// zhi bas mi 'dul khro bor ston/ khro bos 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig par bstod nas mi snang bar

gyur to// karma ku ru'i rgyud las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang/ lots+tsha ba A tsar+ya gnyags dz+nyA nas gtan la phab pa las/ rma rin chen mchog gis
skad gsar bcad kyis gtugs pa'o// brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ kar+m+ma kI la ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ phur pa kar+m+ma las kyi rgyud// rdo rje kI
la ya la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ rdo rje khro bo'i
tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab brjod kyi mi lang ba dang/ btsun mo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab brjod kyis mi lang ba dang/ yang sprul dang sum sprul dang/ mgyogs ma'i tshogs dang thabs cig tu
bzhugs so/ de'i tshe na rU tra shin tu gdug pa 'jig rten thams cad phung bar byed pa/ mgo gsum pa lag pa drug pa/ drag po'i gtum tshig brlang por smra ba zhig gis 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad phung bar byed do// 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad phung bar byed pa'i rU tra de bsgral ba'i phyir/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje kI la ya zhes bya bas/ gdug pa sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thugs ka nas 'od zer rnam pa

lnga 'thon te/ 'od zer de dag kyang khro bo sna tshogs su gyur nas/ rU tra de la rdo rje rtse dgu pa dang/ rtse lnga pa dang rdo rje rgya gram dang me dpung dang tri shul dang/ phur pa rnams 'phros nas rU tra de nyid
bsgral te/ sha zos khrag 'thung rus pa 'chos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba la bkod do/ gzhan yang mi dge ba las grub pa'i dregs pa can/ dbang phyug chen po pho mo dang/ nyi zla tshangs pa dang/
brgya byin dang/ me lha dang/ gshin rje dang/ srin po dang/ chu lha dang/ rlung lha dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ 'byung po'i bdag po dang/ pho mor bcas pa kha bub tu 'gyel nas/ khrag tu skyugs shing 'o
dod chen po 'bod de/ dpa' bo chen po ni thugs rje'i mnga' bdag lags na/ de lta bu ma mdzad/ dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi'o// ci bsgo ba'i bka' nyan zhes nyam thag pa las/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po 'od zer lcags kyu lta bus de dag bkug ste/ mthing nag gru gsum gyis phyogs mtshams gtams pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang nyi zla pad+ma'i steng du pho mo byi
chings su bsnol te/ khro bo'i tshogs kyi gdan du bting/ hUM zhes pa'i sgra dbugs dbyung rngub dang bcas pas/ khro bo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang bsdus pas/ khro bo chen po bcu yab yum
sprul pa dang bcas par gyur te/ phyogs so so'i dregs pa so so'i gdan la bzhugs/ u tsuSh+ma chen mo ni nyid kyi sku la 'khril rU tra'i sems dang sems byung ni rnam par mi rtog pa la bkod/ phyogs
skyong ba so so ni dge ba bcu'i ngang la gnas pa'i sems dang bcas/ dbang phyug chen po yab yum ni nyid kyi gdan du gyur te/ byang chub chen po'i sems ngang gis skyes so// phur pa 'phrin las kyi
rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas khro bo rnam par rgyal bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khams gsum gyi sems can zhe sdang can
rnams/ thabs gang gis 'dul ba bka' stsal du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ khams gsum gyi sems can zhe sdang can 'dul ba'i thabs ni gnyis te/ zhi
ba'i las dang drag po'i las kyi mi 'dul ba ni gang yang med do// rdo rje kI la ya zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ rnam par rtogs pa sna tshogs pa zhi bar byed do// thog ma med pa
nas bsags pa'i bag chags zhi bar byed do// de nas rdo rje kI la ya rnam par rtog pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par

zhugs ma thag tu/ zhi ba'i dkyil 'khaur chen po mngon par 'thon te/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud gru chad bar khyams sgo dang bcas pa rang byung ste rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o/ de'i tshe gsung gi

dkyil 'khor gyi sgra bka' stsal pa/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/

aM aH/ hUM badzra d+h+r-ika/ mUM d+hA tI shwa rI/ oM dzi na dzika lAM dwe Sha rat-I/ swA rat+na d+h+r-ika mAM mo ha ra tI/ AM a ro li ka/ pAM rA ga ra tI/ hA pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika tAM badzra ra tI/ k+ShiM hi ra dzA ya/ hUM lA' s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ trAM A

gar+b+hA ya/ trAM mA le sa ma ya ho/ hrI ha hUM pad+ma bA' da ma/ hr-IHgIrti ra ho haM/ dz+hiM ku ru pA Ni/ aM NIrti rA ga yA' mi/ mai d+ha ra Ni swA hA/ dzaHd+hU pe pra be sha ya/ th+l+hiM nis+sa raM b+hA ya swA hA/ hUM puSh+pa pra be sha hUM sa rA dzA ya/

baM dI pa su gi ri/ muM shrI aM rA gA ya swA hA/ hoHgan d+he tsit+ta ho/ yak+Shi Ni mu kha hUM/ b+he ra be mu kha hUM/ a mr-i ta mu kha hUM/ mA ra Na mu kha hUM/ lte ba'i rtsibs la yab yum dang// gru chad sems dpa' yab
yum brgyad/ khyams la de bzhin brgyad gnas pa// bzhi ni sgo bzhir rab tu 'bar// thabs dang spyod pa thams cad kyis// thams cad zhi ba chen por 'gyur// rnam par rtog pa rab zhi ste// mi
rtog pa la rab tu bkod// zhi ba chen po'i cho ga 'di// zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub par bshad// zhi ba'i lha rnams rab gsal nas// zhi ba'i lha rnams spyan drangs shing// phyag 'tshal brtan
bzhugs dngos grub nod// phyi ma rmad byung bdud rtsi dang// gtor ma dag kyang sbyin par bya// bstod pa'i mchog 'dis rab tu bstod// hUM bcom ldan mi bskyod skur sprul pa// rdo rje sems dpa'
mnga' bdag nyid// nyon mongs thams cad zhi mdzad pa// rdo rje'i sku mchog phyag 'tshal bstod// yid bzhin nor bus dgos 'dod skongs// rin chen sems dpa'i mnga' bdag nyid// nga rgyal
rnam rtog nyon mongs zhi// rin chen sku mchog phyag 'tshal bstod// chags bral chags chen 'od dpag med// pad+ma sems dpa'i mnga' bdag nyid// 'dod chags rnam rtog nyon mongs zhi//
pad+ma'i sku mchog phyag 'tshal bstod// kun tu don grub ye shes sku// las kyi sems dpa'i mnga' bdag nyid// phrag dog rnam rtog nyon mongs zhi// phrin las sku mchog phyag 'tshal bstod// chos
dbyings ye shes rnam dag sku// bde gshegs rigs kyi mnga' bdag nyid// gti mug rnam rtog nyon mongs zhi// bde gshegs sku mchog phyag 'tshal bstod// rigs dang ye shes khyad par las// gang mos
gdul phyir rigs skur bzhengs// nyon mongs ma lus zhi mdzad pa// sems dpa' sems ma rnams la bstod// ye shes bzhi yi khyad par las// tshad med bzhi ldan skur sprul te// nyon mongs thams cad zhi

mdzad pa// sgo skyong rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zhi ba'i las kyis zhi bar byed// yar gyi ngo dang nyi shar dang// dkar po zlum po rab mdzes la// dkar po'i shing yang
zlum por brtsig/ dkar gsum 'bras chan la sogs ste// dkar pos zhi ba'i lha rnams mchod// spyan drang mchod bstod phrin las bcol// zhi ba'i sems kyis sngags 'di brjod// zhi ba'i 'od zer 'phro 'du
yis/ gang la bya ba zhi bar bya/ shAn+tiM ku ru sA hA/ zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// zhi bas mi 'dul sems can la// drag po'i dkyil 'khor rab spro bya// nam mkha' sa gzhi gru gsum

dbyibs// brag ri srin po'i gdong pa 'dra// mar ngor khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bri// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bri// yang na sku gsung thugs 'dus pa/ khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// sku yi dkyil

'khor bri bar bya// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan/ khros pa'i rgyan gyis rab tu mdzes// sku yi dkyil 'khor mdun phyogs su// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brtsam//

gru gsum khru gang thur bru nag/ bsgrub bya'i gzugs ni nang du'o// sku yi dkyil 'khor g.yon phyogs su// sngags kyi 'khor lo bri bar bya// bsnyen sngags sgrub sngags phrin las sngags// phrin las sngags
ni 'khrul 'khor ldan// dmigs pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa'o// sku yi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// mchod dang bstod pa rab tu bya// gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// bzlas brjod dag ni rab tu bya// thugs
kyi dkyil 'khor chen por ni/ gdugs pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu bsgral// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// bsnyen bsgrub las rnams kun rdzogs shing// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun sgrol te// phrin
las rnam bzhi lhun gyis grub// dbus dang phyogs mtshams gru gsum dgu// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor drag po'o// dbus kyi gru gsum phyi rol du// zla gam gsum la sngags rnams kyi// 'khrul 'khor gzugs su
ldan pa ni// gsung gi dkyil 'khor rab ldan pa'o// mu khyud dkar po thod phreng ldan// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor sku yi'o// ser po gru bzhi yon tan rgyas// byang shar sgo khyud gru gsum du// brnag pa'i

gzugs ldan drag po ste// sgo bzhi rigs kyi kha dog ldan// 'bar 'phro gtum rngams rgyan dang ldan// bsnyen bsgrub phrin las sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las ye shes lnga'i// gzhal yas lhun gyis grub

pa'o// gnas der phyin ci log lta rnams// bsgral na dngos grub mchog thub gyur// sku yi dkyil 'khor lte ba la// le tshe dgu ldan dbus gru gsum// dbus su khro bdag yab yum ste// shar du b+hung+d+ha kI la

ya// lhor ni rat+na kI la ya// nub tu pad+ma kI la ya// byang du karma kI la ya// sangs rgyas spyan sogs yum dang ldan// phyogs mtshams brgyad kyi rtsibs brgyad la// shar du rnam par rgyal ba ste// lho ru gshin rje'i

gshed po'o// nub tu khro bo rta mchog dpal// byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'o// shar lhor khro bo dbyug sngon can// lho nub mi g.yo mgon po'o// nub byang gzhan gyis mi thub pa// byang shar khams gsum rnam par

rgyal// mdun du khro bo hUM mdzad de// rgyab tu khro bo stobs po che// rang rang yum dang sprul par bcas// shar sgor pu shud mgo can te// lho yi sgo ru skye ka'i mgo/ nub tu srin bya'i mgo can te// byang du khra yi mgo

can no// mu ran khyams ni thams cad du// mkha' 'gro ma tshogs de bzhin dgod// sku yi dkyil 'khor de bskyed na// nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcod de// ma rungs srin po'i tshogs rnams dang// phyogs skyong

dregs pa'i tshogs rnams ni/ khro rgyal gdan du rab tu bting// der ni lha rnams spyan drangs te// hUM// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// zhe sdang bdud 'dul khro rgyal mi bzad sku// zhe sdang
gdug pa'i dgra bgegs snying la rgyob// shar phyogs gru gsum smug nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// gti mug bdud 'dul khro rgyal mi bzad sku// mi shes

rmongs pa'i dgra bgegs snying la rgyob// lho phyogs gru gsum ser nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rin chen 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// nga rgyal bdud 'dul khro rgyal mi bzad sku// nga rgyal dregs pa'i
dgra bgegs snying la rgyob// nub phyogs gru gsum dmar nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// pad+ma 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// 'dod chags bdud 'dul khro rgyal mi bzad sku// 'dod chags zhen 'dzin
can gyi snying la rgyob// byang phyogs gru gsum ljang nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// phrin las 'dus pa'i sras mchog kI la ya// phrag dog bdud 'dul khro rgyal mi bzad sku// phrag dogs dregs pa'i dgra
bgegs snying la rgyob// gnyis med khro rgyal sku la lhun sbyor ba'i/ khro mo'i skur ston 'byung lnga'i bdag mo rnams// gnod sbyin gdug pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar
ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// phyogs skyong dregs pa tshar gcod gdug pa kun 'dul mdzad// phyogs bcu'i khro rgyal yab yum gshegs su gsol// hUM bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// tshangs pa tshar
bcad gcod nyi zla pho mo 'dul// lha gdon drag po ma lus tshar bcod pa// hUM mdzad hUM chen gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// me lha'i gdon tshogs kun 'dul
zhing// bdud dang srin po rdul du rlog/ khro rgyal dbyug pa sngon po gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// gshin rje'i gdon tshogs kun 'dul zhing// 'byung po'i gdon rnams
rdul du rlog khro rgyal gshin rje'i gshed po gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// srin po'i tshogs rnams 'dul mdzad cing// bar gcod dgegs rnams 'joms mdzad pa/ khro
rgyal mi g.yo mgon po gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// klu yi gdon tshogs 'dul mdzad cing// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin
gshegs su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// rlung lha'i tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad cing// bar du gcod pa'i gdon rnams 'dul mdzad pa'i/ khro rgyal gzhan gyis mi thub gshegs
su gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// gnod sbyin gdon tshogs 'joms mdzad cing// gtum khro dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa/ khro rgyal bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gshegs su gsol// bskal
pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// 'byung po'i gdon gyi tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad cing// dbang ldan gdon gyi tshogs rnams tshar gcod pa// khro rgyal khams gsum rnam rgyal gshegs su
gsol// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// sa bdag gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul mdzad cing// sa gdon drag po ma lus tshar gcod pa'i/ khro bo'i rgyal po stobs chen gshegs su gsol/

khro rgyal sku la gnyis med 'khril ba'i yum// sgra 'byin la sogs rdo rje srin mo bcu// sprul pa mgo brnyan phra thabs yang sprul bcas// bar gcod dgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa// sgra 'byin 'khor
bcas ma lus gshegs su gsol// 'gugs 'dren sdom 'ching 'bebs pa'i las mdzad ma// phra men chen mo ye shes sgo ma bzhi// gnod gdug 'khor tshogs ma lus kun 'dul phyir// 'khor dang bcas pa ma
lus gshegs su gsol// spyan drangs lha yi dkyil 'khor rnams// so so'i las kyi sngags rnams dang// dzaHhUM baM hoH'i sngags kyis ni/ gnyis med don du bstim pa yin/ des ni bar chad tshogs
rnams kyang// rtag tu 'joms par byed pa ste/ khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs can des// bar gcod tshogs rnams rab tu btul// zhe sdang chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams sgrol bar
byed// ye shes thugs kyi phur pa yis// phyin ci log rnams tshar gcod 'gyur// rnam rtog las byung bgegs rnams la/ drag po'i 'phrin las khro bo yis// rtag tu 'dul bar bshad pa yin// dkyil 'khor
bskyed dang spyan drangs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// phur pa'i rgyu tshad gzugs bstan pa// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams dang// gser sogs ser po zangs sogs dmar// lcags sogs nag po dug

shing dang// tsher ma can la sogs pa la// mgo bo rgya mdud ri rab brjid// sked pa rgya mdud smad zur drug/ rtse mo zlum po gru bzhi dang// zla gam dang ni zur gsum rtse// shing gi rtsa ba rgya mdud de// rtse mo'i ngos
su so so'i dbal// ri rab lcung gzhog brgyad ldan brjid// sor bzhi sor brgyad sor bcu gnyis// sor ni bco brgyad dag tu bya// 'byung bzhi rnam shes tshogs brgyad dang// skye mched bcu gnyis khams bco

brgyad// gnas su dag par bya phyir tshad// tshad dang ldan pas log lta sgrol// bsnyen phur sgrub phur gdab phur dang// mngags phur la sogs de bzhin no// byang chub sems kyi phur pa ni// phur pa kun gyi rgyu

yin te// de la tshad dang rim pa med// de mtshon phyir na rgyu dang tshad/ nges pa med kyang de ltar bstan// byang chub sems ni shes rab la// de mtshon tshad dang rgyu gzugs thabs// de gnyis rgyu ru rab shes
pas// don rnams thams cad 'grub par byed// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// nges par 'joms pa nga yis bshad// de dag byin gyis brlab par bya// hUM gis rdzas kyi rtog pa bsreg/ sku gsung thugs
kyi yi ge yis// phur bu dag ni byin gyis brlab// rgya mdud dang po dag la ni// rigs lnga'i kI la ya bsgom bya// zur brgyad rgya mdud steng 'og tu/ khro bo bcu ni rab tu bsgom// logs gsum phaT la zur
gsum hUM// rnal 'byor lag pa g.yas g.yon la// dpa' bo dpa' mo bcu bsgom bya// de yis phur bu byin brlabs nas// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams sgrol bar byed// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes pas ni// dam tshig dag

dang ldan par bya// badzra any+dza li zhes pas// rdo rje thal mor gyur pa yin// sa twa rA dza hUM zhes pas// thugs kyi phur bu rab tu gyur// byin rlabs de dang ldan pas ni// rnam par rtog pa thams cad
bsreg/ drag po'i las kyi phur bu yis// rnam par rtog pa kun grol a// rtse mo dag la rab gnas pa// byang chub sems kyi gnas len no// phur bu dag la dbang bskur ba// gu gul tshil chen

dud pas bdug/ nyung dkar bstim zhing rak+tas byug/ A+oM ma ku ta la pra ta la hUM phaT/ ra rak+ta dz+wa la hUM/ khro bcu'i sngags kyis nyung dkar bstim// byin brlab tshul bzhin byas nas kyang// sku gsung thugs kyis
dbang bskur ba'i// ye shes thugs kyi phur pa 'dis/ nyon mongs dug lnga rab rgyas te// zhen pa phyin ci log la brtas// gnod gdug sdang sems ldan pa'i rnams// bsgral te mi rtogs don la gzhag/ bcom
ldan thugs kyi sprul pa yi/ khro rgyal la sogs 'jigs pa'i sku// ma rungs tshogs rnams kun 'dul ba/ khro rgyal gzugs chen de yis ni// ma rungs thams cad de yis sgrol// 'khrul pa'i bag chags kun sbyong
ba// ye shes thugs kyi khro bo ste// sna tshogs gzugs su rab tu ston// de yis gdug pa kun btul nas// thams cad bde la bkod mdzad pa// ye shes thugs kyi khro bo yin/ khro bo'i gzugs can phur bu
yis// gnyis med don la rab tu bkod// rU tra 'jigs pa'i ngang tshul can// gdul phyir khro bo chen po'i skur// bstan te nga rgyal bcom pa yin// de phyir ye shes khro bo ni// gdug pa ma lus kun sgrol

mdzad// byang chub sems kyi phur bu ni// rnam par rtog pa kun 'joms byed// phur bu'i rgyu tshad dang dbyibs dang ni// skur gsal byin brlab byas pa yis// rnam rtog sgrol ba rab tu bshad// phur bu'i rgyu dang
gzugs dang tshad dang sku dang byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////
byin rlabs phur bu de dag kyang// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu dgod// mchod sogs las kyi cho ga bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor las de dag/ rnal 'byor stobs dang ldan pas bya// snod ldan rab tu mi g.yo'i
bus// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ram// yang na 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor der// gsol gdab gnang sbyin sems bskyed dang// yon 'bul ci rigs sdom pa sbyin// der ni phur bu'i dbang skur bya// chu

dang dbu rgyan rdo rje dang// dril bu meng dang rgyal po byin// dur khrod chas kyi dbang rnams dang// nang dang gsang ba'i dbang mchog byin// nyon mongs thams cad dag par byed// rnam par rtog pa kun 'joms
pa// dbang gi las kyis byed pa yin// dang po dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yang// ci rigs pa yis gsol gdab cing// gnang ba yang ni de bzhin bya/ khro bo yig 'bru phyag mtshan gyi// 'phro 'dus bar du gcod pa

bsal// spyi dang khyad par lhag pa yi// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// A+oM rat+na puSh+pe A bI ra hUM khaM/ zhes// mi 'phangs sems kyis ci 'byor dbul// spyi dang khyad par lhag pa yi// sdom pa

dag ni sbyin byas te// sku gsung thugs kyi yig 'bru yis// de yi lus ngag yid gsum bkru// dam chu blud de sdom pa bsgrag/ drag po'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// rigs kyi bu khyod 'jug par byos// spyi dang

khyad par lhag pa yi// dam tshig gnyan las khyod ma 'da'/ khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga// nga yis ci ltar bsgo ba bzhin// bu khyod kyis kyang bya dgos so// dkyil 'khor gsang ba ma mthong zhing// gsang ba dam pa

ma mthong la// gsang ba dam pa smra ma byed/ khyod kyis sems can srog ma gcod// ma byin len pa rdzun la sogs// mi dge'i las ni spangs bar gyis// 'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// sman lnga snying po lnga la

sogs// phyi yi chu dbang rab tu sbyin// sna tshogs rin chen bum pas bya// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi ldan pa'i// rang byung rang gi bum pas bya// yab yum gsang ba'i snying por ldan// rang byung gsang ba'i bum

pas bya// rin chen so so'i skur byung ba'i// dbu rgyan rab tu bya ba yin// me tog phreng dang cod pan dang// rgyan dang go cha de bzhin gdugs// rin chen las byas rdo rje dang// tshad ldan dril bus de dbang

bskur// ming dang chu dang dam tshig gsum// rdo rje dri'i bu'i phyag rgya dang/ rdo rje brtul zhugs skyabs sbyin gyis// slob dpon dbang ni rab tu sbyin// ngan song gnas ni dbang gis 'joms// drag po'i rdzas dbang

gdug pa sgrol// rnga dang zhing chen thod pa dang// ha sta'i g.yab mo gling bu dang/ khrag zhag thal ba'i thig le dang// me dang stag sbrul glang lpags kyis// dbang bskur bas ni gdug pa 'dul// bza' bca' bgo
btung 'dod yon 'phel// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs bram ze'i rigs// rigs can bu mo mtshan ldan ma// bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad lon// si hA ga pur yod pa

yin// bu mo mtshan ni 'di dag ldan// sha rtsi dkar zhing so tshags dam// skra ni lcang lo g.yas su 'khyil// mig ni dkyus ring ut+pal 'dra// smin mtshams bar ni ma chad cing// brtul zhugs spyod pa spyod nus

pa// yang na mtshan ldan bu mo ni// ut+pal bzhin du sngo sangs ma// ra ba bzhi yi nya bzhi la// gzung thabs bzhi ni 'gyur byed cing// rtog med snying rje chos la dad// de ldan gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro// dngos
grub rtags kyi phyag rgya yis// gsang ba'i man ngag de dbang bskur// drod gsum dang ni ldan byas pa'i// dbang gsum dam tshig ldan la sbyin// bde bas myos la brgyal bar 'gyur// man ngag dbang bskur de
bzhin bya// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba// mtshan ldan shes rab dag la ni// sna tshogs dri yis rab brgyan cing// bsrub dang bsrub pa'i thabs dag las// mi rtog pa ni rab tu skye// dga'

dang mchog tu dga' ba dang// mngon dga' rang bzhin dga' ba ste// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// bgrod byed man ngag dag gis so// dang po dga' ba'i dus su ni// dbus kyi rgyu ba bcu dag la// chu tshod

lnga par sbyar byas te// gzung dang bzlog pa de bzhin bya// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya ni// chu tshod sum cu gnyis ldan byas// dbyu gu'ang drug cu rtsa bzhi yin// phra mo'i thun ni drug cu bzhi// chen po thun bzhi thun

brgyad yin// dga' ba'i gnas su dbugs dang ni// thun tshod chu tshod brtsi byas te// de bzhin dga' ba'i dus su ni// thun tshod chu tshod de bzhin bslab// bde ba gang skyes gnas der ni// man ngag dag kyang
der bstan bya// skad cig dus dang za ma la// nyin dang mtshan du de bzhin bslab// zla ba la sogs de bzhin bslab// de don man ngag bcas pa ni// shes rab dbang bskur rab tu bshad// bzhi pa'i dbang ni

bskur bya ste// rlung gi rang bzhin de shes shing// bo la kak+ko la sbyar la// rang bzhin bde bskor phan tshun 'byung// gzung du med de brjod du med// rtog pa kun dang bral ba yi// rang bzhin 'od gsal der
gnas pa// tshig sogs dbang gi rang bzhin sbyin// rtog pa'i bag chags 'joms par byed// dbang gsum 'bras bu de yin no// dbang bzhi rab tu ldan pa yis// kun rdzogs gnas bzhi'i gnas su
bkru// lus gyi rnam rtog sbyang ba dang// bag chags dri ma bkru ba'i phyir// dbang bskur rab tu sbyin pa yin// dam tshig med pa phal rnams la// dbang dag sbyin par mi bya'o// slob dpon slob ma shi
ma thag/ mnar med gnas su nges par ltung// dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// snod dang sbyar te de dbang bskur// dam tshig nyams par ma gyur na// lam rnams rab tu bgrod byed par// dbang
mchog 'di yis byed pa yin// dbang bskur dam pa 'di yis ni// gnod gdug sgrol bar nus pa yin// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////

gzhan yang dam tshig bstan bya ba// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig dag/ rtag tu bsrung bar bya ba yin// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// rtsa ba'i dam tshig dag tu shes// mi spang ba dang dang du blang// shes dang
bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ni// yan lag dam tshig yin par bshad// dam rdzas dag la longs spyod cing// rtog med dpa' ba'i go gon pa// dam tshig dag tu ngas bshad do// dam tshig dag la rab gnas
pas// las rnams thams cad 'grub pa yin// sku yi dkyil 'khor chen po ni// las kyi bya ba kun byed pa// drag po'i rdzas rnams ldan pa la// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun 'dul bya// dur khrod
chen po'i gnas dag tu// drag po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu brtsam// sa brtag sa zung byin gyis brlab// dang po brtags pa'i gnas chen der// sngags mkhan bya ba kun byas te// sta gon gnas pa'i bya ba

byas// mchod dang sdom pa gzung ba dang// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro bya// so shing srung skud ku sha sbyin// sems bskyed phyir ni chos bshad bya// lha rnams mchod pas mnyes byas la// 'bru dang sman dang

snying po dang// rin chen kha rgyan mgul chings can// dri med dag pa'i bum pa la// tshul bzhin du ni bsnyen pa bya// dkyil 'khor skyang nul thig gdab pa// srad bu lnga dang ldan pa yis// thig ni rab tu gdab pa
ste// lha dang gny-is med gnas pa'i thig/ mchod byas ye shes thig ni gdab// gnyis pa gzugs brnyan thig gdab bo// tshangs thig dang po gdab pa ste// tshangs thig gnyis pa de bzhin gdab// de bzhin
phyogs mtshams ma 'khrul gdab// cha brgyad de gses bcu drug cha// cha phran drug cu rtsa bzhir gdab// dbus bzhi phyi rol bcu drug bskor// phyi rol sgo dang rgyan du bya// dkyil 'khor thig de btab nas
kyang// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yin// gru gsum nyi shu gcig tu gdab// gsum ni le'u tshe'i dkyil 'khor bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lor ldan// sku gsung thugs 'dus dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil
'khor kun gyi dam pa'o// sngon po la sogs tshon rnams ni// dpa' bo 'bru lngas byin gyis brlab// gzhung dang mthun par tshon dgye ste// drag po'i rdzas rnams rab tu gsog/ lhu dum bcad 'phro dum bu
dang// sgal rtsib klad pa khrag dang mgo/ gru gsum mthing nag gtor mar bcas// dug sogs drag po'i rdzas rnams bsngags// mkha' 'gro'i rdzas dang bcas pa ni// bsags te mchod pa bya ba yin// gdug
pa'i rdzas dang sngags kyis ni// gnod cing gdug pa bsgral bar bya// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor ni// dug dang gdug pa'i rdzas kyis bskor// smug nag gzugs kyang de nang gzhug/ drag po'i thun rdzas

der bsag bya// zangs phye rdo phye lcags phye dang// drag pa'i las kyi phur pas ni// gdug pa thams cad sgrol ba yin// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad kun/ khro bo chen por gyur pa ste// nyon mongs thams cad

sgrol bar mdzad// sngags kyi 'od zer drag po ni// tsha tsha'i 'od zer ltar 'phro zhing// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba yin// sngags dang phyag rgya rab ldan pas// khro bo'i lus ni thams cad kyang// ye shes me dang
bcas pa bsgom// gdug pa bsgral phyir bshad pa yin// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/ dam tshig dang thig rdzas kyi le'u ste drug pa'o////
de nas khro bo rnam par rgyal bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// bzlas brjod bsam pa ji ltar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam rtog

nyon mongs gzhom pa'i phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// bzlas pa bya ba'i rim pa ni// mtshan ma can dang mtshan med de// rnam rtog bag chags spyod pa'i phyir// mtshan med bzlas pa ting 'dzin

bya// rang gi lus kyis lus kyi gnas rnams su// 'khor lo bzhi ni rab tu gnas// bde chen 'khor lor gyur pa ni// rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas// yi ge'ang de bzhin ldan pa'o// longs spyod rtsa ni bcu drug

ste// yi ge'ang de bzhin gnas pa yin// chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams ni// rtsa dang yi ge brgyad du gnas// sprul pa'i rtsa ni drug cu bzhi// yi ge'ang de bzhin gnas pa'o// dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge

ni// mtshan dang dpe byad rang bzhin te// 'khor lo bzhi yi gnas su bya// drag po'i las kyi sngags rnams kyang/ 'khor lo la ni rab tu dgod// thabs dang shes rab spyor ba las// sbyor ba'i bde ba chen po
ni// 'khor lo'i rim pa rnams su gnas// yi ge dag tu der gzhug cing// bde ba dag kyang rab tu bskyed// rnam par rtog pa kun sbyong ba'i// 'od zer dag kyang kun tu spro// 'khor lo bzhi yi gnas dag
tu// dga' bzhi dag tu gnas pa yin// rnam par rtog pa kun sbyong ba'i// thabs 'di dag gis byed pa yin// las kyi rlung ni srog tu bshad// sems can gzugs su byed pa yin// byed pa'i rlung ni gnyis yin

te// rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam gnyis so// rgyu ni rnam lngar shes par bya// khyab byed thur du sel ba dang// me dang mnyam du gnas pa'i rlung// srog dang gyen du 'gro ba'i rlung/ rgyu zhes rab tu bshad pa yin// 'bras

bu'i rlung ni rnam lnga ste// rgyu dang rnam par rgyu ba dang// yang dag rgyu dang rab tu rgyu// de bzhin nges par rgyu ba'o// rlung ni bcu po de dag gis// las ni rnam par byed pa ni// byed pa'i rlung zhes rab tu bshad// rlung

ni bcu po 'di rnams kyis// 'khor lo'i gnas ni thams cad du// byang chub sems kyi 'pho ba byed/ bde ba'ang de bzhin der bskyed de// steng gi 'pho ba zhes ni grags// byang chub sems kyi phur bu ni// A li

kI li dag par byung// des ni nyon mongs sgrib pa rnams// thams cad sreg par byed pa yin// spyi bo bde chen 'khor lo ste// rtsa chen yi ge'i gnas su bshad// kI la'i yi ge der brjod do// rtsa bran kun nas
'od zer ni// byang chub sems kyi phur bu rgyu// bde chen gnas su zhi bar bya// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ste// chen po gsum dang kI la'i sngags// rab tu rgyu bar bshad pa yin// rtsa ni 'od

zer rgyu ba ste// byang chub sems kyi phur pa yin// mgrin pa'i gnas su longs spyod 'phel// snying gar chos kyi 'khor lo ste// byang chub sems kyi phur bu rgyu// snying gar dag ni der rgyas nas// thams cad ma lus

'gugs par byed// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste// chen po nas ni kI la rgyu// phra mo nas ni 'od zer rgyu// byang chub sems kyi phur bu 'phro// gnas der thams cad bsgral ba yin// kI la ya yi sgra sgrogs
shing// gnas de dag tu rab tu rgyu// gnyis med sbyor ba bde ba las// spros med chen po'i 'od zer gyis// rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsreg/ byang chub sems kyi phur bu 'di// 'khor lo bzhi la rab tu
gnas// 'phro ba rlung gis rab tu byed// bde stong nam mkha' lta bu ste// las dang nyon mongs rnam rtog dag/ byang chub sems kyi me spar bas// 'og nas g.yo ba rlung gis bskyod// des kyang me ni rab

tu 'bar// bo la kak+ko la sbyar te// steng dang 'og gi 'pho ba yin// des bskyed bde ba dag la ni// byang chub sems kyi phur pa'o// des ni 'khor lo rnam rgyas pa// dga' ba rnams su rab tu bshad// g.yas na

kI la ya rgyu ba// g.yon na big+h+nAM rgyu ba gnyis// byang chub sems kyi yig 'bru ste// mi rtog bskyed phyir rtsa nas rgyu// 'od zer byang sems phur bur rgyu// 'khor lo bzhi yi gnas dag tu// 'od zer kha dog so so

yis// phrin las rnam bzhi rab tu byed// mig nas snying ga mgrin pa dang// kI la ya dang big+h+nAM sngags// phrin las so so'i las sngags sbyar// gnas bzhir bzlas pa'i 'od zer gyis// dga' ba bzhi ni rab
bskyed de// mtshan ma'i ting 'dzin la brten nas// mtshan med mi rtog ye shes bskyed// mtshan mar bcas pa'i bzlas pa yang// drag po'i las kyi sngags kyis so// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul bar
byed// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams/

khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul gyis bsgral ba dang// lus ngag rdul du bshigs nas kyang// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// bud+d+ha kI li kI la

ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM hUM phaT/ hUM laM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM hUM phaT/ mo ha g+hA ta ya rat+na kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM hUM phaT/ b+ha ga wAn pad+ma kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM hUM phaT/ shI g+h+raM bi kri kar+m+ma

kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM hUM phaT/ thabs dang shes rab ldan phyir ro// s+t+wam+b+ha nan kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM hUM phaT/ huM kA ra hUM/ hUM kA ra hUM a/ hUM kA ra hUM a/ bi dza ya a/ nI la daN+Da a/

ya mAn+ta ka a/ Ar+ya a tsa la a/ ha ya grI wa a/ a pa ra dzi ta a/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li a/ trai lo kya bi dza ya a/ nyon mongs bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// lha rnams sngags 'dis skye med bsgom// dngos grub bar
gcod byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// ring par khug la smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir

bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis// hUM pa ra bid+h+wan+sa/ 'di yis thams cad mgo mnan la// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i las sngags kyis// thams cad ma lus sgrol ba

yin// ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ mi g.yo mgon po'i las sngags kyis// thams cad ma lus bcing ba yin// ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ khams gsum rnam rgyal las sngags kyis// thams cad ma lus sgrol bar byed// b+hin

d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM phaT/ rta mchog dpal gyi las sngags kyis// thams cad ma lus 'dzin par byed// gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ rnam par rgyal ba'i las sngags kyis// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms par byed// ha na ha na hUM

phaT// khro rgyal thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// drag po las kyi thun sngags 'byung// ha sa ya ra ha sa ya ra hUM phaT/ A we sha ya A we sha ya hUM phaT/ shI g+h+raM A na ya hUM phaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ ta thA ya

ta thA ya hUM phaT/ b+hin d+ha ya b+hin d+ha ya hUM phaT/ sngags drug las kyi 'khor lo 'dis// ma rungs pa rnams rnam par sgrol// thams cad ma lus rdul du rlog khro rgyal 'dus pa'i dmod mo yin// 'khor lo dag ni
bskor bya zhing// gsang ba'i gnas su gsad bya yin// gdug pa sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// bsgrub bya dag ni sgrol bar byed// sngags kyi 'od zer bskul nas ni// lus kyi rtsa rnams thams cad du// 'od zer
dag ni rgyas byas te// stong grogs byed la sogs pa dbral// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun sgrol te// 'khrul 'khor dag tu rab tu bzlas// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas

pa// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs/ khro bo rnam rgyal ting 'dzin gyis// gdug pa gdul phyir gzi byin bskyed// ha na ha na badzra// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams bsgral

ba'i phyir/ khro rgyal dbyug sngon ting 'dzin gyis// gdug pa bsreg phyir sngags 'di brjod// da ha da ha badzra/ zhe sdang can rnams tshar bcad phyir// khro rgyal gshin rje'i gshed po yis// thams cad gsad phyir

gzi byin bskyed// pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ye shes thugs kyi phra men ma// shwa na mi kha'i sngags kyis ni// byin brlabs gzi byin bskyed pa yin// ma tha ma tha badzra// ye shes tshogs kyi srung ma ni// bse mo

bzhi yi sngags dag gis// gzi byin dag ni bskyed pa yin// dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ dza ye bi dza ye badzra/ ye shes khro bo chen po yis// sngags 'dis gdug pa sgrol bar byed// a dzi te

a pa ra dzi ta/ mA ra se na phra marda na ye hUM phaT/ gzi byin dag ni rab bskyed nas// rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa yin// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig chen gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo
chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren rnams// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// bdag nyid chen mo'i sngags 'di yis// gdug pa thams cad sgrol bar byed// hUM ma ma

ba shaM ku ru ma tang nya ka ra i dan/ d+ha d+hi ma ma karma shI g+h+raM kA ra ya/ sngags 'dis dug gsum sgrol byed cing// drag po'i las rnams byed par 'gyur// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha'am gnod sbyin
bdud kyang rung// nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par gyis// hUM mdzad stobs chen khro bo yis// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams thams cad bsgral/ sngags don 'di dag rab ldan

pas// bsgrub bya thams cad sgrol bar byed// mtshan bcas bzlas pa de bshad de// bsgrub bya rtag tu sgrol ba yin// mtshan bcas phyi yi bzlas pa ni// snying ga nas ni spro bya zhing// 'od zer gyis ni khams gsum

bsgral// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// zhe sdang can rnams bsgral bar bya// bsgrub pa'i bar gcod thams cad kyang// sngags kyi 'od zer drag pos bsgral// gsang ba'i gnas nas spro bar bya// bsgrub bya dag
ni der bsgral te// nga rgyal bcas pa bcom nas kyang// ye shes phur pa'i 'od zer ni// bar mtshams med par bskor ba yin// sngags kyi 'od zer de yis ni// bsgral phyir 'khor lo drug kyang bskor// las
dang nyon mongs thams cad la// 'khrul 'khor gtsang mas 'khor lo bskor// de yis gdug pa kun sgrol te// las ni thams cad 'grub pa yang// drag po 'di yis byed par 'gyur// ye shes thugs kyi phur bu
las// byang chub sems kyi 'od 'phro zhing// nyon mongs thams cad bsreg par bsgom/ khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis// gdug pa sngags kyi sgra sgrogs shing// zhe sdang nga rgyal la sogs 'joms/ khro

rngams chen pos khams gsum sgrol// sprul pa pho nya bka' nyan gyis// de yi sdig sgrib sbyangs te bsgral// bzlas pa gnyis kyis las kun 'grub// de ltar thugs rjes bsgrub bya bsgral// phur pa phrin las kyi
rgyud las/ bskyed rdzogs mtshan bcas mtshan med kyi bzlas pa 'khor lo'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////
drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// bgegs dang log 'dren bar gcod sogs// bsad cing brdeg sogs thabs gang lags// rdzas ni gang dang gang gis bgyi// rnam par rgyal bas de skad gsol// de skad
gsol gsan bka' stsal pa// dngos grub bar gcod byed la sogs// bsad cing bcing ba'i las tshogs ni// sngags dang rdzas dang ldan par bya// ye shes thugs kyi phur bu yis// drag po'i sngags ni bzla bar
bya// tshon skud sna lngas mgo rkang bcing// ye shes thugs kyi phur bu dang// dug dang rdzas su bcas pa ni// btab pas thams cad gsod par 'gyur// bzlas pa gsum dang ldan pas ni// bar gcod thams cad
sgrol bar byed// drag po'i las kyi thun btab na// bsgrub bya dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur// sdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// thun btab bsreg pa'i las ni bya// las kyi sngags ni thams cad kyis// bar gcod

log lta thams cad bsgral// pho nya'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// bar gcod thams cad rtag tu bsgral// las kyi rim pa bya ba yang// sbyin sreg dag ni rab tu bya/ thams cad ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// shin tu

kha dog dkar la 'tsher// zhi ba'i thab khung de byas te/ khru gang khru do'i tshad du bya// 'bras thug 'o thug dkar gsum dang// mngar gsum dang ni rab ldan te// zhi ba'i rdzas ni ma lus bsag/ me tog dkar po

til dkar dang// 'bras chan til sogs dngul phye bsag/ bsreg shing khru gang tshad byas te// yam shing mtho gang sor bzhi bya// shin tu dri zhim dri yis byug/ raM las zhi ba'i me lha ni// srun la kha dog dkar po
ste// 'od zer dkar po 'khyil tshul 'phro// ra skyes dkar po'i gdan la bzhug/ bgrang phreng ril ba phyag na bsnams// nyon mongs thams cad zhi mdzad pa// me lha gsal bsgom spyan drangs la// bstims te

zhal bsil bsreg blug bdun// phul te gang 'dod zhi bar bcol// oM ag+na ye ha bya ka bya/ ba ha na ya di bya swA hA// de nas gtso bo yab yum dang// phyogs kyi khro bo lnga rnams la// cho ga gong bzhin rdzogs pa

dang// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bsreg blug 'bul/ khro bo bcu po yab yum la// brgya rtsa brgyad ni dbul bar bya// phra men sprul pa'i tshogs la bdun// sgo skyong la yang bdun 'bul te// so so'i sngags kyi gsham

dag la// 'di zhes bya ba zhi gyur cig/ shIn+taM ku ru swA hA// de byas gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ni// thams cad ma lus zhi bar 'gyur// rgyas pa'i las kyis sbyin sreg ni// gser 'dra'i thab khung khru de'i
tshad// brkos te phyi rol gru bzhir bya// sreg shing bud shing khru do'i tshad// me tog ser po nyung dkar dang// mar dang sbrang rtsi bur ram gser// 'bras dang 'o thug la sogs te// rgyas pa'i
rdzas rnams so sor bsag/ raM las me lha'i sku bskyed de// srun la kha dog ser po ste// 'od zer ser po phyogs bcur 'gyed// ra skyes ser po'i gdan la bzhugs// bgrang phreng dang ni spyi blug 'dzin// ci
'dod dngos po rgyas mdzad pa'i// me lha gsal bsgoms spyan drangs la// bstim te zhal bsil bsreg blug 'bul// phul te gang 'dod rgyas par bcol// oM ag+na ye ha bya ka bya// ba ha na ye di bya di bya swA

hA/ dang po gtso bo yab yum la// de 'og rigs lnga'i kI la ya// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bsreg blug 'bul/ khro bo khro mo nyi shu la// bsreg blug nyi shu rtsa gcig 'bul// phra men sprul pa sgo skyong dang// sras
mchog dag la bdun bdun 'bul// so so'i sngags kyi gsham dag la// 'di zhes bya ba rgyas gyur cig/ puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ tshe dang bsod nams la sogs te// gang 'dod thams cad rgyas par 'gyur// dbang

gi las kyi sbyin sreg ni/ kha dog dmar po'i sa gzhi la/ khru do'am khru bzhi zla gam brko// phyi rol rgyar yang de bzhin bya// phyi rol kha dog nag po la// phyag rgya bzhi yis mtshan par bri/ kha dog dmar po'i
shing rnams la// zla gam khru do khru bzhi brtsig/ bud shing yam shing de bzhin no// 'bras thug 'o thug dmar por bya// me tog dmar po yungs mar dang// sbyar ba'i bsreg rdzas rab tu 'bul// raM las me
lha dmar por bskyed// spyan drangs bstims te zhal bsil la// sreg blug bdun phul dbang las bcol// oM ag+na ye ha bya ka bya di bya di bya ye// che ge mo ba shang ku ru swA hA/ dang po dkon mchog gsum

la mchod// rtsa ba yab yum rigs lnga yi// kI la ya la brgya rtsa brgyad/ khro bo yab yum nyi shu brgyad// phra men sgo ba sras mchog la// bsreg blug bdun ni dbul bar bya// so so'i sngags kyi gsham dag la//

'di zhes bya ba dbang du sdus// ba shang ku ru swA hA/ gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// drag po'i las kyi sbyin sreg ni// sa gzhi kha dog nag po la// gru gsum khru gang thur du brko// phyi rol khru do'am khru

drug tshad// mdung dang ral gri dgra s+t+wa dang// mda' gzhu de bzhin mtshon gyis bskor// phyi rol thod pa me ri bri// shin tu gdug pa'i shing rnams la// khru gang gru gsum dbyings su brtsig/ de bzhin yam shing

la sogs bsag/ zangs phye rdo phye lcags phye dang// dug sna mung+ga'i chan dug sna// khrag sna sha sna snying sna dang// dug gi me tog sna tshogs dang// me tog nag po sna tshogs dang// til nag khra bo nag po'i 'bru//
raM las me lha nag po bskyed// spyan drangs bstim zhing zhal bsil la// bsreg blug bdun phul mngon spyod bcol// oM ag+na ye ha bya ka bya wa ha na ye di bya di bya che ge mo mA ra ya phaT// rtsa ba

yab yum rigs lnga yi// kI la ya la brgya rtsa brgyad// khro bo khro mo nyi shu gcig/ phra men sgo ba'i tshogs rnams dang// sras mchog tshogs la bdun bdun phul// so so'i sngags kyi gsham dag la// brnag pa

'di kho na mA ra ya// bstod de sbyin sreg bcol bar bya// hUM zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun/ khros pas yud kyis brlag par mdzad// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med//
chags pa'i rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// chags pas sdud la dbang mdzad de// dbang du ma gyur gang yang med// nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab
'byams kun// dpal dang gzi brjid chen po rnams// yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzad// gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams 'dir rab 'byams kun// yud tsam gyis ni zhi mdzad de// zhi

mdzad grub la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas thab khung rim pa yang// kun gyi dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan// zhi ba'i kha khyer zla tshes mtshan// rgyas pa nya dang nyi 'od do// dbang la pad+ma dmar pos mtshan// zhi ba

rje'u rigs khyim gyi me// rgyas pa rgyal po las byung ba'o// dbang ni bram ze smad 'tshong ma'o// drag po bshan pa'i khyim gyi me// de ltar las des bsgrub bya sgrol// drag po'i sngags kyis zil mnan la// grogs
dang phral te dgug cing dbab// bcings shing gzir la phur pas gdab// mtshon gyis gtubs te gtun gyis rdung// lhag ma med par bstab ste bsgral// thams cad nga rgyal bcag pa'i phyir// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg

bya ba yin// tshe dang bsod nams spel ba'i phyir// rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg de bzhin bya// thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// dbang gi sbyin sreg bya ba yin// gnod gdug bar gcod sgrol ba'i phyir// a b+hi tsar+ya'i
sbyin sreg bya// las bzhis las rnams kun rdzogs 'grub// phur pa 'phrin las kyi rgyud las/ a b+hi tsar+ya'i sreg pa dang bcas pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// thugs
kyi dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag/ byin brlabs phur pa de dag kyang// sku stod zhal gsum drag po'i sku// phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// sku smad phur bu zur gsum ste// rU tra'i gdan la rab tu
bzhugs// gru gsum gnas ni thams cad du// de lta'i sku ni rab tu bskyed// tshogs de rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs// der ni drag po'i rdzas rnams dag/ bsags te gdab pa'i las rnams kyang// ye
shes thugs kyi phur bu ni// gsal bkod 'od zer tshul bzhin spro// dgug gzhug la sogs sngags rnams kyis// bsgrub bya dag la las rdzogs bya// gsal ba gsum dang ldan pa yis// teng
'dzin bsgoms te gdab par bya// zhe sdang sku ni gsal ba las// kI la ya yi sngags bzlas nas// zhe sdang sku ni gsal gdab bya// kI la ya sogs sngags dang ni// khro rgyal sngags dang bcas pas ni// sku

gsal bsgom te khrus lud bya// skye med khrus kyis rab dag nas// gzi byin bskyed de gdab par bya// dza ye bi dza ye a dzi te/ a ba ra dzi te// ka taM ka ye sngags kyi gdab// kun gzhi nyon mongs ar gsal

bya// a de bdag la rab bstim pa// tsho zhes bya ste dngos grub blangs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta// ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA wAk+ka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA

tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bdag gis sku gsung thugs thob nas// bsgrub bya'i byung tshor sgo dgag bya// gnas brgyad dag tu phur bu gdab// phung po'i rten ni gcad pa'i phyir// ba ra bi d+h+wan mgo re la// de

bzhin tshogs rnams thams cad kun// gsal bar bsgoms la mnan te bsdams// rnam shes rten ni rtsad gcad phyir// bdud rtsi 'khyil pas gdab par bya// ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ snying la btab ste kun

gzhi'i rten// dag par byas te bsgral ba'o/ khams gsum rnam rgyal sngags kyis ni// dpung mgo gnyis su gdab par bya// zhe sdang rnam par dag phyir ro// b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ rta mchog dpal gyi dbyi gnyis

la// gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT// rnam par rgyal ba gsang bar gdab// skye rgyun dag ni rab tu gcod// ha na ha na hUM phaT// mi g.yo mgon pos mtshogs mar gdab// ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT// bsgrub bya bsgral phyir rnam

shes rten// byung tshor sgo ni dgag phyir gdab// ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a dza te/ a pa ra dzi te/ mig gnyis rna ba

gnyis dang ni// sna bug gnyis dang lce la gdab// mgrin pa snying ga khrag sbal dang// nyon mongs yid la rab tu gdab// gardza gardza ta thA ya hUM phaT/ 'ju thag gcad phyir spyi bor gdab// s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya sarba

A na ya hUM phaT/ rten phur dbyung phyir mthil du'o// gdab pa kun gyi gong du ni// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul dbrog phyir gdab// nyon mongs mnar ba'i sems can dag/ 'khor ba'i gnas nas drang ba'i phyir// rdo rje
phur bus rab tu gdab// ngan song rgyu ni des tshar bcad// rgya mdud gnyis dang logs brgyad dang// dpal dang bcas pa'i 'od zer gyis// ngan song gsum ni der sbyong byed// phur bu'i 'od zer chen po
des// bdag dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub bya// sngags kyi 'od zer drag po de// spros pas gzhan gyi sdig pa 'joms// bsdus pas bdag gi sdig pa 'joms// phur bu'i 'od zer de bsgoms
shing// rnam rtog thams cad des sgrol byed// drag po'i las ni thams cad kyang// snying rjes zin pa'i zhe sdang gis// nyon mongs gnas su dag byas bsgral// thugs kar bzlas pa'i 'khor los bzla// sku
gsung thugs su rab bzlas shing// bdag dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub bya// sngags drug las kyi 'khor lo yis// gzas pa skad cig gcig gis sgral// phur bu'i 'od zer char gyi ni// bdag dang gzhan gyi don

bsgrub bya// mkha' 'gro'i las kyi sngags kyis ni// nyon mongs gnod gdug tshar gcad bya// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang// rgya gram dbyug to mtshon cha'i char// thabs la mkhas pas gdug pa sgrol// thugs kyi
dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// sngags kyi 'od zer drag po yis// ngan song gsum la sogs pa bsgral// skye med rnam dag lam la dgod// ye shes thugs kyi phur bu yis// rnam rtog tshar gcod gnyis med

dgod// yi ge 'bru lnga 'od zer lngas// rgyud lnga'i las kyi sgo bkag nas// rnam shes hUM du gsal gyur te// nyon mongs las kyi phung po dag/ rnam rtog thams cad rgyas pas ni// las dang nyon mongs des byas
pas// sdug bsngal phung po sred len blangs// rnam rtog las las byung ba yi// srid pa'i phung por rten bcas nas// ma rig 'du byed rnam shes chags// ming gzugs reg tshor rga shi'i lam// ngan song sdug

bsngal des sbyang phyir// lan chags dgag zhing sdig pa bshags// shes pa rten bstim sems bskyed skyabs// so so'i khro rgyal chen po dang// sprul pa'i pho nya yig 'bru dang// 'od zer khro mo bum chu a yis

bkrus// 'dod yon lnga yis tshim byas shing// khyad par sems bskyed dam tshig dbab// rigs kyi lhar brtag de bsgral lo// de dag sbyang phyir las kyi rgyud// nga yis nges par rab tu bshad// sems kyi phur

bu thibs pa na/ khams gsum bsgral zhes de la brjod// nyi shu rtsa gcig phur bu ni// rnam shes dag gi rang bzhin la// phyis nyid mi 'khor bya ba'i phyir// nyon mongs phung po dag pa la// phur pa gdab cing lhar
gsal dgod// khro rgyal ting 'dzin gsal bas ni// phung po lhar gsal rnam shes sems// mi rtog don gyi lam la dgod// gnyis med don gyi rang bzhin la// dgod pa nyid du bya ba ste// stong nyid don la rab
gnas pa// sdig pa thams cad der bcom ste// byang chub sems kyi phur pa yin// rtsa bas khams gsum yang dag bsgral// phur bu'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros// de don rtogs na thebs pa yin// lus
sems bral na 'khyams pa yin// phung po ja ril bsgangs byas la// de nas ye shes bum chus bkru// shes pa dag la chags pa yi// sngon gyi lan chags gang yod dang/ khog srung dag la lan
chags bkar// bden pa'i bka' bsgo drag pos bskrad// sil bur byas te dkyil 'khor dgod// snying ni dbus su dgod par bya// mgo ni shar la glo ba lho// mchin pa nub ste mkhal ma byang// mcher ba shar

stod bkod nas kyang// gtso bo yab yum rigs lnga yi// kI la ya lnga rim gyis dgod// mig gnyis shar dang shar lhor dgod// rna ba lho dang lho nub tu// lce ni nub tu sna bug byang// mgrin pa byang du dgod par

bya// byang shar lhen sna gsang ba'o// klad pa steng du dgod par bya// g.yas kyi sog pa shar du ste// dpung pa shar lho lag ngar lho// g.yon gyi sog pa lho nub ste// dpung pa nub tu dgod par bya// lag ngar nub

byang dag tu'o// dpyi g.yas byang ste brla byang shar// rjai ngar 'og gi phyogs su ste// rkang g.yon brla dang rje ngar steng// dpyi ni shar lho'i mtshams su dgod// nam tshod shar smad g.yas g.yon rtsib// lho dang lho

nub smad du dgod// brang nub nu ma g.yas g.yon dang// tshong ra mjug tho byang shar 'god// lag mthil rkang mthil sgo skyong ngo// ci rigs don gyi sa la sbyar// bsreg pa'i las kyang de bzhin no// snying

rje chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// sems can don ni bya ba yin// de don rtogs na thebs pa yin// de lta'i las tshad phrin las mchog/ phur bu phrin las kyi rgyud las/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor phur bu [\[]pa [\]]gdab
pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////

de nas phur bu gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// dmar nag le'u tshe'i dkyil 'khor la// drag po las kyi lha rnams dgod// dbus su rdo rje rgya gram ste// rdo rje'i lte bar kI la ya'i// sngags ni rab tu bsgrims te

bri// phyogs bzhi'i rwa ni bzhi rnams la// rigs bzhi kI la ya rnams kyi// snying po dag kyang rab tu bri// so so'i le'u tshe dag la ni// drag po las kyi sngags rnams bri// mu khyud oM laM sngags kyis bskor// pa ra

bi d+h+wan sngags rnams ni// ha na da ha'i sngags bcas pa// le tshe dag la rab tu bri// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du// ma mo'i sngags ni bri bar bya// 'gugs byed sngags ni thams cad kyang// phyi rol mtshams su
bri bar bya// gsung gi dkyil 'khor de bris la// der ni bzlas pa 'bad de brtsam// 'khrul 'khor gsang bar bzlas pa dang// sku gsung thugs su bzlas pa'o// phyi rol bzlas pa de byas pas// ma rungs pa
rnams sgrol bar byed// drag po'i sngags ni bzlas pa yis// bdag dang gzhan gyi don rnams 'grub// spro dang bsdu ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsung gi dkyil 'khor de dbus kyi// rdo rje gzhon nu'i

rtsa sngags la// rtags mtshan ma byung bar du bzla// phyogs kyi kI la ya rnams kyi// sngags kyang de bzhin dran par bya// sngags de dag gi 'phro 'du yis// las dang nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// bsgrub bya'i

lus la 'od zer 'phro// de yi sgrib pa sbyong bar byed// drag po'i sngags dang las rnams ni// nyin mtshan du ni spro bar bya// gtso bo'i sku ru gsal byas te// spyi bo ljags dang snying ga nas// spros te g.yas rgyu

g.yon rgyu dang// 'khor bar rgyu dang phra mor rgyu// phur bu'i gzugs sogs yig 'bru spro// bcud bsdus yig 'bru'i tshul du bsdu// lus kyi 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su// yig 'bru phur bu der spro bya// sbyin sreg
bzhi yang der bsgrub ste// mchod sbyin bzhi yang der bsgrub bya// dgang gzar blugs gzar sbyar ba yis// gsang ba'i gnas su sbyin bsreg bya// der ni mchod pa bya ba ste// mchod pa gsum du shes par
bya// gnas gsum dag tu mchod pa yis// nyon mongs rnam rtog bsreg bya'i phyir// khro rgyal rnams ni rtag tu mchod// khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis// ma rungs tshogs ni kun 'dul byed// thabs dang
shes rab sbyor byed cing// sprul pa'i mgo brnyan mang po 'gyed// mgyogs pa mgyogs ma pho nyar bcas// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams thams cad la// nyin dang mtshan du las byed 'gyur// 'od zer kun tu spro

byed cing// las dang nyon mongs thams cad bsreg/ 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ khro bo sprul pa phra men bcas// de yis thams cad khengs gyur te// mtshon cha sna tshogs rab tu 'phro// des ni gdug pa'i
tshogs rnams kun// skad cig yid kyis 'jigs par mdzad// ye shes thugs kyi phur bu ni// gsung gi dkyil 'khor der bkod bya// mtshan bcas mtshan med bzlas pa bya// gnyis su bskyed dang gnyis med

bstim// bzlas brjod dbul zhing dngos grub blang// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis// dngos grub dag ni rab tu bsgrub// bzlas pa'i drod tshad ldan pa yis// rgyud drug gnas nas drag pos bsgral// zhe sdang
chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// nyon mongs dag ni rab tu bsgral// las dang nyon mongs thams cad ni// thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis// ma lus par ni bsreg par mdzad// ye shes me ni phyogs bcur 'phro/
khro rgyal 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis// stong nyid don la 'god par mdzad// ye shes me yis nyon mongs bsreg/ gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// ye shes me yis bsregs par 'gyur// rtsa ba'i sku
las 'od zer 'phro// gsung gi 'od zer de dbang bskur// ye shes thugs kyi phur bu yis// las dang nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// byang chub sems kyi phur bu yis// gnyis med don la de
bsgom bya// lus kyi gnas ni thams cad du// rgyud drug gnas kyi sa bon gsal// der ni hUM gi sa bon ni// bkod de rang rgyud sa bon bsreg/ spro dang bsdu ba'i rang bzhin yang// lus kyi gnas rnams kun tu
bya'o// gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos ni// thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin// gsung gi dkyil 'khor de dag ni// las kyi sngags rnams der bkod cing// gnas der las rnams thams cad byed// shes

rab thabs kyis skul byed cing// brda' yang de bzhin bskul ba yin// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rA ho haM/ rA ga yA mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA a nu rA ga Na pU dza swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/

gardza gardza hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI dI pa ya ti hUM phaT/ badzra sU ka ra mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra i Shu sa mu khI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI lA s+ya ki hUM phaT/ badzra bya g+h+ra mu kha hUM/ badzra gr-i D+ha muM khI

hUM/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI tA rA hUM/ A+oM tsa ma ra mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra dro Na mu khI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha ya man+ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+hi sh+ma sha na ba tI hUM/ oM badzra ha ri Na

mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra u lU ka mu khI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI mu sa la hUM/ A+oM badzra dwi pI mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra ba kA ka mu khI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/

A+oM badzra kro d+hi tsaN+Da lI ti hUM/ A+oM badzra bi DA la mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra bak+Sha ti mu khI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha a pa rA dzi ta hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI sha byA ya ti hUM/ A+oM badzra shwa na mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra pa tri mu khI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro

d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI sa byA mi ta hUM/ A+oM badzra sing ha mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra raM tI la mu khI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI ma ra Na hUM/ A+oM badzra tak+Shu

rak+Sha sa mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra na ku la mu khI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI tsun+da ya ti hUM/ A+oM badzra r-i k+Sha mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra ka si ka mi ka mu khI hUM/ A+oM badzra ak+Shi Ni mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra b+hai ra

be mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra a mr-i ta mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra mA ra Na mu kha hUM/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM hUM phaT/ dzaHhUM baM hoH a su nr-i pre tri du/ rgyud drug skul byed des bskul cing// 'bru dgu sngags kyang
der bkod de// dkyil 'khor der ni de bzlas pas// bsgrub bya'i tshogs rnams sgrol bar byed// gsung gi dkyil 'khor de bzhin yang// rang rang lha rnams gdan du bting// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/
gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// rdo rje phur bu'i las rnams ni// drag po las kyi sngags kyis byed// sngags kyi tshogs ni thams cad

kyang// A li kA li dag las byung// lha rnams so so'i snying po ni// sngags de dag las rab tu byung// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug la// ming yig sde tshan lnga yis brgyan// sde tshan lnga yi gsum pa dang// sde tshan
gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas mdzes// sde tshan dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs yig gi ni bzhi pas brgyan// an+tas+thA yi gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni gsum pas brgyan// sde

tshan dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan// an+tas+thA yi gsum pa dang// an+tas+thA yi dang po'o// USh+ma Na yi gsum pa dang// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pa la// sde tshan lnga yi gsum pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni

gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni gsum pas brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i bzhi pas mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas brgyan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i

gsum pa la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i gnyis pa la// sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos

brgyan// dbyangs yig gi ni bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// an+tas+thA yi

gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa'o// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i dang po

la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas brgyan// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pa'o// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gis ni drug pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa dang/ an+tas+thA yi

gnyis pa la// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pas mdzes// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa dang// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pa la// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pas mdzes// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas

brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i gnyis pa la// sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos brgyan// dbyangs yig gi ni bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa

dang// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i dang po la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa
la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs yig ge ni bzhi pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang// an+tas+thA yi dang po'o// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po

la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas brgyan// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas mdzes// dbyangs yig gi ni bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lnga

pa yi ni gsum pa dang// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i

bzhi pa'o// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas mdzes// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa dang// an+tas+thA yi dang po'o// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas brgyan// sde tshan

lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa ni// nyis 'gyur dag tu bya ba yin// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan

lnga pa'i gnyis pa la// sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos brgyan// dbyangs yig gi ni bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis
pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan// an+tas+thA yi gsum pa

la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par ldan// USh+ma Na yi gsum pa la// an+tas+thA yi dang po sbyar// dang po yi ni dang po la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas mdzes// ASh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas

mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// dbyangs yig gi ni bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang/ sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dang

po yi ni dang po la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa'o// an+tas+thA yi dang po dang// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas

mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i lnga pa la// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang pos brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i dang po'o// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i

dang po dang// sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po'o// de dag nyis 'gyur dag tu bya// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i gnyis pa la// sde tshan
gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// dbyangs yig gi ni bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas

brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan// USh+ma Na yi dang po la// sde tshan lnga

pa'i lnga pas brgyan// USh+ma Na yi dang po dang// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa nyid// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas mdzes// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig

gi ni drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas mdzes// dbyangs yig gi ni bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis

pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa'o// dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po dang// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang// an+tas+thA

yi gnyis pa la// de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas mdzes// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni gsum pas brgyan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang pa'o// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug

pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig gi ni gsum pas mdzes// USh+ma Na yi gnyis pa la// sde tshan gsum pa'i gnyis pas brgyan// de dag nyis 'gyur dag

tu'o// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po dang// sde tshan gsum pa'i dang pos mdzes// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum la// sde tshan

lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa la// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// un+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis
mdzes// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan// USh+ma Na yi gsum pa dang// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa la// an+tas+thA yi dang pos brgyan// de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas

mdzes// an+tas+thA yi dang po dang// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas mdzes// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gi ni drug pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// dbyangs kyi

yi ge bcu gsum la// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa dang// an+tas+thA yi gnyis pas brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// an+tas+thA gnyis pas

tshan bzhi pa'i lnga pas brgyan// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa dang// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas mdzes// sde tshan lnga pa'i lnga pa dang// lnga pa'ang de bzhin nyid 'gyur te// sde tshan dang

mdzes// sde tshan gsum pa'i bzhi pa'o// sde tshan dang po'i gnyis pa dang// USh+ma Na yi bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pas brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas

brgyan// an+tas+thA yi gsum pa dang// an+tas+thA yi dang po ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig 'gyur du'o// sde tshan dang po'i dang po la// dbyangs yig gi ni bzhi pas mdzes// an+tas+thA yi gsum pa dang// an+tas+thA yi

dang po'o// de dag bco brgyad 'gyur du bya// sngags kyi btu ba 'di byas la// nyon mongs gdug sems thams cad bsgral// drag po las kyi sngags 'di ni// gdeng dang ldan pas bsgrub pa yin// de phyir sngags
don rab tu bshad// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las sngags btu ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal gyis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// rdo rje rab tu kI la

ya'i// sgrub pa'i las kyi rim pa dag/ thabs dang rdzas ni gang gis bgyi// bsgrub pa'i tshad ni gang dag lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje phur bu'i sgrub gnas ni// brag ri srin po'i gdong
pa 'dra// dur khrod dkyil lam ngam grog gnas// der ni sa gzung brtag la sogs// sngon du las rnams thams cad bya// ras bris lugs su blugs sogs pa'i// sku yi dkyil 'khor chen po bya// mchod pa'i

rdzas la sogs pa bshams// bum pa dag ni bcu dgu la// rang rang lha yi phyag rgya bri// rang rang sngags kyang der bri'o// 'bru sna sman sna snying po lnga// dri lnga rin chen ljon shing dang/ kha dog sna lnga'i ras kyi

bcings// dri med bum pa de byas la// rang rang kha dog bzhin du bsgyur// yang na kun kyang dkar por bya// de dag la brten bsgrub par bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor chen po ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lte bar

bcas// gru chad sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan// lhu dum bcad 'phro phor pa rkang// sha khrag zhing chen dur khrod rdzas// dkyil 'khor dag ni rab tu dgang// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag stong// bdud rtsi dag kyang rab tu
bsag/ yum chen rnams kyis byin brlabs pa'i// bum pa lha grangs bzhin du gzug/ rnam lnga'i mchod pa de bzhin bya// bdud rtsi lnga la longs spyod cing// lha yi tshogs rnams thams cad la// gtor ma lha
grangs bzhin du 'bul// spyan drang mchod dang bstod pa dang// gang 'dod las la gsol ba gdab// rtsa ba'i yab yum skur gsal bas// 'khor lo bzhi yang gsal bar bya// A li kA li'i yi ge yang// rtsa yi
gnas rnams kun tu dgod// rdo rje kI la ya yi sngags// 'khor lo'i rtsa gnas kun tu bsgom// drag po'i las kyi sngags rnams kyang// gsang ba'i mkha' la rab tu dgod// lha rnams so so'i las kyi
sngags// rang rang gnas su dgod par bya// lus la bsngags ni de bkod nas// bum pa'i nang du de bkod bya// rigs lnga kI la la sogs pa'i// snying po dag kyang rab tu bgrang// nyi khri bdun 'bum bgrangs
nas kyang// lha rnams thugs dam bskul bar bya/ khro bo chen po rnams la ni// nyi khri lnga stong bsnyen pa dang// drag po'i las kyi sngags rnams ni// bye ba sum 'bum bzlas pa yis// mngon sum

pa yi rtags 'byung ste// sku gzugs bzhad dang bum pa dang// phur pa dag las 'od 'byung dag/ phur pa ldeg 'phar lung ston 'byung// de ltar ma byung bar du bsgrub// de rtags thon nas sgrub sngags bzlas//

rtsa ba yab yum gsal byas te// kI la ya lnga phyogs nas bskul// skye med chos kyi dbyings las ni// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog sprin 'byung zhing/ rnam rtog 'khor bar 'khyams pa rnams// thabs dang shes rab sbyor
ba las// bde ba'i phur bu rgyas pa yis// so sos 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog pas// las dang nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad// thog ma med nas bkab pa yis// las dang nyon mongs gyur pa yi// 'dod chags zhe
sdang gti mug rnams// srid pa'i 'khor lor gyur pa yin// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi// bde ba byang chub sems phur des// lus kyi rtsa rnams kun tu gang// dug gsum sdug bsngal der
sbyong mdzad// chags sdang zhen las byung ba yi// nyon mongs pa las byung ba'i gzugs// srid pa'i lam la gnas bcas pa// de dag rab tu 'don mdzad nas// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// bde ba

byang chub sems phur ni// lus kyi rtsa rnams kun rgyus gang// dug gsum sdug bsngal des gzhom mdzad// chags dang zhen las byung ba yi// nyon mongs pa las byung ba'i gzugs// lnga phung sems can dag bya'i
phyir// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi// bde ba byang chub sems phur des// lus kyi rtsar brgyud sems bde skyes// bde bas nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi// las dang nyon mongs 'brel 'byung ba'i// 'bras bu

phung po sdug bsngal myong// rnam rtog las dang lam la gnas// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi// bde ba byang sems phur pas ni// lus kyi rtsa rgyud sems bde rnyed// bag chags phung po sdug bsngal zhi// gtso
bo yab yum gnyis med de// g.yas nas rgyu dang g.yon nas rgyu// dbus nas rgyu dang 'od zer rgyu// spyi gtsug mgrin pa snying gar rgyu// mtshon char rgyu dang phur bur rgyu// g.yas
kyis gcod dang g.yon gyis gcod// gso bsad mnan bzlog gang 'dod 'grub// phyogs kyi bum pa'i gnas rnams su// byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun dbab// bum pa de dag chu rgyun gyis// bkang ste rnam par
rtog pa bsreg/ lus kyi gnas ni thams cad du// phab pa'i 'od zer der spro bya// 'od zer tshogs ni thams cad kyang// byang chub sems su gnas pa ste// rnam rtog kun gyi gnyen por bshad// bde chen 'khor
lo'i gnas su ni// zhi ba'i las ni sgrub pa yi// sngags kyi 'od zer thams cad kyang// bde chen rtsa ni kun tu spro// gnas der bde ba bskyed pas ni// bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam rtog bsreg/ rtsa
dang rlung dang byang chub sems// bde ba bskyed de de bsgom mo// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ste// der ni rgyas pa'i las dag bya// sngags kyi 'od zer thams cad kyang// longs spyod gnas su rab tu

spros// rlung dang rtsa dang byang chub sems// bde ba bskyed de der bsgom mo// rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsreg/ tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par 'gyur// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor ni// dbang gi las ni bya ba
ni// sngags kyi 'bru ni der bsgom pas// thams cad ma lus 'gugs par 'gyur// rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems// bde ba skyed byed der sgoms shig/ gnas de dag tu 'od zer 'phro// thams cad ma lus
dbang du 'gyur// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni// drag po'i las kyis bsad pa yin// sngags kyi 'od zer der bsgoms te// 'khor lo'i gnas su 'od zer spro// rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems// bde ba
skyed byed rgyu ru bsgom// sngags kyi 'od zer drag pos ni// sprul pa'i gnas su bsad pa yis// 'khor lo bzhi yi gnas der ni// sngags kyi 'od zer gsal bsgoms la// spro dang bsdu bar bya ba yis// bde ba
dag la rten bcas shing// mi rtog pa'ang der skye 'gyur// gsang bar bzlas dang mi g.yor 'gyur/ khro bo'i sprul pa'i phyag brnyan dang// yang sprul dag ni 'byung bas ni// phur bu'i dngos grub ster

bar 'gyur// sngar bstan rtags ni kun 'byung ste// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub kyang// skad cig la ni thob par 'gyur// de thod bzlas pa'i sngags 'di'o// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM hUM

phaT// de ni spyi yi bsnyen pa'o// de bzhin khro bo so so'i sngags// las kyi sngags kyang dus su bzla// bsnyen pa'i sngags kyis dngos grub thob// las kyi sngags kyis thams cad sgrol// las 'di rnal 'byor can
gyis bya/ khro bo chen po de dag gis// bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams// bsgral te byang chub lam la bkod// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sems can dang// lus sems bral te 'khyams pa dang// ngan 'gro'i sgo
dgag bde lam bkod/ khro rgyal sku yi 'od zer gyis// ste 'og phyogs mtshams kun tu spro// der gnas sems can thams cad kyang// rang rang nyon mongs kun spyod byed// grol ba'i lam la bkod nas
kyang// sdug bsngal thams cad der 'joms byed// de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po yi// bsgrub pa dag ni byed dus su// dngos grub rtags ni byung dus su// the tshom med pa'i rtog pas
blang// dngos grub chen po thob nas kyang// las rnams thams cad bya ba yin// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// de dag bsgrub par bya ba ni// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun phyogs su// dkyil

'khor gru gsum mthing nag bya// phyi rol zla gam gsum gyis bskor// dbus su khro rgyal hUM kA ra// g.yon du khro mo sgra 'byin ma// g.yas su phag gi mgo can de// rgyab tu smrig bu'i mgo can no// sha khrag sna

tshogs las byas pa'i// gtor ma b+han d+ha gang bzhag la// bdud rtsi lnga yang de ru blug/ sha chen tshil chen khrag chen dang// g.yang gzhi spyi blugs thod pa'i rnga// dur khrod rgyan dang rdzas rnams bsags// nyung

dkar skye tshe dug dang sbyar// zangs phye rdo phye lcags phye dang// drag po'i rdzas rnams gru gsum ste// hUM mdzad ting 'dzin la gnas pas// sngags 'di bgrang zhing 'phro 'du bya// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM ka ra hUM/ bzhi 'bum

lnga khri 'don par bya// phra man [\[]men [\]]sngags 'dis las la gzhug/ gardza gardza hUM phaT// bye ba sum khri bton byas na// pho nyas gang 'dod las rnams byed// sprul pas gang bsgo'i las rnams byed// rnal 'byor
can la dngos grub 'bebs// de bzhin khro bo gzhan dag kyang// rang rang khro mo pho nya dang// bcas te bsgrubs na dngos grub thob// bsgo ba nyan cing las rnams byed// rnal 'byor dam ldan rtogs par

bya// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/ bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje phur bu yis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor 'bri bar bya// sna tshogs zas dang sna

tshogs 'bru// sman gyi rnam pa'i gtor ma ni// glang po'am shing rtas 'grongs pa'i tshad// brgya rtsa brgyad dam lha grangs bya// sha sna khrag sna brgya rtsa brgyad// spyan gzigs 'dod yon sna tshogs brgyan// sna tshogs

'bru yi chang rnams bshad// rnal 'byor pho mo g.yas dang g.yon// lus ngag brdas mtshon so sos mchod// lha tshogs phyi nang gsang bas mchod// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshe// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon
la// mtshan ldan gzungs ma phul nas ni// gtso bo rnams la de bzhin mchod// 'khor gyi rnal 'byor thams cad kyang// rang rang gzungs ma dag dang ni// lhan cig gnas te lha rnams mchod// mchod pa'i las

byed dus brdas mtshon// gang zhig spyi bo ston pa la// de la rkang mthil bstan par bya// gang zhig smin ma 'degs byed la// de la mdzub ni bstan par bya// gang zhig lce ni bskyod pa la// de la pad+ma bstan par

bya// gang zhig mdzub mo ston pa la// de la lag pa sbyin par bya// gang zhig brang ni ston pa la// de la nu ma ston par bya// gang zhig sor mo rnams ston la// de la lus ni bstan par bya// gang zhig a ho zhes
brjod na// kye ma ho zhes rab tu brjod// a ti pu ho brjod pa la// pra ti pu ho brjod par bya// a ti dzaHzhes brjod pa la// pra ti dzaHzhes brjod pa'o// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pa la// sa ma ya ho

zhes brjod par bya/ ra ho haM zhes brjod pa la// rA ga yA mi brjod par bya// kye zhes 'bod pa'i sgra sgrog na// a ho zhes pa'i lan yang sbyin// su ra sti zhes brjod pa la// bza' zhing btung ba rab tu sbyin// sa ma
