ya dzaHzhes brjod pa la// lha rnams mchod ces rab tu sbyin// dud du ra zhes brjod pa la// spang bar bya zhes rab tu brjod// de bzhin ngag gi sgra rnams kyang// dus 'di dag tu bya ba yin// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i

dus 'di ru// rkang pa brkyang bar mi bya zhing// phyi rol gtam yang rab tu spangs// mi bgad gsang ba'i ngag la gnas// lha yi grangs ni de bzhin du// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yang// lha rnams la ni rab tu
'bul// zhal zas tshogs la longs spyod cing// dpa' bo dpa' mo mnyam 'khyud la// byang chub sems kyi bde bas mchod// nyon mongs rnam par rtog pa yang// de yi 'od zer dag gis bsreg/ phyi rol bar

chod byed rnams la// 'od zer dag gi bsreg par bya// brtul zhugs chen po'i spyod pa yis// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya ba yin// dam tshig med cing ngang rgyud ngan// rtog pa can la tshogs 'khor gsang// dbang po

dpa' mo brtul zhugs ldan// dam tshig can gyi tshogs 'khor bya// rdo rje'i glu ni rab tu blangs// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la gtor ma sbyin// de don rab tu bshad pa yin// bar bar rdo rje'i glu yis bskul// kye

tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen por ni// dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// so sor rang rig gnyis 'khyud de// de bzhin lha rnams kun mchod cing// bdud rtsi lnga yang rtog med bzang// sha dang khrag ni 'thung cing

bza'// der ni dam tshig can bzung zhing// dam tshig med dang nyams pa spang// brtul zhugs chen po'i spyod pa yis// tshogs kyi 'khor lo rab tu bya// byang chub sems ldan gzungs ma brten// gtsang dme mi

blta brtul zhugs bskyed// lus ni mdzes pas khrus byas brgyan// tshogs kyi mchod pa rab tu bya// mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za mo// ra ro ma dang khrag 'thung ma// sa bla sa 'og sa steng gi/ las la grub pa'i mkha'
'gro'i tshogs// gtor ma len cing las rnams byed// sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro de bzhin byed// gnyis med mnyam 'khyud bde ba yis// dpa' bo dpa' mo mnyes gyur cig/ gnyis med bde ba rgyas gyur cig/ spro

dang bsdu ba'i bde ba yin// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams tshim gyur cig/ bdud rtsi lnga dang zhal zas kyis// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams mnyes gyur cig/ glu dag blangs la
dkyil 'khor bsdu// las dang nyon mongs rab tu 'joms// dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// las 'di la ni brtson par bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lo rab 'bring gsum// phyi nang gsang ba

gsum zhes bya// dam tshig nyams pa skong ba'i phyir// nang gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya// tshogs bsags bsod nams bskyed dus phyi// mi rtog ye shes bskyed dus su// gsang ba'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya// tshogs

'khor de gsum gang gis kyang// sgrib sbyong rnam grol lam la 'god// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po 'dis// yab yum rigs lnga'i khrag 'thung dang/ khro bcu yab yum phra men tshogs// mchod pa dngos grub rang

shugs 'byung/ khro rgyal tshogs can bran gyi tshogs// pho nya bka' nyan bsgo ba nyan/ khams gsum nyon mongs kun sgrol gyis// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub thob// rgyal po bram ze khyim bdag tshogs// dregs

pa'i bsod nams dbang du 'du// gnod gdug zhi zhing 'byor pa 'phel// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa sgrol// de phyir tshogs kyi 'khor lo yang// rab tu bya bar bshad pa yin// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/

tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje phur bu yi// bsreg dang mnan 'phang bstod par bya// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni// phung thod dum bu drug pa ru/ khrag sna dug sna'i

ming rus gzhug/ skye tshe yungs nag brab rdzas bzhag/ nas nag rdo nag zangs lcags phye// zor gyi rdzas su thams cad bsags// yang na mda' yi zor yang bya/ khra dang srin bya pho rog dang// 'ug pa dag gi sgro

bskyon de// smyug ma la ni khrag gis byugs// skyon med sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ khrag dang dug gi byugs byas la// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor der gzug bya// zangs nag zhing chen spyi blugs bgau/ drag po las kyi
gzungs ma ni// nag mo gtum mo khro gnyer can// g.yon bzhag sgrol ba'i yum du brlabs// drag po'i las kyi phur pa yis// bsgrub bya dag la btab ste bsgral// so so'i rtsa sngags las sngags kyis// zor

mda' la ni rab tu bsgrub// phur bu phra mo bdun byas bsngags// sgro rtsar phug ste mda' nang gzhug/ mtshe nyung drag rdzas bzlas la blug/ oM mo ha g+ha ya gardza gardza hUM phaT/ s+pho Ta ya'i bar dag tu// mo ha g+ha yas

mgo mnan bsgrub/ khrag gi nang gis ming gzugs la// nas nag rdo nag la sogs pa// drag po'i sngags 'di btab ste brab// hUM ma ma ba shaM ku ru ma ta nya ka ra i nan d+ha d+hi ma ma karma shI g+h+rang kA ra yA/ las phyed

tshogs ni drag tu bskul/ khro bo'i sprul pa de bzhin bskul// drod tshad ldan pas zor du 'phang// ma mo'i zor ni srod la ste// srin po'i zor ni tho rangs 'phangs// zor lam phye la khro bas 'phangs// mda'
dang thod zor ltas kyang blta// zor kha zlog na bdun dgur bskyar// de nas drag tu bskul de 'phangs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// skad cig nyid la sgrol bar 'gyur// rdo nag 'ur

rdos 'phang bar bya// mda' 'phang mde'u'i me stag ni// g.yas su 'phro dang g.yon du 'phro// gang la log pa'i drod tshad bzung/ khrag la de bzhin blta ba ste// lkugs dang 'khyil dang 'phro ba'o// ltas kyi rnam pa
de blta zhing// zor ni rab tu 'phang bar bya// zor thod bub dang log ltas ni// phyi rol rtags su shes par bya// las kun mtha' ni zor gyi bskul// phrin las rnam bzhis mnan bya ste// e las gru gsum

dkyil 'khor bskyed// zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad kun/ khro bor ma gyur gang yang med// thams cad thal ba rdul du rlog/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ baM las
dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni// zla gam dag tu bskyed par bya// 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// dbang gi khro bor ma gyur med// thams cad dbang du 'du bar

mdzod// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya ba shaM ma na ho ba shaM ku ru swA hA/ ya las rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi dag ni bskyed bya ste// nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad kun// rgyas

par ma gyur gang yang med// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar mdzod// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ma las zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// zlum po dag tu bskyed pa ste// gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas

pas// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad kun// zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med// thams cad ma lus zhi bar mdzod// oM badzra kI li kI la ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i zhabs kyis mnan// 'khor lo rgyas

'debs b+ha gar sba/ khro bo'i tshogs kyi zas su bsngo// bskal pa'i me yi phung por bsregs// ye shes me yi bag chags bsregs// nyon mongs lnga dang ldan pa yis// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// byang
chub sems ni ma skyes par// nam yang btang bar mi bya ste/ khro rgyal yab yum sras bcas pa'i// zhabs kyi gdan khri'i 'og tu mnan// bskal pa me yi klong dkyil nas/ khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs ldan
gyis// ma rungs tshogs rnams 'dul ba'i mchog/ thams cad ma lus tshar gcod cing// ma rungs pa yi tshogs rnams 'dul// mnan pas bar chod rab tu zhi// de nas 'khor rnams yi rangs te// bstod pa'i

mchog 'dis rab tu bstod// bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// zhe sdang 'dul mdzad rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// rnam par thar pa'i dbur ldan zhing// phyag drug phyag mtshan rgyud drug sgrol// zhabs
bzhis rU tra bsgral zhing mnan// gdug pa 'dul mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// rigs lnga khrag 'thung kI la ya// thams cad ma lus rdul du rlog/ shin tu khros pa'i gzugs can de/ khro rgyal chen por
phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs mtshams steng 'og khro bo'i tshogs// thams cad dbu gsum phyag drug ste// sku smad phur pas gdon tshogs 'dul// rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum la// rgod gshe chags pa 'jigs
pa'i zhal// glang lpags ko rlon sku la gsol// stag lpags 'bum gyi sham thabs can// g.yang gzhi thod sbrul khrag zhag brgyan// phyag drug mtshon chas nyon mongs sgrol/ khro mo dbang phyug sku la

'khril// 'jigs byed khro rgyal tshogs la bstod// sprul pa'i phra men tshogs bcas ni// phyogs bcu kun tu pho nyar 'gyed// bdud dang bar chod sgrol bar mdzad// shin tu 'jigs pa'i pho nya rnams// lus ni ma
nges sna tshogs ston// cir yang 'gyur ba'i mtshon cha bsnams// ma rungs sha la stod cing za// sgrol byed tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan thugs kyi sprul pa ni// phyogs bcu kun tu 'gyed par
mdzad// rnam rtog nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// thams cad bde ba'i lam la 'god// rU tra gtum rngams ma rungs pas// sems can kun la gnod par byed// bcom ldan thugs kyi phur bu yis// de dag
sgrol mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jigs byed khro bo'i tshogs bcas kyis// phyogs skyong dregs pa tshar bcad de// sems can thams cad bde la bkod// 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces phyogs
bcu'i khro bo'i tshogs dang/ khor sprul pa'i phra men gyi tshogs dang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rjes su yi rang

ngo// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud las/ zor mnan sreg dang bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// phur pa phrin las kyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// rdo rje phur bu'i las rgyud 'di// u rgyan mkha' 'gro'i gling
dag nas// rje btsun pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis// sems can don du dgongs te byon// sngon gyi las 'phro 'brel ba yis// rong zom gzhon blos lo ts+tsha bgyis// de las byung ba'i bsod nams kyis/ khams gsum
snying rjes sgrol bar shog/ 'dir phrin las kyi rgyud karma mA le rtsa ba'i rgyud rtog pa bcu gnyis pa'i rgyud dang/ rgyud phyi ma zab pa'i rgyud rnams 'dir gzhug par bya'o// sid+d+hi rastu////

rgya gar skad du/ badzra kI la ya ma hA ba liM ta tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das dpal thams cad mkhyen pas/ sku thams cad kun tu gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan nas/ thams cad kun tu ma bsgribs pas/
phyogs thams cad nas gsal bar gyur te/ lhan ne lhang nge ma bsgribs par gsal ba ste/ gsang sngags dam pa 'byung ba'i dus na byin gyis brlabs kyis ston pa nyid du rnam par go bar gyur pa ste// 'og min
dam pa'i gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang phyi dang nang med pa kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang po dang/ gnyis su med par bzhugs nas mnyam

pa'i ngang gis rnam pa gsum gyi tshul du ston par gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa ma lus pa// yang dag don rnams bstan pa'i phyir// thugs rje rgya mtsho chen po la// thams cad 'byung zhing rnam par 'du// nyon
mongs spangs pa'i pha rol na// rgyal ba bya ba rdul tsam med// sems nyid byang chub sems 'di yang// rgyal bar gyur pa'i snying po yin// stong pa'i chos nyid dam pa yin// snang ba ma 'gags lhun

gyi grub// gnyis su med pa'i dam pa yin// 'khor ba'i bcud phyung bde gshegs rgyu// 'khor ba'i dri ma rang bzhin dag/ rgyud dang lung dang man ngag gsum// bstan cing go ste shin tu gsal// med pa ma yin

snying pa'i don// nam mkha'i snying po mtha' yas mchog/ nges med sems ni sna tshogs te// sna tshogs ngo bo gcig tu snang// snang ba nyid du gzung du med// thams cad mchog gi snying po 'di// gzhan du rgyal

bas chos mi btsal// rang rig snying po ma rtogs na// btsal bas rgyal ba'i chos mi rnyed// 'khor ba med cing sangs rgyas med// lha yang med cing 'dre yang med// mtho ris med cing ngan song med// thams cad
sems nyid rig pa'i slong// 'di ni gang yin bder gshegs rgyu// de nyid ma spangs lhun gyis grub// ma btsal ma bsgrubs lhun gyis grub// kun tu bzang po thams cad mkhyen// rdo rje sems dpa'i don rnams
ston// kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems// gnyis su med pa'i 'dul ba'i don// kun bzang dam pa lha yi lha// tshad ma gsum ni nges bzung nas// nges gzhi don la yang dag 'bebs// gnyis su don rtog gang
'dzin pa// gnyis med ngo bor yongs mi 'grub// drug dang bcu yis ma grub cing// bcu bdun rtsa gcig nges par 'grub// nges gzung med par don rtogs na// thob med 'bras bu sgrub mi dgos// rtsol med
lam la bgrod mi dgos// rim pas sa la sbyang mi dgos// yang dag nyid du don rtogs pas// de ma rtogs pas 'bras bu med// bsgom med stsol min snying po'i don// nyams su len pa'i dam pa 'di// nyams
med rtog pas bcings pa 'dis// rtog pas 'bras bu gang bltas pa// de nyid rtog pa nyid du 'gyur// rtog pas bltas pa 'khor ba'i rgyu// rtog pa nyid kyang nges bzung bral// nges pa rtogs pa

gang du 'dzin// ma nges rtog par gzung ba med// de phyir rtog pa'i nges bzung bral// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin bral// rgyu las bskyed par snang mi snang// rgyu las bskyed par gyur pa na// rgyu las bskyed par

'jigs par 'gyur// de la yang dag don mi dgos// gal te rgyu las ma grub na// dper na nam mkha' stong pa la// rgyu med rkyen gyis de mi 'jigs// ma rig rgyu med stong pa la// ji ltar byas kyang ngal ba'i

rgyu// dper na nam mkha' stong pa la// rgyu dang rkyen du ma bstan kyang// sprin dang na bun khu rlangs 'byung// de bzhin sems nyid stong pa la// rgyu las bskyed dang ma bskyed pa'i// don nyid yang dag bshad dka'

yang// ma rig nam mkha'i sprin dang 'dra// nam mkha' sprin du ma shes shing// sprin nyid nam mkhar ma shes na// sprin dang nam mkha' tha dad med// sems nyid stong pa nam mkha' la// ma rig pa nyid sprin dang

'dra// ma rig ye shes tha dad med// ma rig pa nyid yang dag lam// 'khor ba nyid kyang bde gshegs rgyu// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// dper na rin chen gser gling 'dra// rin chen gser gling phyin
gyur na// dbyibs dang kha dog tha dad kyang// thams cad gser gyi ngo bor gcig/ de bzhin sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang// mtshan ma sna tshogs cir snang yang// thams cad sems kyi ngo bor gcig/ bstan pa'i
snying po dam pa 'di// 'di dang 'di ru bstan par ni// bder gshegs nyid kyis brjod par dka'// don dam chos dbyings nam mkha' 'dra// skye med nam mkha'i ngo bo las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang

snang// de bzhin skye med chos dbyings las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang snang// gleng gzhi byang chub sems nyid yang// dper na nam mkha' nyid dang 'dra// dngos por snang ba'i chos rnams kun// 'byung yang
nam mkha' nyid las 'byung// 'dus kyang nam mkha' nyid la 'dus// gleng gzhi byang chub sems nyid la// lta ba sgom pa dkyil 'khor dang// lha dang dam tshig la sogs pa// mchod pa dang ni bstod pa
dang// thams cad byang chub sems las 'byung// 'dus kyang byang chub sems la 'dus// yang dag bstan pa'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// gnyis su gzung du ga la yod// nges bzung

bral ba'i chos nyid la// dngos por bzung du ga la yod// mtha' dbus med pa'i chos nyid la// phyogs char bzung du ga la yod// snang stong gnyis su med pa la// snang zhes mtshan mar ga la 'dzin// stong zhes
chad par ga la blta// de phyir snang stong gnyis su med// kun tu bzang po kun gyi gzhi// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyis brjod du med pa'i don bstan to// rdo rje phur pa

chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas mnyam pa'i ngang gis yum gyi b+ha ga la bzhugs nas/ e ma ho mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo ni// bstan pa'i snying po don gyis go/ 'di ni

sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste// kun bzang nyid du rnam par grags// e ma 'di ltar ngo mtshar che// ya mtshan 'phrul chen rang las byung// mi btsal rang byungango mtshar che// ngo mtshar chen po lha yi sku// ji ltar

bltas pas 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni rab tu ngo mtshar che// e ma 'di ni ngo mtshar che// skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings las// bstan pas go ba ngo mtshar che// don nyid brjod du med pa la// brjod pas go ba ngo
mtshar che// mun pa lta bu'i gti mug la// mar me lta bu'i 'od byung nas// gti mug mun sel mar me sgron// mun pa 'joms pa'i shes rab 'od// 'di ltar gdul byed bde gshegs byung// 'dul ba'i ngo la

cir yang snang// gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyar// e ma 'di ltar ngo mtshar che// nam mkha' stong pa skye med la// skye ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang ston// de bzhin skye med chos dbyings las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul

bsam mi khyab// ston pa 'byung zhing 'khor rnams 'byung// thugs rje 'byung zhing byin rlab 'byung// dkyil 'khor 'byung zhing mchod pa 'byung// thams cad thams cad 'byung ba yin// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlab
kyis// bde ba chen po dbab tu gsol// e ma 'di ni gang 'byung ba// thugs rje sprul pa chen po 'byung// 'gro ba 'dul ba bstan pa'i phyir// gang gis 'dul ba de bzhin du// 'dul ba'i ngo la cir yang
ston// yab la dgyes shing yum la chags// chags pa'i mdangs kyi dgyes pa na// sems dang sems su 'dres pas na// sems nyid mi 'gyur brtan pa'i mchog/ dgyes pa chen pos dbab tu gsol// e ma mi
'gyur brtan pa la// 'gro ba kun gyi don gyi phyir// yab la 'khyud cing dges pa bskul// 'dod pas g.yos shing rab tu 'dzum// zim bag bcas shing brtse ba skye// mchu 'gul lce 'dril rab tu gdung// rtsa
rnams rab tu rgyas mdzad de// pad+ma la ni bde ba dbab// e ma ston pa yum dang bcas// yum ni dges pas yab la 'khyud// yab kyi bde ba chen po 'di// yum gyis dges pas bskang ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i
rdo rje bde ba 'bebs// bde ba chen po 'di dag ni// yum la dbab kyi dges par mdzod// yab yum bde ba chen po 'di// dges pa chen pos dbab par mdzod// e ma oM AHhUM phaT/ sa ma ya hoH sa ma ya s+t+waM/
a nu rA ga yA mi/ a nu rA ga ya hUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH hUM hUM hUM/ gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas// bde ba chen po'i byin brlabs las// thams cad dbang bskur sgrib sbyangs nas// nyon mongs
sbyangs shing byang sems 'phro// drag po la sogs rnam bzhi yis// ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin spros na// dkar dmar gnag dang ser ba dang// dus rnams kun tu rab sbyar nas// yang dag nyid du rnam par

spro// 'di ni sangs rgyas byin brlabs yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med par// dus gsum snga phyi med par sbyor/ hUM hUM hUM/ shAn+ting ku ru swA hA/ puSh+ting ku ru swA hA/ ba shang ku ru swA hA/ mA ra ya sa ma ya hUM phaT/

oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM hUM hUM/ rnam bzhis 'dul ba gang yin pa// de ni sangs rgyas mdzad spyod yin// rngam pa chen po'i lha tshogs ni// 'jigs byed chen po 'di lta bu// drag po rngam pa'i hUM sgra can// de yis stong

gsum rab tu g.yos// yab yum sras dang bcas pa rnams// rngam pa'i nga ro drag por sgrogs// hUM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM hUM hUM/ zhes rngam zhing ngo mtshar ba'i khro bo rab tu 'phros nas/ thams cad rab tu 'dus

nas snang la rang bzhin med par gyur nas/ mnyam pa'i ngang gis bzhugs so// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas sgrol ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// gab sbas lta ba'i don ma rtogs/ khams gsum 'khor zhing sdug bsngal myong// shin tu ma rungs srin por 'gyur// yi dwags srin po ma r
ungs pa// nad dang ma rungs sna tshogs 'byung// srin po gdug pa'i byin brlabs las// sems can thams cad gdug par 'gyur// rang la rang nyid rab tu gdug/ rang gi rtog pas bltas pas na// me

bzhin tsha bas rab tu gdung// de yang rang rig rnam rtog yin// rang la rang gis 'tshig par byed// chu bzhin grang ba rang las 'byung// rang nyid rang las sdug bsngal 'byung// dmyal khams bco brgyad sdug
bsngal kyang// rang gi rnam rtog bltas las byung// yi dwags bkres skom sdug bsngal yang// rang gi rnam rtog bltas las byung// byol song glen lkugs sdug bsngal yang// rang gi rnam rtog bltas las

byung// de la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal ni// rang gi rtog pas de ltar snang// zhe sdang dbal chags me ltar 'bar// gti mug khang pa mun ltar 'thibs// phrag dog zur rno rta ltar 'gyes// 'dod chags 'dzin byed

ci ltar 'dzin// nga rgyal bden med 'brug brag ltar 'tsher// le lo sgyid snyoms chu ltar 'phyo// nyams med spyod pa rang dgar byed// 'dod 'gro nyams pa'i dbang gyur na// nyes med lnga po rnam par 'chang// don

med spyod pa rlung ltar 'phyo// 'di rnams bsgral ba'i zhing bcu ste// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu ma bsgral na// bsgral ba'i dam tshig nyams par gyur// nyams byed lnga ni rab tu bsgral// za byed lnga ni rtod

la mnan// mgyogs byed lnga ni zhags pas bcings// sgrib byed lnga ni rta la bskyon// 'khrugs byed lnga ni rab tu gsal// smyo byed lnga ni smyo dang dbral// 'dzin byed lnga ni bcings pas grol// med pa lnga ni gter

dang sprad// yod pa lnga ni phyam la bskur// lkug pa lnga ni smra ru gzhug/ bcings pa lnga ni zhags pa khrol// 'phyo byed lnga ni bcings la bzhag/ nyes byed lnga ni rnam par spangs/ yangs// 'dzin pa gsum ni rnams

spangs la// nyes byed gnyis ni shes par bya// rtsa ba gcig tu yang dag bsgral// 'dzin pa lnga ru rab 'dzin zhing// mtshang can gsum dang rab tu 'grogs// chen po gcig ni rab shes na// thams cad ma spangs

lhun gyis grub// spong byed rnams kyi sbyangs mi dgos// de yis bsgral ba chen por 'gyur// ma bsgral nyams par yang dag bshad// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ gdug pa can 'dul ba'i le'u ste
gsum pa'o////
de nas rab tu bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// shin tu gdug pa'i sems can chen po la rab tu bsgral ba bstan te/ dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru
bzhi la// thig dang bri bar byas nas su// dus ma nor bar bsgrub par bya// rdzas su bstan pa ma lus kun// gtor ma'i rdzas rnams 'di lta ste// dpal gyi gtor ma chen po ni// sha sna lnga las rab bsham
sa nas// dkyil 'khor lhar bskyed spyan drangs nas// mchod pa ma lus dbul ba kun// gtor ma chen po'i las rnams te// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ ma hA ba liM ta khA hi// dus drug gtor ma dbul byas la//
mi 'dzin gtong bas gtor ma ste/ dus rnams kun tu btang ba dang// lo dang zla bar btang ba dang// thams cad kun tu btang ba dang// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// byang chub mchog tu sems
bskyed pa'i// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa// rigs 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM

hUM phaT/ rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// srog gi go ru shar ba dang// snying gi go ru bsgom par bya// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig
ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtam byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// me ru 'bar ram 'od du 'byung// 'gul lam ldeg gam 'phyo ba'am// 'di rnams gang

byung gtor ma 'grub// oM badzra kI li kI la ya// mA ra ya ba liM ta b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ gang yin phyogs su 'phang nas ni// sprug cing gdab ste khrag kyang gtor/ khro bo chen po bcu rnams la// gtor ma chen po 'di lta

ste// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ steng phyogs khro bo hUM kA ra// yum chen rdo rje sgra 'byin ma// phra men phag dang smrig bur bcas// glang chen sha dang thod khrag dang// go ro tsa na'i gtor ma

dbul// oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ shar gyi khro bo rnam par rgyal// yum chen rdo rje mda' snyems ma// phra men stag dang bya rgod bcas// seng ge dkar mo'i sha dag dang/ dri chen bdud rtsi chen po

dang// skam pa chen po'i sha gtor dbul// oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ shar lho'i khro bo dbyug sngon po// yum chen rdo rje sder mo ma// phra men g.yag dang bya rog bcas// 'dzin byed khra yi sha dag

dang// 'dzul byed gcer bu'i sha yi mchod pa 'bul// A+oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT// lho yi khro bo gshin rje gshed// yum chen khro mo dur khrod ma// phra men sha ba 'ug par bcas// gshog med

'phur dang mAM sa dang// chags med sha khrag mchod par 'bul// A+oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ ban+d+hA ban+d+hA hUM phaT/ lho nub khro bo mi g.yo mgon// yum chen rdo rje gtun khung ma// phra men gzig dang khwa ru

bcas// sgrol byed srin po'i sha khrag dang// me 'bar shing gi bdag po dang// 'gro byed stabs 'bral sha khrag mchod par 'bul// A+oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grwa wa hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ nub kyi khro bo rta mgrin

rgyal// yum chen rdo rje gtum mo dang// sprul pa byi la pu shud bcas// dus 'dzin pad+ma'i khrag dag dang// 'byong byed sha yi mchod pa 'bul// oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ nub byang khro bo

gzhan gyi mi thub dang// yum chen rdo rje mda' snyems ma// phra men khra dang spyang kur bcas// sgrib byed sha dang rdeg byed lag/ myo byed sha yi mchod pa 'bul// oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM

phaT/ byang gi khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// yum chen rdo rje rlung 'byin ma// phra men seng ge pha wang bcas// skyong/ skyed byed mo dang bran dran byed snying// dri chu sha yi mchod pa 'bul// oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ bin d+ha

bin d+ha hUM phaT/ byang shar khro bo khams gsum rgyal// yum chen rdo rje bskyod ma dang// phra men dred dang sre mo'i mgo/ dran byed sha dang 'gro byed rkang// nyal byed sha yi mchod pa 'bul// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA

ba la hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ 'og gi khro bo stobs po che// yum chen rdo rje gsod ma dang// phra men dom dang byi ba'i mgo// nyan byed klu dang sdod byed sha/ 'joms byed sha yi mchod pa 'bul// bzhi

tshan bcu yi lha yi tshogs// hUM mdzad thog 'bebs smyo 'dul rgyal// sred byed dbyug dang sgrol byed gshed// gnod byed mgon dang dbang sdud rta// 'phen byed gzhan dang gsod byed bdud// 'dzin byed khams

dang 'phebs byed stobs// so so'i las rnams sgrub pa dang// so so'i mthu phyin rab tu ster// ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ sgrol byed chen mo'i lha mchog ni// sku mdog gnag cing tho ba bsnams// rkang leb sha yi

mchod pa 'bul// gang yin sgrol ba'i las la brtson// ha sa ya ra ha da na ya hUM ha sa yan yan ha phaT// 'bral byed chen mo'i lha mchog ni// sku mdog mthing zhing gu gul bsnams// rmig zlum sha yi mchod pa

'bul// gang yin skyob byed lha dang 'bral// A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ 'gugs byed chen mo'i lha mchog ni// sku mdog dkar zhing lcags kyu 'dzin// dran byed snying gi mchod pa 'bul// shI g+h+raM A na ya hUM

phaT/ 'ching byed lha mchog chen mo ni// sku mdog sngo zhing zhags pa bsnams// mkhal ma khrag gi gtor ma 'bul// dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT// smyo byed lha mchog chen po ni// sku mdog dmar zhing dug rnams

bsnams// 'du byed med pa'i mchod pa 'bul// bi da ya bi da ya hUM phaT/ stobs pa'i lha mchog chen po ni// sku mdog ljang sngon gzas pa bsnams// don snying sna lnga'i mchod pa 'bul// lha drug bsgrub pa drug tu
bstan// nyams drug rtags drug rab tu gzas// bskyed dang spyan drang mchod pa 'bul// 'dzab bstod la sogs de bzhin bya// bsgrub dang bsgrub pa chen po dang// phrin las rdzogs par shin tu

bzang// dam can gsum la rim pa bzhin// nag smug snying dang mkhal ma dang// pad+ma'i khrag dang srin bya'i sha/ gcan gzan sha yi mchod pa 'bul// dza ye bi dza ye// rim pa bzhin du shes par bya// nal bu'i

sha dang dbang bo'i sha/ nag mo sha yi mchod pa 'bul// ka taM ka ye/ brten pa bran dang 'khor ltar bya// mar dang khrag dang 'o ma dang// sbrang rtsi chu lug lto ser dang// gzhob mgo sna skya mchod pa 'bul// a dzi te

a pa ra dzi te// rim pa nyid du de sbyar nas// bskyed dang spyan drang mchod pa dang// 'dzab bstod de bzhin mchod pa 'bul// bsgrub dang bsgrub pa chen po ni// yang dag nyid du de brten bya// hUM ma ma ba shang ku ru
ma dam nya ka ra i nan// dad+hi ma ma karma nan ti dza// nyid kyi bka' las 'da' ma byed// bka' nyan gsung sdod dran ltar khol// las bzhi bse mo nyid la 'dus// bse mo'i rtags rnams rab tu brtags// mA
ra sai na pra mar d+ha na ye hUM phaT// thams cad las sngags yang dag pa// 'di dag bse mo nyid du bya// gang bsgrub pa yi rim pa la// dam can rnam gsum bka' bzhin nyan// bran dang pho nya bka'

nyan tshogs/ khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// dkar po'i snying dang skyes pa'i snying// rta dang 'dras dang gri yi sha/ dkar po'i sha gsum

mchod pa 'bul// shI g+h+raM ka ra ya/ drug dang gcig dang bzhi rnams dang// drug la rdzas drug yang dag bshad// de bzhin yang dag shes par bya// de rnams kun gyi las rnams ni// bsad pa'i ling+ga brgyangs la

bri// bstab pa'i ying+ga bskum la dri// mnan pa'i ling+ga phyi nang gnyis// gzir ba'i ling+ga nang nas drang// bsad dang bstab pa brkyang ba la// phyi ma gnyis po 'khor lo drug/ bsad pa dag gi sngags rnams bri/ khro
bcu'i sngags rnams la sogs pa// thod pa'i phyi rim de bzhin bskor// rno ba'i mtshon gyi lus la gtug/ smug nag thal kha rab tu bya// bkod pa'i rim pa yang dag bstan// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin
rnams// srid pa phur bu grub mdzod ma karma nan ti dza// nyid kyi bka' las 'da' ma byed// bka' nyan gsung sdod dran ltar khol// las bzhi bse mo nyid la 'dus// bse mo'i rtags rnams rab tu

brtags// mA ra sai na pra mar d+ha na ye hUM phaT// thams cad las sngags yang dag pa// 'di dag bse mo nyid du bya// gang bsgrub pa yi rim pa la// dam can rnam gsum bka' bzhin nyan// bran dang pho nya bka'

nyan tshogs/ khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// dkar po'i snying dang skyes pa'i snying// rta dang 'dras dang gri yi sha/ dkar po'i sha gsum

mchod pa 'bul// shI g+h+raM ka ra ya/ drug dang gcig dang bzhi rnams dang// drug la rdzas drug yang dag bshad// de bzhin yang dag shes par bya// de rnams kun gyi las rnams ni// bsad pa'i ling+ga brgyangs la

bri// bstab pa'i ying+ga bskum la dri// mnan pa'i ling+ga phyi nang gnyis// gzir ba'i ling+ga nang nas drang// bsad dang bstab pa brkyang ba la// phyi ma gnyis po 'khor lo drug/ bsad pa dag gi sngags rnams bri/ khro
bcu'i sngags rnams la sogs pa// thod pa'i phyi rim de bzhin bskor// rno ba'i mtshon gyi lus la gtug/ smug nag thal kha rab tu bya// bkod pa'i rim pa yang dag bstan// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin

rnams// srid pa phur bu grub mdzod nas kyang// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// oM laM hUM laM s+t+waM b+ha nan/ mo ha g+ha ya/ b+ha ga bAn/ hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kri// badzra hUM kA ra hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhUM

baM hoH sarba big+h+nAM badzra kI li kI la ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM phaT/ hUM kA ra hUM a a/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig
chings shig rnam par sdoms// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// ring par khug la smrar chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par

gyis// pa ra bid+yAn hUM phaT/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM phaT/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu

ru mu ru badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ las kyi sngags rnams dril dril nas// snying dang dbang po rnam shes la// rim pa bzhin du phur pa thob// spyi mthun kun tu ma lus gdab// stong pa kho nar yang dag sbyor// chos
nyid kyi bden pa'o// gsang sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o// a b+hi tser+ya'i dus la bab// gnag pa de kho na la'o// dkar nag mtshams su'o// nag po gru gsum gtor ma la// mtshon
rtse gnyis dang dbyig dug zangs// gzhan gyi dngos po mtshon rnams la// bsgrub pa tshul bzhin byas nas ni// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba dang// dgra bgegs dbang po mngon sum bsgral// rdo rje gsang ba'i
bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// las sngags

mtshon du bcas pas gdab// dum bu nyid du de bzhin 'gyur// drag po gru gsum gtor ma la// d+ha du ra yi rtsa ba dang// lug mig grib skams byas pa dang// rtsa ba lo ma 'bras bu dang// thams cad dug tu gyur

pa kun// nag po dag tu yang dag bya// bsnyen bsgrub tshul du byas nas ni// me 'bar 'od du 'byung rtags ni// rim pa bzhin du yang dag sbyar// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang
rung// nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos// las sngags dag la yang dag sbyar// nyon mongs 'khor ba gzhom pa'i phyir// gtan gtun mkha' dbyings yang dag bsam// rdungs
shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dbal snying bsregs nas/ khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdung byas nas// lha yang rung ste brlag par

byos// kha thaM kha thaM kha thaM/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ khyad par chen po'i gtor ma ni// sha chen dam rdzas mchod pa dang// snying khrag dron mo ma lus dang// nyon mongs lnga po rtsad bcad cing//
'joms byed nad la gzhom byed phyir// sna lnga tshon gyis 'dab mas dgab// bsnyen pa nyid du yang dag ldan// klong drug sngags drug lha drug dang// rdzas drug las rnams ma lus bya// bsnyen bsgrub
drod du gyur pa dang// nad rnams ma lus dbab par bya// des ni 'khor ba gting nas skems// nyon mongs 'joms par yang dag bshad// las rnams ma lus grub bya'i phyir// sreg pa'i klong drug yang dag
bstan// phrin las las rnams bya ba'i klong// 'dzab tshogs gnyis ni drag po'i klong// bsreg cing mchod de bstab pa'i klong// dgug cing bstim dang gdab ste brdung ba'i klong// mnyes byed mchod pa 'bul
ba'i klong// gzir gnon khro bo'i stangs stabs klong// bsreg pa'i klong drug nyon mongs dag par bsreg/ thugs rje me yi byin brlabs yin// gdug pa me la rab tu bsngags// drag po me yi las bya'i

phyir// klong drug las 'di rnam par bstan// phrin las bya ba las kyi klong// 'dzab dang tshogs gnyis drag po'i klong// drag po sgrol ba dus kyi klong// tshig bshad drag po gyer gyi klong// drag po'i sngags rnams
'phang ba'i klong// dmod pa bral ba'i klong dang drug/ klong drug drag po 'phang ba'i klong// lam bstan zor gyi klong drug yin// lam rnams yang dag 'grub par 'gyur// nyon mongs 'khor ba gnan pa'i

phyir// gnan pa'i klong drug 'di lta ste// phrin las bya ba las kyi klong// 'dzab dang tshogs gnyis drag po'i klong// brgya dang brgyad ni gdab pa'i klong/ khyad par bal tshon byad kyi klong// bskyed dang spyan drang

gtad pa'i klong// pho brang stangs stabs gnan pa'i klong// klong drug gnan pa las kyi mchog/ las gsum phrin las mtshon pa'i phyir// 'di nyid drag po'i phrin las yang dag bstan// bya ba gsum du yang dag

bstan// rnal 'byor gang zhig gtsor 'dzin pa// gzhung dang ldan pa'i gtor ma la// stong pa chen po chos kyi mchog/ hUM las sngags kyis gtso bor bsam// hUM gnyis 'khor gnyis rab tu bsam mo// dzaHhUM baM
hoHsa spyan drangs nas/ hUM gsum bstim pa'i las rnams bya// gtor ma hUM gsum lha mo drug/ rtsa sngags gzhugs la bstab sngags gdags// nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis bstab// phrin las bcol ba'i las
rnams bya// de bzhin du byas rdzas kyis mchod// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// chags pa med pas zhe 'dod med// mnyam pa nyid du bzhag pas na// thams cad ye grub gtor ma yin// 'bras bu ye shes
tshogs su 'gyur// tshogs bsag rim pa rnam pa gnyis// yang dag nyid du rnam par bshad// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las// drag po gtor mas gdug pa btul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de
nas bcom ldan 'das las thams cad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// las kyi don bstan pa 'di lta bu// dang po byang chub sems bskyed de// bum pa kha rgyan mgul chings

bcas// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// spos lnga snying po lnga dag dang// bgegs bskrad dri yis yang dag gdug/ lha rnams bskyed pa'i rim pa yang dag bya// spyan drangs dbang bskur mchod par bsam// bskul
dang 'dzab dang rim pa ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags rnams la// gdab pa'i sngags kyis yang dag bsgrubs// gnyis pa bsdus shing bum par thim// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba dang// bum pa sku gsung thugs

dbang bskur// nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags rnams kyis// cis kyang mi tshugs tshe dbang bskur// 'chi med tshe yi dbang dang ldan// rab tu brtan 'gyur dbang dang ldan// bdud po pad+ma dbang phyug dang// bdud mo gar
gyi dbang phyug gnyis// dpag bsam shing gi sked pa la// 'dus byas bu ni bcu gcig byung// gnod sbyin bcu gcig rab tu grub// 'gro ba kun gyi don bya'i phyir// thod pa bcu gcig mnan pa'i rdzas// gnad

du bstan pa'i sa rnams ni// mi 'gyur gtan du gnan pa'i sa// dbus su snying po tri rnams bri// 'khor lo drug la sngags drug bri// gnad pa'i ling+gar shes par bya// spyi ltar shes pa rab tu gces// sngon dmar
dkri shing re bas gtum// bya ba'i las rnams byas pa dang// gang yin gnan pa dag tu gnan// don rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur// de yis 'gro ba rab tu mos// gdug pa can gyi zin pa la// 'bum mam
lha sngags mang bzlas te// gang yin bstan pa'i sa de la// rtsa gsum lce yi sngags bzlas la// ldag cing nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur// 'dag pa chu dag gang yang rung// mang du bzlas pas nad la bslan// nad
rnams thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// phan pa'i sman la sngags btab la// gang yin nad la glan par bya// nang nub dus gsum dag tu gdab// rdo rje'i lce yi nad rnams zhi// lha yi ting 'dzin rab tu gsal// des
ni gnod pa'i nad rnams bzhi// nad rnams ma lus zhi gyur na// gnas lnga bsrungs la bgegs rnams bskrad// bsrung ba'i rim pa rab tu 'byung// nyung dkar thal chen la bsngags te// sor bzhi ba yi glang ma
la// 'bru dgu gsum sngags rnams bri bya ste// gdug pa can gyi shing dag la// phur pa sor bzhi nyung dkar gdags// sa ya drug 'bum mang du bzlas// dus rnams kun tu srung ma bskul// dregs pa mchod cing

chang phud gtor// mtho bskor rdzas rnams rab tu sba// nyung dkar thal chen de bzhin sba// bzlas nyung sbreng zhing mtha' ma bskor// de bzhin rab tu brjod par bya// byang chub sems ni rab tu ston// sangs rgyas
rnams kyi dgongs pa yang// 'khor ba rtogs las yang dag byung// dus gsum byang chub sems las 'byung// bskal pa stong du rab btsal kyang// sems nyid byang chub rnyed mi 'gyur// gal te
sems de rnyed 'gyur na// dngos po stong par ga la 'gyur// yang dag bstan pa'i snying po 'di// bstan pa'i snying po dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnyed mi 'gyur// rnyed par kun bzang yongs ma
gsungs// kun tu bzang po'i ngang nyid las// bstan pa 'di dag brjod las 'das// de nyid brjod par sus gsungs pa// de ni brjod par bstan pa min// 'di dang 'di ru bstan pa ni// gsung pa'i ngo bor
brjod pa med// sus kyang ga la bcing ba med// rang rig rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin// de yis bcings pa rab tu dam// skye med chos dbyings dam pa las// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa dang/ khro bcu'i dkyil
'khor dam pa dang// sras mchog dkyil 'khor dam pa dang// spyan drang mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// 'dzab dang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dang// drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor dang// bsregs pa me yi dkyil
'khor dang// mnan pa sa yi dkyil 'khor dang// 'phang ba zor gyi dkyil 'khor dang// dbye ba rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor dang// phyag rgya mnan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// bsrung bya bzlog pa'i dkyil 'khor
dang// 'chi med tshe yi dkyil 'khor dang// dkyil 'khor bcu bzhi yang dag bstan// hUM/ gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// yab yum dgyes pa'i sku bskyed nas/ gdug pa 'dul zhing rngam pa'i

zhal// ye shes drug gi phyag rgya can// zhabs bzhi rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs// yum dang gnyis su med par bzhug/ hUM mdzad sgra 'byin phag dang smig bu'i mgo/ rnam rgyal snyems ma stag dang bya rgod mgo/ dbyug
sngon sder mo g.yag dang bya rog mgo// gshin rje dur khrod sha ba 'ug pa'i mgo/ mi g.yo gtun khung gzig dang khwa yi mgo/ rta mgrin gtum mo byi la pu shud mgo/ gzhan min mda' snyems spyang mo khra yi
mgo/ bdud rtsi rlung 'byin seng ge pha wang mgo khams gsum gsod byed dred dang sre mo'i mgo/ stobs chen bskyed ma dom dang byi ba'i mgo/ thugs dam gnyan po'i dus la bab/ hUM/ sras kyi dam par dbang

bskur ba'i// mthing ga dkar ba sngo dang dmar// nag dang ljang sngon sku mdog can// phur pa gu gul lcags kyu 'dzin// zhags pa dug gtor tho ba 'dzin// gang yin nyams pa phyag na bsnams// sku stod khro bo

chen po la// sku smad lcags phur dbal dang ldan// gru gsum e yi dkyil 'khor na// rtse mo lta bur rnam par bsam// ye shes dbyings kyi phyag rgya dang// rig pa rang rtags phyag rgya dang// brgya byin dpa' rtags

phyag rgya dang// 'dzin byed pho nya'i phyag rgya dang// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i phyag rgya dang// rdung byed tho ba'i phyag rgya dang// rdeg byed mtshon gyi phyag rgya dang// gnon byed ri rab phyag rgya dang// sreg byed

me yi phyag rgya dang// 'phen byed zor gyi phyag rgya dang// phyag rgya bcu yi rab bstan nas// skye med chos dbyings phyag rgyar 'dus// ka la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams// yi ge kun gyi rtsa ba ste// yi ge thams cad 'byung

bar byed// mtshon byed yi ge'i mtshan nyid las// skye med chos dbyings rnam par dag/ skye ba med las thams cad skye// 'di ni sangs rgyas phyag rgya yin// las rnams thams cad ma lus kun// yang dag nyid du
bstan par byas// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las// las thams cad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// gnas ni
rab tu bstan pa'i phyir// dur khrod ma mo tshogs pa'i sar// bdag po gang yin sa rin bcal// maN+Dal 'dom gang grub bzhi la// dur khrod rus pa'i phye mas gdab// dam rdzas sna lngas chag chag
gdab// mtshams bcad rim pa ma nor bya// thig ni hUM las yab yum bskyed// sa mA dza dang phyag rgya bzhis// spyan drang bstim par byas nas ni// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis mchod pa 'bul// sa thig gnam thig

gnyis su gdab// tshon la hUM las nyid du bsam// rim pa gong bzhin shes par bya// gru gsum zla gam mu khyud dang// gru chad snam bu sgo bzhir bcas// dur khrod sna tshogs khrol ma btags// rdzas rnams ma
lus rim par yang// dam can gsum gyi mthun rdzas bsags// ting 'dzin chen po'i byin brlabs pas// gtso bo bskyed dam ma mo ni// gang byed rang sngags 'khor bskyed nas// thams cad sngags kyis bya bar

'dus// lha la mchod cing bsnyen pa drang// phyi nang gsang gsum gang byed par// sngags kyi rim pa de bzhin bya// drod rtags brtan po byung ba dang// bsgrub pa dag kyang de bzhin bya// de yis gong 'dra de byung
na// phur pa lnga ni gdab bya ste// snying dang yan lag bzhi rnams dang// rang rang thun du bcas pa yi// las rnams ma lus rdzogs pa dang// gang yin me la bsreg byas nas// lha la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis

'bul// gang byas nyid la gtor ma 'bul// tshe bstims rim pa lha lngas byas// dbab pa de bzhin shes par gyis// rkyang pa bcu gnyis sgrub pa yang// gtso bo re dang las byed pa// sngags kyi bye brag yang dag

ldan// tha ma snying po rab tu bstan// dregs pa dbang sdud yang dag pa// dkar po gsum gyi snying khrag la// brten pa'i rdzas su yang dag bstan// gtso bo nyid ni yang dag bsam// 'bru dgu sngags kyi bsnyen pa
drang// bsgrub bya dregs pa'i lha la gtad// snying dang dbang po lnga la gdab// tha ma las bstan yang dag bshad// drug dang bzhi yis bsgrub pa la// sngags drug rdzas drug lha drug dang// gtso bo

nyid la rab tu bskor// bzhi yi las su bstan pa ni// dbye dang bstab pa dor byas la// bzhi yi las kyi dmag dpon bsam// rim pa bzhin du shes bya ste// drug gi yan lag lnga rnams dang/ snying dang dwangs ma
bzhi la gdab// de bzhin rim pa grangs kyis sbyar// rtags thon bsgrub par yang dag bstan// nus pa rten 'brel yang dag ni// sha yi bya ba yang dag dang// zho dang 'o ma zangs byed dang// mal 'og dag tu

zhag gsum mnan// d+ha du ra dang ka na si yis// 'tsher byed shing dang slong byed gzhi// lnga gsum gcig tu mnan par bya// gdug pa'i mgo dang dug rnams dang// rdzas rnams bsres pa'i phyi ma la// gang yin
zhabs 'og nyid du mnan// chu grang dag la sngags btab la// tshes brgyad nam langs dag la btung// 'dzin pa'i sha dang dmar byed phrag/ chang dang mthun par rab bsnyams la// me la bsros la rab tu

sbyin// dkar po gsum dang mar rnying dang// dkar po phum dmar snying dag dang// de la sogs pa'i dkar po lnga// srog snying dam par rab bsgrags te// gang yin lha rten dag tu sba// nag po spyi dkar snying dag

dang// mon pa nag po'i snying khrag gnyis// srog snying nyid du bcas pa gsum// gang yin sa la mnan par bya// tsa ra'i snying dang snying po dang// thod pa snying shun dag tu sbas byas la// ra yi thod pa'i nang du

mnan// klu yis bzung ba'i thod pa ru// gdug pa can gyi snying bcug la// ming rus bcug pa yang dag mnan// de nas phung ba'i rdzas de ni// gdug pa klu yi gnas su sba// smyon pa dag gi thod pa ru// gang yin

ming byang bcug byas la// dkar po gsum gyi snying shun tu// dkar po nyid kyi sngags bcug la// dregs pa'i snying po kun bris la// gu gul dud pa btang byas la// sme ba'i rdzas rnams lha rten sba// thod pa gang

yin gnas su sba// rims kyis shi ba'i thod pa ru// de nyid khrag dang zangs phye dang// dug rnams ma lus blugs byas la// gnan pa chen po rab tu bya// sre mong dag gi thod pa ru// gcan gzan sna tshogs snying
bcug la// drag po sngags kyis bskor byas la// sgo gsum 'dus pa'i mdo ru sba// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ thams cad bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom 'das dam tshig

sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dam tshig gnyen po ngas bstan gyis// bstan pa go bar rab tu gces// snying po mchog rnams dam tshig ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa ste// bstan pa'i dam
tshig 'di dag ni// sa gzhi lta bur rab tu bstan// yi dam dam pa mi spang zhing// nyi ma re la lan gsum du// dran pa nyid du rab tu bzung// sngags dang phyag rgya snying po dang// 'di dag rab tu

bstan pa yin// nyams pa lnga ni gzhi nas bstan// gsum dang gcig gis rtsa ba nyams// sgrub pa bzhin du ma shes na// ming dang mkhan khams kyang rnams rab brgyud de// rang gar bzung ba ngar 'dzin te// ngo

bo zhes pa nyams pa'i rgyu// yi dam lha dang snying po'i don// sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs dang// rdo rje slob dpon mched lcam dang// bsrung ba'i rim pa de bzhin bya// sngags kyi las rnams 'di lta ste// 'bru dgu

ye shes lha mchog ste// 'khor gyi dregs pa rang bzhin 'du// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags rnams la// bdud dang ma mo sgrol ba'i ging// las kyi drag po nyid du sgrol// g.yas pa thabs la g.yon pa yum// ma dang

a yi byin rlabs las// hUM dang ma yi byin rlabs 'byung// hUM lnga yab lnga ma lnga yum// sngags kyi rnam par bsam par bya// yab yum sku ru gyur pa las// g.yas dang g.yon gyi mkhrig ma las// sngags kyis rab

tu bskor byas la// bdag nyid yi dam lhar bsam la// snod ni a dang bcud ni hUM// 'og tu raM dang yaM bsgom la// bde ba sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis// rlung bskyor raM gyis me spar nas// a dang hUM dang bcas pa
zhu// bdud rtsi chen po nyid du gyur// g.yas dang g.yon du bsam pa yi// hUM dang a yi byin rlabs las// mkhrig ma sngags kyi 'khor lo las// yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pa las// bdud rtsi chen po nyid du

gyur// de bzhin gtor ma nyid la yang// snod dang bcud zhu lha mo drug/ yab ni bdud rtsi nyid du gyur// rak+ta thod pa nyid la bsam/ snod dang bcud du gyur pa las// rba klong 'khrug cing mtsho ltar 'khyil// yab
yum sngags las thams cad 'byung// khro bo hasti'i las rnams ni// rnam par rgyal bar yang dag bshad// dang po rdzas rnams tshogs gyur na// stong pa nyid las rnam gsum gyis// hasti rab tu bsgom byas

la// gtso bo'i dbu yi gtsug tu bsam// sngags kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs// sngags rnams rab tu de shes pa// oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ sngags stong hasti yab kyi sngags// hUM ni hasti

yum gyi sngags// ha na hasti yab kyi sngags// ha na hasti yum gyi sngags// hUM phaT thams cad las kyis sngags// bskyed pa dang ni spyan drangs la// mchod pa dang ni bstod pa dang// thams cad sngags su shes par

bya// mkha' 'gro lnga la las lnga ni// yang dag nyid du 'bru nyid sgrub// mkha' 'gro gsum ni mchod bya ste// rim pa don gyis gong du bstan// yi dam lha la rab mchod nas// mkha' 'gro rnam gsum spyan drangs
la// thod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bstan// rang rang rtsa sngags gang yin la// ba liM ta yis gtor ma 'bul// gshegs su gsol dang phrin las bcol// yum gyi mkha' 'gro mchod pa ni// gang
yin thod par rdzas blugs la// yab yum gnyis med bskyed bya la// sngags kyi bya ba kun kyang bya// gtor ma a las byin brlab nas// mkha' 'gro rnam gsum sngags kyis mchod// phrin las bcol la las
gnyer gtad// nyi ma re la lan gsum btang// ci bsam las rnams grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud las/ dam tshig sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rgyud gtad pa rab
tu gsung te/ sangs rgyas kun gyis spyi mes ni// kun tu bzang po nga yin te// so sor ston pas gsungs pa bzhin// sdud po rnams kyis rab bsdus nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi mes ngas// rig can skyes bu

khyod la gtad// gsang sngags brda' yis go bar gyis// las dang skal bar ldan pa dang// sbyangs dang las 'phror ldan na ni// shes pa rno la thos pa che// thogs pa med par rtsol ba des// des ni rgyud 'di
rtogs par 'gyur// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtong ma'i rgyud las rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// rdo rje phur pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ kI la ya bi ta sa ma ya tri ta tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ phur bu yak+Sha za byed 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das yak+Sha he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i
dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dbus med pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa na/ rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor nyid las mi gzhan pa bzhis bskor te/ de'i dus su gdul bya'i rgyud gang

la gzigs nas chos ston pa ni/ bskal pa mnyam par gnas pa zhes bya ba la/ dur khrod chen po rab tu rtsub mo zhes bya bar/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mo las bskyed pa'i srin po ma trang ka ru dra zhes bya ba/ yum
'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyas byed ces bya ba la/ 'khor lha srin sde brgyad dang/ lha chen po bcu dang/ zhe sdang gdug pa'i gcan gzan drug dang/ 'dod chags gdug pa'i 'dab chags drug dang/ gti mug gdug
pa'i za gsod drug dang/ mtshams sbyor gyi mche gshog gnyis dang/ las mdzad kyi srin po lcam dral drug dang/ 'jigs pa'i sgo ma bzhis bskor te/ sems can rnams la sna tshogs kyi gnod pa ni byed/ log

pa'i lam la 'jug cing byang chub kyi myu gu skem par byed do/ phur bu za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gleng bzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i bde bar
gshegs pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ kye badzra kI la ya'i tshogs/ 'khor tshogs gdug pa'i sdug bsngal 'khyams pa la// thugs rje thabs kyis drang bar
mdzad du gsol// ces ched du brjod pa las/ dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa rnams bka' bgros te/ rta mchog thub pas btul yang ma thul te// chos nyid zhi ba'i ngang la rtags kyi skur bzhengs te/ des

kyang ma thul dam tshig la rbad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni khro bor rab tu bzhengs te/ lha srin sde chen po brgyad gdul ba'i phyir/ 'jigs byed kyi sku la dpal gyi chas brgyad kyis brgyan te/ zhe sdang gi
bdud thom yor nag po gdul ba'i phyir/ thal chen gyi tshom bu dpral ba'i dme ba gsum ni btab/ 'dod chags mdzes pa'i lha bdud dmar mo gdul ba'i phyir/ mkhur ba sna dang gsum la rak+ta'i dme ba
brtsegs ma ni btab/ gti mug dregs pa'i bdud 'phar ba mgo gsum pa sgyur smug nag gtul ba'i phyir/ zhag gi dme ba gsum brtsegs ni thugs kar btab/ rdo rje gzhon nu dme ba brtsegs pa des/ gza'
nyi ma'i bu mo stag gi sham thabs can gdul ba'i phyir/ dpa' gtum za byed stag gi sham thabs ni gsol/ klu bdud nag po si sha can gdul ba'i phyir/ rigs bzhi sbrul gyi chun pos ni thod pa dang yan lag

brgyan/ 'byung po tshogs bdag glang sna can gdul ba'i phyir/ theg pa mchog gi glang chen ko rlon ni brgyan/ srin po ma traM ka ru dra bdul ba'i phyir/ zhing chen gyi g.yang gzhi ni gsol/ khams gsum srid gsum gyi
bdud dga' rab dbang phyug gdul ba'i phyir/ thod pa tshar gsum ni sku la brgyan pas/ yum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyas byed gdul ba'i phyir/ stong nyid dbyings las sdug bsngal rgyas 'debs pa/ 'khor lo
rgyas 'debs sku la 'khril bar byed/ 'khor lha srin sde brgyad 'dul bas dpal zhes grags/ de'i don rtags sku la brgyan pas na// dpal gyi chas brgyad ces su grags par bstan// srin po'i 'khor tshogs de

rnams kyang// zas su sha za skom du khrag 'thung las su srog gcod pas// yak+Sha khrag 'thung srin par grags pa'o// chos kyi dbyings las 'jigs byed kyi skur bzhengs nas/ dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis ni de

ltar brgyan// gdug pa'i mtshon cha bsnams pa ni// g.yas kyi dang por rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams pa ni// srin po gtso 'khor btul bas rgyas byed dpa' rtags so// g.yon gyi b+han d+ha rak+tas bkang ba'i nang na/ me

tog mdangs dang ldan pa bsnams pa ni/ 'khor ba'i 'dod chags kyi khrag zhal du gsol bas/ thabs shes rab bde ba chen pos rgyas 'debs pas/ rig pa rang rtags kyi phyag mtshan no// me dang kha T+wAM ga dang
phur pa 'dril ba ni/ phrin las don rtags kyi phyag mtshan no// za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ ru dra gtso bo btul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na

rdo rjes/ kye badzra kI la ya/ sde brgyad lha srin btul nas kyang// phyogs skyong lha chen bcu po rnams// thugs rjes ma lus gdul du gsol// zhes brjod nas/ yab yum gnyis su med pa las khro bo yab yum bcu

bton nas btul te/ kun gdan du btings te rig pa rang rtags ni/ rdo rje dang b+han+d+ha dmar gyis bkang ba'o// skye med 'dus ma byas ni rdo rje ste// srid rtsa sdug bsngal rak+ta zhal du gsol// zhes brjod nas/
gnyis med bde chen sbyor ba'i lam la bkod/ phyogs skyong bcu btul [(]te [)]phyag mtshan bar mar bsnams// rgyal byed dpa' rtags zhes su de la grags// ri rab phur pa tha mar 'dril ba ni// phrin las don

rtags 'byin pa'i phyag mtshan no// srin po lha chen po bcu btul ba'i phyi rol na/ zhe sdang gdug pa'i gcan gzan drug gnas pa ni/ za byed za ba 'gying pa'i stag dang/ rngam pa'i gzig dang/ myur mgyogs kyi

byi la dang/ gsod la dga' ba'i spyang ki dang/ zil gyis gnon pa'i seng ge dang/ gtum pa'i dom dang drug gnas te/ de drug ni yab gyi zhe sdang las bskyed/ zhe sdang gi snyigs ma rus pa dang/ rus pa mthar

rgyas pa mche ba ste/ yab las bskyed pa'i za byed mche ba can zhes bya'o// de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir khro bo rnams kyi sprul pa yab kho na bskyed de/ yum drug dang sbyor ba mdzad pas/ pha ye shes kyi khro bo yin pas
lus lhar byas/ ma gdug pa byol song du byung ste/ sprul pa'i phra men ma zhes grags so// bu de drug la mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni/ stag gis nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal dpa' bar 'joms pa dang/ gzig gi mgo

can ni/ shes bya thog med kyi ye shes gsal ba dang/ byi la'i mgo can ni/ rtsol bsgrub thams cad zil gyis gnon pa dang/ spyang ki'i mgo can ni/ sbyor sgrol dbyings su dag pa'i ye shes dang/ seng ge'i mgo
can ni/ zhe sdang skyon gyis mi 'jigs pa'i ye shes dang/ dom gyis mgo can ni/ gdug gtum thams cad byams pa'i sbyor ba'i ye shes dang/ khyad par drug gis zhe sdang gnas su dag cing/ khyad par du
'joms par byed pa'o// dkyil 'khor de'i phyir rim la ni/ 'dod chags sdug bsngal 'dab chags brgyad gnas te/ 'jug skam sha zan gyi bya rgod dang/ rmang rtse rol pa'i bya rog dang/ 'jigs byed rtsal
mchog 'bar ba'i 'ug pa dang/ sgrib g.yogs phag la snyol ba khwa ta dang/ 'jol 'phur rgod nas 'jab kyi pu shud dang/ bya gcan thams cad 'dul ba'i hor khra dang drug gnas te/ de drug ni yum 'dod chags
las bsten pa ste/ 'dod chags kyi snyigs ma khrag khrag mthar rgyas pa gshog pa ste/ yum las gsod byed gshog pa can zhes bya'o// de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir sbyor ba mdzad pas/ thugs kyi sprul

pa'i sras drug byung ste/ pha ye shes kyi khro yin pas lus lhar byung/ 'dod chags 'dul bya'i byol song yin/ mgo byar byung ba'o// de la ni sprul pa'i phra men ma zhes grags so// bu de drug la mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni/
'gro ba'i don la thogs pa med pa'i bya rgod mgo can dang/ chos nyid mi 'gyur bya rog mgo can dang/ mi shes mun pa gzigs pa'i 'ug pa'i mgo can dang/ sdug bsngal dbyings su snyol ba'i khwa ta
dang// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i pu shud dang// nyon mongs dbyings su bsnol ba'i hor khra dang// ye shes khyad par drug gis 'dod chags gnas su dag khyad par 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o// dkyil
'khor de'i phyi rim na/ gti mug pa'i za gsod drug ste/ gti mug dur phag khra mos sems can thams cad gsod par byed pa nyon mongs gtsor 'dzin gyi mche ba can dang/ gti mug gi dug sha nag po ltas ngan
don la 'dzin pa'i mche ba can dang/ gti mug gi dug g.yag kham pa ro la rtags pa'i mche ba can dang/ gti mug gi dug bya dmigs su rtags 'dzin thob pa'i gshog pa can dang/ gti mug gi dug sre mo dug
tsam che ba'i gshog pa can dang/ gti mug gi dug byi ba rku la dga' ba'i las byed gshog pa can dang/ de drug ni gnyis med gti mug las bskyed pa ste/ gti mug gi snyigs ma sha mthar rgyas pa las byed mi

shes pa ni/ yab dang yum las bskyed pa'o// de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir khro bo rnams kyi thugs las sprul pa mkha' nas bskyed de/ yum drug la sbyor ba mdzad de/ yab lha yin pas lus lha mor byung/ ma byol song
yin pas mgo byol song du gnas te/ de la sprul pa'i phra men ma zhes grags so// de drug la mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni/ phag ni ye shes gtsang dme med pas rnam rtog 'joms/ g.yag ni chos nyid 'pho 'gyur med
pa'i don la 'joms/ sha ba ni ye shes rgyas pa'i mtshan ma'i bag chags 'joms/ dmigs bu ni ye shes thogs med 'khor ba'i zhen pa 'joms/ sre mong ni rnam rtog bya rlag skye med dbyings su grol/ byi ba ni
cir snang thams cad gzung 'dzin mtha' las grol/ ye shes khyad par drug gis gti mug gnas su dag khyad par gti mug gnyenapo'o// dug gsum cha snyoms pa'i dred dang pha wang gnyis ni/ shar dang nub kyi

mtha' na gnas te/ zhe sdang rus pa'i mtha' la mche ba rgyas// 'dod chags khrag gi mtha' la bya gshog rgyas// gti mug sha'i mtha' las smra mi shes// de'i phyir dug gsum 'joms pa'i dred mo la shes bya ma
rmongs rtogs pa'i ye shes mnga' 'o// zhe sdang rus pa'i mtha' la mche ba rtse mo rno/ 'dod chags khrag dgu gzhan la smad du che// gti mug lam stor nyin par rgyu mi shes// dug gsum 'joms
mdzad gshog rlabs pha wang la// ma rig mun pa sel ba'i ye shes mnga' 'o// phur pa yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ lha chen po dang gdug pa'i za byed btul ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang gsang

ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yis/ badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to/ kye badzra kI la ya/ lha chen gdug pa za byed btul nas kyang// gdug pa'i sri can rnam gsum 'khrugs pa las// thugs rje chen pos

ma lus gdul du gsol/ zhes brjod pas/ rab tu rtsub pa'i tshogs kyi dur khrod na// phung sri khyi mo 'dod chags dmar lcam ni// sems can rnams kyi srog za zhang [\[]la za zhing[\]]'gugs// dam sri lte phur nag
mo ni/ sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog cing skem/ rgyas sri dun+ting nag mo ni/ sems can rnams la nad gtong zhing srog gcod par byed pa la/ de gsum ni dug gsum gyi mthar rgyas kyi sri can gsum yin

te/ bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas/ thugs kyi yi ge 'bru gsum khar bcug pas/ shwa na ma bzhi dang bdag nyid ma bzhi dang/ rgyal mo bzhi 'khrungs te/ bu mo bcu gnyis pos kyang rang rtags srog gi snying po

phul te/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni/ shwa na mas thugs rje nyi ma'i 'od rgyas pa lta bu mkhyen/ bdag nyid mas sbyor ba lcags kyi tsha tshwa lta bu mkhyen/ bse'i lha mos srog gi spu gri'i so lta bu mkhyen/ de rnams kyis kyang/

dur khrod rab rtsub ma ru tse'i sgo 'gram der/ mA ra se na/ pra mar+d+ha na ya hUM phaT/ ces rang rtags srog gi snying po rnams phul te/ bka' 'khor bsrung bar rang dam rang gis bcas so// dpal chen pos gsang

mtshan btags pa/ shwa na mu kha dang/ shwa na ma sring ba dang/ shwa na ma rag dang/ shwa na ma las mkhan no// bdag nyid ma/ re ma te dang/ re ma de dang/ re ma dza dang/ re ma dzu'o/ bse dun+ti nag mo dang/ bse ba ti
nag mo dang/ bse dun+ti nag mo dang/ tsha ba ko ti nag mor btags so// phur pa yak+sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gdug pa sri can btul ba dang/ thul ba'i bu mo dam la btags pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de
nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yis/ badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badzra kI la ya/ gdug pa'i sri can de ltar btul nas kyang// srin po'i tshogs bdag btul ba'i bka' 'khor
rnams// phyi rab grub pa'i dngos grub ster 'gyur ba// thugs rje thabs kyi mdzad srol bstan du gsol// zhes brjod pas/ bar chad bsrung ba mtshams kyi las// rten du rung ba tshogs gsog lha// byin gyis
brlab pa dam rdzas gsum// sku gsum sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bsgom// dpal chen yum lnga gzhal yas khang// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum brten pa'i lha// dam can bco lnga bsgrub pa'i

grogs// rgyal po'i las bzhi cho ga'i khrigs// 'di brgyad stong khog yin gyi byang chub lam// che ba'i yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas sa// lha rnams bdud rtsis mchod pa dang// thugs dam bskang dang tshogs

mtshams gcad cing bshags// dngos grub 'bru gsum blangs la mchod pa sbreng// dngos grub tshogs kyi mchod pa phul ba yang// dri ma dag pa lha la dri ba dang// slob mas gsol ba btab ste de la brlab// lha
tshogs rnams ni gsal bar bskyed// spyan drangs te dbul bskang sogs rdzas rnams btegs la bya/ phung po bshig ste mchod pa rnam gsum dbul// dngos grub blangs nas bcu gsum las tshogs rdzogs// nyi
shu grub la mkhas na dngos grub las// dkyil 'khor bri dang mchod rdzas bkram// lhag ma byin brlab mgron spyan drangs// las dang dbang bsdus kha chu btab// thugs dam bdar dang mchod mtshon bshags pa
las// phrin las bcol la phur pas gdab// tha ma smon lam bro brdung kha bzhir bsdu// las chen bcu gsum rdzogs pa lhag ma'i las// bdun la mkhas na tha ma mthu chen 'gyur// bcu bzhi he ru las kyi

bzlas pa ste// sgrub pa'i las tshogs zhes ni ston pa'o// phur pa za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ 'khor tshogs byang chub lam la sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo
rje yis/ badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badzra kI la ya/ 'khor tshogs byang chub bsgrub pa de lags na// mtshams sbrul dkyil 'khor tshogs bsags mi 'tshal lam// zhes brjod pas/ bcom

ldan 'das yak+Sha he ru kas 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ phun sum tshogs ldan mnyam nyid du// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams kyang bcad// phyi ni rgyal chen phyogs skyong gi// bcu bzhi mtho yis gcad par bya// nang
ni las kyi mtshams gsum bcad// gsang ba sgo gsum dam sri ma traM mnan// bar mtshams las bcu rgyas pa'i go rim ni// lus ngag bsrung ba bdag nyid bsgom pa'i mtshams// bden pa bdar la bsgom pa
las kyi mtshams// gnas bsrung ba ni gzhal yas khang gi mtshams// de yang mi shigs mtshon cha'i gur dang sa bzhi la// dmar nag dmar smug me yi 'du 'phro 'khyil// ye shes khro bo bcu yang dbyings nas

bzhengs/ khrag 'thung rol pa'i lha ni nang na bzhugs// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus lhun gyis grub// mtshams kyi khang pa'i nang du ni// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan bshams te// sku gsung thugs yon phrin las
lnga'i// zhi khro lha rnams sngags kyis sprul// mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab pa yang// gtor ma las rab kun gyi mchog/ las rnams kun gyi sna la 'gro// gzhong pa b+hUM las gzhal yas khang// rdzas

rnams lha yi rang bzhin las// rdo rje rgya gram kha bcad de// rwa la gsang ba'i yum bzhi gnas// gsang bdag dpal gyi zhabs kyis sbyang// thugs kyi 'od kyis lha rnams bskul// snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang

chub sems// rta yi spyir zhugs yum gyi mkha'// gtor mar thim pas dbyer med zhu// sngags 'dis bskul la byin gyis brlab// te dzo ba liM ta te dzo ba la ti gu ya sa ma ya/ bco brgyad nyi shu rtsa gcig byin

brlab sngags// dbul ba'i sngags ni 'jug ma ched du brjod// bdud rtsi ye shes lnga ldan pa// byin brlab gzhung nas byung ba'i rdzas// phul na dam skong las gnyis rdzogs// byin brlab bya ba'i sngags 'di

bzlas// oM sar+b+ba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrIHthA/ dgug pa nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// byin gyis brlabs te dbul ba yin// rak+ta chags pa'i rang bzhin ni// dbang du 'dus shing las rnams byed// rmad byung dam rdzas kun gyi
mchog/ sngags 'di bzlas la byin gyis brlab// ra rA ga ti pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM// bcu pas byin brlab dbul bar bya// gtor ma lha yi maN+Dal la// bdud rtsi dkar pos te// rag+ta chags shing dmar
la dwangs// byin brlab phul la gshegs pa'i las// bskyed dang mchod dang bsgom bzlas rnams// mtshan ma dus dang grangs su bya// phur pa za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ mtshams bsrung
tshogs bsags pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// bsnyen pa bskyal ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badzra kI la ya/ bsnyen
pa skyel ba'i rim pa de lags na/ gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mi 'tshal lam// zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dang po sa brtag bslang zhing sbyang ba dang// byin
gyis brlabs te bzung ba der// sta gon mchod pa rgyas shes pas// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la 'jug/ mthing nag gru gsum nag po la// zla gam dmar po dbang gis sbras// zlum po zhi ba dkar pos
bskor// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mthing nag la// gong ras dmar la 'od skor dkar// thod pa khra bos brgyan pa bri// rgyas pa'i gru chad ser po la// bar khyams phyogs mtshams sgo bzhi rigs// bcu drug cha

las bgos pa yis// sgo yang brgyad kyi tshad du bya// sgo khyud ra ba bcu drug tshad// zhing gi ka ba de yi phyed// rtsigs pa tri dang pany+tsa e// yang na che ba'i yon tan rgyas// rin po che yi phung por bya// dur khrod chen

po'i gzhal yas khang// dbang drag thod pa'i khol mas brgyan pa bri// ye shes spros dang bral bas na// e ni rA ga rkyang pas te// ra ba thod skam pha gu rlon// rdo rje phreng ba me 'od dmar// badzra yak+Sha

maN+Da la/ tsa ka tri ti sa ma yA// thal mo drug bsnol bzhi sbyar la// blang zhing nam mkhar btegs par bya// pho brang rdo rje rwa brgyad la// rin chen lte ba phrin las bzhi// 'khor lo'i rtse mor ka ba brgyad// zhing chen

'dus pa'i rgyan gyis spras// mchog chen dral btab zhing chen 'phan// glang chen chu srin nyi zlar bcas// steng gi ji ltar gnas gud par// 'og kyang der ltar gsal bar bri// pho brang mtho la phyi rol dma'// ka
stegs lta bur gnas pa bri// gtso bo'i gdan dang bse mo'i thugs// thad kar gnas pa tsam du bsgom// nang gi dur khrod gzhal yas la// phyi ni rin chen gzhal yas khang// gsal ba rang bzhin med par
bsgom// phur bu za byed 'bar ba'i rgyud las// gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol
to// kye badzra kI la ya/ dkyil 'khor bri ba de lags na// lha rnams dgod pa mi 'tshal lam// zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das yak+Sha he ru kas 'di skad ces gsungs so// skye med byang chub sems nyid

las// ru dra lha chen gdan stengs su// rig pa hUM las khro bor bskyed// yum dang 'khril bas longs spyod rdzogs// phra thabs sprul pa dug gsum 'joms// bar khyams shwa na bdag nyid skyed// hUM trAM hrI A bzhi

las bskyed// sgo bzhir gsang ba'i bse mo bzhi// yi ge hUM phaT ta las bskyed// bos la mchod pa'i las rnams bya// dbang dang byin brlab byas nas kyang// bsgom bzlas bsgrub pa rdzogs pa dang// pho nya rnam

gsum 'gugs par bya// thugs rje sprul pa'i pho nya la// gzhi dang dngos po ngo bo phrin las gsum// mgyogs byed ye shes pho nya la// gzhi dang ngo bo phrin las dang// bka' nyan phrin las pho nya la// gzhi dngos
phrin las dgur ldan na// 'gugs pa'i las la bsgrub par bya// de la gdab pa'i las brgyad bya// rig pa sems kyi phur pa de// skye med chos kyi dbyings la gdab// byang chub sems kyi phur pa de// yum gyi

mkha' la gdab pa yin// tshad med snying rje'i phur pa de/ khams gsum sdug bsngal rgyud la gdab// rdzas kyi phur pa dgra dang bgegs la gdab// dang po tshe gso khrus kyang bya// gnyis pa rnam rtog sgo lnga
dgag/ tshogs brgyad dang po byin gyis brlabs// rten gnyis bcad dang 'khor rtsibs bcad// phur pa za byed yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gdab pa'i phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas
gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badzra kI la ya/ lha dgod pa'i phrin las de lags na/ gdab pa'i dgongs pa mthar phyin bstan du gsol/ zhes
brjod pa las/ bcom ldan 'das yak+Sha he ru kas/ 'di skad ces bstsal to// a b+hi tsar+ya'i dus la bab// brnag pa'i las ni 'di nyid la'o// a ni chos dbyings skye ba med// sgyu ma dngos med kyi bden

pa'o// b+hi ni gsang sngags byin gyis brlabs// thugs rje 'gag med kyi phur pa shar// brten te 'khor ba'i sgo yang dgag/ tsar ni gnyis su med pa ste// bdag dang phur pa gzas pa'o// rig pa rtsa bcud sha

khrag drug/ gnyis med gcig pas sangs rgyas mthu// ya ni sku gsum rgya ma chad// byang chub sems ni rin po che// phyi ni kun gzhi nyon mongs yin// yid kyi rnam shes gsum du shar// nang ni he ru ka'i sku
gsung thugs// gsang ba yab yum byang chub sems// dkar dmar gnyis su med dang gsum// rgya ma chad na sgrib gsum byang// rtog pa bral na sems zhes bya// nyams su lon na rin po che// mtshon drug gong

bu gyur pa la// mi blta don du bden bzhi bdar// da ltar bya ba'i dus la bab// lus kyi brnag pa rdeb pa yin// ngag gi brnag pa sngags bzlas bya/ yid kyi brnag pa rnam gsum po// dwangs ma rnam gsum sbyang

ba dang// dkar nag dri ma bkru ba dang// sems nyid rig pa'i dbyings 'byang 'byung na// brnag pa mtha' ru phyin pa'o// thugs rje gzhan du mi spro'i don// 'di nyid kho na'i dus la bab// phur pa yak+Sha 'bar
ba'i rgyud las/ gdab pa mthar phyin pa'i dgongs pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badzra kI la ya gdab pa'i

dgongs pa mthar phyin pa de lags na/ dbang dang dngos grub blang ba mi 'tshal lam/ dngos grub blang ba'i don rnams bka' stsal pa/ ye shes lha yi dngos grub de// don gyi gnas pa'i tshul du blang// rdo rje

'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma phrin las rgya gram de// gang la gnas pa de la blang// dam can rgya mtsho'i dngos grub de// thob pa'i dus la brten te blang// rtse lnga me ri 'bar rtse dang// ti se'i gangs la nyi shar

dang// 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma brdal// mthing nag sgrib rtse nyil dus su// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las lnga yi dngos grub blang// ting 'dzin lam pa'i dngos grub de// thob pa'i tshul la brten

te blang// 'tsho ba zas kyi dngos grub de// thams cad rdzogs pa'i tshul du blang// de la dbang bskur bya ba yang// phyi ni bum pa'i dbang bskur te// bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis bya// gsang ba a mr-i ta dang rdo
rje tshe'o// phyi ni shes dbang ye shes ni/ lhag pa'i byang chub sems so// nang gi bum pa'i dbang des lus dag pa ste/ lha'i sku snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// nang gi gsang ba ni ngag dag par
byed pa ste/ lce la dbang bskur sngags bklag pa'o// nang gi shes rab ye shes sa yid dag par byed pa ste/ sems las su rung ba'o// gsang ba'i bum pa'i dbang ni/ 'khril te 'khyud cing bsrub pa'o// gsang

ba'i gsang ba ni bde ba rtse la smin pa'o// gsang ba'i shes rab ye shes ni// gnyis shor gnyis mnyam pa'o// phyag rgya ma yi rgyu 'khrungs na// rdo rje slob dpon bka' 'byung na// yi ge na yang sked par chod// bla
mas pad+ma mtshan ldan de// bu la gtad de sbyor bar bskul// bde ba'i ye shes byang chub sems// mkha' nas blangs te rang brten nas// dbang dang dngos grub kha ru btung// de nas blangs te bu la
bskur// mkhas dang gtsang sme med rtog na// grol zhing mi ldog bla ma yin// bu mo'am chung ma mdza' bde mo// 'phangs pa bla ma de la dbul// dngos grub yon tan dam par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor 'gram du

longs spyod kyang// nyam nga bag tsha med par bya// ma byin brkus na dmyal bar lhung// sems kyi thongs nas sbyin pa'i mchog/ bla ma ye shes gter zhes bya// phur pa yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dbang dang dngos

grub bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ badzra kI la ya la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye badzra kI la ya dbang dang dngos grub bstan pa de lags na// rgyud dang

dgongs pa'i khyad par bye brag rnams// phra mor byas te bstan par mi 'tshal lam// bye brag so sor bstan pa bka' stsal pa// rgya shug tsan+dan dkar po dang// skyer pa yang na gla ba dang// seng ldeng mdzo mo dmar

mo dang// shir shing nag po tsher ma can// 'di brgyad phur pa'i rgyu yin te// yang na shing gi rgyu bstan pa// zhi rtsi rgyas pa rtsa ba dbang// drag po sa yi gting la bya// dur khrod rus pa'i rgyud bstan pa// bya phur
dkar po 'gugs byed pa// mgyogs pas zhi ba'i phur par bshad// glang chen bzhon pa ser po la// dngos grub rgyas pa'i phur par bshad// bya rgod mchog gi phur pa de// dbang sdud las kyis phur par

bshad// gcan gzan rkang gi phur pa de// drag po las kyi phur par bshad// dngul la zhi ba rgyas pa gser// dbang sdud dmar thabs zangs yin te// lnga bdun tshogs na drag po lcags// phur pa'i rgyu chen bco

brgyad po// mkhas pas bye brag shes par bya// rgyu la don gyi tshad bstan pa// skye ba rnam bzhi'i sgo bkag pa// tshad ni sor bzhi bstan pa yin// rnam shes brgyad kyi sgo bkag pas// rten 'brel bcu gnyis rgyun
bcad phyir// 'bring tshad sor ni bcu gnyis bstan/ khams chen bco brgyad rtsad bcad phyir// sor ni bco brgyad ring tshad ldan// rnam lnga'i dgongs ldan bar bar par par bya// phur ni rig pa'i

ye shes te// pa ni sna tshogs dngos po'o// sna tshogs sems kyi cho 'phrul tu// rtogs na phur pa zhes su grags// dbyibs ni zlum po'i zhi ba la// rgyas pa rtse mo gru bzhi pa// dbang ni zla gam gsum du bshad// rgya
mdud bcum gzhogs brgyad dang ldan// de yi byin rlabs 'di bzhin no// sngags dang rdzas dang ting 'dzin dang// lag pa'i 'du byed thabs shes rab// grub pas byin gyis brlab par bya// rig pa'i ye shes

byang chub sems// tshad med snying rjes gdab par bya// sgo bzhi don gyi tshad ma'o// phur pa yak+Sha 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud don dgongs pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// phur pa yak+Sha
'bar ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar du/ badzra kI la ya sarba d+harma nir+b+bA Na ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur bu chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan
'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bstan pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid/ thams cad so so ma yin pa'i rang bzhin te/ mtha'
dang dbus med pa 'og min gyi gnas/ drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas/ rgyu rin po che 'bar ba sna tshogs dang/ 'jigs byed drag po'i rgyan mang pos bklubs pa/ rnam pa tha dad cing so so na gsal
ba/ ngo bo gcig cing ye nas gsal ba na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po/ 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po sku gsung thugs bsam gyis khyab pa dang/ ldan pa'i dbu gsum pa/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/
pad+ma dang/ las dang/ 'khor lo la sogs pa'i/ rigs dang grangs dang/ phyag rgya dang/ kha dog la sogs pa'i ngo bor bzhugs so// de yang rigs kyi yab dang yum dang sems dpa' dang/ sems ma dang/ khro

bo dang/ khro mo dang bcas par bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las phyung ngo// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid
ni// ye shes chen pos dbang bsgyur zhing// dkyil 'khor thugs rjes 'byung ba'i ngor// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi ngang las byung// yon tan phrin las de bzhin te// bde
chen mchog gi gnas nyid do// zhes gsungs so// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas kun tu bzang po 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po/ ma lus pa thams
cad kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes/ ma chags yum gyi dkyil 'khor na gnyis su med par bya ba dang/ gdug pa can thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/ rab tu drag po mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas/ chos nyid ma g.yos zhes bya'i dbyings// ma bcos rang bzhin bde ba'i yum// rang bzhin ma g.yos dkyil 'khor ni// bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul dang// phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor
gsal// bde gshegs rgyal bas sbas pa'i gter// sus kyang dpag par dka' ba de// kun tu bzang po bdag la gsal// zhes brjod pas ma chags yum gyis dkyil 'khor dang/ gnyis su med par gyur
to// gyur nas yum gyis 'di skad ces brjod do// chos nyid dbang bsgyur bde chen gtso// bde gshegs rgyal ba kun bzang yid// rang bzhin ye shes drug yin te// kun bzang bde chen nyid kyi brgyan// bde
chen thugs kyi rang bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi mchog/ skal med rnams la rang bzhin gsang// sku gsung thugs nas dbang mchog yin// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin du
dbyer med par gyur pas/ nyid kyi ye shes las karma he ru ka'i ngo bor gyur nas zhu ba po'i bdag nyid tu gyur to// des bka'i lung go nas 'di skad ces gsol to// chos nyid ma bcos don 'di la// spros med
brjod med ye gnas la// skal med thugs rjes ji ltar gzung// gnyis med sems kyi rang bzhin la// skal med 'byung ba ci lta bu// don 'di mi gnas bdag cag la// gnyis med rgyal pos bshad du
gsol// zhes brjod pas/ bka' stsal pa/ ma bcos sems nyid rang bzhin la// ye shes brjod med ye gnas kyang// 'khrul pa'i bag chags phra mo 'dis// gzung 'dzin dngos po gnyis su der// phyin ci
log tu gol ba ste// gnyis med don gyi ngo bo las// thabs chen 'bar ba'i rol pa yis// bden pa gnyis kyi ngang du bsgral// zhes gsungs pas/ karma he ru kas khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol
to// ma bcos chos nyid rang bzhin las// rol pa'i sku ni ci ltar byung// yang dag bden pas ci ltar bsgral// dngos su bsgral ba'i yon tan ci// zhes gsol pas/ khrag 'thung rgyal po badzra kI la yas// ye

shes med pa ma yin pa'i dbyings nas shin tu drag po mi bzad pa'i sku phyung nas/ theg chen gsang ba'i bstan pa 'di// rgya cher grags par gyur pa ni// mya ngan 'da' bar lung bstan te// 'bras bu chub par ston

pa ni// rdul bral dri med bstan pa zhig/ mchog gi zhing khams dag pa 'dir// snang ba thob pa'i skal can la// don gyi ngo bor bshad par bya'o// nga ni snang ba 'di nub nas// chos kyi me long dam pa zhig/ nga
'das gling gi 'jig rten 'dir// 'byung ba'i dge slong skal chen la// bstan pa'i char chen bab nas ni// kun dang mthun par grags 'gyur zhing// nga snang mi gnas de rjes na// lo ni brgyad brgya

dang bcu gnyis kyang cu rtsa gnyis na// gsang 'dus mya ngan 'das pa 'di// byang chub snying po can zhes pa'i// sa le gser gling bya ba der// las dang thugs rje mthun pa yis// chos kyi mig gcig 'byed 'gyur
zhing// rigs ldan kun gyis thob gyur cig/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas/ snying rje rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ kye ma ho sangs rgyas mang po'i tshogs// kun tu
snang ngo rab tu 'dir// srid pa log pa'i gdug pa can// 'khor ba'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs// sdug bsngal chen po yi dwags te// las kyis 'jig rten khams 'dir 'byung// drag po rang gi dka' thub
kyis// srid pa gsum gyi bdag por smin// drag po ru dra'i dug dbal gyis// 'gro rnams mthar rlogs 'joms byed 'di// gdul bar bya ba'i 'os mchog ste/ snying rje'i bdag po kun 'dus la// sdug bsngal
las kyi rgyun bcad de// bde chen sa la bzhag pa'i rigs// zhes gsol to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las khungs dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan
'das badzra kI la yas/ nyid kyi ye shes rigs kyi khro bor sprul nas/ mi 'dul bar dgongs nas bka'i bgro ba mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung snying pos bgros pa/ kye ma'o 'dus pa'i tshogs chen
dag/ 'das pa'i dus nas sngon byung ltar// da lta dus 'dir byung ba ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis/ khro bo'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams
cad kun// shin tu khro drag gtum par 'gyur// shin tu khro drag gtum pa yis// 'o dod 'bod par ltung bar 'gyur// mi bzad chen pos sdug bsngal te// dug gsum mtha' la mngon zhen pa// ci ltar ba
yi thabs kyis gdul// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'das gti mug chen po'i tshogs gyis bgros pa/ shin tu gtum pa'i sems can 'di// ci ltar de dag bzhag gyur na// bag chags ngan pa'i chu rlabs
kyis// bdud kyi tshogs su mngon 'phel nas// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyun gcod cing// bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig par 'gyur// de tshe las kyi mun pa yis// 'gro ba ma rig 'khor bar 'khyams// dug nad
rims nad phra men ma// gnod sbyin gdon dang log 'dren nyid// srid pa gsum po 'jig byed cing// dam tshig gnyan po 'dral byed pa// ci lta ba yi thabs kyis 'dul// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'das nga
rgyal chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// las kyi gdug pa'i rU tra de// rgyal ba 'das pa'i sbyor ba yis// ci ltar khro drag gtum pa ltar// da lta tshe 'dir byung ba
yis// dug gsum brtsegs pa'i ri bo 'di// 'bar 'phro 'khrugs pa'i sbyor ba yis// ci ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du 'os// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas kyang// khros pa'i sprin nag gtibs pa
yis// mngon spyod rol pa'i thabs chen gyis// 'khor ba bsgral ba'i dus la bab// ces bgros so// bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen pos bgros pa// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi
'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las/ khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang// 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis/ khams gsum ma
lus smos ci dgos// zhes bgros so// bcom ldan 'das phrag dog chen po'i tshogs kyis bgros pa/ rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo las// log rtog phyin ci log pas bcings// dngos po rang dgar zhen pa

yi// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba dang// dam tshig la sdang rnams sbyang phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod// ces bgros so// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ thugs rje chen po'i phrin

las kyi bka'i mol pa mdzad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas karma he ru kas 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas/ shin tu yang bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya rigs kyi khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa la/ 'di

skad ces brjod do/ khrag 'thung chen po/ dka' thub gyi sems can 'di// rgyu dang rkyen ni ci las byung// 'bras bu smin pa ci ltar smin// rigs dang sde ni gang du gtogs// las skal spyod pa ci zhig byed// ma

btul ba yi skyon ni ci// btul na yon tan ci ltar 'thob// ces brjod pas bka' stsal pa// log pa'i sems can chen po de// legs pa'i rgyu rkyen las ma byung// nyes pa'i rgyu rkyen las byung ste// rgyu ni gzung
'dzin rtog las byung// rkyen kyang log par spyad las byung// 'bras bu nyon mongs lnga ru smin// rigs ni 'khor ba'i rigs can te// gdol pa can gyi 'byung por gtogs// las skal chags sdang spyod la
zhen// ma btul ba yi skyon bsten na// lha dang mi yi srid pa brlag kha lo log par bsgyur nas su// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab stongs te// 'khor ba ste chad du lus la// sangs rgyas dman rigs su lus
nas// don la mi phan skyon yod do// btul na yon tan dpag tu med// dug gsum rtsad gcod 'khor ba dong nas sprug/ 'khor ba chos nyid chen por 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing khams dag pas
na// btul bas yon tan chen po 'thob// ces brjod pas/ karma he ru kas shin tu bskul te/ e ma ho badzra kI la ya// dus la bab pa'i bskal chen 'dir// las la bab pa'i thugs rje
yis// rnam par smin pa'i 'byung po 'di// bsgral ba 'ba' zhig thugs rje'i mchog/ ces nye bar bskul bas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis/ sprul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad de/ ye shes kyi sprin dmar nag
ni dbyar gyi char sprin du gtibs pas/ 'bar ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs su bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bden pa'i gzhung gis 'dul bar gzas pa na/ rU tra nag pos se gol lan gsum
