la// nyes pa gtsor zhog gdung ba'i mchi ma ngus// sbyin pa'i thabs ldan mnga' bar bcad pa'i bka'// dur khrod chen po'i gnas su bsgral ba'i phyir/ khyod kyi ma rig dur sa btsal ba ni// zhe sdang dbang gis
chags pa'i skyon spangs kyang// gzung 'dzin rnam par thar pa'i lam ma rnyed// btsal bas rnyed med yon tan rmongs pa'i dur// zhe sdang dbang gis bdag gzhan gnyis su mthong// bdag med bla med thar lam

ma rnyed de// tsha grangs dmyal ba'i gnas su zab pa'i phyir// thar bar mi 'gyur zhes te khyod rang nyes// ngan song gsum por khyod kyang mi gtong gis// lus sems gnyis 'brel 'di la chags ma shig/ lha dang
mgon btsan kun dang dbral ba'i phyir// gu gul nyung dkar mu zi ldong ros dang// sha chen snum chen ga pur dud btang la// sdig chen ma rtogs kha 'khor nyon mongs pa// sngon gyi las ngan mi zad de bcad

pas// dus zad tshe 'phos de la ma chags par// sdug bsngal mi zad nyon mongs shes par byos// khro rgyal mi bzad rgyal po hUM sgra can// gdug pa'i mtshon cha char ltar phab pa yis// rang dbang med par rab tu

'jig par 'gyur// de bas sdig can 'di la ma 'khor bar// ngas smras skyes bu nga yi tshig nyon la// rang gi gnas tshol bag dang ldan par byos// de ltar rten dang dbral nas kyang// mda' 'phen zla ba mar ngo

la// nag po'i chas su rab zhugs nas// sngar shi'i ro gos khrag can la// chas gos bya ba'i rgyu ru shis// nag po'i rgyan chas lnga gon la// byang chub sems ni sngon btang ste// drag po'i phrin las nub bdun

bstud// de nas lcags kyi gze ma nyid// snga nas don dang mthun pa ru// mi rta gsad pa'i mtshon rtse la// phur bu so brgyad gcig byas la// gong bzhin byin gyis brlab par byos// gzhan yang phur bu sna tshogs
la// snying po so sor bzlas shing dril// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas 'gug 'dren bya// ming rus gzugs la sngags bzlas so// lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum gyi// sngags 'dir rab tu drag tu

bzlas// swArtsA hUM ka he pu ra bste swA hA/ sre Na Na rA tsa na Na/ he ru me mo ka ri swA hA/ te ru sri spu ka spya mi skye swA hA/ A+oM swAM rtswAM hUM ka de pu ra pa de swA hA/ phI nan rtsa ra nan/ he ru me myo ku ka ra ri swA hA/ he ru sran yu

ka spya mi skye swA hA/ e lig shi ka shig he ru hid pa ma me shan he re lig shan/ li sha shi b+h+yo thuM re leg swA hA/ shi shi b+h+yo thuM/ sngags de re re btab pas su// lcags kyi gze ma rkang gsum de// gcig ni mi phyin slar

mi phyin// rtse gcig sems kyi rang bzhin no// brgyad kyis rnam shes tshogs brgyad dag/ dbang po yul dus gnyis med don// mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su bsgral// byang chub ma bkag yan du khye// don mthun

pa yi dkyil 'khor du// rigs dang ldan pa'i skye bu yis// skal dang ldan pa'i sems can la// dbang po lnga yi gnas lnga ru// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du yis// nyon mongs lnga yi ngo bo la// ye shes lnga yi phra
bkod pas// gnyis med dbyings kyi mkha' la nub// don gyi 'bras bu thig ler gsal// log rtog rgyu 'bras thal bar brlags// chags sdang dngos po gtan nas brlags// gzung 'dzin gnyis ni 'chor
med bzung// phyogs ris sa mtshams dbyings su dag/ pho nya mang pos stong gsum bkang// ma spros sems su ye nas dag/ 'gugs byed mang po gcig tu dril// 'gyur med dbyings kyi ngang du 'dres// zhes

brjod pas/ pho nya'i tshogs de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngang du/ ye nas gnas pa'i don de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das so// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ pho nyas rnam shes ye shes su

sbyongs shing/ mngags par bya ba'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang badzra kI la yas/ don chos nyid zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos par/ sku yang shin tu drag po mi bzad pa'i skur thon

nas/ dregs pa gdon gdug can drag po'i phrin las kyis bsgral la/ phung po 'dod pa'i longs spyod du sgrub pa'i phyir/ rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems sngon du btang nas/ 'di skad ces brjod do// skye med sems kyi
rang bzhin ni// rang bzhin med pas bsgral ba'i zhing// mtshan ma med pas bsad pa'i rigs// dngos po med pas gtub pa'i rdzas// rang bzhin don la bcos med bzhag/ dngos po gzung 'dzin 'dres pa

bsgral// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog raM gyis bsreg/ gti mug mun khams e yis sbyangs// 'dod chags bse rtse khaM gis bkru// nga rgyal brag ri laM gyis gzhig/ phrag dog 'tshub ma yaM gyis bud// dngos gzhi dug
gsum rtsad nas bcad// gong du bstan pa'i gnas dag tu// rdzas dang gtor me de bzhin du// phyi mtshams bcad cing las rnams bcol// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// chag chag gdab

cing sa tshon brlabs// thig gdab bri zhing tshon rtsi bkye// dkyil 'khor yum gyis dbyings 'dra la// dbus su mthing nag gru gsum la// tha ma zla gam dmar pos bskor// rdo rje brag gis yongs su bskor// phyi

rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// bskal pa'i me 'od 'bar bas bskor// de yi phyi rim thod pa'i mkhar// gru chad bzhi dang bar 'khyams gnyis// sgo khyud bzhi dang nag pos bskor// rgyan gyi bye brag tshang bas
brgyan// lcags sam gdug pa'i shing rnams la// phur bu tshad dang ldan pa rnams// de bzhin byin gyis brlab par bya// bdug brdeg byug cing cod pan gdags// b+han+d+ha dum bu gsum pa la// yum chen rgyas
'debs bzhugs gnas bshams// sprul pa'i phur bu mang po kun// dbus nas dgod cing gra ru spungs// rdzas rnams tshogs nas rim bzhin bgod// hUM dbus nas dpal chen 'bar ba'i sku// zhal gsum
phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs sku la 'khril// bde chen sangs rgyas dbu la brgyan/ khrag 'thung rol pa'i thugs las sprul// sprul pa'i phra men phyogs bcur 'gyed// phyogs kyi gdon

rnams zhabs kyis gnon// nyon mongs gdug pa mkha' la sgrol// drag po'i phrin las dus la bab// 'bar ba'i gdan la rim bzhin bzhugs// hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ he he he he

he he he he/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ de bzhin rdzas kyi ngo bo dgod// chos rnams dag pa'i rang bzhin yang// ting 'dzin sbyang phyir rnam gsum bsgom// chos rnams ma bcos rangabazhin dang// mi dmigs don dam
byang chub sems// don dam gnyis med rtog las 'das// brjod med spros bral chos kyi dbyings// ma bcos rang las ma g.yos kyang// dpag med ye shes chen po ni// mkha' la 'ja' tshon snang ba ltar// rang

bzhin klong du sa ler gsal// nam mkha'i rang bzhin dwangs pa la// yon tan khyad par snang ba ltar// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// sems kyi rang bzhin hUM du bsgom// e karma rak+ta/ baM keM ha raM/ b+h+rUM

kha ta li d+hi b+h+rUM ma ya d+hi/ a ma hri yang/ dzi sti ra baM/ hUM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn dIp+ta tsakra ha na ha na hUM phaT/ A+oM gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje rlung nag rak+ta'i rgya mtsho

dang// sha chen sa gzhi keng rus ri rab steng// 'byung chen lnga las grub pa'i gzhal yas ni// dbyibs dang mtshan nyid so sor ma 'dres kyang// ye nas ma bcos yum chen lnga yi ngang// brjod med spros bral
'khor lo rgyas 'debs klong// mkha' mnyam rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar kun tu khyab// ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// phyogs bcu rgya yongs ma chad

pa'i// phyi dang nang med kun tu snang// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// zhing chen gcal bkram rmang du byas// b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas ni// gnam lcags gzer btab rgyan rnams rdzogs// gru gsum

'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// zla gam dmar po dbang gi tshul// zlum po gru bzhi rgyas pa ste// 'od zer dmar smug stong phrag gang// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// ma hA de wa sni bsnol khar// dri za gru

bum klu gdon dang// gnod sbyin la sogs phyogs skyong bcu// 'jigs byed gdan du sni bsnol khar/ A+oM badzra kro ta hUM kA ra hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+hI dI pa ya ti hUM phaT/ badzra mU ka ra mu kha he/ badzra a

Shu sa mu khA he/ A+oM badzra kro ta bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na ha na hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tI lA se kI hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra byA g+h+ra mu kha he/ A+oM badzra gr-iD+ha mu khI he/ A+oM badzra kro ta nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha da ha hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tI tA tA

hUM phaT/ badzra tsa ma ra mu kha he/ badzra dro Na mu khI he/ A+oM badzra kro ta ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI sh+ma shA na pa tI hUM phaT/ badzra ha ri Na mu kha he/ badzra u lU ka mu khI he/ A+oM badzra kro ta Ar+ya a tsa la

hUM/ b+han+da b+han+da b+han+da hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tI mu sa lI hUM phaT/ badzra di pI mu kha he/ badzra kA ka mu khI he/ A+oM badzra kro ta ha ya grI wa hUM/ hu lu hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro tI tsaN+Da lI hUM phaT/ badzra pi DA la mu kha he/ badzra

bak+Sha ti mu khI he/ A+oM badzra a pa ra dzi ta hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tI sa byA ti hUM phaT/ badzra shwa na mu kha he/ badzra sa tri mu khI he/ A+oM badzra kro ta a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tI sa byaM mi

ti hUM phaT/ badzra sing ha mu kha he/ badzra ti tI la mu khI he/ A+oM badzra kro ta trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI mA ra Na hUM phaT/ badzra ta k+Shu mu kha he/ badzra na ku la mu khI he/ A+oM badzra kro ta ma hA ba

la hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro tI tsun+da ya/ ti hUM phaT/ badzra r-ik+Sha mu kha he/ badzra mU Shi ka mu khI he/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ oM AHhUM/ srog gi go ru shar ba dang// snying gi go ru bsgom par bya'o// 'bru

gsum ngo bos byin rlobs la// ye shes lnga yis dbang bskur ro// A+oM badzra yak+Shi NI hUM phaT/ badzra b+hai ra be hUM phaT/ badzra a mr-i ta hUM phaT/ badzra mA ra NI hUM phaT/ dbang bskur byin brlabs de bzhin no// ma bcos

gdod nas dag pa'i dbyings nyid las// ma g.yos rang bzhin gsal ba'i ye shes shar// gnyis med khyad par che bas sku ru bstan// dus gsum skye shi med pas rdo rje ste// dus gsum 'dus ma byas shing skye shi
med// de nyid spros med 'khor lo rgyas 'debs klong// gnyis med byang chub thugs kyi sa bon las// sgril ma hUM gi 'od zer tshogs bcas rnams// yum gyi mkha' la spros ging 'dus

pa las// phyag mtshan rdo rjer gyur cing hUM brjod pas// sku gsung thugs kyi khro bos phyogs mtshams gang// yab yum sprul par bcas te de bzhin no// hUM chen dbu gsum dkar dmar sngo ba'i zhal// rdo rje tho ba
mda' gzhu spu gri bsnams// rnam rgyal dbu gsum sngo ser dkar ba'i zhal// rdo rje tri shUl dung chen 'khor lo bsnams// dbyug sngon dbu gsum ljang dmar sngo ba'i zhal// rdo rje dbyug to rin chen ti ra
bsnams// gshin rje dbu gsum ljag nag sngo ba'i zhal// thod dbyug 'khor lo rdo rje ti ra bsnams// mi g.yo dbu gsum ljang sngon smug pa'i zhal// rdo rje zhags pa gshol dang gtun shing snams// rta mgrin

dbu gsum dkar sngo dmar ba'i zhal// sbrul nag rdo rje spu gri ti ra bsnams// gzhan gyis mi thub dkar dmar ser ba'i zhal// rdo rje ti ra b+han d+ha rnga yab bsnams// bdud rtsi dbu gsum dkar sngo smug pa'i

zhal// rdo rje rgya gram dbyug to spu gri bsnams/ khams gsum rnam rgyal dbu gsum dkar sngo zhal// rdo rje mda' gzhu dung dmar ti ra bsnams// stobs chen dbu gsum dmar nag dud kha'i zhal// rdo rje zhags

pa gshol dang gtun shing bsnams// sgra 'byin mda' snyems rdo rje sder mo gsum// dur khrod gtun khung rdo rje sder mo drug/ mda' snyems rlung 'byin rdo rje gsod byed dgu/ skyod byed la sogs rgyan rnams de

bzhin ste// zhal mdog de bzhin g.yas na dril bu bsnams// g.yon gyis de bzhin dung chen stob par mdzad// phag dang smig bu stag dang bya rgod dang// g.yag dang bya rog sha ba 'ug pa dang// gzig dang khwa ta

byi la pu shud dang// spyang mo khra dang seng ge pha wang dang// dred dang sre mo dom dang byi bar bcas// rgyan dang mdog ni yab kyi ngo bo ste// phyag mtshan yab kyis nyid kyi rtags su ste// sprul pa'i don gyis rtags kyi

ngo bor bsnams// gtso bo thugs kyi ye shes rnam bzhi yis// ma rig rmongs pas bcings pa'i sems can rnams// don dam gnyis med ngang du bsgral ba dang// skye shi rtsad nas gcod phyir hUM kA ra// 'khor lo

rgyas 'debs rang bzhin 'dus ma byas// dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin las// gnyis med che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// skyi shi med pa'i don 'byin sgra 'byin ma// spyod pa'i ye shes sa rnams
dus gcig gcod// thugs rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas spor// thabs dang shes rab spyod pas mtha' gnyis spangs// de phyir hUM mdzad gnyis mdzad shwa bya tI// hUM chen yab yum gnyis med byang chub
las// sprul pa yang sprul tshogs bcas de bzhin no// lhag mthong ye shes chos dbyings rlan gyis brgyan// thugs rje smon lam 'khor ba gdug sgrol rmongs// rtog 'joms rdzas la gtsang sme med

par rol// de phyir myos byed phra men sU kar he// 'jug pa rang dbang med par nyid gyur nas// bsam dang mi mthun log lta myos byed cing// bstan pa'i chos sgrog log lta myos byed pa// thams cad myos byed phra
men i Shu mus kha he/ khro rgyal ye shes me long lta bu yis// chos rnams rang bzhin med par ye nas rtogs// mtha' gnyis ma spangs rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan btsugs// de dag don las rgyal bas rnam par
rgyal// ye shes thugs rjes zin pas bsam mi khyab// thugs rje shes pas zin pas srid las 'das// gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bstan// 'dod pa'i rgyal po mnyes byed lA se ki/ thugs rjes
sdug bsngal mi bzod las 'das pas// yal bar mi gtong brtson 'grus shugs kyi brtun// gdod nas don mdzad 'khor ba mtha' gtug sgrol// de phyir dpa' brtul za byed byA g+h+ra ma// yid g.yo las can

sems kyi 'gyur ba ni// ye shes dbang gis 'gro la thugs rje g.yo// don mdzad ye shes 'od 'byung dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir tshul khrims ldan ma'i gr-ing+d+ha ma/ khro bdag thugs kyi ye shes chen po des// 'khor
ba'i bag chags nyer len 'joms par byed// nga rgyal dregs las zhen pa'i nyon mongs de// 'gyur med ngang las g.yos pa med pas na// de phyir ye shes dbyer med dbyug sngon can// rig pa'i sder chen chos
kyi dbyings nyid zin// thugs rje lcags kyus 'khor bar mi gtong zhing// shes rab thabs ldan lcags kyus 'dzin par byed// gtso bo dbyug sngon mnyes byed tA tA bI// sdang mig thugs rjes mi 'gyur zhe la
gnon// mthu rtsal rngom brjid 'gyur med mthu dpung 'joms// tsham rngams ral bsigs gdangs sgras 'jig rten 'gengs// de phyir 'gyur med phra men tsa ma ra// bsam pa'i dngos pos 'dod la 'dun pa
'dzin// dbyings nyid mnyam pas ye shes mkhyen pas gzigs// thugs rje 'dun pas 'khor ba'i bag chags za// de phyir za byed tro Na mu kha he/ khro bdag ye shes mnyam pa'i rgyal po yis// 'chi bdag bdud

dang gshin rje tshar gcod cing// de yi rang bzhin de nyid yin pa'i phyir// de phyir khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// ye shes mtshan sdug thugs rje khro 'byung zhing// sprul pas 'gro sgrol sku dang ye shes

'byung// shes snying ma skyes dbu mar rig pa ste/ khro rgyal gshin rje mnyes mdzad sta na sa// rtog pa'i dgra spangs drag po'i dgongs par gnas// 'khrul skyon dri ma shes bya'i rdzis tshor yang// 'gro don dus la
bab na thugs rjes 'jug/ de phyir 'jug byed ha riN mu kha he// dmigs pa sems 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur// ye shes dbyings rtogs 'grangs pas nyin mo nyal// 'gro ldang rmongs la thugs

rjes mtshan mo ldang// ye shes thugs rjes 'grangs pa'i u lU ma/ khro bdag thugs kyi ye shes mthar mi g.yo// de yi rang bzhin gang yin dbyer med pa// dngos por ma spros rang bzhin don gyis khyab// kun la
khyab pa'i phyir na mi g.yo mgon// mtshan ma thabs kyi tho bas dbyings su brdungs// thugs rjes sems can phrin las mtshan ma 'joms// rmongs pa ye shes snying rjes mi gtong bas// mi g.yo mgon po mnyes

mdzad mu sa la// chos dbyings gnas la rtogs pa'i skyon sel cing// thugs rjes spu gris sprul pa bsam mi khyab// dug gsum zad phyir sha rus khrag la rol// sel byed sprul pas don mdzad byA g+h+ra ma// brnag

pa'i dngos la ting 'dzin rtse gcig sgyur// mnyam nyid mthu rtsal dbyings la ma g.yos pas// rtog pa'i spyod yul bral bas mi mthong ste// de phyir phra men mgyogs byed pre ta lI// khro bdag rnam par mi stong ye
shes kyis// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i chos thams cad// de yi rang bzhin ma 'dres par 'dus pas// de phyir khro bo'i rgyal po rta mchog dpal// rdo rje gtum mos mtshan ma'i dngos po 'joms// ye shes
rngam tshul srid pa thal bar rlog/ de nyid mi rtog mtha' bral dbu mar brjid// ha ya grI wa mnyes byed dza ya ti// yang pa gzon chags 'gro don thabs dang ldan// mi 'dul zil thub btang snyoms chen por
bzhugs// dus la mi 'da' brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// de phyir mkhas brtson mdzad pa'i pi DI li// las 'bras bden la yid ches dad par 'gyur// mnyam nyid dbyings su ye shes thugs kyis

mgyogs// zhi gnas don gyis lhag mthong gto tshegs chud// de phyir mgyogs byed phra men bak+Shi tI// khro bdag thugs kyi ye shes tshad med las// dbyings kyi don la mtshan mas yongs mi thub// thugs rjes
'gro don rnam par mdzad pa la// bdud dang srin pos shin tu thub dka' ste// rang bzhin gang yin gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// phra bas dbyings nyid 'bigs pa'i ye shes 'phen// dbyings la ye shes thugs rjes
gtan du rdeg/ ma rmongs dbu ma chen po'i don ston pa'i// gzhan gyis mi thub mnyes mdzad sa byA tI// dbyings la ye shes zhugs pas shes bya za// dbyings nyid shes pa zhugs pas nyon mongs za// gnyis med

ye shes thugs rjes 'khor ba za// de phyir za byed shwa na mu kha he// ye shes thugs rjes chos kyi dbyings la 'dzin// lhag mthong ye shes dbyings la mnyam 'gyur 'dzin// zhi gnas che bas 'dzin pas mi 'phrog
ste// de phyir 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid pany+dzi ra/ khro bdag thugs kyi ye shes ye nas grub// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes chos dbyings su// 'khor ba'i chos can bdud dang 'dra ba la// ye shes thugs rje

sman gyi rtsi btang zhing// ye shes kun la khyab pa'i dbyings su 'khyil// de phyir khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rtsi 'khyil// mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings nyid rig pa'i sgra// dbyings rig ye shes gnyis la nyan pa'i sgra// de
las bstan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin ma// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa mnyes mdzad sa byA mi ta// rigs btsun gnyen por gyur pas thams cad 'dul// phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung thams cad 'joms// stong nyid sgra
sgrogs mu stegs wa tshogs 'joms// de phyir rtsal 'phags 'joms byed sed+ha ma// 'dris pa'i dngos po mi brjed dran par 'gyur// dbyings dang ye shes mnyam nyid mi brjed dran// ting 'dzin 'bum phrag lhag
mthong so sor gsal// de phyir sgra 'byin phra men ti tI la/ khro rgyal thugs kyi ye shes chen po des// dus gsum mi 'gyur sems kyi rang bzhin ni// gnyis med chos kyi dbyings su rab rtogs pas/ khams

gsum mya ngan 'das pa'i ngang du rgyal// de phyir khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar bstan// bdag tu blta ba'i mtshan ma kun 'joms shing// za byed mche bas skye shi rtsad nas gcod// sku dang ye shes ma skyes mi
dmigs pas/ khams gsum rnam rgyal mnyes mdzad ma ra NI// dbyings la ye shes shar zhing thugs rje rmi// mthing nag chen pos drag po'i skur ston pa// thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ma mgyogs 'khyog kyang

dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir rmi byed phra men tak+Shu mu kha he// chos rnams dbye ba med par gyur pa ni// mnyam dang mi mthun log lta myos byed cing// rig pa skyed phyir sems nyid the tshom gcod// de phyir gsod byed
phra men na ku la/ khro bdag ye shes thugs de rnam dag pas// thams cad dbyer med dbyings kyi ngang du stobs// mtha' gnyis zil gyis gnon pas brjod du med// gnyis med don gyis ngo bo stobs po
che// thugs dam dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas bskul// thugs rje'i shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren// gnyis med mchod 'bul dbu ma'i dgyes pa stobs// ma hA ba la mnyes mdzad tsun+da ya hUM// lhag
mthong ye shes stobs kyis mtha' gnyis gnon// tsham rngams ral bsigs gdangs sgras stong gsum 'gengs// las su ci mdzad brtson 'grus stob dang ldan// de phyir stobs ldan phra men r-ik+Sha ka/ gsum

'dus bcas pa rig pa gyur pa ni// phrin las bye brag mang po ci mdzad kyang// phyag rgya bzhi ni ma bskyed dbyings su mkhyen// de phyir 'phrog byed phra men mU Shi ka/ 'khor ba rdo rjes gcod pas mya ngan 'das// chos
sku rdo rje brjod pas mya ngan 'das// brjod med brjod bral don gyi tshig dang bral// de phyir brjod med badzra yak+Sha NI// chos nyid rdo rjes mtshan ma'i dngos po 'joms// ye shes rdo rjes gzung

'dzin rtog pa bsregs// phyag mtshan rdo rje drag pos lha bdud 'joms// de phyir don la brjod med b+hai ra be// 'chi med bdud rtsis yul sems skye 'gag med// de nyid don de ye shes thugs rje 'byung// gnyis

med bdud rtsi'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel// de phyir bdud rtsi mchog gi ye shes a mr-i ta// ye shes spros med yon tan rgya mtsho 'grub// thugs rjes 'phrog cing 'jig rten dbang du sdud// ye shes thugs rjes
mnyam nyid dbyings su sdud// de phyir phra men rlag byed mA ra NI// cho ga rnam gsum las kyi 'phro 'du las// sku bskyed gsal gdab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// don gyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings su

bstan// snang srid don gyi ngang du rang gnas pas// snang srid las kyi dkyil 'khor bdag gis bskyed// ces brjod pas/ ci ltar snang zhing srid pa thams cad dpal khrag 'thung gi rang bzhin du mya ngan las
'das so// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed cing che ba'i yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos las kyi

dkyil 'khor du bdag bya ba'i phyir/ drag po'i phrin las su bdag bya zhing/ dngos grub nod pa dang/ tshad med pa bzhis 'gro ba ma rig pa'i don du/ drag po gtum po'i phrin las kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

bzhugs nas/ 'di skad ces brjod do// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur bu'i lta[\[]lha[\]]// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes

sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings la// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad par// sku yi dbyig tu bdag gyur cig/ ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po che// nga nyid du ni bdag gyur cig/ phyag
rgya'i rgyal por bdag bskyod cig/ 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul ba la// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlab
'dir stsol cig/ srid pa gsum gyi bsdus pa kun// thugs kyi ye shes phur bu yis// khams gsum gdar sha bcad pa dang// srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ma
bcos thig le chos dbyings las// 'gyur med sku gcig gnas pa de// ye shes khro bor gshegs su gsol// drag po'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// nyon mongs gdug pa bsgral ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo
gshegs nas kyang// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen gyi// 'phro 'du las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// nyon mongs phung po bsgral ba

dang// rnam shes hUM du gdon pa'i phyir// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// drag po las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// gnod gdug rnam gnyis bsgral ba'i phyir// gang gi pho nya mang po des// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i
khams bkang nas// gang dmigs gnas nas 'gugs par bsam// dpal chen kI la ya yi spyan snga ru// rnal 'byor kun gyi las bya zhes/ khas blangs dam bcas ji bzhin du// dam tshig chen po'i dus la
bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// mthu rtsal phyung ba'i dus la bab// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// gnyis med don du bsgrub pa ni/ khams gsum rgyal
ba'i gdung 'tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin rnal 'byor rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams/ khro bo pho nya'i byin rlabs las// lcags kyi gze rgod skar ltar

'khrugs// sprul pa'i phyag brnyan glog bzhin 'gyu// ma mo mkha' 'gro khra ltar 'jum/ khro bo mang po thog ltar 'bab// rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir/ khro tshogs 'bar ba'i byin rlabs kyis// yud tsam gyi ni

'dir khug la// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang// lus ngag rdul du bshigs nas kyang// rnam shes hUM du rab bskyed kyis// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// pho nya mang po'i 'phro 'du yis// gnas

nas khug la zil gyis gnon// oM laM/ hUM laM/ s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ mo ha g+ha ya/ hrIHSh+t-IHbi kr-i/ snying po sngags kyis bkug pa de// ri rab 'og tu zil gyis mnan// ming dang mtshan mar bcas pa de/ khrag 'thung yab

yum zhal du bstab// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byin rlab las// hUM chen po dang sras mchog bskyed// de yis ri rab rming nas mnan// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur// badzra hUM ka ra hUM/ badzra kI li kI la ya/
phyag rgya chen po rnam bzhi yis// dgug cing bcings la dam du sdom// sems ma 'khrugs par dbang du bsdu/ hUM gis bsdus la phaT kyis gtor// hUM kA ra dang kI la ya// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi dbus bsdus

la// chos nyid a yi ngang du spar/ dzaHhUM baM hoH sarba big+h+nAn/ badzra kI la ya/ hUM phaT/ badzra hUM kA ra hUM/ khro bo'i tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor de// phaT kyis spros pas dgra la bstim// gzi bkrag dbang rnams mngon

du phrog/ tsar gyi byung ste ya la bsdu// bdag gi thugs kar dbang bskur bas// skye med tshe yi dngos grub thob// phaT aH/ de ni ting 'dzin phur pa ste// rtse gcig ma yengs 'grub pa'i rtags// ting 'dzin lta ba
ma khrol na// dngos su bsgral bas don mi 'grub// don gyi 'bras bu ngan song rgyu// don nyid gnyis med dbyings su bsgral// ting 'dzin gsal ba'i phur pas gdab// ces brjod pas/ 'jigs

byed khro bo'i tshogs kyis thams cad dmigs su med par mya ngan las bsgral lo// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bdag nyid che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed de/ dbang nod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi
phur pa gdab pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas yang khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ drag po'i phrin las kyis dmigs pa'i dgra de mngon sum du bsgral ba'i phyir// nyon mongs pa'i gzugs la// pho nyas
dbang po mngon sum du bsdu ba 'di skad ces brjod do// skal ngan las kyis mnar ba de// rnal 'byor don la bar gcod byas// gnyis med bsgral bas mi 'dul bas// mngon spyod bsgral ba'i las byas

la// gang gis gzugs la ming rus bris// gshin rje'i phyogs su las rnams bya/ khru gang brkos la rgya sol gdab// thod pa mda' gzhu zhags pa dang// rtsang dang dug rdzas tshang bas bskor// ma nyes zhal lce
kun la bcol// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas las 'di bya'o// bdag nyid dbang gi rgyan gyis brgyan// dam can bsnyen nas pho nya bkye// gzugs bsdu ba yi las bsdu ba// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// rnal
'byor don sgrub dkyil 'khor la// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// pho nya phyag brnyan tshogs bcas kyis// zung zhig chings shig rnam par sdoms// gtogs
shig grogs dang phral bar gyis// rig par khug la smyor chug cig/ phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// las kyi pho nya mang po kun// gzugs la bsdu ba'i las byung gis// sngon chad dam bcas ci bzhin

du// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis// rnam shes dbang po gzugs la bsdus// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang// dril bu phyag rgya bzhi bcas la// bsdu ba'i dngos po

'di brjod cing// dbang pos mngon sum mthong bar bsam// shI g+h+raM A na ya hUM phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ya na ha ra na hUM phaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ A be sha ya A be sha ya

hUM phaT/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ khrag 'thung khro bo'i tshogs kyis/ nyon mongs pa'i sems gzugs la bsdus pas// bdag po dbang pos mngon sum du mthong nas rnam par shes pa'i sems/ mya ngan las 'das par

bya ba'i phyir ro// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gzugs la rnam shes dbab cing bsdu ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang kI la yas/ de drag po sngags dang khro tshogs kyis
phur pas gdab cing bsgral ba'i phyir/ sdang ba zhe la bzhag thugs rjes nyon mongs pa'i zhe sdang gting nas g.yos nas/ shin tu gtum pa'i nga ro dang/ gdangs skad drag po'i phrin las kyis gtum
tshig 'di skad brjod do// hUM drag po 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gtum rngam 'khrugs pa'i ngo bo las// pho nya phyag brnyan tshogs rnams kyis// rnam shes gzugs la bsdus pa de// nyon mongs 'bras bu
'phel byed pas// thabs kyis 'dul ba'i skabs med kyis// dmigs kyis mngon sum bsgral bar bya// mthing nag cod pan phur pa la/ khro bo'i tshogs su de bzhin de// bdug brdeg byug la brlabs shing
bskur// glad la lan gsum sku gsung thugs/ khams gsum phur pas dus gcig bsgral// ngang la pho nya'i phur pas gdab// de nas sngags dang ting nge 'dzin// thabs dang dgos ched lnga ru yod// dam

tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i de bzhin te// dbus nas phur pa bzhi blang la/ khro bdag yab yum hUM ka ra// sgra 'byin ma ste yab yum bzhis// drag po'i
gnas su rim bzhin gdab// shin tu mi bzad hUM sgra can// gdug pa'i tshogs bcas ma lus kyis// dngos su btab nas zhig par bsam// don gyi btab pas mkha' la bton// yum gyi gser zhun lta bu'i
sems// hUM gis bsdus pas bdag la bstim// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs// dus gsum 'gyur med tshe yi dngos// che ba'i yon tan mthar phyin bsam/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i dbang thob
pas// don gyi gnas kyang theb par bsam// dran pa'i gzhi la des btab nas// nyon mongs rtsa thag nges gcod nas// sems nyid ye shes chen por bskyed// dbang po'i yul la des btab pas// dran pa
nyams nas dbang po 'phrog/ rnam shes mi gnas gnas su bsgral// don dam gnyis med mkha' la bsgral// bstod cing phrin las drag po rol// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// srog gi go ru shar ba

de// dmigs par bya ba'i don rnams la// snying gi go ru kI la ya// hUM tsit+ta tsit+ta hUM phaT/ a dzi te a pa ra dzi ta hUM phaT/ taM ga te hUM phaT/ dza ye bi dza ye hUM phaT/ bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs/ khyed kyi phrin

las dus la bab// sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na badzra/ b+han+da b+han+da badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ ha na ha na badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ ma ra pra marda na ye hUM

phaT// pa ra bid+yA na mu ru mu ru hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na pA ya gr-ih+NA pA ya hUM phaT/ su ru su ru badzra/ b+hin+d+ha bin+d+ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ rim gyi 'jug la de bzhin te// gnyis med mkha' la bsgral ba yin// zhes brjod
pas/ thams cad ma lus par thebs nas/ phung po dngos su bsgral te rnam par shes pa mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ phur pa dngos su gdab

cing rnam shes mya ngan las bzlas pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas yang drag po'i phrin las mtshon gyis brdeg cing gtub pa'i phyir/ 'di skad do// hUM rnam shes bsgral ba'i phung po la// sprul pa phyag

brnyan las bya'o// 'di yang pho nya'i ting 'dzin dang// sngags dang thabs dang dgos ched do// hUM zhing bcu bsgral ba'i phung po la// pho nya rol pa'i las bya bas// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// rdo rje gsang

ba'i bka' las ni// sdig chen gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po dang// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// de ni pho nyas gtub
pa dang// bka' rnams nyan par byed pa'o/ khro bo gdug pa'i mtshon dbal gyis// nyon mongs mnan pa'i phung po de// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gris gtub// mgo snying lhu gzugs ma lus rnams// dngos gzhi med

par brlag par bsam// gtub dang bka' nyan snying po dang// de dang der ni de bzhin no// ma ma ba shaM ku ru ma thA ma/ dz+nyA na ka ra i daM/ da d+hi ma ma shig+h+raM karma kA ra ya/ rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo yis// g.yon gyis
mnan la g.yas kyis so// spyi bo ske dang phung po rnams// de la de yis de bzhin gtub// ma rig nyon mongs rgya dral nas// yang dag gnas la des bkod na// 'gyur med sku thob de dgongs nas// ming

gis mi byar mi gtub bo// zhes brjod pas// nyon mongs pa lnga ye shes lnga'i ngang du mya ngan las 'das so// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ mtshon gyi gtub pa'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer

bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang kI la yas/ de'i mthu dang rdzu 'phrul phyir mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad brjod do// de yang pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sngags dang thabs dang dgos ched do// phung po lhag ma

ga go la// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gnyis med par/ khro tshogs 'bar ba'i dus la bab// yang dag don spyod rnal 'byor la// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha yang rung ste bdud kyang rung// nga la bar chod

byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par gyis// yab kyi pho nya rgyu byed kyis// de yi mthu rnams 'phrog par bsam// yum gyi pho nya 'jigs byed kyis// de yi rdzu 'phrul 'phrog par rol// sa bsal na ya hUM
phaT// ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ de yi 'od zer bsam yas pas// de yi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul rnams// phaT kyis gtor la hUM gis bsdus// bdag la de yi 'od 'dus pas// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ldan
pa'i thabs// thabs kyi 'phro 'du mang po las// bdag la thabs kyi rgyu yod pas// de'i mthu dang rdzu 'phrul rnams// ston mi nus pa'i dogs pa'o// zhes brjod pas gdon gyi rigs de dag gis

mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston mi nus par gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul phrogs nas phyis ston mi nus par bya ba'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas yang kI la

yas// drag po phrin las kyis// gtum tshogs 'bar ba'i bar du// nyon mongs dug lnga'i gzhi zhe sdang 'bar bar smin pa'i phung po'i thed rol de mi gnas par bsgral te/ gnas su stob pa'i phyir 'di skad brjod

do// hUM gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i klong// bcos med yum gyi mkha' klong du// yab kyi ye shes tho tshogs kyis// nyon mongs ma lus rten 'pho ba'i// lhag ma ma lus skur bton gyis// dam tshig chen po'i

dus la bab// pho nya mang pos gtun du brdung// brdung dang bstab dang dbyings su bsgral// snying po rim bzhin sngags bzlas pas// gnyis med mkha' la gdon par bya'o// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun/
khro bdag dpal chen 'bar ba yi// bka' las 'das pa'i sdig chen rnams/ khas blangs dam bcas mna' bor bas// rang gi gshed mar rang gyur te// rdo rje me dbal snying bsregs nas// lus ngag rdul phran

bzhin du rlogs/ khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdung byas te// lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya'o/ khA thaM khA thaM khA thaM/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ badzra rak+sha kro ta khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha/ don nyid mi
dmigs dbyings su bsgral// dkar nag mtshams nas sku bskyed la// nyi shu rtsa gcig kI la yas// snang srid phur bu'i skur gyur te// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog rtsad gcod pa'i// skye med byang chub sems su

bstan// zhes brjod do// chos nyid don gyi byin brlabs so// gsang sngags che ba'i byin brlabs so// sangs rgyas kyis ni nus mthu yis// a b+hi tsar+ya'i dus la bab pa'o// gnag pa de kho na la'o// badzra kI li
kI li/ gnag pa de kho na la'o// kI li kI li zhes bco brgyad dkar nag gi mtshams su'o// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ drag po phrin las kyis gtun tshogs su brdungs shing/ chos nyid

bden pa'i don gyi phur pas/ nyon mongs pa rtsad nas bcad nas/ byang chub kyi sems phur bu'i rang bzhin du mya ngan las bzla ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas yang kI la yas bsgral ba de dag
don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ dgos ched sku mchog shin tu legs par bstan cing/ bsgral ba'i gnas kyi man ngag 'di skad brjod do// de dag bsgrub pa'i dam pa ni// kun gyi bya ba ma yin te// gnyis med don
ldan skyes bu des// gnod gdug rnam gnyis ma bsgral na// nges par ngan song 'khor bar ltung// ci phyir nges pa'i las la sgrib// nges pa'i don bor log par gol// blta ba ngan pas ras chod
byas// spyod pa rtsing bas tho cor byas// dam tshig nyams pas gzu lums byas// gzhung las gol bas dkyil 'khor dral// ma nyes pa ni drag par 'joms// rang las mkhas la skur pa 'debs// de la drag

po'i las byas na// mya ngan 'das pa'i yon tan thob// ma mo mkha' 'gro bran bzhin 'khol// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// dgra dang 'byung po rdul du rlog/ mthu chen lha srin de bzhin te// ci bgyis bka'
nyan bsgo ba nyan// 'di dang pha rol gnyis su yang// bsam pa 'grub cing mtho ris thob// bdag dang gnyis med byang chub sems// gnyis med chos skur dbyer med pas// ngan song gsum po sgo bkag
nas// gnyis med mkha' la de bsgral na// don dang mthun pas dam tshig skong// sdig chen bsgrol na las ngan chad// dam nyams bsgral na bka' gzhung btsan// log rtog bsgral na dkyil 'khor
gnyan// gnod gdug bsgral na bar chad nyung// gzhan yang yon tan brjod las 'das// 'bras bu nges par chud mi za/ khro bdag chen po thabs mkhas pas// bsgral ba'i las rnams bya bar bshad// dang po

snying rjes gzhi bzung la// tshad med rnam bzhi sngon du gtong// de nas bsgral ba'i phung po de// gnyis med lha yi dkyil 'khor du// yang dag don gyi sbyang bar bya// nam mkha' lta bur skye ba med// rnam dag phung

po lnga yis bsdus// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rje gtam byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// bsgral ba'i rnam shes hUM du gsal// de nyid byang chub

sems kyi rtags// dpal chen rdo rje nyid kyi sku// ma lus dbyer med 'dus ma byas// gnyis med don gyi de bzhin no// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ sku gsung thugs kyi 'bru gsum po// hUM gis

bsdus la phaT kyis 'phang// mkha' la bton la rdo rjer ro// rtse lnga 'bar ba'i sku ru gsal// mi 'gyur sku yi ngo bor gyur// hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ tiSh+Tha badzra ces brjod pas// thams cad mya
ngan las 'das nas sku mchog de shin tu mi 'gyur bar gyur to// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gso zhing byang chub kyi sems gcig gi rang bzhin du bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun
pa'o//// de nas yang ni kI la yas/ karma kI la ya nyid kyi thugs kar bsdus shing/ yongs su bzung ba 'di gsungs so// e ma ho/ phyogs bcu dus gsum cir yang snang// byang chub rdo rje nyid kyi
sku// spros med thig ler gnas pa las// gzung 'dzin las kyis rnam par zin// chos kyi sgo mo bsam yas kyang// mya ngan 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam// nyon mongs dug lnga thabs kyis
btul// don dam mya ngan 'da' bar bsgral// don gyi man ngag nges par bshad// 'jigs byed dpal chen thams cad kyis// phyag rgya chen por mya ngan 'da'// don de rtogs nas sus brjod pa// nges par yang
gsang dbang chen rdzogs/ khrag 'thung rgyal po 'khor bcas la// mya ngan 'das las gzhan mi mnga'// mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu rgyal 'di// nyid de nges don thugs las byung// de ni nges par lung bstan
te// thugs las skyes pa'i he ru ka/ mi 'gyur byang chub sems la gnas// zhes brjod pas/ dpal khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas pa thasam cad dbyer med par shin tu dgyes nas/ sku gsung thugs kyi rgyan

gyis thams cad ma lus par mya ngan las 'das par gyur te/ karma he ru ka yang nyid kyi thugs kar bsdus te thim par gyur to// phur bu 'bum sde rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po las/
yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// phur bu mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so////
